3a1(brgyad stong): so tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams gang ci spyad smon pa dang / brjod pa da 'cha
3a2(brgyad stong): kA/ 8/ rab tu ston pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyi zhen/ de bzhin gshegs bram
3a3(brgyad stong): gang bstan pa'i chos bstand pa de la bslabs nas/ de dag chos nyid de mngon sum du byed do// chos nyid de mngon sum du byas nas gang ci smra ba pa
3a4(brgyad stong): stond pa dang / brjod pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rab tu ston pa de dag thams cad chos nyid dang myi 'gal lo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu
3a5(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu de dag 'di ltar chos nyid du stond pa rnam sachos nyid dang myi 'gal ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa'i chu mthun pa
3a6(brgyad stong): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad
3a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la rtsom ste/ ci nus kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3b1(brgyad stong): rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ khyod spobs par byos shig ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das
3b2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas
3b3(brgyad stong): lags// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de yang bdag gis yang dag para'i rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom
3b4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de yang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das byang
3b5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang bdag gis ma 'tshal ma dmyigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang ma 'tshal ma dmyigs
3b6(brgyad stong): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na / byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang la gdams shing bstan par bskyedabacom ldan 'das 'on
3b7(brgyad stong): kyang gal te 'di ltar bshad cing bstan pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems myi zhum myi 'gong ste/ de'i yid phyir phyogs par myi bgyid de mya skas
4a1(brgyad stong): ci dang / drang bar myi 'gyu de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stonang pa lags so// de nyid byang chub
4a2(brgyad stong): ka/ sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par rig par gyi'o// de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gdams pa lags so// gal te de ltar
4a3(brgyad stong): gnas na/ de nyid gdams pa dang bstan pa lags so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod cang
4a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsgoms pas/ ji ltar bslabs ma/ byang chub sems dpa'i sos des kyang rlom sems su kyi bgyid pa de ltar bslab par bya'o// 
4a5(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems de ni sems ma mchis pa ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni 'od gsal ba lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan
4a6(brgyad stong): ba rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci gang sems myed pa'i sems de yod dam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dkyis
4a7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ji sems myed pa gang yin pa de la yod pa 'am myed pa myi dmyigs pa yod dam// sha ri'i bus smras pa
4a8(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da de ni myed do// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gal te sems myed pa de la gal te yod pa 'am myed pa myed cing myi dmyig na/ kang tshe dang ldan
4b1(brgyad stong): ba sha ri'i bu 'di skad du sems myed pa'i sems de yod dam zhes zer ba de/ khyod kyis de skad brgal bar rung ngam// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
4b2(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorang sems myed pa de gang yin// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems
4b3(brgyad stong): myed pa ni 'gyur ba myed rnam par rtog pa myed pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
4b4(brgyad stong): ji ltar khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa myed pa la gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa ltar ston pa legs so legs so// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
4b5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chupa las phyir myi ldog par brtag par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
4b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyind pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// nyan zos kyi sA la slob par 'dod pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya'o// bzung bar bya
4b7(brgyad stong): bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rnal 'byor du bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la
4b8(brgyad stong): slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ bzung bar bya/ bcang byar bya// klag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o/ shes rab kyi
5a1(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o/ rnal 'gyur du bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa la slong par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
5a2(brgyad stong): pa 'di nyid mnyam par bya/ bla byung bar bya/ bzang bar byed/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po 'di nyid la thabs ma'am pa
5a3(brgyad stong): ldam pas sangs rgyas kyi 'os thams cad mang+yas smra subya ba'i phyir nal 'byor du bya'o/ de ci'i phyi zhes byung chub po rjes rgyu ma sa na 'os su
5a4(brgyad stong): bslab cing rnal 'byor du bya ba'i byang chub sems dpo'i chos thas tha rgyas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid lus bsta / bla ma myong ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
5a5(brgyad stong): la slob par 'dod pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ bzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ mun chub par bya
5a6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la zabs ma sa pa dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir rten rnal 'byor du bya'o// 
5a7(brgyad stong): de ba'i phyir zhem/ shes rab kyi sa re le la bu mu pa 'phyilas mi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mdul bslab par bye ba dang rnal 'gro rjed bya ba'i sa sus
5a8(brgyad stong): kyi chos thams cad rgyas par bstan tos/ de nas bcom na 'angs la rkye dadu ldam par ba 'bye kyis 'di skad ces gsolang to bcom ldan 'das kyang chub sems dpa'i bye 'di
5b1(brgyad stong): bdag gis ma 'tshal ma dmyigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong shes rab kyi pha rol pa phyinang pa yang mi 'jal/ ma dmyigs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ bcom
5b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i mying de mo 'tshal ma dmyigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang ma 'tshal ma dmyigs yang dag par rjesu
5b3(brgyad stong): myi mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa gang la gdams shing bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dngos po ma 'tshal
5b4(brgyad stong): ma dmyigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ mying tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' zhes 'du ba dang / 'jig par bgyid pa ni bdag gi blo ba la gcugs mod kyi
5b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das myeng de myi dmyigs shing myi gnas pa yang ma legs na rnam par gnas pa yang ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mying de yang ma mchis pa'i slar
5b6(brgyad stong): du de ltar mying de myi gnas shing myi gnas pa yang ma legs larnam par myi gnas pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo bshad pa la
5b7(brgyad stong): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems ma zhum ma gong / yi ma bsad/ yid phyir phyogs par myi bgyidamyi skrag myi dang / dngang bar myi 'gyur/ 
5b8(brgyad stong): zhing lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nI/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// phyir m+bi ldog pa'i byang chub
6a1(brgyad stong): ma na ma sa ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa sa
6a2(brgyad stong): gzugs pa gas pa sngo kyi de bzhin du tshong pa la ma las
6a3(brgyad stong): ro lad tu phyind pa la spyad cing nachos ra lung tu
6a4(brgyad stong): byed pa la spyod kyi ba kyi la ldan gal te de bzhin du chor
6a5(brgyad stong): spyod pa ma lugs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed
6a6(brgyad stong): ma mams na/ kye/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu sbyipa
6a7(brgyad stong): da pa yongasas rdzogs pas rnam ma su kyi bcu pa yongs su bzung ba mas cad ma khye ma sa byar 'byung ba kyi 'gyu
6a8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pa ro stod na byed pa sa gzugs yo ma / ya non du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin rgyal tshomi dang / 'du thos dang / 'du byed rnams dang
6b1(brgyad stong): sa sa / sa par gas pa ma lags / pa sa du du bya mas susu #
6b2(brgyad stong): kyi ngoms dbu' snyoms dpa brgyan pos zhes sa kyi pha 'olang du srin pa 'di la spyad par bgyi'o/ 'di yang byang chubs su bu'i sems dpa' chen po'i tshemya mams ca yong su pa
6b3(brgyad stong): 'i ti 'as su sadus sa d+g+ha/ rangs sa rgyas sems pang gyu #
6b4(brgyad stong): nga sa lags sa/ rnam zung bar gyu kun tu sgrub po spangs rnams cid ma rgya
6b5(brgyad stong): sa chi yos ma sa mazhig pa'i ye shes kyis zhugs so// sa nas// ngag zugs yongs su kyi 'jim/ de ba ma
7a1(brgyad stong): dang / 'du byed kyim da rnas 'i sa su yang ga pa rjes su skye mthong / shes pa dernam par shes pa'i phyi rol ma mthes pa dag pa rjes kyi mtho
7a2(brgyad stong): shes pa de rnam par shes pa las gzhan ma yod yang dag par rjemasu myi mthong ste/ tshig gi rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs mos so// de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di
7a3(brgyad stong): la mos na pa/ tham sa cad du dad pas rjes su 'dra bzhi rlos nyid tshong mar byas te/ mos pa zhes bgyi'o// des chos gang yang yong su ma bzung ngo // gang gzung ba'
7a4(brgyad stong): gtang ba'i chos de yod pa dmyigs so// de myo ngan las 'das par ya rlom sems su myi bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'angs 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
7a5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rolan tu gyi tshu par rig ma pos gyi'o// zus gang lag yang yongs su myi 'dzin// de bzhi na du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams gang
7a6(brgyad stong): legs pa dang / rnam rbe shem pa grong lags pa yongs su myi 'dzin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mye 'jig ste pa
7a7(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres bya bco brgyad rnams yongs su ma rdzogs par khor ma dor yongs su mya ngan las myi 'ang ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang chub snyoms dpa' sems
7a8(brgyad stong): pha rolang su phyi nang par drig drir bgyi'o// ka zhan yang bam ldan 'das byang chub sems la sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / shes ram kyi pha
7b1(brgyad stong): nad pa la sgom pas 'di ltar brtag cing 'di ltar bsams te/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di gang yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gang gi yin/ ji chos gang myed po dang / 
7b2(brgyad stong): myi dmyigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyinang pa yin nam zhes/ gal te de ltar brtags te/ de ltar bsams na/ ma zhum ma gong / yi myi gsod/ yi gsod par myi bgyi
7b3(brgyad stong): de'i yid phyir phyogs par myi bgyid/ myi skrag myi dang / dngang bar myi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ma bral bar rig par bgyi'o// 
7b4(brgyad stong): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i busatshe dang ldan pa rab byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor pa 'di ltar gzugs nyid gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang bral ba
7b5(brgyad stong): de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du 'di ltar rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba da shes rab kyi pha
7b6(brgyad stong): ro lad tu phyind pa yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin na// 
7b7(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang
7b8(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu gzugs nyid gzugs kyi dro bo nyid dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du tsho
8a1(brgyad stong): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid kyang tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
8a2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyird pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 
8a3(brgyad stong): bral ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang rang gi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyi gzhi yang mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i ngo bo
8a4(brgyad stong): nyid dong bral ba'o// ngo bo nyid kyang ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang / bral ba'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces smras so/ 
8a5(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la slob par 'gyur ba de thams cad mkhyen pa pa nyid ma nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram// rab 'byor kyis
8a6(brgyad stong): spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la slob par 'gyur ba de thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la slob
8a7(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la slob par 'gyur ba de thams cad
8a8(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur rog// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang skyab pa ri'i bu chos thams cad ni ma byung ma skyes pa ste/ de ltar spyod mtshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub so snya
8b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la nye ba yin no// yang tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shwesta/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod na thas cad/ 
8b2(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid la nye ba yin no// gzham yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brtsams te/ 'di skad ces smras so// gal te gzugs la
8b3(brgyad stong): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs kyi mtshan ma la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs mtshan ma myed pa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs 'bru
8b4(brgyad stong): ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs 'gag pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs 'jig pa la spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs stong
8b5(brgyad stong): pa'o snyam du spyod na mya tshanam la spyod do// bdag spyod do snyam ma mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam na dmyigs pa la spyod do// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 
8b6(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams te/ gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par zhes pa mtshan
8b7(brgyad stong): ma myed pa'o snyam du spyod ma mtshan mo myed pa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa 'byung ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa 'gag pa la spyod
8b8(brgyad stong): mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa 'jig pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag spyod do snyam na mtshan ma
9a1(brgyad stong): la spyod do// bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam na dmyigs pa la spyod do// gal te 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod na/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do snyam du sems
9a2(brgyad stong): na mtshan ma nyid la spyod do// byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni thabs myi mkhas par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang
9a3(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa yin// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
9a4(brgyad stong): kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te gzugs la myi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod/ gzugs mtshan ma myong ba'o snyam du mya
9a5(brgyad stong): spyod/ gzugs 'byung ba la myi spyod/ gzugs 'gag pa la myi spyod/ gzugs 'jig pa la myi spyod/ gzugs stong pa'o snyam du myi spyod// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba
9a6(brgyad stong): la mya yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed la ma yin/ gal te rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la myi spyod/ rnam pa shes pa'i mtshan ma myed
9a7(brgyad stong): pa'o snyam du myi spyod/ rnam par shes pa 'byung ba la myi spyod rnam par shes pa 'gag pa la myi spyod/ rnam par shes pa 'jig pa la myi spyod/ rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du myi spyod
9a8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de spyod kyang spyod do snyam du nye bar myi 'gro'o// myi spyod kyang myi spyod do snyam du
9b1(brgyad stong): nye bar myi 'gro/ spyod kyang spyod la myi spyod kyang myi spyod do snyam du nye bar myi 'gro'o// spyod pa nyid kyang ma yin la myi spyod pa nyid kyang ma yin snyam du nye bar myi 'gro'o// spyod par bya'o snyam du yang nye
9b2(brgyad stong): bar myi 'gro/ spyod par myi bya'o snyam du yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// spyad par yang bya la myi spyad par yang bya'o snyam du nye bar myi 'gro/ spyad par bya ba nyid kyang ma yin la/ myi spyad par bya ba nyid
9b3(brgyad stong): kyang ma yin snyam du nye bar myi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni rjes su nye bar ma song ba/ ma blangs pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting
9b4(brgyad stong): 'dzin chos thams cad len pa myed pa zhes bya ste/ yangs pa mdun du ma byas pa/ tshad ma nges pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/ 
9b5(brgyad stong): 'dzin 'di la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas
9b6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ gnas brten tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das gang ting nge 'dzin 'apA la spyod
9b7(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
9b8(brgyad stong): byang chub tu lung bstan te/ de ni ting nge 'dzin de yang dag par rje su myi mthong / ting nge 'dzin des rlom semasu yang myi bgyid de/ bdag ni mnyam par gzhag pa ste/ bdag ti
10a1(brgyad stong): 'di la snyoms par 'jug s+ho/ bdag ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhog rgo/ po bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms por zhugs pa'o snyam pa de lta bu de la yong ye ma mchis so// de skad
10a2(brgyad stong): ma gsol ba dang / spyod ldan bshu mi dus tshe dang ldas bya rgyab 'byor dul 'di skang rjes smos s+homi dang ldam tha ba 'byo ting nge 'dims mnas ma/ byang chub se ma
10a3(brgyad stong): dba'i chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom lnga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla ma sbeng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin de bstan du rung ngam/ 
10a4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor da kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ltam yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ting ba'i ze byi zhes yang dag par myi shes so// sha ri'i bus
10a5(brgyad stong): smras pon rje tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de kyi shes yang dag par shes zhes rdzi ram/ rab 'byor kyis spras bran mo ldan pa zhi dri bu myi shes yang dag par myi shes zhes zam/ 
10a6(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyi 'dzin de myed pas na myi shes yang dag phyir m-i shi su/ dra nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan rab 'byur ba la legs so zhes bya ba byin mo// 'di la
10a7(brgyad stong): khyod sbyangs rgyas kyi mthas slo sa byar gyi sangs kyis kyi'i gyi tsums kyis snyam duso so ga du legs de de bzhin no// ban byung chub stes sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ra
10a8(brgyad stong): du 'byol ba slab par bya'o// / de m+b+hi'i phyi ni / byang chub sems dpa' ser su dpa' ni de ltar slob nashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob po// de nas bcom ldan 'das
10b1(brgyad stong): ba'i dri'i bus 'di di kyis gsus com ldan 'ongs byang chub sems ba po mas dpa'i chen po de lce'i slo shes rab kyi phyi rol du tu phyin pya ma slob pa lags sa/ 
10b2(brgyad stong): kyis gsol bu com ldan 'angs kyis su nga ldan pa ni'i bu la 'od byas bka' stsal to/ na rje'i bu thung rgya moms dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar ma spong
10b3(brgyad stong): shes ba kyi pha ro ma na gyi drang pa la slob pa yin no/ de spyod rgyas bka' su med pa bcom ldan 'das la rtsod po ldan byo ni bus 'di skad ces gso nga to// bcom ldan 'das bya
10b4(brgyad stong): rgyo'i sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa chos byol slo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sgra larje tshe dang ldan pa zla ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
10b5(brgyad stong): de ltar snga bye ma ni chos gang 'i yang gyi slo 'o// de ci'i phyi zheshA ri'i bu chos de dag ni ji ltar gyis rgya bya ba kyi ts+tsha ba~M ltar mabyon pa bzhin po de bzhin du yod pa ma yin no// shA ri'i dus
10b6(brgyad stong): stsol du pa bcom ldan das mdze lta bu 'i mchis// sho ri'i bu ji ltar yong pa de bzhin du yod de// de lhur myong bas de'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o// de dag la byis pa so so'i skye
10b7(brgyad stong): thos pa dang lce ljon pa rnams mngon par zhen drug gis chos thams cad myong pa la brtags so/ de dag gis brtogs nas mtha' gnyis la zhen pas chos de dag myi shes kyi mthong
10b8(brgyad stong): ste/ de'i phyir myed pa'i chos sems nyid kyi chog smon de dag shes gtums rgyas ma tha ma nyis lo marlon phyir zhen rte ri'i gzhis dmyigs pa la gnas nas/ 'das pa'i chos la rtog go
11a1(brgyad stong): ma 'ongs pa'i chos la nyog go// ngaltar blang ba'i chos ma ston no// de dag gi la rtogs nas phyi nga dang mjug ma mi mngon par nyes byas/ de dag gis byed pa tshonas kyims cad la brnyeg pa
11a2(brgyad stong): de dag gis byed pa'i chos dengs thams cad la brtags nas lam lung drub pa 'i lta ba ti na du myi zhes kyi mthong ngo / mang ma dag po ji lta ba bzhin dum zhes ma mthong bas/ 'asus gsum
11a3(brgyad stong): nas nges par myi 'byung / yang dag pa'i mtha' khong du ma chud de/ de'i phyi me ga byas pa zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'thor// de dag chos bden pa la mi yid kyi ches so// yang sha ri'i bu byang chub
11a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos gang la yang mngon pa zhem par gyi byed pa de skad ces bka' stsalang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das can ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol gyi
11a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'iltar slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob po/ bcom ldan 'ongs kyis bka' stsal dpa/ shA ri'i bu byang
11a6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ thangs mkhyen pa nyid la gyi slob ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems 'apa'i chom po de ltar slob ma chos zas cad la slong
11a7(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye ba sam/ thams nang mkhyen pa nyid du de skyeb ma 'byung
11a8(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dkyis 'di skad ces gas yang rten bcom ldan 'das ma 'i bu 'di skad su ni skye skye'i skyes bu 'di thams na
12a1(brgyad stong): rdzo ba de skad ces bka' stsalang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe 'i ma dus shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces mthom to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sems pas
12a2(brgyad stong): pa zhes 'i ming du phyid pa la tho pa pa skyes bus tha byed nga dag dam pa'i bya drugs slob par gyi ma 'i'i slang du zhen/ ma ldar 'das 'di na
12a3(brgyad stong): phung po la podi nyi lce'i snas chu gzungasas kyi ci'i lung / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs ni snyam lta 'dugs/ sa te gzugs mdul sas pa yang ba
12a4(brgyad stong): drug dang po lnga po dag lags te de la zhing du tshor ba dang / 'di shes dang 'a byed rnams kyang sgyu ma lta bu'i bzhi byen bar ni g.yang sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes tha
12a5(brgyad stong): ngas kyis gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'ongs rnam pa pa de ya dbang po drug dang / phung po lnga po de dag lags zo 'i lagasar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpal
12a6(brgyad stong): po mam bas pa 'ong thos nas skrag kyang skyeb dang / shin nu dngas par myi 'gyur // bcom ldam 'das gyis pa ga yong reb 'byir theg pa lnga
12a7(brgyad stong): nags pa sumams sadapa' phyis pa ma tho mas sngas pa'i skyobapa pa'i lug tu song bar gyu na ci zhig pa dang dang 'du/ zhes su ba gyu / mas 'byed mam
12a8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' ses su che po dge ba'i sem su rgya na kyi song ba lta can kyi'am 'i tha na gying pa nga phyi na kyi sa laga' myi myang ba dang kyi 'dus
12b1(brgyad stong): me pa ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pa'i dag pa'i bani sa nyen shang rnams rgyan mo phyir rig par bgyi/ 
12b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang de la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ston cing 'dams pa rnams dang / gang ro la bdud kyi nyes pa ni 'dis bur rig par rgyasabadud kyi nyes pa ni 'di
12b3(brgyad stong): bdud kyi las mi 'di dag yin par rig par bya// bdud kyi las 'di dag rtogs nas spang bar bya'o zhes/ bdud kyi las ston pa 'di dag mi/ ran 'byo nga byang chub sems dpa' ma
12b4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyes rnams rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / #
12b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis 'di skad ces pasol to/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad du 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i ba shes
12b6(brgyad stong): gnyen du rig par bya'o zhes bkra' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'dibyang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dom gang lags
12b7(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gyi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces bkra' stsal to// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad
12b8(brgyad stong): rgyags bya myed pa lnga slob po// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad le ma chags pa khong du chung bar bya ba'i phyirabla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
13a1(brgyad stong): byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/ rab 'byor nga byang chub kyi don gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
13a2(brgyad stong): ka/ kyis gang 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi// bcom
13a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi ris chen po'i gtso bo byed par 'gyur bas ma/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
13a4(brgyad stong): bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shi ri'i bu sa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das par ga kyang don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
13a5(brgyad stong): chen po zhes bgyi ba spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu de'i dus la bab par shes na spobs par byos shig/ sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bdag tu lta ba
13a6(brgyad stong): dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / rang gi lus la
13a7(brgyad stong): lta ba chen po 'di lta bu la stsogs pa'i lta ba de dag spang ba'i slad du chos bstan to snyam na/ don de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
13a8(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang don keng gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra/ 
13b1(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de'i dus la bab par shes na/ spobs par gyis shig/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba
13b2(brgyad stong): ni bcom ldan 'das gad byang chub kyi sems 'di yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems/ zag pa myed pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems/ myi mnya
13b3(brgyad stong): pa dang mnyam pa'i sems te/ sems de ma chags yongs su ma zin to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de ni zag pa ma mchis pa yongasu ma zin pa'o// zas
13b4(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa'i sems de yang zag pa ma mchis shing yongasu ma zin te/ sems de ma chags shing yongasu ma zin pas na/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ngan
13b5(brgyad stong): grangs su mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir sems de la ma chags shing yongs
13b6(brgyad stong): ma zinang/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems myed pa'i phyir sems de la ma chags shing yongs su ma zin to// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
13b7(brgyad stong): cig pa sems myed pa'i sems de yod dam// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ci sems myed pa de la myi ma'am yod pa zhes bya ba dmyigs pa yod dam/ sha ri'i bus
13b8(brgyad stong): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de lta ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gal te sems myed pa de la yod pa 'am myed pa myed cing myi dmyigs na/ tshe dang
14a1(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ sems gang myed pa'i sems de yod dam zhes zer// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga ji ltar khyod bcom ldan 'dus
14a2(brgyad stong): kyis nyon mongs pa myed pa la gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa ltar ston pa legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gang po byams pa'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom/ 
14a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ sems dpa' de go cha chen po bgos pa/ sems dpa' de theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'tshal ba lags ma/ de'i slad du/ 
14a4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangasu mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorapa kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen #
14a5(brgyad stong): blo bags pa zhes bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha/ chen po bgos pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
14a6(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po 'di snyam du/ bdag gis sems can dpag tu myed pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o// bdag gis sems
14a7(brgyad stong): can grangs myed pa yong su mya ngan las bzla'o// sems can de dag de snyed cig yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang // ga yang yongasu mya ngan las bzlas pa'i sems can gang yang mye do snyam
14a8(brgyad stong): du sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos rnams kyi chos nyid de yin te/ rab 'byor nga dper na/ sgyu ma byed pa la mkhas pa'am/ sgyu ma'i byed pa'i nye gnas kyis lam
14b1(brgyad stong): chen po'i gzhi mdor skye bo'i tshogs chen po mngon par sprul te/ mngon par sprulang nas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po myi snang bar byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dul chos gang
14b2(brgyad stong): yang bsad pa'am/ shi ba'am/ bshin pa'am/ myi snang bar byas pa yod dam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
14b3(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga de de bzhin te/ sems can dpag tu myed grangs myed gzhal du myed pa rnams yong su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / chos grang yang yongasu mya ngan las bzlas
14b4(brgyad stong): pa'i chos gang yang myed do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta bur bstan pa 'di thos nas myi skrag myi dngang shin tu dngang bar myi 'gyur na/ byang chub
14b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
14b6(brgyad stong): 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa'i don brdzug 'tshal te/ yon te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ go cha ma mchis pa bgos pa lag da par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
14b7(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni go cha myed pa bgos par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhes
14b8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de thams cad mkhyen du pa nyid ni ma byas pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// sems can gang gi don bu go cha 'di bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyi ba byas mngon par 'dus ma byas
15a1(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsalang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol ba / bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa de
15a2(brgyad stong): 'a skad du zhesam ldas 'a sa 'angadu byung gzugs mim brjis mgrol ba'o// de bzhin du / 'du gas dag 'du byed rnas bya dang / ldam
15a3(brgyad stong): 'di ltar rnam par shes pa yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 
15a4(brgyad stong): 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams pa'i bus/ 
15a5(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorang gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 
15a6(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan
15a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor nga tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ma/ tshe dang / 
15a8(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor ngade gzugs gang ma bcings ma grol pa zhes zer ba'i gzugs de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin/ rnam par shes pa
15b1(brgyad stong): ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor du gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin// tshe dang lde me pa 'a
15b2(brgyad stong): 'byor nga tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi ngo bzhin nyid ging yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma bcings su grol
15b3(brgyad stong): zhes zer ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams pa'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan
15b4(brgyad stong): ba gang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams gang yim
15b5(brgyad stong): dang / sgyu mo'i skyes bu'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de mi ma brjings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// sgyu man
15b6(brgyad stong): skyes bu'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mam
15b7(brgyad stong): bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag pa'o klu ma yin pas na ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pas+ya ne ma bcings ma grol ba'o// mu skyes pas nam bcings ma grol
15b8(brgyad stong): bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i go cha chen po go cha myed pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams
16a1(brgyad stong): pa'i bu cang kyi smra bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rje dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
16a2(brgyad stong): chen po'i go cha chen po bgos pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing / theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'chal ba lags/ theg pa chen po de gang lags/ theg pa chen po de gang sa
16a3(brgyad stong): yang ngan pa tsugs/ leg pa chen po de gang du gnas par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po de gang ma gnas par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po des gang nges par 'thung byar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa
16a4(brgyad stong): dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor theg pa chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni dpag tu myed po'i tshig bla dgas logaso// 
16a5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor nga dpag tu myed pa zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhal du myed pa ni phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di skad du theg pa chen po de gang ma sa nges par 'byung zhes zer bya me/ khams gsum nas nges par
16a6(brgyad stong): 'azung bar 'gyur te/ sgrib pa myed pa ga la ba der yang dag par zhugs shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te/ theg pa des gang yang nges par ma byung / nges par myi 'byung / nges par
16a7(brgyad stong): 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe ma/ gang nges par 'byung ba dang / gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i chos de gnyi ga yang myed rnying mi dmyigs te/ de ltar chos rnams sbed cing myi dmyigs pa
16a8(brgyad stong): chos gang zhis chom gcigs nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ ji skad ces bka' stsal dbu dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces rgyas mato docom lnga'i ma ma bres bu
16b1(brgyad stong): mkhar la sems can grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchim pa'i ge skabs ma mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das theg parjod ro la yang sems can grangs me mtshas dbag tu ma mchis pa'i
16b2(brgyad stong): bas ma ma bcom ldam 'das rnam gras 'das na 'di'i thong chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams kyi theg tu tshon pa'o// 'di la khyod gAmang kyi gang/ 'di sa nges pa
16b3(brgyad stong): ldan sa gas / sheg parkyen pa zug pa sa ldan nas kyis me rnam par rgyas pa
16b4(brgyad stong): ma ldan 'das la ga pa kyims pa'i rdus ga pas gapa'ado/ mam ldan 'das gnas gan rab 'byo 'di la zhes rab kyi pha ro la na byin pa'i slang du mtshul ba btam pa 'di
16b5(brgyad stong): theg pa chen po band pa mams so/ sa ldam 'das ma mngang ldan pa rab 'byod kyis 'di skad byas gas sote// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang lam
17a1(brgyad stong): par theg pa chen po snyam par ma gyurang lags grang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga de lta ma yim te/ rab 'byor nga khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
17a2(brgyad stong): pa la theg pa chen po rjes su mthun par stonang to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// yang bcom ldan 'das
17a3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar yang nye bar myi mchi'o// byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar yang nye bar myi mchi/ byang chub sems dpa' dbu su yang nye bar myi mchi// de ci'i slad du zhe na
17a4(brgyad stong): nye bar myi mchi zhes bgyi ba ni/ gzugs mu ma mchis pas na byang chub sems dpa' yang mu ma mchis par rig par ba gyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
17a5(brgyad stong): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// gzugs byang chub sems dpa'o zhes nye bar mya mchi ste/ 'di yang
17a6(brgyad stong): ma mchis myi dmyigs so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' yod ye ma dmyigs pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de yang dag par rje su myi mthong // / 
17a7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang yang dag par rje su myi mthong myi dmyigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong myi dmyigs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos
17a8(brgyad stong): de yod ye yang dag par rje su myi mthong zhing myi dmyigs na/ chos gang zhig chos gang gis chos gaphyal gdams shing bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba 'di ni mying tsam mo
17b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa yang mying tsam ste/ ci ltar bdag ces bgyi ba bdag shin tu mngon par ma grub pa de bzhin
17b2(brgyad stong): du chos rnams ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa yagong gzung du ma mchos mngon par ma grub pa'i gzugs de gapa lags/ char po dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams gang logs/ gang gzung dum
17b3(brgyad stong): mchis mngon par ma grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams gang lags/ gang gzung du ma mchis mngon par ma grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags// 
17b4(brgyad stong): de ltar chos de dag gi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa'o// gang chos rnams kyi mngon par ma grub pa de ni chos ma lags na/ ji shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
17b5(brgyad stong): mngon bar ma grub pas mngon par ma grub pa la gdams shing bstan par bgyi 'am/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gud na chos thams cad dam/ byang chub sems dpa'
17b6(brgyad stong): chos sam/ byang chub tu spyod pa yang kyi dmyig s+ho// mal te rdo ltar bshad cing bstan pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi zhum myi gong / yi myi gsod/ yi gas
17b7(brgyad stong): par myi bgyid/ de'i yid phyung phyogs par myi bgyid/ myi skrag myi dngang / shin tu dngang bar myi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
17b8(brgyad stong): spyod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sgom pa'o zhes de ltar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe ma
18a1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ chos 'di dag rab tu rnam par rtog ste/ de'i tshe gzugs la nye bar myi 'gro/ gzug
18a2(brgyad stong): la nye bar gyi rig/ gzugs 'gag par yang dag par rjes kyi mthong // de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes go la nye bar myi 'gro/ rnam par shes
18a3(brgyad stong): ba la nye bar myi rig/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par yang dag par rjesu myi mtho // de ni'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi 'byung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni zugs ma lags so
18a4(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi 'jig pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lagaso 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / gzugs shes pagyi ba 'di ni gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyisu dbyer mo mchis so// 'jig pa
18a5(brgyad stong): dang gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyisu ma mchis shing gsu bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis po grangasu gtog so// bye ba na
18a6(brgyad stong): du 'di ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyi gang lags pa dang / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i 'byung ba ma mchis pa gang lagaso pa de ni rnam par shesngo pa ma lags son/ 
18a7(brgyad stong): par shes pa'i 'jig pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa la lags te/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyis bgyir mos
18a8(brgyad stong): 'jig pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis te/ mal nga 'di skad du rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis ma mchis po'i dra
18b1(brgyad stong): gtogs so zhes de ltar chos la yongasu rtog na/ de'i tshe gzugs la nye bar kyi 'gronagazugs ma nye bar gyi tshig gzugs 'gas par yang dag pa brje su myi mthog
18b2(brgyad stong): rkyong byu nga / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la nyeb kyi 'o// rnam pa zhes pa la nye ba s+ho g+sa/ rnam pa pazhes pa lags pams na
18b3(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi 'byung ba ma mchi zla gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so// gzugs kyi 'jig pa ga/ lags pa dri ni gzugs mu lags
18b4(brgyad stong): khri dang gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyisu ma mchis shing na/ nyi su bgyi ma mchis so// 'jog pa dang gzugs ni skyes bgyi ba 'di ya gro nyis bgyir ma mchis
18b5(brgyad stong): 'di skad du gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis ma mchis pa'i grong su gtogs de bzhinathu 'di ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du bye ba rnams gdu lam su
18b6(brgyad stong): par shes pa'i 'byung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bsgrib 'di yang gnyis ma mchis gronyis su brgya
18b7(brgyad stong): ma mchis// 'jig pa dang rje bar shes pa zhes gyi ba 'di yang gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyis kha~M byim ma mchis pa ste/ gangs pa 'di skad bu ma par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyisu mi mchis can
18b8(brgyad stong): grangasu gtogs so// bam po gnyis pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pasha ri'i bus me dang ldan pa rab 'byor
19a1(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces smras so// de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di ltar bshad pa'i don kho bos shes te/ byang chub sems dpa'i yang 'byung ba myed pa yin
19a2(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba myed pa yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa ci'i phyir spyod/ sems can rnams kyi phyir sdug bsngal
19a3(brgyad stong): gang yod pa de dag bzod par byed cing myong bar 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa
19a4(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bu kho bo ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba spyad pa spyod par myi 'dod de/ gang dka' bar 'du shes pas spyod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'
19a5(brgyad stong): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha re'i b+ha bde bar 'du shes pa nyid du bya zhing / sems can thams cad la mar 'du shes pa dang / thar 'du shes pa dang
19a6(brgyad stong): bur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes pa byas pa ma gtogs par sems can grangs myed dpag tu myed pa'i don bya bar myi nus so// de ltar skyes pa dang bud myed dag la 'du shes byas shing / 
19a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la mar 'du shes pa dang
19a8(brgyad stong): par 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// bdag nyid kyi bar du yang 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ ji ni slo semal du ma lanan pa bad kyi phyis du rkun lnga ma
19b1(brgyad stong): tha rang bar bya ba de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la yang 'di ltar 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag yongs su myi gtang ngo // bdag gos sems can 'dzi
19b2(brgyad stong): dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po dpag tu myed pa las thar par bya'o// bdag gi lus brgyar gtubs kyang / chung ngu na 'di dag la bdag gis gnod sems kyang myi bskyed do snyam du
19b3(brgyad stong): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te sems de ltar na/ dka' bar byed pa'i 'du shes su byed pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan
19b4(brgyad stong): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos jinas kyang ma pa sa kyis du gyi rtsigs pa de ga sa bsgreng bar bya ste/ de bzhin du nang dang rgya'i chos rnams la
19b5(brgyad stong): 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// gal te sems de ltar spyod na dka' ba'i 'du shes can du myi spyod de/ tshe dang ldan ba sha ri'i bu gang 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'byung
19b6(brgyad stong): ba myed pa'o zhes smras pa de de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'byung ba myed pa'o// seMd lda shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji byang
19b7(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' nyid 'byung ba myed pa 'am/ 'on te byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams 'byung ba myed pa yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnas/ 
19b8(brgyad stong): kyang 'byung ba myed pa'o// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba myed dam 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'byung ba myed/ rab
20a1(brgyad stong): ga 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'byung ba byed do// sha ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'gyur
20a2(brgyad stong): ba myed dam/ 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang 'byung ba myed/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang 'byung ba myed do// 
20a3(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams nyi tshe 'byung ba myed dam/ 'on te so so'i skye bo yang 'byung ba myed/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
20a4(brgyad stong): ldan pa sha ri'i bu so so'i skye bo yang 'byung ba myed do// sha ri'i bu sa smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji so so'i skye bo nyid 'byung ba myed dam/ 'on te so so'i skye bo'i chos nas
20a5(brgyad stong): 'byung ba myed/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ri'i bu so so skye bo'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba myed do// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus
20a6(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' yang 'byung ba myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba myed pa/ thams cad
20a7(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'byung ba myed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba myed pa so so'i skye bo yang 'byung ba myed pa/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba myed pa na
20a8(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob pa ma yin nam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ tshe dang ldan
20b1(brgyad stong): ba sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ma byung ba'i chos la thob par kho bo myi 'dod de/ mngon par rtogs pa yang myed do// ma byung ba'i chos kyis thob pa ma
20b2(brgyad stong): byung ba thob par myi 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ma byung ba'i chos kyis thob pa ma byung ba thob par 'gyur ram/ 'on te 'byung ba'i chos kyis thob pa ma byung
20b3(brgyad stong): ba thob par 'gyur/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra'i bu cim byung ba'i chos 'byung ngam/ 'on te 'byung ba'i chos nyid ma byung / sha ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab
20b4(brgyad stong): 'byor ci ma byung ba nyid 'byung ba myed pa 'am/ 'on te ma byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshedang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'byung ba myed pa'i chos 'byung ba myed
20b5(brgyad stong): pa'i chos shes smra bar myi spobs so// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'byung ba myed pa'i chos la smra bar mya khyod kyis spobs sam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ 
20b6(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'byung ba myed pa nyid smra ba yin la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'byung ba myed pa nyid la spobs par byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'byung ba myed pa nyid spobs pa'o// des
20b7(brgyad stong): ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos ston pa'i nang na mchog tu gzhag par bya'o// de ci'i
20b8(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni/ gang dang gang la yongs su dris pa de dang de nyid las 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / chos nyid las kyang myi g.yo'o// de skad ces
21a1(brgyad stong): smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi gnas pa'i chosanas
21a2(brgyad stong): ni/ de dag las gang dang gang la dris pa de dang de nyid las 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / chos nyid las 'gal bar myi byed do// chos nyid las kyang myi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar
21a3(brgyad stong): chos thams cad la gnas pa myed pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces spras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor legs so// 
21a4(brgyad stong): legs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad la myi gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'a di gang yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa tshe dang ldan
21a5(brgyad stong): ba sha ri'i bu chos thams cad myi gnas pa'i phyir/ theg pa tham sa rbad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yidan no// de lta ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab
21a6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta bur bstan cing bshad pa la/ nem nur du myi 'gyur ba dang / rmongs par myi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ gnas pa 'di lta bur karma
21a7(brgyad stong): shing / yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral ba yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
21a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ ji ltar yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
21b1(brgyad stong): yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur na/ de yang de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur zhing / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sa
21b2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral na/ de bzhin du yid la byed pa dang yang ma bral bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sos
21b3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po yid la byed pa dang ma bral na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral ba nyid du 'gyur te/ de ltar yin du zin ma/ sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
21b4(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyang yid la byed pa dang / ma bral bar gnas so// de skad ces smras pa dang / 
21b5(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ce sa smras so// sha ri'i bu legs so legs so// khyod la dris te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu don nyid yang dag
21b6(brgyad stong): pa'i tshig tu brjod pas yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gyi ngo bo nyid myed pas na/ yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid myed par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri bu sems can
21b7(brgyad stong): dngos po myed pas na/ yid la byed pa dngos po myed par rig par bya'o// sems can dben pas na yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems can mngon par
21b8(brgyad stong): byang ma chub pas na yid la byed pa mngon par byang ma chub par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la byed pa 'di lta bu dang / gnas pa 'di
22a1(brgyad stong): ba ga sus gnas par 'dod do// 'phags pa zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad song ba las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yis
22a2(brgyad stong): spang ba'i le'u zhes bya ba/ rab 'byor gyi le'u zhes bya ste/ dang po'o// / yang de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum bcu ma gsum gyi rigs kyi lha'i bu bzhi rje
22a3(brgyad stong): dang lhan gcig tu 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod par gyur to// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi las/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu nye khrir bcas pa dang / myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
22a4(brgyad stong): pa'ang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu nyi khrir bcas pa dang / nas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu lnga stong 'khor de nyid du 'dus te/ 'khod do// lha'i bu rnams kyi rang gi las kyi rnam par sbyin
22a5(brgyad stong): pa las skyes pa'i 'od ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brdzi da dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zil gyis mnan to// 
22a6(brgyad stong): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor lha'i bu stong phrag mang po 'khor 'dir 'dus te 'khod pa rnams/ 'phags/ 
22a7(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi man ngag dang / gdams pa dang / bstan pa nyan par 'dod na/ byang chub sos/ 
22a8(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar rnal 'byor du bgyi/ gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis spras pa/ ke'u shi ka de'i phyir sangs rgyas
22b1(brgyad stong): kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ khyod la bstan par bya ste/ lha'i bu gang gis blar byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag gis kyang / thun byed
22b2(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang sems bskyed par bya'o// gang yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs pa de dag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i skal
22b3(brgyad stong): bgyid de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'tshams bcad pas/ yang dang yang tu 'khor zhing / de dag bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i ska
22b4(brgyad stong): bgyid mod kyi/ 'on kyang gal te de dag gis thun byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ thung bar du 'phags pa mchos rnams la ches kyang bar du 'phags
22b5(brgyad stong): ba'i chos rnams la lhag par dmyigs par bya ste/ ded ga gi dge ba'i phyogs la kho bo bar chad kyi byed do// nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldar pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa
22b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor legs so legs so// gang khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la spro ba byang ba legs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
22b7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi cing du/ blon byang chub sems das gyu bas/ byang chub tu tshangs par spyod mi spong sa ma
23a1(brgyad stong): nyan thos gzhan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gangabs shing bstan te/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis spyad pas/ bla na myed pa'i ye shes bskyed do// bcom ldan
23a2(brgyad stong): 'das de bzhin du bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheran ban parjes su gzung bar bgyis rjes su bskong bar bgyul// yang dag par yangs su gzung bar 'gyu
23a3(brgyad stong): yangangs pa rlon rnaM/ de ci'i mang du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das 'dil bdag cag gis zung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjes su gzung ba dang / rjes su bar
23a4(brgyad stong): ba dang / yang dag par yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag/ gan par bskor bas// myur du bla na med pa yang dge par 'o// gas pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// 
23a5(brgyad stong): de nas rab 'byor kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/ ke'u shika de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zu shi ka dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
23a6(brgyad stong): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ba kho bos khyod la bshad par bya'o// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la gnas
23a7(brgyad stong): bar bya ste/ kewan ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa res gzugs la gnas par myi bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
23a8(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa la gnas par myi bya'o// b+ha ra/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par gyi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa
23b1(brgyad stong): nyid la gnas par myi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par myi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par gyi bya'o// de bzhin du gzugs so zhes gnas par myi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor
23b2(brgyad stong): ba'o zhes/ 'du shes so zhes/ 'du byed rnams so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'o zhes rnam par shes pa la gnas par myi bya'o// de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
23b3(brgyad stong): 'bras bu'o zhes gnas par myi bya'o// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du dgra bcom pa'i
23b4(brgyad stong): 'bras bu'o zhes gnas par myi bya'o// de bzhin du rang sang sa rgyas so zhes gnas par myi bya'o// de bzhin du sangs nga rgyas so zhes gnas par myi bya'o// gzugs rtag pa dang myi
23b5(brgyad stong): rtag pa'o zhes gnas par myi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes/ pa rtag pa dang myi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par myi bya'o// 
23b6(brgyad stong): gzugs bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'o zhes gnas par myi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bde ba dang // sdug bsngal ba'o zhes
23b7(brgyad stong): gnas par myi bya'o// gzugs bdag dang bdag myed pa'o zhes gnas par myi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag dang bdag
23b8(brgyad stong): myed pa'o zhes gnas par myi bya'o// gzugs sdug pa dang myi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par myi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug
24a1(brgyad stong): pa dang myi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par myi bya'o// gzugs stong pa 'am dmyigs pa'o zhes gnas par myi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
24a2(brgyad stong): ka/ rnam par shes pa stong pa 'am dmyigs pa'o zhes gnas par myi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par myi bya'o// de bzhin du lan cig phyir
24a3(brgyad stong): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par myi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye
24a4(brgyad stong): ba'o zhes gnas par myi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par myi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa sbyin pa'i gnas zhes bya bar gnos par myi byan/ 
24a5(brgyad stong): rgyun tu zhugs pa po zos kyang srid pa lan bdun pa zhes gan sa par myi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par myi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba yongs
24a6(brgyad stong): su mthar ma phyin pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro zhes gnas par myi bya'o// phyir myi 'ong ba sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par myi bya'o/ 
24a7(brgyad stong): phyir myi 'ong ba 'jig rten 'dir phyir myi 'ong bar de nyid du mya ngan las 'da'o zhes gnas par myi bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par myi bya'o// dgra bcom pa 'di
24a8(brgyad stong): nyid phung po lhag sa ma lus par mya ngam las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' sdes gnas par gyi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par bya bya'o// 
24b1(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas ni nyan thos kyis las 'dus nas/ ring sangs rgyas kyis ma thob par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes gnas par myi bya'o// sangs rgyan sbyin pa'i gnas ma sa
24b2(brgyad stong): gnas par gyi bya'o// gsangs rgyas nas so'i skye bo'i sa dang / nyan thos kyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das nasagrangs byed dpag du myed pa'i sems can rnams kyi ngom ma sa
24b3(brgyad stong): grangs myed dpag tu byed pa'i sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzlas te/ grangs byed dpag tu med pa'i sems can rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su nges par mdzad cing / sangs
24b4(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi sa la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ma da nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes/ des 'di ltar gnas par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'a
24b5(brgyad stong): snyam du sems te/ gal te sangs rgyas kyang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de grangs myed dpag tu myed pa'i sems can gyi don mdzad nas
24b6(brgyad stong): grangs myed dpag tu myed pa'i sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzlas te/ sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro zhes des de ltar yang
24b7(brgyad stong): gnas par myi bya na/ des ji ltar gnas par bya snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas
24b8(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci zhig la gnas
25a1(brgyad stong): gara'i dus smras ba/ med ldan byung ba gshegs pa rna dus yang gnas pa la yin/ pa byung med/ mdang ldan pa rab 'byor de ba'ims
25a2(brgyad stong): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni myi gnas pa ste/ 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams la yang myi gnas la 'dus ma byas kyi khams la yang myi gnas te/ 
25a3(brgyad stong): de las bzhengs pa yang ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
25a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen pos 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ci ltar de ba bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni la yang myi gnas shing / myi gnas pa yang
25a5(brgyad stong): ma yin la rnam par myi gnas pa de bzhin du de lta ra de ltar bslab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'i ga nas ci lta ba bzhin du gnas par bya'o// de bzhin
25a6(brgyad stong): du bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam pa ni myi gnas pa'i tshul gyis legs par gnas pa yin te/ de ltar 'di la
25a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o// de nas 'khor der lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gnod sbyin rnams kyis bshad pa'i gnod sbyin gyi tshig
25a8(brgyad stong): de dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyi brjod pa de dag sman shes par rung gi/ gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kang ci smra zhing brjod pa dang / ston cing 'chad pa
25b1(brgyad stong): 'dzin shes par gyi rung ngo // de nas rab 'byor kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lnga'i bu dag shes sa
25b2(brgyad stong): par gyi rung zhes bya ba 'din 'di ltar 'di la cung zad kyang smos pa myed de/ cung zad kyang thos par gyi rung ngo // de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ ma ma
25b3(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni gsal bar byed pa'o// e malo 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni gsal bar byed pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'ang mi ring ba bas kyang ches ri
25b4(brgyad stong): zla bdas sa rgyu bar lugadab bas ces rab cu 'dug ni slon nga 'a du/ de rnam sangs rgyas kyi mabum ma dang ldan par
25b5(brgyad stong): kyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis ni/ sa nas/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag de lta bas na/ gang tshun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
25b6(brgyad stong): bu thob par 'dod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / khan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gas
25b7(brgyad stong): par 'dod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'dod pa dang / dgra bcom pa
25b8(brgyad stong): nyid la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang rang byang chub thob par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la gnas par 'dod na yang bzod pa 'phel ma brten par myi 'grub bo// bla na myed pa yang nga/ 
26a1(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'dod na yang / bzod pa 'di la ma brten par myi 'grub bo// 
26a2(brgyad stong): de nas yang lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di la chos nyan pa ji lta bu dag btsal bar bya snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
26a3(brgyad stong): lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ lha'i bu dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu dag kho bo la chos nyan pa ni sgyu ma dang sprul pa dag btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
26a4(brgyad stong): ltar de dag ni nyan par myi 'gyur mngon par nyan par myi 'gyuraro// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ra la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor sems
26a5(brgyad stong): can de dag sgyu ma lta bu yin nam/ rmyi lam lta bu yin nam rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag sems can de ngag ni sgyu ma lta bri rmyi lam lta bu ste/ lha'i bu dag de ltar sgyu ma/ 
26a6(brgyad stong): dang / sems can dag gnyis su byar myed do// de ltar rmyi lam dang sems can dag ni ga nyis su byar myed do// lha'i bu dag chos thams cad kyang sku rmo na bu myi lam lta bu'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa/ 
26a7(brgyad stong): yang sgyu ma lta bu myo lam lta bu'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang sgyu ma lta bu rmyi lam lci bu'o// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba
26a8(brgyad stong): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmyi lam lta bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmyi lam lta bu'o// rang sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmyi lam lta bu'o// rang sa / 
26b1(brgyad stong): nyid kyang sbru ma lta bu rmyi lam lta bu'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmyi lam lta bu'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmyi lam lta bu'o// de nas
26b2(brgyad stong): lha'i bu de dag gis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces sbas so// 'phags pa rab 'byor yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmyi lam lta bu'o zhes zer ram/ yang dag par
26b3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes zer ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu myi lam lta bur sma na/ chos gzhan lta ci smos
26b4(brgyad stong): lha'i bu dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor mya ngan la sa 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmyi lam lta bu'o zhes zer ro/ ma/ rab 'byor gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu dag kho bo ni gal te
26b5(brgyad stong): mya ngan las 'das pa las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos gzhan zhig yod kyang / de yang sgyu ma lta bu rmyi lam lta bu'o zhes smra'o// de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma dang rmyi lam lta bu'o// mya ngan las
26b6(brgyad stong): 'das pa dang 'di ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams pa'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa lho rings chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka ta
26b7(brgyad stong): 'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po rnams kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la
26b8(brgyad stong): su dag yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dang
27a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rnams sam/ lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag rnams sam/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa gang yin pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bshang pa
27a2(brgyad stong): yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gnas btan de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bshad pa 'ang
27a3(brgyad stong): la yang dag par 'dzin pa su yang myi 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la chos gang yang ma smos/ chos gang yang yongs su snang bar ma byas/ chos gang yang yongs su ma bcas te
27a4(brgyad stong): de lta bas na 'di la chos gang yang ma smos chos gang ya nga yongs su snang bar ma byas/ chos gang yang ma bcwa sa pa de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag pa
27a5(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa gang yang myi 'byung ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa rab 'byoragyis de ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan na/ bdag gis kyang 'di
27a6(brgyad stong): ltar me tog dag mngon par sprul te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor la mngon par gtor ro snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de'i tshe me trog mngon par sprul nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
27a7(brgyad stong): gtor ro// de nas gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lha'i dbang po brgya byin la rjes su brjod pa'i phyir 'di snyam du sems te// 'di ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mngon par gtong ba'i me tog 'di dag ni
27a8(brgyad stong): bdag gis sngon chad sum bcu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas na yang yod par ma mthong ste/ me tog 'di ni sprul pa'o// 'di ltar lha'i dbang pos mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di/ shing dang gel ba dang
27b1(brgyad stong): khri shing las skyes pa ma yin gyi/ yid las byung ba'i me tog go snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ tshe dang ldan
27b2(brgyad stong): ba rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma byung ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid las byung ba'i me tog ni gang yang myed de/ shing dang gel ba dang khri shing las
27b3(brgyad stong): skyes pa yang ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka de skad du me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes pa ste/ me tog 'di dag yid las skyes pa yang
27b4(brgyad stong): ma yin/ shing dang gel ba dang khri shing las skyes pa yangam yin no zhes zer na/ ke'u shi kA gang ma skyes pa ni me tog kyang ma yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du ses
27b5(brgyad stong): te/ e ma 'phags pa rab 'byor shes rab zab ste/ mying dang tshig du btags pa yang ston la/ de dang 'gal bar kyi myi byed de nyid gsal bar byed cing / de nye bar ston snyam pa dang / 
27b6(brgyad stong): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor ji skad ston pa de bzhin du/ 
27b7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de la bslab par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// 
27b8(brgyad stong): ke'u shrI ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de la bslab par bya'o// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
28a1(brgyad stong): ltung slob cu/ thus tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bul slob bo// yan cig myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / gra bcom pa nyid la gyi slob
28a2(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas nyid la myi slob bo// sangs rgyas nyid la myi slob ste/ gangs 'di dag la gyi slob pa de ni/ sangs rgyas nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo// gang sangs
28a3(brgyad stong): rgyas nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu myed tshad myed pa la slob bo// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu myed tshad myed pa la slob pa
28a4(brgyad stong): de ni/ gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// gang tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam
28a5(brgyad stong): par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyi ra myi slob bo// gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa dang / gang tshor ba la ma yin
28a6(brgyad stong): 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa de ni/ gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang / dor bar bya ba'i
28a7(brgyad stong): phyir myi slob bo// tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang / dor bar bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// chos / 
28a8(brgyad stong): yang yongs su gzung ba dang nub par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// chos gang yang yongs su gzung ba dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa de ni thos cad mkhyen pa nyi yongs su gzung ba dang / 
28b1(brgyad stong): nub par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par
28b2(brgyad stong): 'byung ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos gang la
28b3(brgyad stong): yongs su gzung ba dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir myi slob pa de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir myi slob ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob
28b4(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing / thams cad mkhye na pa nyid la nges par 'byung ngo // rab 'byor gyis smras
28b5(brgyad stong): pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang chos gang yang yongasasu gzung
28b6(brgyad stong): ba dang nub par bya ba'i phyir myi slob bo// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su gzung ba dang nub par bya ba'i phyir myi slob na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
28b7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di
28b8(brgyad stong): skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang nas btsal bar bya/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ ke'u shi ka byang
29a1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o// sha de'i bus de skad ces smras pa dang / la
29a2(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa sha ro'i bu 'di ltar 'phags pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa su'i mthu/ 
29a3(brgyad stong): su'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ ke'u shi ka tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang 'chad pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ste/ 'di ni
29a4(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka gang 'di skad du
29a5(brgyad stong): bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chang pa su'i mthu su'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya zhes zer ba nike'u shi ka bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa de ni
29a6(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya'o// ke'u shi ka gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang nas
29a7(brgyad stong): btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs las kyang btsal bar myi bya/ gzugs las gzhan
29a8(brgyad stong): du yang btsal bar myi bya/ tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar myi bya/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan du
29b1(brgyad stong): yang btsal bar mI bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shika 'di ltar gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khyod rdo/ de ba
29b2(brgyad stong): du tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
29b3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa myed do// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes
