29b4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen dpo'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes ra// ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad myed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ 
29b5(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyi na pa'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de de bzhin no/ 
29b6(brgyad stong): de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// keny+dza shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad myed
29b7(brgyad stong): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gzugs mtha'
29b8(brgyad stong): yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
30a1(brgyad stong): pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ke'u shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa chen po zhes
30a2(brgyad stong): bya ba dang / de bzhin du tshad myed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin tu mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes mngon par chags par myi byed do// ke'u shi ka de bas na
30a3(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ke'u shi ka dmyigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
30a4(brgyad stong): ba 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ke'u shi ka sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ 'di da lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas
30a5(brgyad stong): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// yang ke'u shi ka ci lta ra na dmyigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i pha rol/ 
30a6(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa yin no zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar chos thams cad thog ma dang / dbus dang mtha' myi dmyigs te de bas na ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha'
30a7(brgyad stong): yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ ke'u shi ka rnam grangs 'dis dmyigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dra ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin
30a8(brgyad stong): pa'o// ke'u shi ka 'di ltar gzhan yang chos thams cad mtha' yas mu myed de/ de dag gi thog ma 'am dbus sam mtha' myi dmyigs so// de bas na ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ 
30b1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyi sog pa 'am/ dbus sam mthal gyi dmyigs so// kes shika
30b2(brgyad stong): bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa thog ma 'am/ dbus sam mtha' myi dmyigs te/ ke'u shi ka rnam grangs de lta bur 'di lta ste/ shes
30b3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas mu myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog pa 'am dbus sam
30b4(brgyad stong): mtha' myi dmyigs te/ de bas na 'di lta ste/ ke'u shi ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de skad ces spras pa dang / lha'i
30b5(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor ji ltar na/ sa mas can mtha' yas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
30b6(brgyad stong): pa mtha' yas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka bgrang ba'i tshul lam bgrang ba mang pos sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
30b7(brgyad stong): mtha' yas pa ma yin no// bcu byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor 'on ji gang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyi / 'di la ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
30b8(brgyad stong): mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas
31a1(brgyad stong): yin/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can zhes bya ba na chos kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin/ chos myed pa'i tshin
31a2(brgyad stong): bla dgas kyang ma yin te/ mying du btags pa 'di ni blo bur du byung ba'o// mying du btags pa 'di ni dngos po myed pa'o// mying du btags pa 'di ni bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba myed
31a3(brgyad stong): pa'o// 'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes mying du btags pa 'di ni dmyigs pa myed pa'o// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems 'di la
31a4(brgyad stong): sems can yongs su bstan par bya ba gang yang yod dam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de lta ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gA
31a5(brgyad stong): la sems can yongs su bstan par byas pa de myed pa la sems can mtha' yas pa yod dam/ ke'u shi ka/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
31a6(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skal pa gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed du byin gyis brlabs te/ dbyangs mtha' yas pas go bar byed pa dang / gsung dbyangs zab mos sems can sems can zhes tshig
31a7(brgyad stong): tu brjod du zin kyang / de la sems can gang yang skye ba 'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gag pa yod dam/ smras pa
31a8(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma nas dag pa'i phyir/ sems can thog ma nas yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ ke'u shi ka
31b1(brgyad stong): nas grangs 'dis kyang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin pas/ ke'u zhika de ltar sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes
31b2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang por bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag par bcas pa dang / drang srong dang
31b3(brgyad stong): skyes pa dang / bud myed kyi tshogs kyis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/ kye ma'i chos kye ma'o chos/ kye ma'o chos rnams kyi chos nyid de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba gang dang gang yin
31b4(brgyad stong): ba de ni/ 'phags pa gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis legs pa ra smras pas brjod cing bstan te rab tu gzhag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis slan chad bdag cag ni byang chub sems
31b5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas
31b6(brgyad stong): pa 'di la gnas pa 'dini de bzhi na gshegs pas legs par 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang por bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / sangs pa dang bcas pa dang / skye dbu'i bung
31b7(brgyad stong): bor bcas pa dang / drang srong dang bcas pa dang / skyes pa dang / bud myed kyi tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te/ su'i bu dag gang gi ci rgyal po'i pho brang
31b8(brgyad stong): 'khor na/ mar me can zhes bya ba'itshong dus kyi dbus su/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi drung du bzhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa phra
32a1(brgyad stong): bar gyur pas/ de'i tshe mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skal pa grangs myed pa na/ shag kya thub pa zhes
32a2(brgyad stong): bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten rig pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na myed pa
32a3(brgyad stong): lha dang myi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes/ nga bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag gis 'di
32a4(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su sdud cing
32a5(brgyad stong): rjes su yongs su 'dzin pa ngo mtshar to// bde bar gsheg sa pa shin tu ngo mtshar to zhes zer ro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
32a6(brgyad stong): brgyang steng pa las/ brgya byin gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// bam po gsum
32a7(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor der lha'i bu gang dag 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa dang / dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod
32a8(brgyad stong): par gyur pa dang / 'khor bzhi po thams cad 'dus te 'khod par mkhyen nas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams dbang
32b1(brgyad stong): du bzhag ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la stsogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po la stsogs pa tshangs ris dang / 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ 
32b2(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog kam/ kun chub par byed dam/ rab tu 'doran na/ de la bdud dam/ bdud tu
32b3(brgyad stong): ris kyi lha glags lta ba dag gis glags rnyed par myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de la myi dang myi ma yin pa rnams kyis glags rnyed par yang myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs
32b4(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo de nyam nga ba myi spongs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par myi 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang lha'i bu dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhug
32b5(brgyad stong): pa rnams dang / lha'i bu gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma bzung ba dang / ma bcangs pa dang / ma grags pa dang / kun chub par ma byas pa dang / rab tu
32b6(brgyad stong): myi 'dod pa'i lha'i bu de dag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du 'ong 'dod par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / rab tu 'don pa de la
32b7(brgyad stong): nyan par 'gyur te/ thob nas 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur ro// rab tu 'don par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka rigs
32b8(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de ba dgon par song yang ru
33a1(brgyad stong): khyim stong par song yang rung / lam du song yang rung / lam gol bar song yang rung / 'brog dgon par song yang rung / nye bar 'ong yang rung ste/ 'jigs pa 'am
33a2(brgyad stong): bag tsha ba myi 'byung myi skye'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
33a3(brgyad stong): bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa dang / sba bar
33a4(brgyad stong): bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dang nga po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// ma ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bum
33a5(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de la/ bsrung ba dang / 
33a6(brgyad stong): bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
33a7(brgyad stong): 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'adzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don
33a8(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
33b1(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag 'thob
33b2(brgyad stong): cing 'dzinang par gyu rang pa ngo mtsha rang to// bcom ldan 'das yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bzung na/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug po thams cad bzung bar 'gyur ram/ de skad ces
33b3(brgyad stong): gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
33b4(brgyad stong): pa dazung bas/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug po thams cad bzung bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 
33b5(brgyad stong): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par byed na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de tshe 'di la yon tan gang dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba shi nang tu legs par/ 
33b6(brgyad stong): nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis legs so legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas/ lha'i dbang po tra bcom ldan 'das kyi
33b7(brgyad stong): ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsa lang te/ ke'u shi ka gang la la zhig chos 'di la bachod par 'dod pa dang / rgol bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar byed pa zhin/ 
33b8(brgyad stong): byung na/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang / rgol bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar byed par 'dod pa de'i/ rtsod pa dang / rgol ba dang / 'gal bar gang 'byung zhing / skyes pa de myed par 'gyur te/ 
34a1(brgyad stong): thod par 'dod pa dang / rgol bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar byed par 'dod pa de dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dzin
34a2(brgyad stong): 'di ltar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'dond par 'gyur na
34a3(brgyad stong): de'i thong pa'i gzhi 'byung zhing skyes pa de dag myed par 'gyur te/ zod par 'dod pa dang / rgol bar 'dod pa/ 'gal bar byed 'dod pa de dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par myi 'gyur ro// 
34a4(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de
34a5(brgyad stong): tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka 'di ltar dper na/ tshi ma gi zhes bya ba dugathams cad zhi bar byed pa zhig yod de/ der skye bo sbrul gdun
34a6(brgyad stong): pas bkres shing zas 'dod de zas tshol ba zhig gis/ srog chags su gyu rang pa 'ga' zhig mthong ste/ sbrul gdug pa des zas kyi phyir bza' bar 'dod nas srog chags su gyur pa de'i dri phyogs
34a7(brgyad stong): su 'brang zhing bstsags pa dang / srog chags su gyu rad pa de rtsi ma gri gang na yod pa der song nas phyi nangad te 'dug pa dang / de nas sbrul de che de'i dri tsam gyis phyir ldog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ keT
34a8(brgyad stong): ka de ltar sbrul gyi gdug pa zil gyis gnon pa de ni/ tshi ma gi de'i sman gyi yon tan de yin te/ ke'u shi ka tshi ma gi de ni de ltar mthu che ba'o// ke'u shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
34b1(brgyad stong): bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa 'dzin pa dang / 'chang bdud/ klon pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'dond pa de la ni ke ni ka chod pa dang / rgol ba dang 'ams pa
34b2(brgyad stong): byed pa gang dang gang 'byung ba de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i kazi brjid dang mthus de dag byed par 'gyur te/ kye yin smra par 'gyur/ de dag gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid
34b3(brgyad stong): du nub par 'gyur zhing 'gag ste 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / kyi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
34b4(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi lang tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par rkang pa dang / rab tu 'dond pa de la bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa
34b5(brgyad stong): dang / sra bar byed de/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am // sa kyi bu mo des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag yongs su dA rung bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
34b6(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzinang pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'dod pa de tshig bzung bar 'gyur ram/ tshig pa
34b7(brgyad stong): par 'gyur tshig 'chal pa myed par 'gyur ro// khro ba'i zil gyis non par myi 'gyur ro// brgyal rgya zil gyis non par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi
34b8(brgyad stong): rol du phyind pas yongs su dul bar byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su bskur te/ khro ba 'phel bar myi byed/ nga rgyal 'phel bar gyi byed/ khon tu 'dzinang pa yongs su
35a1(brgyad stong): myi 'dang / gnod sems yongs su myi 'chang la/ bka la nyal gyi 'dzin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar spyod pa la dran pa dang byams pa skye bar 'gyur zhing / 
35a2(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du sems shing / gal te bdag gis gnod sems bskyed du zin na/ bdag gi dbang po rnams 'khrug cing bzhin gyi mdog kyang gyur ngom/ bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang/ 
35a3(brgyad stong): chub tu yang dag par zhugs shing / 'di la slob par 'dod pa khro ba'i dbang du 'gro ba 'di ni mya rigs so snyam nas/ de myur du dran pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
35a4(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa/ dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba des/ tshe 'di la yon
35a5(brgyad stong): tan 'di dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de sku da ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsolang ngo to// 
35a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su dul ba dang / khengs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar
35a7(brgyad stong): gnas pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsalang ba/ ke'u shi ka gzham yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par 'gyur
35a8(brgyad stong): 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ rab tu 'dond par 'gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 
35b1(brgyad stong): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / kha ton byed pa de thab mo g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshe/ g.yul gyi thog mar byung na/ de thab mo g.yul du 'jug
35b2(brgyad stong): g.yul du zhugs sam/ la te 'gro 'am/ 'greng ngama'adug pa 'di lta bu ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs myed de/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin
35b3(brgyad stong): pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / kha ton byed pa de'i srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba 'am/ gzhan gyis gnod pa byed pas srog gi bar
35b4(brgyad stong): chad du 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin no// gal te de la mtshon 'phangs na lus la phog par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
35b5(brgyad stong): tu phyind pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o// ke'u shi ka la de lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na myed pa'i rig sngags so// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu
35b6(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'don gyi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags te/ ke'u shika rig sngags 'di la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo na/ bdag la gnod pa bya bar myi sems/ gzhan la gnod pa/ 
35b7(brgyad stong): bya bar yang kyi sems/ gcig la gnod pa bya bar yang gyi sems te/ gzu shig rig sngags 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bla ma byed pa yang dag par
35b8(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur te/ de bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
36a1(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems la lta bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rig sngags 'di la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
36a2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po ni/ gang ma thob pa 'am/ ma shes pa 'am/ gang yang mngon sum tu ma byas pa myed do// de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhes bya ste/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am
36a3(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di yongs
36a4(brgyad stong): su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de gang na yod pa der/ chung ngu na bris nas gle gas bam du chud par byas nas/ mchod pa sngon du byas
36a5(brgyad stong): te bzhag la bkur stir byas te/ myi 'dzin myi 'chang / myi klog kun chub par myi byed/ rab tu 'don par myi// / 'gyur yang / ke'u shi ka de la las kyi rnam par smin pa
36a6(brgyad stong): ma gtogs par/ myi 'am myi ma yin bA glags lhas kyang glags rnyed par myi 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'im rigs kyi bu mo de tshe 'di la yon tan 'di yang yongasu 'dzin/ 
36a7(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i khor yug na 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i nang na 'dug pa dang / byang
36a8(brgyad stong): chub kyi snying po'i drung na 'dug pa'i myi dang myi ma yin pa dang / byol song yan chad kyang / myi dang myi ma yin pa dag gis rkyal ka bya ba 'am/ gsad pa 'am/ gnod par byed myi nus te
36b1(brgyad stong): detso'i phyir zhe na/ de 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / 
36b2(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'chang chubar/ sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang / rgya 'khon pa dang / kyi skrag pa ston cing brjod pa de bzhin du
36b3(brgyad stong): kan ni gachags kyi bu 'am/ rigs ky-i suM lo gang shes rab tu pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzid pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par byed pa de la/ las kyin
36b4(brgyad stong): par sbyin pa 'ba' zhigs gtogs pa rgya dang ma ma yin pa ras sa rgyal ka bya ba 'am/ gsang pa 'am/ gnod par byed kyi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhem/ ke'u'i ka shes ra
36b5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid kyis sa phyogs de sems canan/ mas kyi mchod rtenang du gyur par bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / bla mar
36b6(brgyad stong): bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi skyabs dang / gnas dang / 'gon dang / dpung gnyen du byas par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 
36b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas glegs bam
36b8(brgyad stong): du chung par bgyis te/ bzhas pa de la lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / 
37a1(brgyad stong): khor yug du mar me'i 'phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bgyis pa dang / bla mar bgyis pa dang / ri mor bgyis pa dang / mchod pa dang / brjed
37a2(brgyad stong): pa dang / gsol ba dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung dag mchod rten gyi nang du stsal te/ yongs
37a3(brgyad stong): su 'dzind cing bcangs la/ de dag la yang de bzhin du lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / gre byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 
37a4(brgyad stong): ba dan dang / kho ra yug du mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mtshod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bgyi ba dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyis/ mchod cing brjod de
37a5(brgyad stong): gsol na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gnyis gang ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i
37a6(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri bar bya ste/ khyod kyis ci nus pa de bzhin du lung ston cig/ ke'u shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ gang de bzhin
37a7(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par grub pa 'di lam gang la bslabs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
37a8(brgyad stong): rnams kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes shing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas// de skad ces bka' stsald pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya
37b1(brgyad stong): byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la bslabs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo/ gas
37b2(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes shing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
37b3(brgyad stong): pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas na sku de lta bu brnyes pas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su myi 'gro ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pas de bzhin gshegs pa de
37b4(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// ke'u shi 2 ka de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de yang
37b5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba yin te/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag gi sku gdung gru ba pa'i dngos po grub pa yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
37b6(brgyad stong): pa dang / thabs mkhas pa las byung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gnas su gyur pa yin no// de ltar de la brten nos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu dbye'o// sangs rgyas
37b7(brgyad stong): kyi sku gdung rab tu dbye'o// chos rab tu dbye'o// dge 'dun rab tu dbye bar bya'o// de ltar bdag gi dngos po'i sku gdung grub pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sku las byung ste/ thams cad
37b8(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyur gyur pas na/ sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur cing phyag bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba
38a1(brgyad stong): dang brjed par bya ba dang / gsol bar bya bar gyur pa yin no// de lta bas na nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung de dag la mchod pa de lta bur 'gyur ro// ke'u ni
38a2(brgyad stong): ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di bris nas/ glegs bam du chud par byas te/ 'chang ba dang / mchod pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang
38a3(brgyad stong): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang
38a4(brgyad stong): po dag gis bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed mchod par byed/ brjed par byed/ gsol bar byed na de nyid de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed do// de ts+yai
38a5(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mi des thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
38a6(brgyad stong): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bris nas/ glegs bam du chud par byas te/ bkur stir bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba 'i sa kya mchod par bya ba dang / brjed par bya ba dang / 
38a7(brgyad stong): gsol bar bya ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag byed na/ de nyid de'i gzhi las bsod nams myang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang / 
38a8(brgyad stong): ba la mchod par 'gyur ba des/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mchod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
38b1(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu gling gi myi gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bkur sti myi bgyid/ bla mar myi bgyid/ ri mor gyi brjid / mchod par
38b2(brgyad stong): myi bgyid/ brjed par myi bgyid/ gsol bar myi bgyid pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal bar 'gyur ram/ de ste 'tshal bar myi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i
38b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod par bgyis pa de ltar don che ba dang / phan yon che ba de dag myi rig myi 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang
38b4(brgyad stong): po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'usangaka de ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu gling gi myi de dag la gang dag sangs rgyas la rtogs nas dang pa dang ldan pa dang / 
38b5(brgyad stong): gang ngag chos la togs nas dang pa dang ldan pa dang / gang nga ga dge 'dun la rtogs nas dang pa dang ldan pa ji snyed cig yod// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'dra
38b6(brgyad stong): lha'i dbang po brgya byin kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu gang gi mying ngag la/ gang dag sangs rgyas la rtogs nas dang pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag / chom
38b7(brgyad stong): gsanas dang pa dang ldan pa dang / klung sa dge 'dun la tshugs na sa dang pa dang ldan pa da/ da ska ces gsol ma ldan 'das kyis pa'i tshas
38b8(brgyad stong): mad ces pa' bral te/ sas ga ra bzhidi ni/ deng bzhin 'am bu m-ing gi byong dag na gang dag sangs rgyal la rtogs na dang pa dang ldan nga ma
39a1(brgyad stong): rtogs nas dang ba dang ldan pa dang / gang dag dge 'dun la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo // gang dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ni nyung ba de bas kyang
39a2(brgyad stong): ches nyung ngo // gang dag len cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa ni nyung ba bas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag dgra bcom pa thob pa ni nyung ba bas kyang ches
39a3(brgyad stong): nyung ngo // gang dag rang byang chub mngon du byed pa ni nyung ba bas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni nyung ba bas kyang ches nyung ngo // 
39a4(brgyad stong): gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sem sa bskyed nas/ sems bskyed pa de rab tu rgyas par byed pa ni nyung ba bas kyang chos nyung ngo // gang dag bla na myed pa yA
39a5(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sems bskyed pa rgyas par byas nas/ brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas pa de ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag
39a6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag shes rwa
39a7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung ngo // ke'u shi ka gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'bad de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
39a8(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya pa dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa'i saHla gnas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
39b1(brgyad stong): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing 'bad pa rnams la shes
39b2(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nye bdu ston cing 'dzin tu 'jug ci 'chang du 'jug pa dang / klog tu 'dug pa dang / kun chub par byed du 'du pa dang / rab tu 'don du 'jug pa dang / shes
39b3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro la lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / zugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan rnams
39b4(brgyad stong): dang / kho ra khor yug du mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed du 'jug/ bla mar byed du 'jug/ ri mor byed du 'jug/ mchod du 'jug
39b5(brgyad stong): brjod du 'jugagasol ru 'jug pa ni nyung bra bas kyang ches nyung ngo // ke'u shi ka gang dag byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi sems
39b6(brgyad stong): rgyas par byed cing nabyang chub kyi sems rab tu rgyas por byas nas/ dz+dza byang chub kyi sems rab tu rgyas par byas nas/ byang chub tu spyod pa'i sems can ni grangs myed dpag tu myed pa yod do// 
39b7(brgyad stong): ke'u sha ka sems can grangs myed dpag tu myed pa byang chub la spyod pa de dag las/ gal te gcig gam gnyis shig phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par 'gyuraro// 
39b8(brgyad stong): de na'i phyir zhen no kle'u shrI ka bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ brtson 'grus zhen pa dang / le lo gan gyi dang / sems stobs zhan pa dang / 'du shes dman pa dang / 
40a1(brgyad stong): dad pa dman pa dang / shes rab dman pa rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang myur du bla na myong pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
40a2(brgyad stong): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ rgyun myi 'chad par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// kun
40a3(brgyad stong): chub par bya'o// rab tu gdon par bya'o// yongs su dri bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di lta bur shes te de bzhin gshegs
40a4(brgyad stong): pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ yang 'ad de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs kyis/ bdag cag gis kyang de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// 'di lta
40a5(brgyad stong): ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bdag cag gi ston pa'o snya ma ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang da ga par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs kyang rung / yongs
40a6(brgyad stong): su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten par bya'o// ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
40a7(brgyad stong): bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de
40a8(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can byed du bcug ste/ byas nas kyang des de la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /

40b8(brgyad stong): pa byas par 'gyur bar/ chung ngu ra glegs bam du chud par 'gyur bar byas te/ 'chang ngam bzhag lade la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / blam/

45b8(brgyad stong): ces bka' sa led pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// de de bzhin to// de ba dgashegs pa de de hri
46a1(brgyad stong): te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la bkur stir bgyid pa dang / bla mar bgyid pa dang / ri mor bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgying ba dang/ brjed par bgyid pa dang
46a2(brgyad stong): gsol bar bgyid na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyis yongs su mkhyen pa'i 'jig rtend kyi zhes
46a3(brgyad stong): ni bzhugs pa rnams la shin tu bkur stir bgyis pa dang / bla mar bgyis pa dang / ri mor bgyis pa dang / mchod pa dang / brjed pa dang / gsol bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
46a4(brgyad stong): 'di lta bur stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems
46a5(brgyad stong): can ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad las/ sems can so so nas rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can re re bgyid du stsal la/ sems
46a6(brgyad stong): can de dag so so nas mchod rten de dag thams cad la skal pa 'am/ skal pa bas lhag par sil snyan thams cad dang / glu dbyangs thams cad dang / gar thams cad dang / rnga dang / pheg rdob
46a7(brgyad stong): ba thams cad dang / lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang
46a8(brgyad stong): khor ra khor yug du mar me'i 'phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bcing / bla mar bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ marjed par bgyid/ gasnol bar bgyid na/ 
46b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la mngon par dad dertog cing mos la/ sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed de lhag pa'i
46b2(brgyad stong): bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bkri pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan das la yA
46b3(brgyad stong): rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang / ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis yongs su dpyod par bgyid cing / sangs rgyas kyi
46b4(brgyad stong): tshul rgyun chad par mi gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyu rad cig ces/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa'
46b5(brgyad stong): rnams la phan gdags par bsgrub pa bgyis par 'gyur ba ra chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par bgyis te/ 'chang / dam bzhag la/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des
46b6(brgyad stong): lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra khor yug du mar mo
46b7(brgyad stong): 'phreng ba dag dang / rje mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ brjed par bgyid/ gsol bar bgyid na/ 'di nyid de bas
46b8(brgyad stong): so bsod nams mang du skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka rigs
47a1(brgyad stong): ga kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du snyed do// ke'u ga ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang po dpag tu myed par skyed do// 
47a2(brgyad stong): keny+tsa ni ko rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams grangs byed par skying ngo // ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'as rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams bsam gyis myi khyab

47a4(brgyad stong): nams gzhal du myed par skyed do// ke'u shi ka de ci'i phyir dazhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa dar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyend pa

47a8(brgyad stong): par stond pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang / ji ltar grub pa'i shes rab kyis yongs su dpyod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par
47b1(brgyad stong): ma gyurd cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyurd cig ces/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags pa sgrub pa
47b2(brgyad stong): byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par byas te/ 'chang ngam bzhag la/ de la lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang

47b4(brgyad stong): byed/ mchod par byed/ brjed par byed/ gsol bar bye/ da na/ bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rte nad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring
47b5(brgyad stong): bsrel gyi snying po can la bkur stir byas pa'i bsod nams mdo na bar 'du byed pa snga ma de bas/ brgya'i char yang nye ba ra myi 'gro/ stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro/ khye ba'i
47b6(brgyad stong): char yang nye bar myi 'gro/ bye ba phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro brgya stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro/ grangs su yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang / rgyur yang myi bzod do// 
47b7(brgyad stong): de nas lha'i bu bzhi khri gang de dag lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang bcas par 'khor der 'dus te 'khod par gyur to// de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po shes
47b8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar bgyi'o// grogs po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcang bar bgyi'o// grogs po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa klag par bgyi'o// grogs po shes rab kyi
48a1(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyinang pa kum chub par bgyi'o// grogs po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rab tu gdon par bgyi'o// grogs po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lung mnod par bgyi

48a5(brgyad stong): 'di lung nos shig/ ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di kha ton gyis shig/ ke'u shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gi tshe lha ma yin rnams 'di lta bu'i seMs

48b7(brgyad stong): pa'i rigs sngags 'di la brten nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ da ltar 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
48b8(brgyad stong): myed pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i rig
49a1(brgyad stong): sngags 'di la brten nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ dra yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu

49a3(brgyad stong): po bcu'i las kyi la mo rnams kyang 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i tshad myed pa bzhi dang

49b1(brgyad stong): spyod thos pa'i shes rab kyi phal tu phyi drang ba'i rgyu mthun pas thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan par la ke'u'i ka de dag sems can dmas kyi

50a7(brgyad stong): mo'i kha ton du byed pa de la phyir myi snang bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang dang yang kha ton du byed pa de dag de glags lta ba dang / glags yol ba gang dag bye bar 'ongs par
50a8(brgyad stong): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bzung ba'i phyir/ de dag gis grags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po 'am/ blon po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag nye bar
50b1(brgyad stong): yang / smra bar 'dod cing gtam zer bar 'dod de/ yang dag par dga' bar bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ro// ke'u 'i ka phyi chen tsha/ shes ya kri pha ro ya tu phyinang

51a1(brgyad stong): sadzu ba sa kyi thos dran thos bsams byas ba 'a 'du sa sa kunan du tu bye d+hA ba pas rjes ba sa

51a7(brgyad stong): ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu mu stegs can gzhan kun tu klu de dag la chos dkar po gcig kyang yod par dris la mthong ste/ de dag thams cad ni klan kha tshol ba'i bsam pa
51a8(brgyad stong): me'i sems kyis 'od 'dod par 'gyur ro// / de nas bdud sdig can 'ang snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor ba
51b1(brgyad stong): 'a'adridran pas bsams rab tu gangon par zung klu nga
52a1(brgyad stong): rab tu bton pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tA bas bsams shing kha ton tu byas te/ rab tu 'don pa de lta de lta bur bdud sdig can
52a2(brgyad stong): lam de nyid nas slar log sde song bar gyur to// de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis me tog man da ra ba dag mngon par sprul te/ bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'dug nas
52a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der mngon par gtor cing mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ 'di skad du kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yun ring mo zhig na/ 'dzam bu gling gi myi rnaMs kyinang du 'byung po zhes
52a4(brgyad stong): ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas/ yang lha'i me tog rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das seMs
52a5(brgyad stong): can gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'chad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa de dag ni/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ klags rnyed par myi 'gyur
52a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang ros pa kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'dond pa dang / lung nod pa dang / 
52a7(brgyad stong): ton byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du bgyid pa'i sems can de dag na/ ngan ngon gyi dge ba'i rgyu ba dang ldan pa ma lags so// 
52a8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grags par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag gis kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba de dag rnams la bgyi ba bgyis po lags na/ gang 'dzin
52b1(brgyad stong): pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid
52b2(brgyad stong): du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lta ci smos// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa lags so// de ci'i slad
52b3(brgyad stong): du zhe na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rab tu 'byed do// 'dis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
52b4(brgyad stong): dper na rin po che gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen pos rab tu phye ba lags/ de dag ni rgya mtsho chen po las btsal bar bgyi ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
52b5(brgyad stong): bzhin du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rin po che yang de bzhi na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rgya mtsho chen
52b6(brgyad stong): por btsal bar bya'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin
52b7(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rin po che ni 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa rgya mtsho chen po 'di las skyes so// de nas
52b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'i yon tan myi gsung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i yon tan myi gsung
53a1(brgyad stong): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i yon tan myi gsung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i yon tan mye gsung bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
53a2(brgyad stong): bsngags pa myi gsung myi brjod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gcig pu'i myang brjod do/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ de de bzhin no// kun dag
53a3(brgyad stong): bo de de bzhin te/ nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bsngags pa brjod cing smra ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa gzhan gyi myi brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha
53a4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyind pa lnga'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// kun dga' bo de snyam du sems/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du spos su ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba'i
53a5(brgyad stong): mying thob par 'gyur ram/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ de bzhin du yongs su ma
53a6(brgyad stong): bsngos pa'i tshul khrims dang / yongs su ma bsngos pa'i 'azod pa dang / yongs su ma bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus dang / yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bsam gtan rnams dang / kun dag/ 
53a7(brgyad stong): bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i shes rab le/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba'i phying thob par 'gyur ram/ kun dga' bos
53a8(brgyad stong): gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
53b1(brgyad stong): nyid du yongs su bsngo bas/ yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bsam gyis myi khyab pa'o// kun dga' bos gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// bcom
53b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis myi khyab pa'o// bcom ldan
53b3(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na dam pa yin pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyind pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas ma thams cang mkhyend pa nyid du
53b4(brgyad stong): bsdam pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni pha rol du byi nang pa lnga'i sngon du 'gro ba mo// tshul 'dis rolang tu phyinang pa lta ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyimeng pa
53b5(brgyad stong): na du lus / 'dis sa rab kyis da na rol tu na pa drun sa 'dzi gA'i hU~M thA dgas lams sa
53b6(brgyad stong): bode lbu bas n+tu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa brjodan pha rol tu phyind pa rgyan pomams kyang brjod par 'gyur ro// kun dka' bo 'di lta ste dbar na/ sachen po lam
53b7(brgyad stong): ma/ tshogs pa dang 'brangan skye bar 'gyur te/ smanas bon de dag gi sa'i yin thams chen pos byin rnams zin de dag skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' ba de bzhin du pa rol
53b8(brgyad stong): phyind pa lnga yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yang yang dag par bzung zhing / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas pas/ pha rol tu phyind pa
54a1(brgyad stong): skye bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba'i mying thob par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na shes rab kyi
54a2(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyinang po 'di nyid pha rol tu phyind pa lnga'i sngon du 'gro zhing 'drend pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
54a3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par bgyis pa dang / rab tu bton pa dang / lung mnos pa dang / kha ton tu bgyis na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rim
54a4(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo de yon tan gang dag yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di'i phyogs bcom ldan 'das las gang blangs shing rab tu bton pa shes rab
54a5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i yon tan 'di dag thams cad nga dung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog/ sa pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma brjod do// bcom ldan 'dra
54a6(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka legs so legs so// ke'u shwa ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 
54a7(brgyad stong): rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa de dag nyi tshe la yon tan 'di dag 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun cha
54a8(brgyad stong): par ma gyu dad cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyu ra cig ces/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags
54b1(brgyad stong): bar bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di bris nas glegs bam du chud par byas te bzhag la/ de la lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 
54b2(brgyad stong): 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / khor ra khor yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang
54b3(brgyad stong): baM dag gis bkur stir byed/ tha mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ brjed par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i/ tshe 'di nyid
54b4(brgyad stong): kyi yon tan ngas bshad par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal da pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byi na gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
54b5(brgyad stong): bdag gis kyang gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di 'dri ba dang / 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog/ pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don
54b6(brgyad stong): ba dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
54b7(brgyad stong): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / khor ra khor yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag giso bkur stir bgying / bla mar bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ mchod par bgyid
54b8(brgyad stong): brjed par bgyid/ gsol bar bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rigs kyi bu ma
55a1(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa kha ton du byed pa ni/ lha'i bu brgya phrag mang po dang / lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dang / lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po rnams chos nyan
55a2(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir nye bar 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu de dag chos nyand pa na/ chos smra ba de'i spobs pa nye bar bsgrub bo snyam du sems par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe chos smra ba de myi smra bar 'dod par gyur
55a3(brgyad stong): pa de'i tshe/ lha'i bu de dag gis chos la gus pa de nyid kyis/ spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par sems so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ji ltar smra bar 'gyur ba/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'o
55a4(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub na par byed pa dang / rab tu 'dorang pa dang / lung nod pa dang
55a5(brgyad stong): kha ton byed par gyu rad pa de dag tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag yong sa su 'dzind par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa
55a6(brgyad stong): 'di 'chang ba la klan ka tshol ba la brgal na myi rung ngo snyam du sems zhum par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas bsrung ba dang / bskya pa dang
55a7(brgyad stong): sba bar byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas na/ gang klan ka tshol ba yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong // la gla na ka btsal bar bya ba de yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / 
55a8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha ro lud tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rnam grangs 'di
55b1(brgyad stong): 'di lta bur rgol ba gang yang myi 'byung ngo // myi skrag myi dngang / shi nad tu dngang par myi byed de/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'dzind pa dang / 
55b2(brgyad stong): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed par 'gyur ba de tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//

55b4(brgyad stong): dben par 'gyur ro// de la pha rol rgol ba dag 'byung zhing / skyes pa dag chos dang ldan pas tshar gcod nus par 'gyur ra ro// mthu yod par 'gyur te/ pha rol gyis brgal
55b5(brgyad stong): kyang / brgal pa la lus ston nus par 'gyur ro// rig sa kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin byed pa 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang

55b7(brgyad stong): phyogs gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di bris nas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des grags bam du chud par byas te/ bzhag par gyur pa deng / ke'u'i ka rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
55b8(brgyad stong): lha dag gi nang ni lha'i bu gang su dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag der 'ong bar bsams te/ der 'ongs nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di
56a1(brgyad stong): glegs bam du chud par byas pa la lta bar 'gyur/ phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur/ 'dud pa byed par 'gyur/ 'dzind par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun

58a1(brgyad stong): bar sems so// ke'u shig rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ gang su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtend kyi khams grangs myed dpag tu myed

58a3(brgyad stong): dag thams cad glegs bam nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lhogs shig/ phyag tshol cig/ 'dud pa gyis shig/ zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis
