81b5(brgyad stong): pas bsam pa zag pa nas sbyin par byed pa dang / chung ngu na 'dri ba dang / klag pa la yang myi skyo bar sgrub pa dang / btso na bas 'dzin tu 'jug pa dang / yang dag par stond pa dang / 
81b6(brgyad stong): yang dag par gzings bstod pa dang / rab tu dga' bar byed pa dang / yang dag par 'dzind tu 'jug pa dang / tshig gis mtshond pa dang / rnam par mtsho nad pa dang / rjes su mtsho nad pa dang / 
81b7(brgyad stong): 'di'i don yang dag par stond pa dang / 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dag tshur shog/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di la slobs shig/ khyod kyis lam 'di la bslabs shing spyad de 'bad na/ myur du
81b8(brgyad stong): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can gyi khams gzhal du myed pa rnams phung
82a1(brgyad stong): po yang dag par zad pa bla na myed pa 'ang ste ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ra'i tu 'byed pa la 'dul bar 'gyur ro// zhes sems rnam par spong zhing the tsom myed par byed pa dang / tshig 'du
82a2(brgyad stong): skad du/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'di lta skye rnanasu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'di dag thob par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di las dgra bcom pa nyid rab tu 'byed do zhes
82a3(brgyad stong): zer zhing / de la 'di ltar rigs kyi bu khyod ji lta bur shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa de lta bur/ khyod mthar kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// thams cad
82a4(brgyad stong): mkhyend pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur ro// khyod 'di la slob na rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i
82a5(brgyad stong): 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas nyid rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// 6/ sangs rgyas nyid rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// zhes spro ba 'phel bar
82a6(brgyad stong): byed na/ de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// gzhan yang ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rang sangs
82a7(brgyad stong): rgyas nyid la bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde
82a8(brgyad stong): bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lang pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di chung ngu na/ glegs bam la bris nas
82b1(brgyad stong): mngon par dad pas dad par byed/ rab tu rtog pas rtogs par byed/ lhag par mos pas mos par byed/ sems dang bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba la byang chub tu sems bskyed de
82b2(brgyad stong): lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas/ bsam pa zag pa nas sbyin par byed pa dang / chung ngu na 'dri ba dang / klag pa la yang myi skyo bar sgrub pa dang / brtson pas 'dzinang du 'jug pa dang / 
82b3(brgyad stong): yang dag par stond pa dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / rab tu dga' bar byed pa dang / yang dag par 'dzind tu 'jug pa dang / tshig gis mtsho nad pa dang / rnam par mtshond pa dang
82b4(brgyad stong): rjes su mtsho nang pa dang / de'i don yang dag par ston pa dang 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dag tshur shog/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di la spobs shig/ khyod kyis lam 'di la
82b5(brgyad stong): bslabs shing spyad de 'bad na/ myur du bla na myed pa yang da ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'ang rgya bar 'gyur ro// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
82b6(brgyad stong): nas/ sems can gyi khams gzhal du myed pa rnams phung po yang dag par zad pa bla na myed pa 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' rab tu 'byed pa la 'dul bar 'gyur ro zhes sems rnam par spyod
82b7(brgyad stong): zhing the tsom myed par byed pa dang / tshig 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod 'di la ste/ shes rab kyi phararo yang tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos de dag nyid thob par gyis shig/ de ci'i phying zhe na 'di las pa
82b8(brgyad stong): ba'i 'bras bu rab tu 'byed ngo // zhes zer zhing de la 'di lta bur rigs kyi bu khyed ji lta ji lta bur shes rab kyi pha rol tu byind pa la slob par 'gyur ba de la de lta bur/ mthar kyis khyod sangs
83a1(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur ro// khyod bslab pa 'di la slob cing spyod de 'bad na/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rab
83a2(brgyad stong): tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas nyid rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// 
83a3(brgyad stong): zhes spro ba 'phel bar byed na/ de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// yang ke'u shi ka/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad / rang sangs rgyas nyid la bzhag pa'i bsod
83a4(brgyad stong): nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ke'u shi ka gling da chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rtend kyi khams nA/ sem das can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
83a5(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang sangs rgyas nyid la bo// dkyang / ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten kyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la
83a6(brgyad stong): bkod pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ke'u shi ka stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la
83a7(brgyad stong): la zhig gis/ rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod kyang / ke'u shi ka stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed
83a8(brgyad stong): pa lta zhog/ ke'u shi ka stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig te nad kyi khams ca/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang sangs rgyas nyid
83b1(brgyad stong): la bkod kyang / ke'u shi ka stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ke'u shi ka
83b2(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod kyang
83b3(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi sems can thams cad/ rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ke'u shi ka gang ga
83b4(brgyad stong): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams na/ sems na ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod na/ 
83b5(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed nga/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // 
83b6(brgyad stong): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di chung ngu na/ glegs bam du
83b7(brgyad stong): chung bar byas nas/ mngon par dad pas dad par byed/ rab tu rtogs pas rtogs par byed/ lhag par mos pas mos par byed/ sems dang bas byang chub sems dpa' sems
83b8(brgyad stong): rang ba la byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa la/ lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas/ bsam pa zag pa nas smin par byed pa dang / 
84a1(brgyad stong): chung ngu na bri ba dang / klag pa la yang myi spyo bar sgrub pa dang / brtson pas 'dzin tu 'jug pa dang / yang dag par stond pa dang / yang dag par gzengs pastod pa dang / 
84a2(brgyad stong): rab tu dga' bar byed pa dang / yang dag par 'dzinang tu 'jug pa dang / tshig gis mtshond pa dang / rnam par mtshond pa dang / rjes su mtshond pa dang / de'i don yang dag par ston
84a3(brgyad stong): pa dang / 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dag tshur shog/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di la slobs shig/ khyod kyis lam 'di la bslabs shing spyad de 'bad na/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag
84a4(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ra 'gyur ro// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can gyi khams gzhal du myed pa rnams
84a5(brgyad stong): phung po yang dag par zad pa bla na myed pa 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' rab tu 'byed pa la 'dul bar 'gyu ra ro zhes sems rnam par sbyong zhing / the tsom byed par
84a6(brgyad stong): byed pa dang / tshig 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i chos de dag nyid thob par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
84a7(brgyad stong): las rang sangs rgyas nying rab tu 'byeng ngo zhes byer 'angadi / de la 'di ltar rigs kyi bu khyong ji lta ji lta bur zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyung ba de myu lta zung ma tha kyis/ 
84a8(brgyad stong): nga mangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par 'byung ngo ro// thams cad mabyed pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// thaMd bslas pa 'jas zan cing srong 'bangam/ rgyan du chugs pa'i 'bras burab tu 'byongs
84b1(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas nyid rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro zhes spro ba
84b2(brgyad stong): 'phel bar byed na de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// gzhan yang ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu gleng gi sems can de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
84b3(brgyad stong): za na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du
84b4(brgyad stong): brgyas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'drin byon pa dang / keT+Ta shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigasakyi nu mo gang gis byed gyi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
84b5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar gtad de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de la slob par 'gyur/ rnal 'byor du byed par
84b6(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ 'di nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bsgom pa 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub par
84b7(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro zhes nye bar gtad na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni nges par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
84b8(brgyad stong): ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal mthar 'byenang par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can thams cad bla na myed pa/ 
85a1(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rtend kyi khams na sems
85a2(brgyad stong): can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug kyang / ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi
85a3(brgyad stong): pa'i 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi sems can thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ke'u shi ka stong spyi phung
85a4(brgyad stong): kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhi dug gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
85a5(brgyad stong): sems bskyed du bcug kyang / ke'u shi ka stong spyi phud kyi 'dzi garte nad kyi khams kyi sems can thams cad bla na myed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsod
85a6(brgyad stong): nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ yang ke'u shi ka stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rtend kyi khams ma/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
85a7(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug kyang / ke'u shi ka stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi sems can thams cad bla na
85a8(brgyad stong): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ke'u shika stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte nad kyi khams na/ sems can/ 
85b1(brgyad stong): ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug kyang / ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong
85b2(brgyad stong): chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi sems can thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ke'u shi ka gang ga'i
85b3(brgyad stong): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
85b4(brgyad stong): bskyed pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyede nas/ sems can de dag thams cad la shes rab kyi pha
85b5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyinang pa 'di bris te byin pa dang / ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dang
85b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po la byin te/ 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob cing rnal 'byor du byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di de ltar lhag par bsgoms ma/ 'phel
85b7(brgyad stong): zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes gtad na/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// 
85b8(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni nges par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal mthar 'byind par 'gyur ro// 
86a1(brgyad stong): gzhan yang ke'u shika 'dzam bu gling na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur la/ rigs kyi bu 'am
86a2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam la bris te/ byin zhing nye bar gtad de/ don bzang po chog 'bru bzang pos nye bar ston na/ ke'u shi ka re
86a3(brgyad stong): snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // 
86a4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi phung po de'i grangs su yang gzung bar sla ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das pa song nams kyi phung po de bgrang bar yang / dper yang / 
86a5(brgyad stong): rgyur yang bgyi sla ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyisabaka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
86a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dag la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 
86a7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dri la gdams shing bstan na/ de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// yang ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can thams cad phyir myi ldog par gyur
86a8(brgyad stong): pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rtend kyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod
86b1(brgyad stong): ba de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur la/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa
86b2(brgyad stong): 'di glegs bam la bris nas/ byin zhing nye bar gtad la/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang pos rab tu ston na/ ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir/ 
86b3(brgyad stong): mi ldog par gyur pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nang pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ke'u shi ka stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams na sems can
86b4(brgyad stong): ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur la/ de dag la ri gas kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab
86b5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas byin zhi nga nye bar gtad la/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang pos rab tu ston na/ ke'u shi ka stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rtend kyi
86b6(brgyad stong): khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir myi ldog par gyur pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ke'u shi ka stong gnyis pa
86b7(brgyad stong): bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyurang la/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs/ 
86b8(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu gyonang pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas byin zhing nye bar gtad la/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang pos nye bar ston na/ ke'u shi ka stong gnyis pa
87a1(brgyad stong): par ma'i 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir myi ldog par gyur pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta/ 
87a2(brgyad stong): zhog/ ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ bla na myed pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur la
87a3(brgyad stong): de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas/ byin zhing nye bar gtad la/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang pos
87a4(brgyad stong): rab tu ston na/ ke'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte nad kyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir myi ldog par gru rad pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di nye
87a5(brgyad stong): bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ke'u shi ka 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa
87a6(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyu rang la/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam la bris
87a7(brgyad stong): nasabyin zhing nye bar gtad la/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang pos yongs su stonang na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi
87a8(brgyad stong): las bsod nams mang du skyed dam brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das bsod nams de'i grangs
87b1(brgyad stong): gzung bar sla ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bgrang bar yang / dper yang / rgyur yang bgyi sra ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lang pa/ ke'u she ka dre
87b2(brgyad stong): bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
87b3(brgyad stong): rgyu bar 'dod pa de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas/ byin zhing nye bar gtang la/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po rab tu stond pa dang / shes rab
87b4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di nye bar 'doms shing ston na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
87b5(brgyad stong): gzhan zhig 'byung ba de/ 'di skad du bdag ni 'di dag tham sa cad pas/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzo stegs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par
87b6(brgyad stong): bya'o zhes zer ba la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis mngon par shes pa myur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi
87b7(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyind pa la bstand cing gdams na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
87b8(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji bur bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa de lta de
88a1(brgyad stong): lta bur shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la bstand cing gdams na de bzhin nyid la nye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid la nye bar gyur pa na de bdag gis
88a2(brgyad stong): gos dang bsod snyoms dang / mal rnga dang / bro 'chal ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byang rnams yongs su spyad na 'bras bu chen por bgyid sman yon chen por bgyid
88a3(brgyad stong): da ni bsod nams zhining tu mang du skyed do// de na'i phyir zhed/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bram byed ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur da pa lags so// 
88a4(brgyad stong): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dkyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'a de skad ces smras so// ke'u zhika khyod 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i thes pa can rnams la/ spro ba sprin 'di phan
88a5(brgyad stong): 'dogs pa dang rim 'gro byed pa legs so legs so// ke'u shi ka khyod kyis de ltar byos te ra/ 'phags pa nyan thos gang sems can thams cad la phun gdagyes par 'dod pa des byang chub sems
88a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la spro ba 'phel bar byed cing phan gdags pa dang / rim gro byed pa de ltar gyis shigade ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
88a7(brgyad stong): dpa' rnams kyi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'di las skyes te / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems 'di yang bskyed du zin na pa/ byang chub
88a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la a gyi slob pha rol tu phyind pa drug la yang myi slob par 'gyur ro// ma bslabs nathu na myong ba yang
88b1(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur ba zhig na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa pha rol tu
88b2(brgyad stong): byind pa drug la spob ste de'i phyir bla ma byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// 'phags pa zhes rab kyi
88b3(brgyad stong): rolang tu phyind pa brgyad stong pa las bsod nams kyi rnam grangs kyi le'u zhes bya ste 'or// rnas pa dang sas dang byas la gan pad cad ldan parab 'byor la smras pa/ 'jags das khyod byang rnams pa das ses dme po'i rjes su
88b4(brgyad stong): yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nas
88b5(brgyad stong): bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de dag las / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i
88b6(brgyad stong): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di mchog ces bya'o// dam pa 'i sa bya'o// mchog rab ces bya'o// su nom pa zhes bya'o tha ma zhes bya'o// tha na myong ba zhes bya'o// go na myed pa
88b7(brgyad stong): zhes bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen de byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// byams pa byang chub sems
88b8(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang phyogs bcu 'jig rtend kyi khams thams cad nas thams cad du des 'jig chend kyi khams dpal tu byed pa nas zangs myed pa'i yang grangs phreng sathams kyi
90a1(brgyad stong): byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / rgya sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu srung bstan pa de dag gi pe/ 
90a2(brgyad stong): ba'i rtsa ba ji yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ji yod pa dang / gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la lung bstand pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i
90a3(brgyad stong): tsha ba ji yod pa dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom
90a4(brgyad stong): pa las byung ba'i bso rnams bya ba'i dngos po ci yong pa dang ma gro pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa baji yod pa dang / myo slob pa'i bag pa byed pa'i dge ba'i ma bar song ba dang
90a5(brgyad stong): mo ma'i skye bo gang dag gis chos de la dge ba'i cha ba bsdund pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag go 'khor ba'i po dge slong ba dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams
90a6(brgyad stong): dang / dge bzhen ma rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bso rnams bya ba'i dngos po ci yod pa da / tshul khrims lus byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ci yod pa dang / brkom phra las byung ba'i
90a7(brgyad stong): mas kyaba'i ngol po dang delas sa rgyas bcom ldan 'damam ma so pa de / mam
90a8(brgyad stong): kyi'am ci dang / 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa dang dang rgyas ma ga sbyig nas su song ba'i thamam can de ngas thamasas ge bam pa 'thu semams rapag la
90b1(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la gang gis dge ba'i che ba baspu nad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la gang gis dge ba'i rtsa
90b2(brgyad stong): ba bskrund pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la brte rang pa dang chos la brtend pa dang dge 'dun la brtend pa dang yid kyis bsgoms pa'i gang zag la brten nas dge ba'i rtsag
90b3(brgyad stong): bsku nad pa de dag thams cad ma lus pa lus pa myed par gcig tu bsdus te/ bsdoms shing gtsal nas rjes su yid rang ba dang / ldan pa'i mchog dam pa gtso bo rab mchog rab
90b4(brgyad stong): gya nom pa bla mang / bla na myed pa grong na myed pa'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pas rjes su yi rang la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bla na myed pa yang
90b5(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bsngo'o zhes tshig 'di skad du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yo ngas su sdud par gyu rad cig ces zer ba de la gang zag
90b6(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dag dngos po gang dag dang rnam pa gang dag dang / dmyigs pa grang dag gis rjes su yi rang zhing sems de bskyed pa'i dngos po de dag dang / dmyigs
90b7(brgyad stong): pa de dag dang rnam pa de dag ji ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin du dmyigs sam de skad ces smras pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas gnas brtan
90b8(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces smras so// gyi dngos po de dag dang dmyigs pa de dag dang / rnam pa de dag ji ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin du myi dmyigs so// de skad ces smras pa dang / 
91a1(brgyad stong): gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te dngos po de yang myed la/ dmyigs/

91a3(brgyad stong): myed pa'i dngos po yin te myi rtag pa la rtag pa sdug bsngal ba la bde ba/ bdag myed pa la bdag myi sdug pa la sdug par rnam par brtags shing / kun tu brtags nas
91a4(brgyad stong): 'du shes phyi nad ci log pa dang / sems phyind ci log pa dang lta ba phyi nad ci log par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar dngos po ci lta ba dang / dmyigs pa ci lta ba bzhin du byang chub
91a5(brgyad stong): kyang de bzhin sems kyang de bzhin chos thamasacad kyang de bzhin no// gal te dngos po de ji lta ba da nga dmyigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ byang chub kyang de
91a6(brgyad stong): bzhin sems kyang de bzhin na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i sems de gang yin/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams
91a7(brgyad stong): bya ba'i dngos po tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de gang yin/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas tshe dang ldan pa rab

93a5(brgyad stong): bsdoms shing gcal nas ma lum par byas te/ ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// rjes su yi rang nas rjes su yo rong ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de

95b5(brgyad stong): theg pa can dag rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la lung ston pa de dag gi dge pa'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang // spang zag nyan thos kyi theg patsun na kyi sbyin lnga las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang
95b6(brgyad stong): tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos por dang bsgom pa las blang ba'i bstod nams bya ba'i dngos blo ci yod po da / slob pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa dang ga po myed bu'i ngas
95b7(brgyad stong): ba'i rtsa ba ji yod pa dang myi slob pa'i zag pa myed pa'i dge bye'i zla ba ji yod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes rab
95b8(brgyad stong): kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa dang / phyin par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / 
96a1(brgyad stong): snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dpag tu myed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bshad pa dang / chos de dag la gang gis
96a2(brgyad stong): bslabs pa dang lhag par mos pa dang gnas pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa / chos de la so so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskru nang pa dang / lha dang klu dang / 
96a3(brgyad stong): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa gang dag gis chos de thos la/ thos nas
96a4(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrund pa dang byol song gi skye gnasasu song ba'i sems can de dag gis chos de thos nasadage ba'i rna ma bskrund pa dang / gang gris sangs rgyas bcom
96a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ladage ba'i rtsa ba bskrunang par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ bsdoms shing gnal nas ma lus
96a6(brgyad stong): par byas te/ ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// rjes su yi rang nas!rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba 'i dngos po de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs par/ 
96a7(brgyad stong): byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar 'du shes phyi nad mi ldog tu myi 'gyusems phyi nad mi log tu myi 'gyur/ lta ba phyin
96a8(brgyad stong): ci log tu myi 'gyur zhe na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de la sems su 'du shes par 'gyur na/ de ltar byang chub
96b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// nam sems/ 
96b2(brgyad stong): de yang myi shes sems de 'da'o snyam du bya bar yang myi shes ma de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes phyi nang ci log tu myi 'gyurasems phyinang
96b3(brgyad stong): log tu myi 'gyuralta ba phyi nad ci log tu myi 'gyur ro// de ste sems gang gi ste yongs su bsngos pa'i sems de yang myi shes shingasems de 'di'o zhes sems su 'du shes par
96b4(brgyad stong): gyur na de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyi nad ci log pa dang / sems phyi nad ci log pa dang / lta ba phyi nang ci log par 'gyur ro// yang
96b5(brgyad stong): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gang gis yongs su bsngos pa'i sems de yang 'di ltar shes shing 'di ltar sems te/ sems bsam pa de yang / 
96b6(brgyad stong): de ltar zad pa yang zad par shes la gang zad pa de yang yongs su bsngo bar myi nus/ sems gang gis yongs su bsngos pa'i sems de'i chos nyid kyang de yin chos gang dag
96b7(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yis/ chos gang dag la yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin no zhes gal te de lta nga yongs su bsngon yang
96b8(brgyad stong): dag par bsngo ste/ log par yongs su myi bsde'o// / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsngo bar bya'o// gzhan yang 'phags pa rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' seMs
97a1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lam chad pa/ 'dug pa chan pa/ spros pa dang srid par 'dren pa chang ba/ zas/ 
97a2(brgyad stong): kamyed dpag tu byed pa dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang
97a3(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar dang / phung po lhag ma myed pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bar dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das
97a4(brgyad stong): pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos ma nub pa dang / nub par ma gyurd pa'i bar dang de dag gi bar gyi sangs rgyas da bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i

97a8(brgyad stong): pa'i dge ba'i cha ba ci yod pa dang / slob pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i dge ba'i che ba ji yod pa dang / myi slob pa'i zag pa myed pa'i dge ba'i cha ba ci yod pa dang / sangs

97b7(brgyad stong): pa dang / skyed par 'gyur ba dang / skyed pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis dam pa'i chos de thos pa dang / thos par 'gyur ba dang / nyan pa dang / thos nas

98a1(brgyad stong): bskrund par 'gyur ba dang / baspu nad pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms te/ gcal nas ma lus par byas te/ ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i mchogangam

98a4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyi nad ci log tu myi 'gyur sos mo du kyi 'bru lta ba byer ci log tu myi 'gyur zhe na/ gal te yongs su bsngo zhing 'di snyam du chos de dag ni zad cing 'gags te myed par

98b1(brgyad stong): byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba yin no// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsngo ba bla na myed pa'o// kal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams mngon

98b6(brgyad stong): de'i mtshan nyid can de'i rigs su gtogs pa'i de'i rang bzhin can no// gal te de ltar shes na tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/

98b8(brgyad stong): 'ongs pa de yang ma phyind pa'o// gang da ltar byung ba de la gnas par myi dmyigs te/ chos gang myi dmyigs pa de ni mtshan ma yang ma yin no// yul yang ma yin no// gal te de ltar mtshan
99a1(brgyad stong): mar 'dzind cing sems na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ma yin no// de ste dran pa dang bral bas mtshan mar myi 'dzind myi sems pa dang /

100b8(brgyad stong): gzigs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ci lta ba dang / rigs gang yin pa dang / rus gar gtogs pa dang / ci 'dra ba dang / rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / chos nyid
101a1(brgyad stong): gang gis yod pa de bzhin du rjes su yi rang ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis me ltar gnang
101a2(brgyad stong): pa de bzhin du bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o snyam na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su bsngos
101a3(brgyad stong): ma nyes pa myed cing yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba yin te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la skur pa myi 'debs so// de ltar na de'i bsngo
101a4(brgyad stong): ba ni dug myed pa'i yongs su bsngo ba yin no// yongs su bsngo ba da chen po yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba yo dngas su rdzogs pa shi nad tu yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// 
101a5(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo ba ni lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed de gzhangan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'itheg pa can gyis ci ltar tshul khrims gang yin pa dang / 
101a6(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / shes rab gang yin pa dang rnam par grol ba gang yin pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa gang yin pa ci ltar 'dod pa'i khams su myi gtogs
101a7(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi khams su myi gtogs gzugs myed pa'i khams su myi gtogs 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de ci'i
101a8(brgyad stong): phyir zhen pa khams gsum du myi gtogs pa'i phyir de bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba yang myi gtogs pa'o// chos gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de yang ma gtogs pa'o// gal te de ltang mos shi
101b1(brgyad stong): de ltar yongs su bsngo na/ de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yongs su bsngo ba ni chung ma zos pa yin te/ ma gtogs pa yongs su bsngo ba chen po bsngo/ 
101b2(brgyad stong): ba drug myed pa chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba yongs su rdzogs pa legs par yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de la mngon par chags shing mtshan mar 'dzin
101b3(brgyad stong): na log par yongs su bsngo ba yin no// de la gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni chos nyid kyi yongs su bsngo bu 'dis ci snang sangs rgyas
101b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rnams mkhyen pa de ltar yongs su bsngos na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu legs pa phyi yongs su bsngos pa yin no// 'di ni yang dag pa
101b5(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo ba yin gyis de ltar yongs su bsngo'o snyam na/ bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su kyi bsngos pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
101b6(brgyad stong): gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la bos te bka' stsal dpa rab 'byor khyod stonang pa'i bya ba byed pa rab 'byor nga legs so legs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar khyod byang
101b7(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos stond pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor nga yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi dbyings su
101b8(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo ste/ chos nyid 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ci ltar gzigs pa dang / mkhyend pa'i dge ba'i tsha ba de rigs gang yin pa dang / rigs gar gtogs
102a1(brgyad stong): pa dang / ci 'dra ba dang / rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / chos nyid gang gis yod pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngo'o snyam pa'i
102a2(brgyad stong): bsod nams kyi phung po de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga klung ki bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am
102a3(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par bcud cing bkod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed yod pa de bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
102a4(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo ba 'di nyid mchog ces bya'o// gtso' bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// mchog rab ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla ma zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa zhes bya'o
102a5(brgyad stong): gong na myed pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da stong gsum gyi sto/ ra chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma sbed dgu na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad
102a6(brgyad stong): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na
102a7(brgyad stong): sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bsam gtan bzhi thob par gyur la/ de dag gi bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa ci yod pas rab 'byor nga sems can de dag la yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan pa'i
102a8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni mchog ces bya'o// gci ba zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// rab ces bya'o// mchog rab ces bya'o// 
102b1(brgyad stong): nom pa zhes bya'o// bla ma zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa zhes bya'o// gong na myed pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dkan
102b2(brgyad stong): sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bsam gtan bzhi sgrub pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte nad kyi
102b3(brgyad stong): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad tshad myed pa bzhi thob par gyur kyang rab 'byor nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte nad kyi khams
102b4(brgyad stong): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can thams cad tshad myed pa da bzhi thob pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi
102b5(brgyad stong): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur kyang / rab 'byor nga stong gsum
102b6(brgyad stong): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sems can thams cad gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ba'i thob pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ 
102b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor nga stong gsum gyi spyong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur kyang / rab 'byor stong
102b8(brgyad stong): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga krung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor du stong gsum
103a1(brgyad stong): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems nan ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyu nad tu zhugs par gyur kyang / rab 'byor nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
103a2(brgyad stong): 'jig rte nad kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma skyed te sems can thams cad rgyu nang tu zhugs par gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta 'og/ rab 'byor nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
103a3(brgyad stong): kye khams gang ga krung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur kyang rab 'byor nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte nad kyi khams gang ga krung gi bye ma
103a4(brgyad stong): snyed kyi sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed nas
103a5(brgyad stong): na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur kyang / rab 'byor de stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rte nad kyi khams gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad phyir myi 'ong/ 
103a6(brgyad stong): bar gyu rad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog// rab 'byor nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga kung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad
103a7(brgyad stong): dgra bcom par gyur kyang rab 'byor nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rte nad kyi khams gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad dgra bcom par gyurd pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog
103a8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyurd kyang / rab 'byor nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po
103b1(brgyad stong): 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyu rang pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten
103b2(brgyad stong): kyi khams gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs la/ de dag thams cad kyis stong gsum gyi
103b3(brgyad stong): stong chen po 'jig rte nad kyi khams gang ka klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad la/ byang chub sems dpa' re res gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang
103b4(brgyad stong): na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang bde bar sbya rang ba thams cad dang / bde ba la reg par sbyar ba thams cad kyis skalang pa gang ga krung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas te/ de yang dmyigs
103b5(brgyad stong): pa'i 'du shes kyis byin la/ rnam grangs de lta bur de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' re re la skal pa gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byed cing / gos dang bsod snyoms dang / 
103b6(brgyad stong): mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bde bar spa rang ba thams cad dang / bde ba la reg par sbya rang pa thams cad kyis bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed ri mor byed/ 
103b7(brgyad stong): mchod par byed/ brjed par byed/ gsol bar byed de de bzhin du ri res kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la nam grangs de lta bur sbyir pa byin na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
103b8(brgyad stong): ci byang chub sems dpa' de dag de'i ga'i las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ rab 'byor dkyis gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das
104a1(brgyad stong): sngags pa ni gsum kyi stong chen po 'jig ten kyi khyams kyang // sung ba byes snyed du yang gyi thong bar 'gyu // / de na kyis gsolang bya dang / bcom ldan
104a2(brgyad stong): sa parnyan gyi dang ldan pa rab 'tho la 'di na da nga 'a/ pa'i / mas
104a3(brgyad stong): yang rnams bdun byud du rab 'ang sa kyis rgyas yongs su bathob la su skyes pa'i sasong byas 'a ni/ sa 'i na
104b1(brgyad stong): cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi srid pa byin pa ni yongs su chang ba yin no/ de nas rgyal chen ba na'i dris kyi sku'i bu stong phrag kyi bu rnams pal mo skur te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan
104b2(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces gsol / gabacom ldan 'das 'di ltan/ shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i che ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs
104b3(brgyad stong): su bsngos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba chen po lags te/ de ni 'di ltar dmyigs pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las
104b4(brgyad stong): byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de snyed kyang zi lad kyis mnand pa lags so// de nas sum bcu cha gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu brgya phrag stong gse lha'i me tog dang de 'dug pa dang / 
104b5(brgyad stong): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma rnams kyi char dang / lce'i rin po che'i char dang lha'i na bza'i char gyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas/ 
104b6(brgyad stong): lha'i gzugs dang / rje tshul mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir byas bu mar byas rba ri mor byas mchod par byas brjed par byas
104b7(brgyad stong): nathom par byas nas lha'i sel snyan rnams rab tu bkrol nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs
104b8(brgyad stong): su bsngo ba 'di ni bsngo ba chen po lags te/ 'di ltar dmyigs pa can gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin bu las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de snyed kyang zil gyis mnan pa lags so
105a1(brgyad stong): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas yongasu bzung ba'i slad du 'di ni bsngo ba chen po lags so// de bzhin du lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang lhags nas
105a2(brgyad stong): ka/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir bya ba dam pa dang bla mar bya ba dam pa dang / ri mor bya ba dam pa dang / mchod par bya ba dam pa dang / brjed par bya ba dam pa dang / gsol bar bya ba dam pa rnams
105a3(brgyad stong): kyis bkur stir byas bla mar byas/ ri mor byas mchod par byas brjod par byas/ gsol bar byas nas 'di skad du sgra 'byind cing de skad du dbyangs rjesu sgrog// de bzhin du mtshe ma
105a4(brgyad stong): dang dga' ldan da 'phrul nang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa 'dun na 'don dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad myed 'od dang / 'od gsal dang dge chung
105a5(brgyad stong): dang / tshad myed dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin myed dang / bsod nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu che dang / 'du shes myed pa'i sems can dang / mya che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang
105a6(brgyad stong): shi nad tu mthong dang / 'og myin gyi lha de dag kyang de bzhin tu thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
105a7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongasu bzung zhing thabs mazhes pa dang ldan pa des byang chub sems dpa' dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi yun ring po de tsam du bstsags pa dang / de ltar rgya cher yang
105a8(brgyad stong): dag par bsdus pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa yang zil gyis gnod pa ngo mtsha rang ngo to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas chang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu la sogs te/ lha'i bu de dag thams cad la bka' stsa lang pa/ 
105b1(brgyad stong): lha'i bu dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sems can thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs la bla na myed pa yang dag
105b2(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas sbyin pa byin pa lta zhog/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rtend kyi khams gzhan gang ga'i bye ma snyed na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams
105b3(brgyad stong): cang tha na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par gyu rang la byang chub tu sems bskyed nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig cend kyi khams gzhan gang gakrung gi bye ma snyed kyisas
105b4(brgyad stong): can thams cad la gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bde bar sbyar pa thams cad dang / bde' ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis byang
105b5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' ri res kyang skalang pa gang ka'i bye ma snyed du 'dug ste/ sbyin pa byin la de dag dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis sbyin pa byin pa dang / nam grangs del bur byang chub sems dpa' de dag pas dang / 
105b6(brgyad stong): kyis skal pa gang ka klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug ste/ sems can de dag thams cad lA na/ gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bde bar
105b7(brgyad stong): spa rang ba thams cad dang / bde ba sa reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis rim gro byed cing sbyin pa de yang dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis byin la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'is
105b8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su zind pa zhig gis/ 'das pa dang / ma byond pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi/ 
106a1(brgyad stong): phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can de dag gi dang / 
106a2(brgyad stong): de la sems can gzhan gang dag gis dge ba'i tsha ba bskrund pa dang / bskrund par 'gyur ba dang / bsku nad par byed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te bsdoms shing gzhal nas ma lus par
106a3(brgyad stong): byas te/ ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang nas rje su yi rang ba'i mchog dam pa gatshob/ rab mchog rab gya nom pa bla ma bla na myed pa gong na myed pa gong ma'i yang gong ma/ 
106a4(brgyad stong): mnyam pa myed pa/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rje su yi rang la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di la
106a5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' dmyigs pa can dag gis bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro stong gi char yang / brgya stong gi char yang/ bye ba'i char
106a6(brgyad stong): yang bye ba brgya'i char yang bye ba stong gi char yang / bye ba brgya stong gi char yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cher yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// grangs su yang bgrang bar yang
106a7(brgyad stong): dper yang rgyur yang myi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can dag sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'i phyir ro// / 
106b1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du/ bka' stsa lang ba 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
106b2(brgyad stong): thams cad dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa dang / sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / 
106b3(brgyad stong): da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms te/ gzhal nas ma lus par
106b4(brgyad stong): byas te ma lus pa la rje su yi rang nas/ rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog/ dam pa gtso bo rab/ mchog rab gya nom pa bla ma/ bla na myed pa/ gong na myed pa/ gong ma'i
106b5(brgyad stong): yang gong ma mnyam pa myed pa myi mnyam pa dang ma nyam pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjesu yi rang bar bya ba'i mchog ces gsung na bcom ldan
106b6(brgyad stong): 'das ci tsam gyis rje su yi rang ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces bka'i sA lang to// rab
106b7(brgyad stong): 'byorang nam gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi chos rnams la myi 'dzin rlom semasu myi byed/ myi dmyigs/ myi rtog rnam/ 
106b8(brgyad stong): par myi rtog myi mthong yang dag par rjes su myi mthong zhing chos de dag la 'di ltar yongs su rtog ste chos thams cad ni brtags pa rnam par bslabs pa ste/ ma skyes pa/ 
107a1(brgyad stong): nges par ma skyes pa/ 'ong ba myed pa/ 'gro ba myed pa'o// 'di la chos gang yang sngon ma skyes pa'o// chos gang yang skye bar myi 'gyur/ chos gang yang myi skye'o// 'di la chos/ 
107a2(brgyad stong): gang yang sngon 'gags pa myed do// chos gang yang 'gag par myi 'gyur ro// chos gang yang myi 'gag ste/ chos de dag gi chos nyid ci lta ba bzhin du rje su yi rang bar byed do// de ltar rjes su
107a3(brgyad stong): yi rang nas/ de bzhin du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo ste/ rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog yin no// 
107a4(brgyad stong): 'byor nga yongs su bsngo ba 'di la byang chub sems dpa' snga ma dmyigs pa'i 'du shes pa dang / dmyigs par lta ba de/ ngag gi sbyin pa de ni brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro ba nas/ bye ba
107a5(brgyad stong): khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha'i bar du yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// rgyu'i bar du yang myi bzod do// gzhan yang rab 'byor gang zag bya nga chub sems dpa'i theg pa can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
107a6(brgyad stong): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sbyin pa la rjesu yi rang bar 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims la rjes su yi rang bar 'dod pa dang / bzod pa la rjesu yi rang bar 'dod pa dang
107a7(brgyad stong): brtson 'grus la rjes su yi rang bar 'dod pa dang / bsam gtan la rjes su yi rang bar 'dod pa dang / shes rab la rjes su yi rung bar 'dod pas/ 'di ltar rjes su yi rang bar bya ste/ rnam par
107a8(brgyad stong): thos bcil pa bzhin du sbyin pa yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba bzhin du tshul khrims kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ci lnga pa bzhin du 'azod pa yang de ba'in no// rnam par grol ba/ 
107b1(brgyad stong): ji lta ba bzhin du brtson 'grus kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba bzhin du bsam gtan yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba mi lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ci
107b2(brgyad stong): lta ba bzhin du rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba bzhin du rjes su yi rang ba yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba bzhin du rje su yi rang ba
107b3(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ni lta ba bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / rang sangs rgyas kyang de bzhin/ rnam par grol ba ci lta ba
107b4(brgyad stong): bzhin du/ de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba bzhin du chos gang 'das shing 'gag pa yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol
107b5(brgyad stong): ba ci lta ba bzhin du chos gang ma 'ongs ma byung ba de dag kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba bzhin du chos gang da ltar byung ba de dag kyang de bzhon no// rnam par grol
107b6(brgyad stong): ba ci lta ba bzhin du 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / de dag gi nyan thos rnams kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba bzhin du/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas
107b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / de dag gi nyan thos de dag kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba bzhin du da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / de dag gi nyan thos
107b8(brgyad stong): rnams dang / sangs rgyas 'jig rtend kyi khams grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa de dag kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba bzhin du/ 'das pa dang / 
108a1(brgyad stong): ma 'das pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de bzhin du chos de dag kyang ma bcings pa ma grol ba ma chags pa dag gi chos nyid gang yin pa de bla na
108a2(brgyad stong): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba'i tshul dang myi 'pho ba dang / myi 'jigs pas yongs su bsngo na/ rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang
108a3(brgyad stong): ba'i mchog yon/ rab 'byor nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig te nad kyi khams gang gakrung ga bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang ngag par zhum
108a4(brgyad stong): te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rtend kyi khams gzhan gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad
108a5(brgyad stong): byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ byang chub sems dpa' re re sa kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re la dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis sbyin pa byin pa dang / gos dang / bsod
108a6(brgyad stong): snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bde bar sbyarang pa thams cad dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis rim gro byed cing sbyin pa de yang
108a7(brgyad stong): dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis sbyin pa byin pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor da gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad
108a8(brgyad stong): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par btsud de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par btsud nas/ skald pa gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed du/ lus kyis
108b1(brgyad stong): kyis legs par spyod pa dang / ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa'i tshul khrims dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can dag gis yang dag par blangs te gnas pa dang / rnam grangs de lta
108b2(brgyad stong): bur byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang skal pa gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug la/ skal pa gang 'ga' klung gi bye ma snyed du lus kyis legs par spyod pa
108b3(brgyad stong): dang / ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa'i tshul khrims dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can dag gis yang dag par blangs te gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
108b4(brgyad stong): chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkha/ nyes pas yongs su zind pa dag gis 'das pa dang / ma bya na pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
108b5(brgyad stong): rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gi yang tshul khrims dang / ting / 
108b6(brgyad stong): nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / nyan thos de dag gi yang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang
108b7(brgyad stong): rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms te/ gzhal nas ma lus par byas te/ ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang nas/ rjes
108b8(brgyad stong): su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i mchog/ dam pa/ gtso bo rab/ mchog rab/ gya nom pa/ bla ma/ bla na myed pa/ gong na myed pa/ gong ma'i yang gong ma/ mnyam pa myed pa/ myi mnyam pa dang
109a1(brgyad stong): mnyam pa/ mtshungs pa myed pa'i rjesu yi rang bas rjes su yi rang nas/ rjes su yi ring ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
109a2(brgyad stong): su bsngo na/ rab 'byor dade rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa'i dmyigs pa can dag gi tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed

109a4(brgyad stong): gnas pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga stong gsum gyi steng chen po 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga krung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems dan thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
109a5(brgyad stong): dag par zhugs te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya nga chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ skald pa gang ga kru nga gi bye ma snyed du lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang / ngag gis
109a6(brgyad stong): legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa'i tshul khrims dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can dag gis yang dag par blangs te gnas pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor da gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig
109a7(brgyad stong): rtend kyi khams na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
109a8(brgyad stong): yang dag par zhugs nas/ skal pa gang gA klung gi bye mo snyed du 'dug cing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rte nad kyi khams gzhan dag na/ gang gakrung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyis
109b1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' re re la spyos shing brdegs te brgyad kyang / de dag thams cad dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis bzod pa yang dag par blangs te gnas pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams

109b4(brgyad stong): cad dmyigs pa'i 'du shes can gri ban+do pa lnga dag par blangs te gnas la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su

110b1(brgyad stong): tu yang dag par btsud nas skalang pa gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug cing / skal pa gang ga klung gI kye pra snyed du yi myi gsod cing / rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis zild kyis myi ron par

111a1(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/ rab 'byor nga rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmyigs pa can snga ma

113a5(brgyad stong): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma 'ang gas pa sha ri'i bu ci'i phyir 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ kye ma phags pa sha ro'i bu tsa'i gzhi las 'di 'dri bar 'gyur snyam nas
113a6(brgyad stong): sgra'i dbang po bcu phyin gyis tshe dang ldan pa ga ra'i bu la 'di skad ces sde sa so// 'phags pa sha ra'i bu ci'i phyir 'di 'dra bar 'gyur te/ 'phags pa sha ri'i bu ci'i gzhi las 'di 'dri bar 'gyur
113a7(brgyad stong): de gdang ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma ra'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ken ni ga zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs la mkhas
113a8(brgyad stong): pas yongs su zind pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa byang
113b1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' dmyigs pa can de dag thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims las byung ba gang yin pa dang / bzod pa las byung ba gang
113b2(brgyad stong): yin pa dang / brtson 'grus las byung ba gang yin pa dang bsam gtan las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad zil gyis gnon to// kes
113b3(brgyad stong): shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper na dmus long brgya 'am stong ngam brgya stong yang yongs su mtshon pa myed na lam du 'jug pa'i skal ba myed cing / grong ngam grong khyer du
113b4(brgyad stong): 'gro ba'i skal ba myed de/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du sbyin ba dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / @tshon 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyis ni pha rol tu phyi med
113b5(brgyad stong): 'i rgya rgya thon mo/ yongs su mtshon pa shes rab tu yang du phyind pa myed pa'i phyir dbus long lta bu yi na te/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i lam du 'jug pa'i rnas
113b6(brgyad stong): bayang byedad/ thams cad mkhyen pa thob par sa ga la byed/ ke' ga nas sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsams tanarnams
113b7(brgyad stong): mthond pa'i lam na 'jug pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa rjes su thob par bya ba'i phyini rab tu thob pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa ga de'i bus 'dims
114a1(brgyad stong): ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos na ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par bsgrub par brgya
114a2(brgyad stong): skad nas gsolang za dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsalang rte/ sha ri'i bu gzugs la mngon par gyi sgrub par blta ste
114a3(brgyad stong): 'chir gyur ba nga 'dun sa dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnas par shes pa mngon par byasmran par / 'thong po ldanams mdzod par rgya ga
114a4(brgyad stong): bza nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la mngon pa ra sgrub pa zhes bya'o// de ltar mngon par bsgrim sa pas rung po lngal mngon par bsgobs pas
114a5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par sgrub pa ste/ mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsald pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di
114a6(brgyad stong): skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa de ltar mngon par bsgrubs na/ chos gang thob par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lod pa/ 
114a7(brgyad stong): shara'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de ltar mngon par bsgrubs nas chos gang yang thob par byed pa myed do// sha ri'i bu nam chos gang yang thob par myi byed pa de'i tsheshes
114a8(brgyad stong): tu ma romang du tsunang pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dra'o// den sa bcom ldan 'das la lha'i phung bu la phyin gyis 'di skad ces gas sang to// bcom ldan 'das cinis rab kyi pha ro lang du phyinadu
114b1(brgyad stong): pa 'di thams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyang thob par gyi bgyid dam bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stso lang ba ke'us ka 'di skad du ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'a
114b2(brgyad stong): byams cang mkhyed pa nyid kyang thob par gyi bya ro ngan zhes zer ban ci stong dmyigs pa de lta bur thob par myi byed do// kyang ci lta bur de bzhin du thob par myi byed do/ mngo
114b3(brgyad stong): ra 'du byong ba co lta bur thob par mya byed dad brgya byin gyis gsol blag bcom ldan 'das 'on ci lta bur thob par brgya bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lang po ken
114b4(brgyad stong): TIshA myos thob byar myi byed pa de stor thob par bya bya dang // brgya byin gyis gsolang pa bcom lda na 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyi nad pa ni
114b5(brgyad stong): chos gang so tha slo chos kyang yang myi 'gog marjo chos thams cad skye ba mo mchis pa dang 'gog pa ma mchis pa bgyi bu'i slad du nye bar gnas pa la
114b6(brgyad stong): sa pa yangam lug sa pajam ca dang to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad kyis gas yong bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' de
114b7(brgyad stong): ze de lta bur 'phral bar gyi bgying shes rab kyi pha rol du phyirid pa 'di ring du bgyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ring pa 'di gsog du bgyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyiring pa 'di'i gson
114b8(brgyad stong): sa ras kyis mang du phyinang pa 'ad kyi 'byor do// de sad thos gas yong ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis kyi dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsalang to
115a1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ rab 'byor nga de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor nam grangs gang gis shes rab kyi pha ro ma du phyi nang pa 'di rgyang ring du byed pa dang / shes
115a2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gsog du byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyird pa 'di ga sob du byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa 'gro kyi byed par 'gyur ba'i rnam thas/ 
115a3(brgyad stong): yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yongs su gsal bar byas na/ gzugs yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ tshor ba la
115a4(brgyad stong): ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa yongs su gsal bar bya/ ba ma yin/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su
115a5(brgyad stong): gsal bar bya ba ma yin lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'dra sa bu ma yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin gra bcom pa nyid yongs su gsal bar byed pa ma yin/ 
115a6(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas nyid yongs su gsal bar byed pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas nyid yongs su gsal bar byed pa ma yin no// gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
115a7(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni pha rol tu phyind pa chen po lags so// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lang pa rab 'byor nga 'di ji snyam du sems
115a8(brgyad stong): rnam grangs gang gis 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ pha rol tu nod pa chen po yin/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs
115b1(brgyad stong): pa chen por gyi bgying chu byang myi bgyid gzugs srung bar myi bgyid yi bar myi bgyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma lags 'du shes la ma lags
115b2(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams la ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa chen por myo la grip+na/ chu byar myi bgyid rnam par shes pa srung par myi bgyid g.yengs par bya
115b3(brgyad stong): bgyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gang lags po de dag kyang / stobs dang ldan par yang myi bgyid stobs ma mchis par yang
115b4(brgyad stong): kyi bgyid do// khams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chem bar gyi brgyangacung byung gyi bgyidasrung bar gyi bgyid g.yengs par gyi bgying ngo // btsa'i mang du 'ir
115b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni ma bsdus ma g.yengs pa legs so// gal te de ltar 'al bar yang myi bgying na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
115b6(brgyad stong): phyind pa la spyod pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can 'di dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i rgyu mthun tha ma lags
115b7(brgyad stong): de nyid de'i dmyigs pa chen por 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na sems can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par
115b8(brgyad stong): bgyi ste/ sems can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par bgyi'o// sems can dben pas na shes rab kyi pha
116a1(brgyad stong): rol tu phyind pa dben par rig par bya'o// sems can bsam gyis myi khyab pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gyis myi khyab par rig par bya'o// sos/ 
116a2(brgyad stong): can myi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid legs pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid du rig par bgyi'o// sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'chang myi rgya bas na
116a3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya bar rig par bgyi'o// sems can don ci lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
116a4(brgyad stong): phyind pa yang don yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya bar rig par bgyi'o// sems can s+ho// bas yang dag par bsgrubs pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
116a5(brgyad stong): stobs yang dgra par sgrub par rig par bgyi ste// / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs de lta bus 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa na pha rol tu phyind pa chen po lags so// 
116a6(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri bris 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la
116a7(brgyad stong): mos shing / nem nur myi byed the tsom myi 'tshal rmongs par myi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de ga nam shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
116a8(brgyad stong): phyi nang pa'i don dang / chos nyid dang / don gyi tshul dang / chos nyid kyi tshul bzhin du 'tshal ta 'i rkyen snying rjes su rtogs par bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yun ring po
116b1(brgyad stong): srid cig spyad par rig par bgyi/ de skad ces gso yang pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
116b2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byas shing yongs su dris nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par rig par bya'o// 
116b3(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhen pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byas shing / yongs su dris te 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag
116b4(brgyad stong): nas shi 'phos nos 'dir skyes pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyand to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di tho sa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la ston
116b5(brgyad stong): par 'du shes skyed do// bdag gi stonang pa mngon sumadu gyur te/ bdag gi stond pa mthong ngo snyam du se mas bskyed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la na
116b6(brgyad stong): ba lpags te gus par nyanang to// btam gyis bar chad myi byed de/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yun ring du spyad pa de lta bur rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang
116b7(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsolang te/ 
116b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mnyan pa 'am/ rtogs pa 'am/ bsams pa 'am/ bskyed par nus sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de 'di'o/ 
117a1(brgyad stong): zhe 'am shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na'o zhe 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang na zhes rnam pa dang rtags dang / mtshan ma gang gis kyang bstanang par nus sa// 
117a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de ltar ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni phung po 'am khams sam/ skye mched du stond cing nye bar bzung myi nus
117a3(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad dben pa dang / chos thams cad shi nang tu dben pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bstan pa 'am/ nye bar bstand pa 'am
117a4(brgyad stong): rtogs par myi nus te/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni/ phung po dang khams dang / skye mched las gzhan na yang myed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor daphung po dang // 
117a5(brgyad stong): khams dang / skye mched nyid stong pa dben pa ste/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / phung po dang khams dang skye mched gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// stong zhing
117a6(brgyad stong): dben pa dang / zhi ba'i phyir dmyigs su myed de/ chos thams cad kyi myi dmyigs pa gang yin pa de ni kashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya'o// nam 'du shes kun shes dang btags

117b2(brgyad stong): rgyas stong phrag mang po mthong nas/ de dag gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di la ma dad ma mos par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs kyang yod/ de ci'i phyir zhe na sngon sangs
117b3(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstan pa dang / nye bar bstand pa dang / bshad pa la ma gus pas nyan myi 'dod do// nyan myi 'dod pas bsnyen bkur
117b4(brgyad stong): myi byed do// bsnyen bkur myi byed pas yongasu myi 'dri'o// yongs myi 'dri bas ma dad do// ma dad pas 'khor de nas byol te de dag de'i phyir chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i las bstsags shing / 
117b5(brgyad stong): kun nas bstsags pa dang / nye bar bsdus pas/ da ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'chad cing stond pa dang / nye bar stond pa las byol zhing ma gus pas dad pas mos par myi
117b6(brgyad stong): byed de/ lus dang sems kyis kyang mthun par myi byed de/ mthun par myi byed pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di myi shes myi rig khong du myi chud de/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
117b7(brgyad stong): pa la ma dad par 'gyur ro// ma dad pas myi nyand to// myi nyan pas myi shes so// ma shes pas myi mthong ngo // ma mthong bas khong du myi chud do// khong du myi chud pas chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i
117b8(brgyad stong): las bstsags shing nye bar sdud de/ de dag chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las de bstsags shing nye bar sdud pas/ shes rab 'jal par 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro// 
118a1(brgyad stong): de dag shes rab 'chal pa'i las mngon par 'du byas shing bstsags pa dang / kun nas bstsags pa dang nye bar bsdus pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'chad pa dang stond

118a3(brgyad stong): dbang zos te/ myi snyan par brjod pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad mkhyend pa nyid spangs par 'gyur dbang zos par 'gyur/ 
118a4(brgyad stong): myi snyan par brjod par 'gyur/ de dag bdag gi rgyud ma rung bar byas shing bsregs nas/ gzhan blo chung bla bu spyod nams chung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dad pa tsam dang ldan pa dga' ba tsam dang ldan
118a5(brgyad stong): pa mos pa tsam dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa tsam dang ldan pa/ la sa dang po la skal pa myed par rnams kyi dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang / 'dod pa tsam yang phyir

118a7(brgyad stong): bar byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bskur ba btab pas/ thams cad mkhyen po nyid la bskur pa btab par 'gyur ro//

118b4(brgyad stong): can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro ba ra 'gyur ro// de dag de lta bur yun ring por sems can dmya la ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho ba ma/ 
118b5(brgyad stong): me'i skud pa'i skalang pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kye'i spyad pa/ 'i bskal pa byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sa mas can dmyal ba gang yod pa de dag tu 'dor te/ de dag sems
118b6(brgyad stong): can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag der 'dor te sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu skyes ma thag tu/ de na yang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho bar
118b7(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// de dag de na sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho ba na/ yang me'i skung ba'i skal pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag de nas 'chi 'phos ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi zhes
118b8(brgyad stong): gzhan dag na sems can dmyal ba chen po yod pa der 'dor teng / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag der yang de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen
119a1(brgyad stong): po 'pho bar 'gyur ro// de dag der yang yun ring por 'pho bar 'gyur ro// de der yang yun ring por sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho ba na/ der yang de bzhin du mye'i skud
119a2(brgyad stong): kaba'i skal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag me'i snang ba 'byung ba dang yang de nas shi 'phos te las de nyid ma zad cing lhag ma lus pas/ yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'dor te/ de dag deng bor nas kyang sos
