119a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gso lang to// bcom ldan 'das 'tshams ma mchis pa lnga'i las bgyis pa yang / yid kyis nongs par spyad pa dang / ngag gis
119a6(brgyad stong): nongs par spyad pa 'di gzugs brnyan du yang 'dra ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa yad pa/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te sha ri'i bu 'tshams myed pa lnga byas pa ni yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / 
119a7(brgyad stong): ngag gis nyes par spyad pa 'di gzugs brnyan du yang 'dra ba ma yin no// las bsngags shing kun nas bsregs te/ nye bar bsdus pa'i 'dra ba'i tshul tsam yang ma yin no// gang su dag shes rab kyi pha
119a8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyind pa 'di bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / nye bar bstand pa na phyir gzhil bar sems shing spong bar 'gyur/ myi snyan par zer bar 'gyur te/ 'di la bslabs par myi bya'o zhes tshig tu smra bar
119b1(brgyad stong): par 'gyur de ni de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa ma yin no// zhes tshig smra'o// smra bar 'gyur ro// de dang sems can gzhan dag kyang 'bral bar byed do// de bdag gi rgyud ma rung bar byas nas/ gzhan gyi rgyud kyang
119b2(brgyad stong): ma rung bar byed do// bdag gi rgyud dug can ma rung bar byas nas/ gzhan gyi rgyud kyang dug can du byas par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid phung nas gzhan yang phung bar byed par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid shes rab kyi pha rol
119b3(brgyad stong): tu phyind pa zab mo myi shes ma rtogs la/ gzhan dag kyang 'di la bslab par myi bya bar 'dzi nang du 'jug pa'i gang zag de lta bu'i bltar yang ngas myi gnang na/ de dang 'grogs pa lta ci smos/ bsnyen pa dang bkur
119b4(brgyad stong): stir bya ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu de de lta bu'i gang tha/ de dag ni chos la sun 'byin par rig par bya'o// sha ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu dag ni shing rul pa lta bur gyur pa yin no// sha ri'i
119b5(brgyad stong): bu gang zag de lta bu dag ni nag po'i rang bzhin can tu rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu dag las gang dag mnyan pa dang / dad par bya bar sems pa de dag thams cad kyang tshul ma yin pas brlag
119b6(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sun 'byin pa de dag ni chos la sun 'byin par rig par bya'o// sha ri 'i bus gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag der skyes
119b7(brgyad stong): shing sems can dmyal ba na mchis pa'i lus de'i tshad ma bstanang to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu gang zag der skyes pa'i lus de'i tshad lta zhog gi/ de ci'i phyir zhe na gang zag de lta bu/ 
119b8(brgyad stong): 'i lus kyi tshad thos nas/ kha nas khrag skyug cing 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'chi ba tsam gyi sdug bsngal myi zad pa dang / nad kyis reg cing tshig gam/ mya ngan gyi zug rngu zhugs sam/ g.yang sa chen por ltung ngam/ 
120a1(brgyad stong): skam pas nying par gyur bar myi rungango // gang la nyes pa de dag yod pa'i lus de'i chang 'jigs pa chen po'i bar tu ni thos na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lus de'i mang 'di tsam du 'gyur ro// khres tshe
120a2(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la go skabs ma bya'o// lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsolang to// gang zag de'i lus kyi tshad kyis phyi'i skye bo mang po lnga skang
120a3(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur gyis ngag dang yid kyi las bstsags shing kun nas bstsags pa dang / nye bar bstsags pa 'dis/ sems can dmyal ba'i lus 'di lta bu chen po yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur ro// zhes
120a4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa dang / nye bar bstsal pa 'das sems can/ ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i myi dge ba'i
120a5(brgyad stong): las mngon par 'du byed pa de'i bsregs pa dang / kun nas bstsags pa dang / nye bar bsugs pas / yun ring po 'di tsam du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba nyid
120a6(brgyad stong): kyis ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo mang po la snang bar byas par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu sdug bsngal de nyid dpag tu myed pa dang / sdug bsngal mang po gang yin pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma
120a7(brgyad stong): de dag dkar po'i skal ba can rnams skyo bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos lus kyi
120a8(brgyad stong): las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las shin tu bsdam par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das dag gis nongs sgyur smras pa lta bus bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po skyes so// 
120b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gang gis bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po 'di skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ngag gis nyes par smras pas bsod nams ma yin pa'i
120b2(brgyad stong): phung po de snyed skyes so// rab 'byor nga gti mug de legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba de nyid la rab tu byung la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di sun dbyung bar sems spong bar
120b3(brgyad stong): sems phyir gzhil bar sems par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di phyir bcil na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub kyang phyir bcil bar 'gyur ro// sangs
120b4(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi byang chub phyir bcil na/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / rang da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang phyir bcil bar 'gyuraro// thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
120b5(brgyad stong): phyir bcil na/ dam pa'i chos phyir bcil bar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos phyir bcil na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phyir bcil bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
120b6(brgyad stong): pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phyir bcil na/ 'o na ni dkon mchog gsum las yong ye phyi rol tu 'gyur ba yin te/ dpag tu myed pa'i yang ches dpag tu myed pa'i myi dge ba'i las chen po mngon par 'du byed
120b7(brgyad stong): pa yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
120b8(brgyad stong): mo// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di phyir gzhil bar sems pa de'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka stsal pa/ rab 'byor da rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bdud
121a1(brgyad stong): kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'am/ shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba'i las kyis/ chos zab mo dag la ma dang ma mos par 'gyur ba 'am// rab 'byor de sdig pa'i chos 'di gnyis dang
121a2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la phyir 'jil bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rab 'byor nga rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i khrag tu srong bya yin
121a3(brgyad stong): myi brtson pa yin nas/ mngon par zhen pa yin nam/ bdag stong gzhan la smod pa dang / nyes pa'i klan ka tshol ba yin nam/ rab 'byodang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab
121a4(brgyad stong): tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bshad cing bstand pa dang / nye bar bstand pa la phyir gzhil bar sems pa de ni rnam pa de dag dang ldan pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa skyong bra smras
121a5(brgyad stong): can dmyal bya'i le'u zhes bya ste btun pa'o// bam po / de nasu// bcom ldan 'das la tshe rang ldan pa rab 'byord kyis 'dri rnyed kyis
121a6(brgyad stong): gsol ton bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinade pa ni myi brtson pas mos par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ra
121a7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni myi brtson pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang / blo zhan pa dang / myi 'dod pa dang / zos pa nyung ba dang / shes rab zhan pa dang / sdig pa'i grog
121a8(brgyad stong): brtan pa dang / sri zhu chung ba dang / myi 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang / dge ba'i chos la myi brtson pas mos par dka'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das e ma shes rab kyi
121b1(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyind pa 'di mos par dka' ba'i slad tu ci tsam tu zab pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
121b2(brgyad stong): 'byor nga gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rab 'byor nga de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o
121b3(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rab 'byor nga gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe
121b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir ro// ge/ rab 'byor de gzugs kyi phyi ma'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol/ nye ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe nagarab 'byor de gzugs kyi phyi ma'i
121b5(brgyad stong): mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de gzugs kyi da ltar byung ba ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzu gas ni da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor/ 
121b6(brgyad stong): bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mtha' ma macings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rab 'byor nga na pA shes pa ni sno/ ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir
121b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dade rnam par shes pa ni phyi ma'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de rnam par shes bya ning/ 
121b8(brgyad stong): ltar byung ba ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de rnam par shes pa ni da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor da kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes ra
122a1(brgyad stong): tu phyinang pa ni mos par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shi na tu mos par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no rab 'byor nga de
122a2(brgyad stong): bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni mos par dka' ba'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni shinang tu mos par dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs
122a3(brgyad stong): kyi rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o// 'bras bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar gzugs kyi rnam par dag pa dang / 
122a4(brgyad stong): 'bras bu rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyi su myed de/ gnyi su byar myed cing tha myi dad de ma chad pa'o// rab 'byor de de ltar 'bras bu rnam par dag pas na gzugs rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs rnam par dag pas
122a5(brgyad stong): na 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o// 'bras bu
122a6(brgyad stong): rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'bras bu rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyi su myed de gnyi su byar myed cing tha myi dang te chad pa'o// 
122a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ltar 'bras bu rnam par dag pas na/ rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa'o// rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas na/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor nga gzugs rnam
122a8(brgyad stong): khang dag pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o// thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar gzugs rnam par dag pa dang
122b1(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gnyi su myed de/ gnyis byar myed cing tha myi dang de ma chang pa'o// rab 'byor de de ltar thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam par dag pas na gzugs rnam par dag par
122b2(brgyad stong): gzugs rnam par dag pas na/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni
122b3(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang thams cad
122b4(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su myed de/ gnyisasu byar myed cing tha myi dad de ma chad pa'o// rab 'byor de de ltar na thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam par dag pas na/ rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa'o/ 
122b5(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas na/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab
122b6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab bo// bka' stsal pa sha ri'i bu shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gsal bar bgyid pa'o// 
122b7(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni snang bar bgyid pa'o// bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu shi nang tu rnam par
122b8(brgyad stong): dag pa'i phyir ro// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'tshams sbyor ba ma mchis pa'o// bka' stsal pa sha ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol dpe bcom ldan
123a1(brgyad stong): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'o// bka' stsal pa sha ri'i bu shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
123a2(brgyad stong): ka tu phyind pa ni thob pa ma mchis pa mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'o// bka' stsalang pa sha ri'i bu shinang tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsolang ba bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par
123a3(brgyad stong): grub pa ma mchis pa'o// bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dgra pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang / 
123a4(brgyad stong): gzugs myed pa'i lam su yang skye ba ma mchis pa'o// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// ga sold pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni
123a5(brgyad stong): ma 'tshal yang dag par ma 'tshal ba'o// bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'a ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni ci zhig ma 'tshal zhing yang
123a6(brgyad stong): dag par ma 'tshal bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gzugs myi shes yang dag par myi she so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du na cu she
123a7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa myi shes yang dag par myi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan
123a8(brgyad stong): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par yang myi bgyid gnod par yang myi bgyid do// bka' stsal pa sha ri'i bu shin tu rna bar dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes ra/ 
123b1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang yongasu myi 'dzin chos gang yang yongasu myi gtong / bka' stsal pa sha ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad
123b2(brgyad stong): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas na/ gzugs rnam par dag pa'o// bka' stsal pa rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par
123b3(brgyad stong): dag pas na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas na/ rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa'o// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// 
123b4(brgyad stong): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas na/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas/ 
123b5(brgyad stong): na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o// bka' stsal pa rab 'byor nga shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas na/ thob pa yang ma
123b6(brgyad stong): mchis mngon par rtogs pa yang ma mchis so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag mu mchis pas na/ gzugs mu mchis pa'o// 
123b7(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag mu mchis pas na/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mu mchis pa'o// bka' stsam
123b8(brgyad stong): ba/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam yang dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar rtogs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bka' stsal pa rab
124a1(brgyad stong): 'byor pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshu rol gyi 'gram na yang myi gnasapha rol gyi 'gram na yang myi gnas gnyi ga'i bar
124a2(brgyad stong): kyang ring po na yang myi gnas// bka' stsal pa rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ra/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
124a3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dong bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgyang du bgyid par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ 
124a4(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mying las kyang chags par 'gyur ro mtshan ma las kyang chags par 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
124a5(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar chags pa 'di dag bshad pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni legs par bshad cing legs
124a6(brgyad stong): par bstan te/ shin tu mthar gtugs pa ngo mtshar to'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chags pa gang yin
124a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ me dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzugs stong pa'o snyam du ni chags pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa stong
124a8(brgyad stong): pa'o snyam pa ni chags pa'o// 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos rnamasu shes pa ni chags pa'o// ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnam su shes pa ni chags pa'o// da ltar
124b1(brgyad stong): byung ba'i chos rnams la nga ltang byung ba'i chos rnams shes pa ni chags pa'o// gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can sems dang po bskyed pa nas bsod nams 'di tsam bskyed do zhes bya ba ni
124b2(brgyad stong): chags pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis chags par 'gyur/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ 
124b3(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka gal te 'di ni byang chub sems dpe zhes byang chub kyi sems su yang dag par shes shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo'o zhes yong su sdom/ rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo/ 
124b4(brgyad stong): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa des sems kyi rang ba bzhin yongasu bsngo bar myi nu so// de bas na ke'u shi ka gzha nal yang dag par ston pa dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa
124b5(brgyad stong): dang / rab tu dga' bar byed pa dang / yang dag par 'jug pas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag pa nyid du rjesu rtogs pa dang yong dag por bstan par bya/ yang dag
124b6(brgyad stong): par gzengs stod par bya/ rab tu dga' bar bya/ yang dag par gzung bar bya ste/ de ltar na bdag nyid la yang gnod par myi byed cing / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pas
124b7(brgyad stong): dag par 'dzin du bcug par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de chags pa'i mtha' 'di dag rnam par spangs par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la dge'o zhes
124b8(brgyad stong): bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la chags pa'i mtha' khong du chud par byed pa legaso legs so// rab 'byor de de'i phyir chags pa rab tu phra ba gan
125a1(brgyad stong): ngag kyang / shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legaso zhes gsol nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / 
125a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar
125a3(brgyad stong): yid la byed na/ rab 'byor mtshan ma ji snyed pa chags pa yang de snyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtshan ma las ni chags pa 'byung ste/ 'dras pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba nas kyi
125a4(brgyad stong): zag pa myed pa'i chos gang dag yin pa de dag la rjesu yid rang ngo zhe sa rjesu yid rang nas/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
125a5(brgyad stong): tu yong su bsngo'o snyam na/ rab 'byor chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ de ni dus gsum las grol ba'o// gang tus gsum
125a6(brgyad stong): las rnam par grol ba de ni yongs su bsngo bar myi nus so// mtshan mar myi rung / dmyigs par myi rung ste/ de ni mthong ba dang thos pa dang rtogs pa dang / rtogs pa dang / rnam par rig pa ma yin no// 
125a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin ni zab bo// bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor dben pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
125a8(brgyad stong): ni rang bzhin zab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rang bzhin dben pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab
125b1(brgyad stong): 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin dben pas na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
125b2(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de thams cad mkhyend pa'i rang bzhin dben pa ste/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dben pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rab
125b3(brgyad stong): 'byor de chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
125b4(brgyad stong): de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor 'di
125b5(brgyad stong): ltar rang bzhin gyis chos 'di dag gang yang myed de/ rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin myed pa'o// rang bzhin myed pa gang yi na pa de ni rang bzhin te/ 'di lta ste mtshan nyid myed pas na chos thos
125b6(brgyad stong): cad kyi mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bas na/ de bzhi na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i
125b7(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin ni dmyigs su myed de/ rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do// rab 'byor rang bzhin myed pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin te/ rab 'byor de ltar
125b8(brgyad stong): na chags pa'i mtha' de dag rnam par spangs pa yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rje su rig par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor/ 
126a1(brgyad stong): su yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni byasam gyis myi khyab pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal
126a2(brgyad stong): stsal pa rab 'byor sems kyis ci ltar rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin pa'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bgyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
126a3(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed pa po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma byas pa'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
126a4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ci ltar spyad par bgyi// bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor gal te gzugs la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba
126a5(brgyad stong): la ma yin// 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ gal te rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na/ shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs stong pa'o// 
126a6(brgyad stong): zhes myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed ni sa la ma yin gal te rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du myi spyod na shes
126a7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha lad tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzugs gang ba ma yin snyam du myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzugs gang ba myed pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags te
126a8(brgyad stong): de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gang ma yin no snyam du myi spyod na/ shes rab
126b1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// rnam par shes pa gang ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// zhes de ltar yang myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de skad ces bka'
126b2(brgyad stong): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji'i slad du de ltar chags pa nyid dang / ma chags pa nyid bshad pa ngo mtshar to/ bcom ldan
126b3(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs chags pa myed pa'o snyam tu myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin tu tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin
126b4(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa chags pa myed pa'o snyam tu myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ gzugs la chags pa/ 
126b5(brgyad stong): gyi skyedatshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed nams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la chags pa myi skyed/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa myi skyed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
126b6(brgyad stong): bu la chags pa kyi skyed/ byid gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid la chags pa kyi skyed/ rang sangs kyis nyid la chags pa myi skyed/ sangs rgyas nyid la chags pa gyi snying / thams pad mkhyen
126b7(brgyad stong): pa nyid la chags pa gyi skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma chags ma bcings pa/ yang dag par ma 'das pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar chags pa thams cad las rab tu badz+ra nA~M
126b8(brgyad stong): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad par bya'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyimi
127a1(brgyad stong): chos 'di ni zab ste/ de ni bstan kyang myi 'grib ma bstan kyang myi 'grib/ bstan kyang myi 'phel ma bstan kyang myi 'phel ba po mtshar to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
127a2(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor legs so// legs so// de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
127a3(brgyad stong): rgyas nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing / nam mkha'i bsngags pa ma brjod kyang nam mkha' yongasu 'grib par myi 'gyur/ bsngags pa brjod kyang nam mkha' yongasu 'phel bar myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
127a4(brgyad stong): na sgyu ma'i skyes bu la bsngags pa brjod kyang rjes su chags par myi 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur/ bsngags pa ma brjod kyang khong khro bar yang myi 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs par yang myi 'gyur ba de
127a5(brgyad stong): bzhin rtug rab 'byor chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de yang / bstan kyang de snyed du zad do// ma bstan kyang de snyed du zad do// gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ses
127a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa la zhum par myi bgyid/ ya ya bor myi 'gyur/ 'di la rnal 'byor du yang bgyid la phyir myi ldog/ 
127a7(brgyad stong): na dka' ba bgyid lags so// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa 'di ni nam mtha' sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis go cha 'di bgos pa ni
127a8(brgyad stong): phyag bgyis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal pa de ni nam mkha' la go cha 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems
127b1(brgyad stong): can chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa rnams kyi slad du go cha bgo bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
127b2(brgyad stong): chen po dpa' bo lags so// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba/ de ni nam mkha' 'degs par 'tshal ba lag so// byang chub sems dpa' seMs
127b3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i chos rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa lags so// de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gis bcom ldan 'das
127b4(brgyad stong): ga la ba de'i log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta shes rab
127b5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni chos gang yang myi skyed do// chos gang yang 'gog par myi bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor
127b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du byed pa de ji la rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa ni nam mkha' la/ 
127b7(brgyad stong): rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ro// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par sems pa ni/ bla gab myed pa la rnal 'byor du byed par 'dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin
127b8(brgyad stong): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa ci zhig bka' stsal tu gsol/ 
128a1(brgyad stong): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka chos gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sba bar bya ba'i chos de khyod kyis mthong ba
128a2(brgyad stong): ka brgya byin gyis smras pa// 'phags pa rab 'byor de ltar ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis smras pa bya ke'u shi ka de ltar gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
128a3(brgyad stong): phyin pa ci ltar bshad pa la gnas na/ de nyid la bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang sbed par 'gyur ro// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ma bral bar gyur na/ myi dang myi ma yin pa de la
128a4(brgyad stong): grags lta ba dang glags tshol ba dag gis glags rnyed par myi 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gang byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsrung ba
128a5(brgyad stong): ba dang bskyab pa dang / sba bar sems pa de ni nam ka bsru ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar sems so// ke'u shi ka de ji snya ma du sems/ khyod brag cha la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang
128a6(brgyad stong): sba bar byed nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ltar ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
128a7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la glanas pa yang chos rnams kyang brag cha lta bur yang dag par rjes su myi mthong myi shes kun d+ha myi shes yang dag par myi shes kyi snang skyed cing myi dmyigs te/ gal te
128a8(brgyad stong): de ltar gnas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal po chen po bzhi ci snyed yod pa dang lha drab
128b1(brgyad stong): po brgya byin thams cad dang / tshangs pa chen po thams cad dang myi 'byed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po yang bcom ldan 'das gal ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lu mgo
128b2(brgyad stong): bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang rgyal po chen po dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin thams
128b3(brgyad stong): cad dang / tshangs pa chen po sa kyi ste kyis po yang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ sangs rgyas stong yang dag par rjesu dran te/ de dag gis kyang mying 'di
128b4(brgyad stong): ngag nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid dang / rab 'byor ces bya ba'i dge slong dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su zhus pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di nyid lha'i
128b5(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin dag yongasu 'dri zhing kun 'dri bar byed pa da de sa phyogs 'di nyid tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de nyid bshad par dran no// byang chub sems dpa' seMs
128b6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po byams pa yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs kyi ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sa phyogs 'di nyid tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di nyid
128b7(brgyad stong): 'chad par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// 
128b8(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni mying tsam mo// mying de yang myi
129a1(brgyad stong): dmyigs te/ ngag gi dngos po nyid mying zhes bgyi'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba de yang ma mchis myi dmyigs te mying mi lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhi
129a2(brgyad stong): no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci lta ba bzhin du mying yang de bzhin te/ chos 'di gnyis ni ma mchis shing myi dmyigs na/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
129a3(brgyad stong): po byams pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mying 'di dag dang / yi ge 'di dag gis sa phyogs 'di nyid tu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad par
129a4(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byas pa
129a5(brgyad stong): ni gzugs stong pa'o zhe 'am/ gzugs bcings pa zhe 'am gzugs grol ba zhes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur te/ de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin 'du byedal
129a6(brgyad stong): ma yin rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / rnam par shes pa bcings pa dang / rnam par shes pa grol ba'o zhes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor nga rnam pa de lta bur byang chub sems dpa'
129a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ mying 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
129a8(brgyad stong): pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro// de na skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das e ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
129b1(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di ni yong su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
129b2(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa yong su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nam mkha' yongs su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab
129b3(brgyad stong): 'byor gzugs gos pa myed pas shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa gos pa myed pas shes rab kyi pha rol
129b4(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// nam mkha' yongs su dag pas na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gos pa thams cad kyis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos myi dmyigs
129b5(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dgapa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'angs la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bco
129b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rna lam tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag par 'gyur ba de dag kyang rnyed pa logs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / 
129b7(brgyad stong): klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton du bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de dag ni nyam nga ba myi spong bas 'chi ba'i dus myi bgyid do// de dag la lta
129b8(brgyad stong): stong phrag mang po dag de'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang / bcwo lnga la chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gang dang gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'chad
130a1(brgyad stong): pa de dang der/ bsod nams mang tu skyed par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin no rab 'byor de de
130a2(brgyad stong): bzhin te/ rab 'byorang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chang ba deng lha stong phrag mang po dag 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha rol
130a3(brgyad stong): tu phyind pa ni lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rin po che bla na myed pa'o// yang rab 'byor du rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur mod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
130a4(brgyad stong): pa yi ger 'dri ba dang / lung nod pa dang / ston pa la bar chang mang du byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phying na ljo mo 'byor 'di ltar rin po che chen po ni gra yang ste/ citsam tu dbyig tu gyung pa de bzhin du dgra ches
130a5(brgyad stong): lci bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rin po che chen po 'di ni bla na myed pa'i rin po che ste 'jig rten la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa'i chos thams cad
130a6(brgyad stong): myi skye ba dang / myi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir myi 'jigs pa'i tshul gyi sa nye bar gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang la yang myi gnas/ chos gang la yang myi sbyor chos gang
130a7(brgyad stong): la yong myi 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad ni myed cing myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga myi dmyigs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni ma gos pa'o// rab 'byor
130a8(brgyad stong): ma gos zhes bya ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ rab 'byor da 'di ltar gzugs ma gos pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma gos pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'a
130b1(brgyad stong): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma gos pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang ma gos pa'o// gal te de ltar yang dag par myi shes na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// rab 'byor
130b2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di ni chos gang la yang 'jug pa 'am/ nges par 'jug pa 'am// yang dag par ston pa 'am/ yongs su thob par byed pa 'am/ nges par thob par byed pa myed do// de nas
130b3(brgyad stong): lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dag par snang la tsa co dang / gzha dag byed do// gos dag gtong zhing e ma 'jam bu krid tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lan gnyis 'byung bar snang ngo zhes zer te// de nas bcom ldan
130b4(brgyad stong): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba ma yin te/ chos gang la yang rab tu bskor ba 'am
130b5(brgyad stong): ldog pa myed do// rab 'byor de 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
130b6(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gang chos thams cad la chags pa ma mchis pa dang / gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
130b7(brgyad stong): 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal la/ chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor yang / chos gang yang myi ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i
130b8(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyind pa chen po'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang smos par bgyi ba'i chos de dmyigs te chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur ba ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
131a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das chos thams cad ni shin tu mngon par ma grub pa ste/ chos gang yang mngon par ma grub par myi 'gyur/ rab tu bskor bar yang myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhems bcom ldan 'das chos
131a2(brgyad stong): thams cad ni thog ma nas mngon par ma grub pa'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor nga stong pa nyid ni rab tu 'jug
131a3(brgyad stong): pa 'am ldog pa myed do// rab 'byor da mtshan ma myed pa ni 'jug pa 'am ldog pa myed do// smon pa myed pa ni 'jug pa 'am ldog pa myed do// gang 'di ltar bstan pa ni chos thams cad bstan pa yin te/ 
131a4(brgyad stong): sus kyang bstan pa myed la/ sus kyang thos pa myed sus kyang mnos pa myed/ sus kyang mngon sum tu ma byas/ su yang mngon sum du byed par myi 'gyur ro// chos bstan pa 'dis ni su yang yongasu
131a5(brgyad stong): mya ngan las ma 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das par myi 'gyur/ yongasu mya ngan las myi 'da' ste/ chos bstan pa 'dis ni su yang sbyin pa'i gnas su byas pa myed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa
131a6(brgyad stong): dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i slad du 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom
131a7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das chos thams cad dmyig su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mnyam pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol pa tu phyinang pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shi nang tu stong pa'i slad du/ 'di ni dben pa'i pha rol tu phyinang
131a8(brgyad stong): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i slad du 'di ni myi rje ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ma mchis shing lus ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni gos pa ma
131b1(brgyad stong): mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa'i srad tu/ 'di ni ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos nAd 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i
131b2(brgyad stong): slad du 'di ni 'ong ba ma mchis pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni myi 'phrogs pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan
131b3(brgyad stong): 'das myi bas pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i slad du 'di ni myi bas pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma grub pa'i slad du 'di ni chos thams cad myi skye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
131b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byed pa po myi dmyigs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni shes pa po dang mthong
131b5(brgyad stong): ba po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba myi skye ba'i slad tu/ 'di ni myi 'pho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang
131b6(brgyad stong): da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni myi 'jigs pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis shing rnam par grol bar myi bgyid pa'i slad du/ 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol tu
131b7(brgyad stong): phyi nad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni rmyi lam gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi ngo bo nyid ma
131b8(brgyad stong): mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rten myi dmyigs pa'i slad du 'di ni myi gos pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rlom
132a1(brgyad stong): sems thams cad las 'das pa'i slad du/ 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// bcom ldan 'das g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol
132a2(brgyad stong): tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi slad du 'di ni ma g.yos pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma log pa de bzhin nyid kyi slad du 'di ni
132a3(brgyad stong): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rnam par myi rtog pa'i slad du/ 'di ni ldang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma
132a4(brgyad stong): thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i slad du 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rold tu phyi na pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi pha rold tu phyin pa'i slad du 'di ni skyon ma mchis pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'o// 
132a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i slad du 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das cho sa thams cad ldang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni tshad ma mchis
132a6(brgyad stong): ba'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni yang dag pa ci lta ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma chags pa'i srang / 
132a7(brgyad stong): du 'di ni mtha' myi rig pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma 'brel pa'i slad du/ 'di ni tha myi tha dad pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang
132a8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi slad du 'di ni mchog tu myi 'dzin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rtog pa nyid kyi slad du 'di ni myi rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid tshang ma
132b1(brgyad stong): mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni grangs ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid bdag ma mchis pa'i srad du/ 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos
132b2(brgyad stong): thams cad rnam par myi rtog pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du 'di ni rnam par myi rtog pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rang bzhin gyi slad du 'di ni dmyigasu ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 
132b3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i slad du 'di ni myi gnas
132b4(brgyad stong): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad 'dus ma
132b5(brgyad stong): bgyis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni myi rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i slad ta 'di ni sdug bsngal bu'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan
132b6(brgyad stong): 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma chags pa'i slad du 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i slad du 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rolang tu phyin
132b7(brgyad stong): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma grub pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mtshan ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mtha' yas mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni dpag tu/ 
132b8(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das myi rdzi ba'i slad tu 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bgrang ba'i tshul las shin tu 'das pa'i slad du/ 
133a1(brgyad stong): 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shin tu ma zhum pa'i slad du/ 'di ni myi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams
133a2(brgyad stong): cad ma log pa de bzhin nyid kyi slad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni rang byung ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 
133a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yongasu 'tshal ba'i slad du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'o// / 
133a4(brgyad stong): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa brgyad ste/ nga pa las bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// bam po // // de nas lha'i dbang
133a5(brgyad stong): po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa yin
133a6(brgyad stong): na gang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / khe ton byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te klags pa dang kun chub par
133a7(brgyad stong): byas pa dang / rab tu bton pa dang / lung banos shing kha ton byas nas/ de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed pa lta ci smos te/ de dag ni ngan ngon ma yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
133a8(brgyad stong): ba dang / ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
133b1(brgyad stong): 'das las shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dris shing yongasu dri bar byas pa yin te/ gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa 'di nyid thos nas da ltar yang nyan te mnyan nas kyang 'dzind par 'gyur 'chang
133b2(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ rab tu 'don par 'gyur ston par 'gyur kha ton byed par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du slob par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'gyur/ de
133b3(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa 'di nyid thos pa yin/ 
133b4(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol dra tu phyind pa zab mo 'di lta bu bshad pa la zhum par myi 'gyur/ kun tu zhum par myi 'gyur/ yi myi gsod yi
133b5(brgyad stong): gsod par myi 'gyur/ yid phyir phyogs par myi byed myi sreg myi dngang shi nang tu dngang bar myi 'gyur ba de dag ni sang sa rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa yin par rig par bya/ 
133b6(brgyad stong): snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi 'di lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
133b7(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa k+tsi DI la mngon par dad te rtog ring mos la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par
133b8(brgyad stong): byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang kha ton bgyid pa dang de bzhin nyid tu slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du bgyid pa de ni phyir myi ldog pa'i
134a1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ji lta ba bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhem/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni zab ste bcom ldan 'das
134a2(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang / yongasu myi 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du gyur pa ma thos pa dang / sngon spyad pa dang ma ldan pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
134a3(brgyad stong): phyi nad pa zab mo 'di la mos par myi nus so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag ma rtogs pas spong bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni sngon gyi mtha' na yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang
134a4(brgyad stong): pa 'di nyid 'chad pa na spangs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i slad du sngon ma spyad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la mos par myi nus so// 
134a5(brgyad stong): gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa na spong bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin du rig par bgyi ste/ de dag gis sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid bshad pa na spangs pas 'di ltar
134a6(brgyad stong): de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la mos pa ma mchis dad pa ma mchis/ dga' ba ma mchis/ dadang pa ma mchis/ bzod pa ma mchis te/ de dag gis sngon gyi sangs rgyas ban
134a7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la yongs su ma dris te/ yongs su dri bar ma bgyis so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags
134a8(brgyad stong): pa sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni zab ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma smad pa dag shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la mos par myi 'gyur ba de ltar ngo mtshar ci che/ de nas bcom ldan
134b1(brgyad stong): 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni
134b2(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la phyag 'tshal
134b3(brgyad stong): ba de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di las skyes te ke'u shi ka thams cad
134b4(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa'i ye shes las kyang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa skye ba rab tu gzhag go// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyad par bya/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di la gnas par bya/ 
134b5(brgyad stong): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
134b6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyad ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa lags/ ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
134b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka legs so legaso// gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di
134b8(brgyad stong): 'dri bar sems dpa' legs so legs so// ke'u shi ka 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus khyod kyi spobs pa skyes so// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di
135a1(brgyad stong): gal spyod na/ gzugs la myi gnas/ gzugs so zhes myi gnas te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la myi gnas gzugs so zhes myi gnas pas/ 
135a2(brgyad stong): keSh+Ta shrI ka de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la myi gnas rnam par shes/ 
135a3(brgyad stong): pa'o zhes myi gnas te/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par shes pa la myi gnas/ rnam par shes pa'o zhes myi gnas pas// ke'u shi ka de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
135a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen pos rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// ke'u shi ka nam gzugs so zhes myi sbyor te/ ke'u shi ka nam gzug so zhes myi sbyor ba de ltar gzugs so zhes myi gnas pa'o// ke'u
135a5(brgyad stong): shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o zhes myi sbyor te/ ke'u shi ka nam rnam par shes pa'o zhes myi sbyor ba de ltar/ rnam par shes pa'o zhes
135a6(brgyad stong): myi gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni zab bo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang
135a7(brgyad stong): pa ni rtogs par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gzung bar dka'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni tshad ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
135a8(brgyad stong): su lang pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ kwa/ ri'i bu gzugs zab bo snyam du myi gnas so// shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs zab bo snyam du myi gnas pas/ de ltar gzugs la rnal 'byor
135b1(brgyad stong): du byed do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zab bo snyam du myi gnas so// sha ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zab bo snyam du myi gnas pas de ltar rnam par shes
135b2(brgyad stong): pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// shA ri'i bu gzugs zab bo snyam du rnal 'byor du myi byed do// shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs zab bo snyam du rnal 'byor du myi byed pas/ de ltar gzugs zab po snyam du myi gnas so// de bzhin
135b3(brgyad stong): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zab bo snyam du rnal 'byor du myi byed do// sha ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zab bo snyam du rnal 'byor du myi byed pas sha ri'i bu de ltar
135b4(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa zab po snyam du myi gnas so// de skad ces bka' stsa lad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to dang / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
135b5(brgyad stong): tu phyind pa zab pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa rnams kyi mdun du bshad par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nem nur myi bgyid de the tsom
135b6(brgyad stong): 'tshal bar myi 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa sha ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa'i mdun du shes
135b7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bshad na nyes pa ci yod/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka gang lung ma bstan pas shes rab kyi pha
135b8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyind pa 'di blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mnyan par thos par 'gyur la/ thos nas myi sreg myi dngang / dngang bar myi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yun ring po nas theg
136a1(brgyad stong): pa la yang dag par zhugs te/ de ni yum ring por myi thogs par lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de ni lung bstan pa la bsnyen pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chom
136a2(brgyad stong): de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig gam gnyis las myi 'da' ste/ de nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thog
136a3(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ thugs byung bar byed par myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
136a4(brgyad stong): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong na yang lung bstan pas 'bras bu yod par byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas bla na myed pa yang dag
136a5(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang mnyan pa thos par 'gyur la
136a6(brgyad stong): thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
136a7(brgyad stong): de ni ring po nas 'ong ba yin te/ yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ dge ba'i rtsa
136a8(brgyad stong): yongs su sbyin pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha ma
136b1(brgyad stong): tu phyind pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mnyan pa thob par 'gyur la thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par byed
136b2(brgyad stong): pa dang / lung nod par dang / kha ton byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyang ring po nas 'ongs pa yin te/ sun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'o// 
136b3(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su smyin pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di
136b4(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol bar bdag spobs so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na rigs kyi bu'am rigs
136b5(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo gang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can de'i rmi lam tu yang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa rmin/ bcomaldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
136b6(brgyad stong): de ni/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi ba'i slad du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsnyen pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
136b7(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan pa dang / gzung ba dang bcang ba dang / klag pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / 
136b8(brgyad stong): lung nod pa dang / kha ton bgyid par rnyed par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyi gang zag de ni rgyang ring po nas mchis pa lags te gang zag byang chub sems
137a1(brgyad stong): dpa'i theg pa can de ni lung bstand pa la bsnyen pa lags so// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par
137a2(brgyad stong): bya'o// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di chung ngu na nyan par rnyed par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smyind pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/ 
137a3(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das phal cher chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las bstsags pa dang ma bral ba'i sems can de dag las phal cher ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la sems
137a4(brgyad stong): zhum par 'gyur/ sems ldog par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i che ba ma bstsags pa ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di la myi 'jug ste/ gang yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di rab tu gnon cing yang dag par dad par
137a5(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i cha babastsags pa lags so// de ni dge ba'i cha ba shi nad tu bsu kas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na skyes
137a6(brgyad stong): bu zhig 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya 'am/ dpag tshad nyis brgya 'am/ dpag tshad sum brgya 'am/ dpag tshad ba'i brgya 'am/ dpag tshad lnga brgya 'am/ dpag tshad brgya phrag bcu'i 'brog dgon par byung / 
137a7(brgyad stong): ba dang / des 'di ltar mtshan ma gang gis grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal mchis par mngon pa'i mtshan ma sngar gda' ba/ ba lang rdzi 'am/ thugs rdzi'am/ 'tshams sam/ kun
137a8(brgyad stong): dga'i ra ba phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ tshal phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ de ma lags pa'i mtshan ma gzhan dag sngar mthong la/ des mtshan ma de dag sngar mthong ba dang / 'di snyam du 'di ltar
137b1(brgyad stong): mtshan ma 'di dag snang bas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal tu nye bar gyu rad to snyam nas/ 'di ni dbugs 'byind pa rnyed pa lags te/ de sa sran chang chom po yid la bgyid pa ma mchis pa
137b2(brgyad stong): lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la nye bar gnas na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
137b3(brgyad stong): bro 'di ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye ba lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni ring po myi thogs par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand pa thob par
137b4(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la semadas par myi 'gyur/ 'jug par myi 'gyur ro// de cili slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ltas sngar ganga' ba 'di lta ste/ shes
137b5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag brgya ba dang / mnyan par thos pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces / so lad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la
137b6(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus smra ba dang / smra bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du yang / gnas 'di la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ 
137b7(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das le tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ 'di la skyes bu la la zhig/ rgya mtsho chen po blta 'am
137b8(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur te/ de rgya mtsho chen por mchis nas/ ji lta ji ltar mchis pa dang / ka la t+ye des ldum bu 'am ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma mthong na/ des 'di snyam du 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po ni da du
138a1(brgyad stong): ring ngo snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi'o// gal te phyis ldum bu 'am ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am chi'i mtshan ma mthong na/ des 'di snyam du 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po dang nye'o snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du
138a2(brgyad stong): zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni dma' ba lags pas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i napar ldum bu 'am/ ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma gang yang ma mchis te/ rgya mtsho chen po de myig gis ma mthong mod kyi/ 'on
138a3(brgyad stong): kyang rgya mtsho chen po ni bdag gis bsnyen te/ 'di phan chad rgya mtsho chen po mya ring ngo snyam du rtog par rig go// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du rig par bgyi ste/ 
138a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di nyan pa na/ de bzhin gshe gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bdag ni mngon sum du lung ma bstan kyang / 'di ltar bla na myed pa
138a5(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsnyen par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan pa thob pa'i slad du'o// bcom
138a6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na dpyid ka'i dus nye bar gnas pa na/ shing sna tshogs kyi yan lag dang lo ma lhags pa las lo ma byung ste/ lo ma rnams byung ba dang / 'dzam bu gling gi myi rnams nags tshal dag la mtshan
138a7(brgyad stong): ma sngar byung ba de dag mthong nas/ da ni me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams ring po myi thogs par 'byung ngo // snyam nas yid dga' bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sdong po las mtshan ma 'di/ 
138a8(brgyad stong): lta bu dag sngar gda' ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan
138b1(brgyad stong): pa'i slad du nye bar gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyind pa lags par rig par bgyi ste/

138b5(brgyad stong): pa ji lta ji ltar lus bskyod na cher snyom par 'gyur te/ 'cha/ sheg pa la dang cher myi 'gyur/ kha zas chung ngu 'tshal bar 'akrur/ rmugs pa dang gnyid che bar 'gyur/ smra ba nyung bar 'gyur/

142a1(brgyad stong): nyid du rnal 'byor du bgyid pa de dag thams cad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi yongs su bzung bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

142a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ de ltar bsgrub par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsolang pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lang ngo to// sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// 
142a4(brgyad stong): de de bzhin te/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung bas
142a5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rab tu 'dond pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang
142a6(brgyad stong): yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur/ de ltar bsgrub par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du slob par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur te/ sha ri'i
142a7(brgyad stong): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la nyan pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /

142b1(brgyad stong): gshegs pas mkhyend to// sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs so// sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so// sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan
142b2(brgyad stong): gyis rnam par gzigs te/ thos shing bris pa dang / bzung ba dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / bcangs pa dang / klag pa dang / rab tu bton pa dang / lung nos pa dang / kha ton du byas nas
142b3(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi
142b4(brgyad stong): pha rold tu phyind pa 'di bris nas 'chang zhing / de bzhin nyid du myi slob/ de bzhin nyid du myi sgrub/ de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byo/ ra du myi byed pa de dag kyang / de bzhin nyid du myi slob/ de bzhin
142b5(brgyad stong): nyid du myi sgrub de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du myi byed pas/ bzhin nyid dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gnas par myi 'gyur mod kyi/ shA ri'i bu de dag kya
142b6(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen nga pa/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mkhye nang / de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam
142b7(brgyad stong): par gzigs so// sha ri'i bu de dag gis 'bad pa dang / g.yo ba de dag don chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhi na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ chos thams
142b8(brgyad stong): cad kyi don dam pa dang ldan pa yin te/ sems can thams cad la yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya bas nye bar gnas so// sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di dag
143a1(brgyad stong): ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus na/ lho phyog su 'byung / lho phyogs nas kyang slar mtha' 'khob tu 'byung / mtha' 'khob nas kyang byang phyogs/ 
143a2(brgyad stong): su 'byung ste/ chos 'dul ba snying por gyur pa na ni ma yin no// sha ri'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang
143a3(brgyad stong): rab tu 'dod pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs so// chung ngu na sha ri'i bu yi ger bris nas glegs bam du/ 
143a4(brgyad stong): chung bar byas te// 'chang ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa sa mkhye nang to// 61/ ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs so// sha ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas
143a5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs so// sha ri'i bu sa gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na/ byang phyogs dang /

143a7(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la rnal 'byor du byed don kho bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'dzidad pa dang / ra byed pa rab/ 'chang ba dang / klog pa

143b1(brgyad stong): dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bya'o//

143b8(brgyad stong): myi skrag myi dngang / shind du dang dra bar myi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ ches nyung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
144a1(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su 'brang 'ang yongs su dris pa dang / yongs su dris pa byas so// gang zag byang chub so mas dpa'i theg pa can rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo

144a5(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par gas pa'i byang chub las brtsams nas/ de nyid kyi sa gtam byed par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi gtam la mngon par
144a6(brgyad stong): dga' bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de dag rab tu gnas shing / mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur/ bdud kyis kyang dbye bar myi nus ma/ 'di lta ste/ sems can
144a7(brgyad stong): gzhan dag gis 'dod pa dang / gsang ste bstand pas dbye ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mthu brtan pa'i phyir ro// 
144a8(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di thos nas/ rgya chen po rnyed par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di lta ste/ skye bo mang po dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
144b1(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ pal mngon sum du tshig 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa'i

147b1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor nga 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun sdud pa 'di spangs

147b3(brgyad stong): slob par myi 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa la/ chos rjes su 'byung bar myi 'dod pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la myi slob bo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

147b5(brgyad stong): pa'i chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'i rtsa ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs te/ yal ga/ la 'ju bar sems so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na
