147b7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tsha ba 'di bor te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yal ka dang lo ma dang 'dab ma lta bu las/ snying po sangs rgyas nyid btsal bar sems par
147b8(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo chung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su spyad par myi shes te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs shing bor nas/ 
148a1(brgyad stong): de ma yin pa'i mdo sde gang nyan thos kyi theg pa mngon par ston pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi mig pa mngon par bstan pa de dag la lhag par ku chub par bya bar sems te/ de lta bu'i byeng
148a2(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' de dag ni yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma lta bu la zhugs pa yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji skar
148a3(brgyad stong): nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dag slob pa de ltar myi bslab po// rab 'byor nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dag ji ltar slob ce na/ 
148a4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gcig pu dul bar bya'o// bdag gcig pu zhi bar bya'o// bdag ga cig pu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam ste/ bdag
148a5(brgyad stong): dul ba dang zhi ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i sbyor ba thams cad rtsom ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
148a6(brgyad stong): bos bslab par myi bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ 'jig rten thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid kyang de bzhin nyid la
148a7(brgyad stong): gnas par bya/ sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid la dgod par bya ste/ sems can gyi khams dpag tu myed pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i sbyor ba
148a8(brgyad stong): thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar bsam par bya ste/ sems des kyang rlom sems su myi bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste dper na/ glang po che ma mthong ba'i skyes bu la
148b1(brgyad stong): la zhig/ glang po che'i kha dog dang dbyibs tshol te/ des mun zhung nas glang po che zhig rnyed nas/ snang ba de ga la ba der brtags te brtags nas glang po che'i rjes btsal bar sems shing 'i glang po che'i
148b2(brgyad stong): rjes las glang po che'i kha dog dang dbyibs rtog par byed na/ rab 'byor da 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
148b3(brgyad stong): de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kyi shes kyi 'dri zhing de spangs la
148b4(brgyad stong): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ mdo sde gang nyan thos kyis ma ngon par ston pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon par ston pa
148b5(brgyad stong): de dag yongs su btsal bar sems pa de dag de lta bur rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu rin po che tshol ba zhig rgya mtsho chen po mthong na der myi 'jug cing / rin po che de dag
148b6(brgyad stong): la myi sems myi dmyigs te/ rin po che ba lang gi myig rjes kyi chu nang du tshol bar sems/ ba lang gi myig rjes kyi chu dang rgya mtsho chen po mtshungs par sems na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes
148b7(brgyad stong): bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de bzhin du gang zag byang
148b8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed nas/ ma rtogs shing myi shes pas 'dor bar byed de/ mdo sde gang nyan thos kyis mngon par ston pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon
149a1(brgyad stong): bar ston pa dag/ brtson pa chu rtsal gnas par 'dod pas btsal bar sems pa de dag de lta bur rig par bya'o// gang las byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i bsngags pa rgya
149a2(brgyad stong): 'byung la/ bdag gcig pu dul ba dang zhi ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe dang / nang du yang dag par gzhag pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o// 
149a3(brgyad stong): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob par bya'o// rang byang chub thob par bya'o// tshe 'di nyid las zag pa
149a4(brgyad stong): las len pa myed par sems yongs su grol bar bya ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/ 
149a5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de ltar sems bskyed par myi bya'o// 'iphyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
149a6(brgyad stong): ra chen po ni/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs thong / gom chen po 'gos pa yi te/ dedag gis nam du yang spro brgya tshu la sems kyi bskyed do// rtsal gyi marnam
149a7(brgyad stong): bu ngam pa de dag ni 'jig rten yongs su 'dren pa 'jig rten gyi don byed pa yin te/ de bas na rtag tu rgyur gyi 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gang ba
149a8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dge na pa yongs su ma sbyin pa/ mo zhan pa lhag pa'i bsam pazhan pa dag/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i mdol sde dag kyi shes shing khong du ma chung la
149b1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bor te/ mdo sde gang de dag nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon par ston pa de dag yongs su btsal bar sems te/ rab 'byor 'di yang gang zag byang
149b2(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa'i theg pa can 'di lta bu de dag bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ shing mkhan nam shing mkhan gyi slob ma zhig rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad du khang pa
149b3(brgyad stong): byed par 'dong / bsgrub par 'dod nas/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal myed khang gi tshad dang / dkyil 'khor yongs su tshol te/ de yongs su tshol bas/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal myed khang mthong ba dang
149b4(brgyad stong): de dag gi tshad gzung bar sems na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du se mas/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa byed par 'dod pa dang / sgrub par 'dod pas/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal myed khang gi tshad
149b5(brgyad stong): bzung ba yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom lnga na 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
149b6(brgyad stong): gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can la la dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spangs/ shes rab
149b7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di btang nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su tshol bar sems te/ mdo sde gang bdag gcig pu dul bar
149b8(brgyad stong): bya'o// bdag gcig pu zhi bar bya'o// bdag gcig pu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o// zhes mngon par ston pa'o// bdag 'ba' zhig dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las
150a1(brgyad stong): 'da' ba thob par byed pa de lta bu'i mdo sde dag yongs su tshol zhing / de lta bur slob par sems na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems byang chub sems dpa' de dag mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can
150a2(brgyad stong): du rig par bya snyam 'amarab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab
150a3(brgyad stong): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu zhig 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po lta 'dod la/ 'khor lo skur ba'i rgyal po mthong ste/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong nas/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i kha dog dang
150a4(brgyad stong): dbyibs dang / gzi brjid dang / rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra'o zhes ma datshan mar bzung nas des mkhar gyi rgyal po mthong na/ da des mkhar gyi rgyal po'i kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzi brjid
150a5(brgyad stong): dang mtshan ma bzung ste/ bye brag shes par myi nus la/ 'di ska da du/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni kha dog dang dbyibs da nga gzi brjid dang mtshan ma 'di 'dra'o zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de
150a6(brgyad stong): ji snyam du sems/ gang 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / mkhar gyi rgyal por mtshungs par bya bar sems pa'i skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom
150a7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
150a8(brgyad stong): 'di thos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde
150b1(brgyad stong): dag las thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su btsal bar sems pa dag 'byung ba 'di yang / rab 'byor bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
150b2(brgyad stong): pa'i mdo sde dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btsal bar bya'o// zhes nga myi smra ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byang chub ses
150b3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa gang bshad pa de la ma bslabs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung
150b4(brgyad stong): bar myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ma yin pa ma do sde gzhan dag las byang chub sgrub pa 'byung ba ni bul ba yin no// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs
150b5(brgyad stong): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phan yon de dag gcig/ pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo dag ni nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
150b6(brgyad stong): phyir bye ldog par 'gyur snyam ste/ nam grangs du mas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par ston/ yang dag par gzengs bston
150b7(brgyad stong): rab tu dga' bar byed/ yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug/ yang dag par 'dzung / yang dag par 'god do// rab 'byor khyod byang chub sems dpa' gang phyir myi ldog pa'i theg pa chen po
150b8(brgyad stong): thob cing bsgrubs nas/ de bor te/ yang phyir ldog pa'i theg pa yongs su btsal bar sems na/ de dag mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
151a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu bkres pa zhig gis kha zas ro brgya pa/ zhu na phan
151a2(brgyad stong): pa kun bde ba/ de'i tshe mthar thug gi bar du bkres pa dang skom pa zlog pa zhig rnyed la/ des de bor te/ zhaka drug bcu pa'i 'bras chun btsal bar sems shing / zhag drug bcu pa'i 'bras
151a3(brgyad stong): chan rnyed nas/ kha zas ro brgya pa bor te/ zhag drug bcu pa'i 'bras chan za bar sems na rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ rab
151a4(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sos
151a5(brgyad stong): dpa' la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed nas/ shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
151a6(brgyad stong): pabor nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag btsal bar sems shing / mdo sde gang nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mngon par ston pa de dag
151a7(brgyad stong): gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar sems na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsom

151b2(brgyad stong): bzhin can du rig par bya 'am/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lang pa/ rab 'byor nga de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus
151b3(brgyad stong): na/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can la la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo// 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang mtshungs par bya bar sems te/ 
151b4(brgyad stong): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas thams cad mkhyend pa/ nyid dang / thabs mkhas pa yongs su btsal bar sems na/ rab 'byor pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems
151b5(brgyad stong): dpa' de dag mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya 'am/ rab 'byor da kyis gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das de/ lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
151b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor nga 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond pa dang / lung nod pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 
151b7(brgyad stong): kha ton byed pa dang / chung ngu na yi ger 'dri ba la yang g.yeng bar 'gyur ba'i spobs pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsa lang
151b8(brgyad stong): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yi ger brir rung ngamabacom ldan 'das kyis bka'
152a1(brgyad stong): stsal pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byorang su dag shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di yig 'brur bris nas/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di bri bar sems shing / yi ge
152a2(brgyad stong): dag la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dag la mngon par chags na/ rab 'byor de 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'dri ba la
152a3(brgyad stong): ljongs yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor yid la bye bas/ 
152a4(brgyad stong): tete'abyung bar 'gyur/ bskyed mos tshal yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bla ma yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ kun bstan pa yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ chom po yi/ 
152a5(brgyad stong): la byed pa dang / la gcan yid la byed pa dang / smad 'tshong ya nga la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bde ba yid la byed pa dang / sdug bsngal ba yid la byed pa dang / 'jig pa yid 'byed pad/ 
152a6(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ bud myed yid la byed pa dang / skyes pa yid la byed pa dang / ma ning yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ ma dza' ba dang myi mdza' ba dang / snrel gzhi yid la byed pa dag/ 
152a7(brgyad stong): 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha ma dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang / spun dang sring mo dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ gnyen bshes dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang / chung ma dang / 
152a8(brgyad stong): bu dang bu mo dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang / khyim dang zan dang skom yid la byed pa dang / gos yid la byed pa dang / mal cha yid la byed pa dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad yid la byed pa dang / 
152b1(brgyad stong): 'phral gyi yo byad yid la byed pa dang / 'dod chags yid la byed pa dang / zhe sdang yid la byed pa dang / gti mug yid la byed pa dang / mdza'o dang cha lag dang / snag gi gnyen 'tshams dang ldan
152b2(brgyad stong): yid la byed pa dang / dus tshigs yid la byed pa dang / dus bzang po dang dus ngan pa yid la byed pa dang / glu yid la byed pa dang / sil snyan yid la byed pa dang / gar yid la byed pa dang / snyan
152b3(brgyad stong): ngag yid la byed pa dang / gru tshig dang srung yid la byed pa dang / gtsug lag yid la byed pa dang / tha snyad yid la byed pa dang / bzhad gang yid la byed pa dang / mya ngan yid la byed pa dang / nyon mongs
152b4(brgyad stong): pa yid la byed pa dang / rab 'byor nga yid la byed pa de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang bdud sdig can nye bar sgrub par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la bar chad byed par
152b5(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur / sems g.yeng bar byed pa 'gyur/ byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bdud kyi las 'di dag rtogs par byas te/ rtogs nas spang bar byam/ 
152b6(brgyad stong): gzhan yang rab 'byor nga rgyal po yid la byed pa dang / gzhon nu yid la byed pa dang / glang po che yid la byed pa dang / rtalha yid la byed pa dang / shing rta yid la byed pa dang / la gcan dang / 
152b7(brgyad stong): yi ge yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor nga me yid la byed pa dang / 'dod pa yid la byed pa dang / nor yid
152b8(brgyad stong): la phye dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems
153a1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di lung nod pa dang / kha ton tu byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dag la/ gos dang bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman
153a2(brgyad stong): dang yo byad dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dag gis sems la gdung ba yid la byed pa dang / 'di yang rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis
153a3(brgyad stong): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// de dag rtogs nas rnam par spang bar bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di lung nod
153a4(brgyad stong): pe dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dag la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang ldan pa'i mdo' sde zab mo/ snang gang dag yod pa de dag/ bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du bskur
153a5(brgyad stong): nas sbyin par 'gyur te/ 'di skad du 'di la spobs shiga'ad dris shig/ 'di lung nos shig/ 'di 'a ton du sa shig/ 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'grub bo zhes ze
153a6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa dag gis de la re ba myi bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mdo sde dag las stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa
153a7(brgyad stong): myed pa dag bshad mod kyi/ de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa ma bstanang ngo to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes kyi bye brag mngon par gyi
153a8(brgyad stong): shes pa de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo gtang par sems te/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di btang nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag la
153b1(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas pa btsal bar sems te rab 'byor nga 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor nga chos nyan pa dag mos pa
153b2(brgyad stong): dang ldan zhing / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa gzung bar 'dod na/ chos smra ba snyom par 'gyur te/ chos ston par myi 'dod pa yang rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
153b3(brgyad stong): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang chos smra ba snyom par byed cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sbyin par 'dod na/ chos nyan pa bya ba mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ba 'di yang
153b4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la dngas su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor nga chos nyan pa mos pa dang ldan zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gzung
153b5(brgyad stong): bar 'dod/ bcang bar 'dod/ kun chub par byed par 'dod cing / rtogs pa dang ldan/ dran pa dang ldan pa ra 'gyur na/ chos smra ba yul gzhan du btang na/ rab 'byor
153b6(brgyad stong): 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa dang yi ger 'dri ba la tshogs pa dang myi ldan par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las
153b7(brgyad stong): su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byorang chos smra ba shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa sbyin par 'dod/ klog tu 'jug par 'dod na/ chos nyan pa yul gzhan du zhugs par gyur na/ 'di
153b8(brgyad stong): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor nga chos smra ba zang zing lhur byed/ gos lhur byed/ rnyed pa lhur byed par 'gyur la/ 
154a1(brgyad stong): chos nyan pa ni sbyin par myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor nga 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bslab pa dang / bri ba la tshogs pa dang myi ldan par 'gyur te/ 'di yang rab 'byor
154a2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor chos nyan pa dad cing sbyin par 'dod/ nor yongs su gtong bar 'dod na/ chos kyi bar chad du 'gyur
154a3(brgyad stong): bas chos smra ba la mdo sde de dag myed de myi 'jug na/ chos nyan pas chog myi shes par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par
154a4(brgyad stong): byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba la tshogs pa dang myi ldan par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor chos
154a5(brgyad stong): smra ba 'chad par 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni nyan par myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzu nga ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / 
154a6(brgyad stong): nyan pa la 'tshogs pa dang myi ldan par 'gyur te/ rab 'byora'ade yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor nga chos smra ba gnyid
154a7(brgyad stong): che zhing lus lwa bar 'gyur te/ de lus lci ba de dang lus snyom pa de dang ldan pas 'chang kyi 'dod par 'gyur la/ chos nyan pa ni nyan 'dod par gyur na/ rab 'byor 'di yang bri ba dang klag pa dang
154a8(brgyad stong): ku chub par bya ba la 'tshogs pa dang myi ldan par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes rab kyi
154b1(brgyad stong): rol tu mund pa yi sher 'dri ba dang / 'chang ba dang / thon pa la la zhig der 'ongs nas/ sems can dmyal ba'i myi bsngags pa brjod/ tshul song gi ste gnas dang yi rigs kyi yus kyi bye bsngags pa
154b2(brgyad stong): brjod de// sems can dmyal ba ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal ba'o// rgyal song gi ste gnas ni 'di sar sdug bsngal ba'o// yi dgas kyi yul ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal ba'o// lA ma yin gyi lus ni 'dis
154b3(brgyad stong): sdug bsngal ba'o// 'du byeng ma na 'asdug bsngal ba ste/ 'di nyid du sdug bsngal mthar dbyung bar bya'i zhes zer na/ rab 'byor 'ang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lams
154b4(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa yi geng 'dri ba dang / klog pa la la zhig der 'ongs na nas lnga'i bsngags pa brjod de/ lha rnams ni 'ji ltar sring / 
154b5(brgyad stong): mtho ris ni 'di ltar bde'o// 'dod pa'i khams su ni 'dod pa 'di ltar bsten no// gzugs 'khams bsam gtan rnams ni 'di ltar mnyam par gzhago// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa
154b6(brgyad stong): 'jug pa rnams ni 'di ltar mnyam par bzhago// 'di yang shes rab kyis brtags na/ skye ba thams cad du sdug bsngal ba yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag se gol rtogs/ 
154b7(brgyad stong): pa srid du yang srid par 'gyur ba myi bstod de/ 'dus byas thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ srid par song ba thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ khams gsum thams cad ni stong pa/ chos thams cad ni bdag
154b8(brgyad stong): myed pa ste/ de ltar de dag thams cad ni myi rtag pa myi brtan pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ 'gyur ba'i chos can du rig par byas nas/ mkhas pa dag gis 'di nyid du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par
155a1(brgyad stong): par bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par bya'o// yang bdag phyir phun sum tshogs pa sdug bsngal mang po de dag dang phrad
155a2(brgyad stong): par gyur ta re zhes zer te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' kha cig skyo bar byed par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang
155a3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor dge slong chos smra ba gang yin pa de dag 'khor lhur byed par 'gyur te/ de dag 'di snyam du gang nga la bsnyen par byed pa de dag la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sbyin no// gang nga la bsnyen par myi byed
155a4(brgyad stong): pa de dag la ni myi sbyin no zhes zer bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar 'dod pa dang gnyer ba dang chos la gus pas/ chos smra ba la bsnyen par byed par 'gyur te/ chos smra ba de gang na mu ge dang grub pa dang bde
155a5(brgyad stong): ba myed pa dang / srog gi bar chad yod pa de dang der 'gro bar 'gyur/ te/ chos nyan pa de dag kyang gzhan las thos na/ phyogs // de na mu ke 'byung ste/ grub pa dang bde ba myed cing phyogs der srog
155a6(brgyad stong): par cang du 'gyu zhes thos la/ chos smra ba de yang rigs kyi bud ngag la 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu phyogs 'di zhes bya bar mu ge'i 'jigs pa byung ste/ khyod der dong na mu ge'i 'jigs pas
155a7(brgyad stong): phyis 'gyod ta ri zhes zer nas/ de dag de ltar chos smra ba des thabs phra mos spong ste/ de dag kyang yid byung nas 'di ltar shes te/ 'di dag ni spang ba'i mtshan ma yin te/ 'di dag ni sbyin par 'dod pa'i man
155a8(brgyad stong): ma ma yin te/ 'di ni sbyin myi 'dod do snyam nas bsnyen par myi byed de/ rab 'byor 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bslab pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la 'tshogs pa dang myi ldan par

155b2(brgyad stong): gcan zan gyis 'jigs pa yod pa dang / gang na myi ma yin pas 'jigs pa yod pa der chas te 'gro 'am 'dug na yang ka can zan gyi dgon pa dang / grog sbur gyi dgon pa dang / mu ge'i dgon pa
155b3(brgyad stong): gang na yod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur te/ chos nyan pa de dag la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu dag shes par gyis shig/ nga ni yul gang na srog chags kyis 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan gyis 'jigs pa dang / 
155b4(brgyad stong): sha zas 'jigs pa dang / srog sbur gyi dkon pa dang / myi rgod kyi dgon pa dang / chu'i dgon pa dang / mu ge'i dgon pa gang na yod pa der 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu dag shes par gyis shig/ 
155b5(brgyad stong): khyod sdug bsngal 'di dag myong bar nus sam zhes zer zhing de dag thabs phra mos spong bar 'gyur te/ de nas de dag kyang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yid byung nas de la bsnyen pa myi byed cing phyir
155b6(brgyad stong): ldag par 'byur// rab 'byo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lung nong pa dang / kha ton byed pa la/ ma kir 'dri ba la bar yang 'di dag 'byung / rab 'byung 'ad sang byang chub sems dpa' tha
155b7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen pas bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor dge slong chos smra ba de mnga'o'i khyim dang bslangs na ster ba'i khyim la gdu bar gyur te/ mdzama'i khyim dang bsrangs na ster bam

156a1(brgyad stong): bya ba zhig yod do// nga cung zad 'gro dgos pa zhig yod do zhes zer na/ rab 'byor 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bri ba dang / kun chub par bya ba la tshogs pa dang myi ldan par 'gyur

159a5(brgyad stong): ba'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ston pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las skyes te/ rab 'byor shes rab
159a6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ston pa'o// 'jig rten kun ston pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs
159a7(brgyad stong): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di las skyes// rab 'byor 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
159a8(brgyad stong): gang su dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
159b1(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor ngadam 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi
159b2(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'di la brten nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngar bar rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dang lar gyi rgyas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs skyed
159b3(brgyad stong): dpag tu myed pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po bde ba dang / 'jig rten
159b4(brgyad stong): la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang / lha dang myi rnams dang / sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i phyir bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de
159b5(brgyad stong): dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol phyind pa 'di la brten nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor da da ltar de bzhin
159b6(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di nyid la brten / 
159b7(brgyad stong): nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsolang ngo to// bcom ldan 'ad/ 
159b8(brgyad stong): kyis gang 'di skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'jig rten ston pa'o zhes bka' stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhi
160a1(brgyad stong): gshegs pa rnams la 'jig rten ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'jig rtend du gsungs// 
160a2(brgyad stong): pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces gsol to// rab 'byor nga phung po lnga rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten
160a3(brgyad stong): du gsungaso// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ste/ rab 'byorang phung po 'di lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pas
160a4(brgyad stong): 'jig rtenang du gsungs so// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyin pas phung po lnga ci ltar bstan/ bcom ldan 'das
160a5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pas ci zhig bstan/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ra ba 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor myi
160a6(brgyad stong): 'jig rab tu myi 'jig pas na/ phung po lnga 'jig rteno zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bstan no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi 'jig rab tu myi 'jig pas na de ltar bstan to// rab 'byor phung
160a7(brgyad stong): po lnga rnams ni ngo bo nyid myed pas na stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do// rab 'byor stong pa nyid ni 'jig pa 'am rab tu 'jig pa ma yin te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang de
160a8(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o// rab 'byor mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa dang / myi skye ba dang / dngos po myed pa dang / chos kyi
160b1(brgyad stong): dbyings kyi 'jig rab tu kyi 'jig pa de bzhin du/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o// rab 'byor sems can grangs myed
160b2(brgyad stong): dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dngos po myed par rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas de
160b3(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bden nas/ sems can grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag gi/ sems can grangs khyed dpag tu myed pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ 
160b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshes sa pa rnams la 'jig rten ston pa'o// gzham yang 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
160b5(brgyad stong): la brten nas/ sems can grangs myed dpag tu myed pa'o zhe sa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
160b6(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can grangs myed dpag tu myed pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ sems can ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ sems can grangs myed dpag tu
160b7(brgyad stong): myed pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems
160b8(brgyad stong): dpag tu myed pa rnams sems dpag tu myed pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems
161a1(brgyad stong): can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems dpag tu myed pa rnams sems dpag tu myed pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor de'i sems ni rnam par nyams shing sems
161a2(brgyad stong): de 'gog pa la gnas pa rten myed par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ nam mkha' dpag tu myed pas na sems kyang dpag tu myed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi
161a3(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems dpag tu myed pa rnams sems dpag tu myed pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor
161a4(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ba rten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems pa/ smras pa rnams sems bsdus pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
161a5(brgyad stong): du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems ca na dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems bsdus pa rnams sems bsdus pa'o// 
161a6(brgyad stong): zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ zad pa yang zad pa nyid/ ma zad pa yang ma zad pa nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab
161a7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems bsdus pa rnams sems bsdus pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin
161a8(brgyad stong): gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems g.yengs pa rnams sems g.yengs pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyend to// 
161b1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brted nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems g.yengs pa rnams sems g.yengs pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba brje
161b2(brgyad stong): du rab tu mkhyen rkyen/ rab 'byor chos nyid kyis sems de dag ni ma g.yengs pa sems de dag ni byi zad par yang dag pa ji lnga ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bre
161b3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems g.yengs pa rnams sems g.yengs pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byo
161b4(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems zhes
161b5(brgyad stong): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ rab 'byo rang ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi kun
161b6(brgyad stong): nas nyon mongs pa'i sems rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ sems de dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pas nyon mongs pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 
161b7(brgyad stong): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi kun nas nyon mongs pa dag sems kun nas nyon mongs pa'o zhes yang dag pa
161b8(brgyad stong): lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems kun nas nyon mongs/ 
162a1(brgyad stong): ba myed pa rnams sems kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
162a2(brgyad stong): 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa rnams sems kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu ma
162a3(brgyad stong): ce na sems de dag ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ste/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sas
162a4(brgyad stong): kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa rnams sems kun nas nyo/ na mongs pa myed pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs
162a5(brgyad stong): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ se mas can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems zhum pa rnams so/ mas zhum pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ 
162a6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems zhum pa rnams sems zhum pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba
162a7(brgyad stong): bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor sems de dag ni kun gzhi myed pa ma zhum pa ste/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed
162a8(brgyad stong): pa dag gi sems zhum pa rnams sems zhum pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ 
162b1(brgyad stong): sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems rab tu bzung ba rnams sems rab tu bzung ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha
162b2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems rab tu bzung ba rnams sems rab tu bzung ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor sems de
162b3(brgyad stong): dag ni bzung du myed cing myi gzung ba yin te rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems rab tu gzung ba rnas
162b4(brgyad stong): sems rab tu bzung ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can
162b5(brgyad stong): dpag tu myed pa dag gi zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems rnams zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gaste// 
162b6(brgyad stong): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems rnams zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
162b7(brgyad stong): rab tu mkhyem chen rab 'byor sems de dag ni ngo bo nyid myed cing kun tu rtog pa myed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can
162b8(brgyad stong): tu myed pa dag gi zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems rnams zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi
163a1(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtes sna/ thams can dpag tu byed pa dag gi gas pa byed pa'i sems rnams zag pa myed pa'i sem mo zhes yang das pa ji lta pa bzhin du rab tu ma khyen to// 
163a2(brgyad stong): 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi zag pa byed pa'i sems rnams zab pa byed pa'i sems zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba
163a3(brgyad stong): bzhin du rab tu mkhyem ce na/ sems de dag ni dngos po med par gyur cing lhun gyis grub pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la bdem nas/ sems can dpas
163a4(brgyad stong): tu myed pa dag gi zag pa byed pa'i sems rnams zag pa med pa'i sems zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
163a5(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di sa brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa da/ ga gi 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems rnams 'dod gas dang bcas pa'i sem mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
163a6(brgyad stong): tu mkhyer to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag gi 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems rnams 'dod ma
163a7(brgyad stong): dang bcas pa'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor sems la 'dod chags dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin// rab 'byor/ 
163a8(brgyad stong): sems kyi yang dag pa nges pa nyid bang yi pa sa/ 'di chags dang bcas pa'i semam sa yin te/ rab 'byung sar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab tu ro tu bye pa 'dus ba
163b1(brgyad stong): can dpag tu myed pa dag gi 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems rnams 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sem so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs
163b2(brgyad stong): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems rnams 'dod chags dang bral ba'i semaso zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
163b3(brgyad stong): rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems rnams 'dod
163b4(brgyad stong): chags dang bral ba'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen cen/ rab 'byor sems kyi bral ba gang yi ngan pa de ni sems kyi 'dod chags dang bcas pa ma yin/ 'dod cham
163b5(brgyad stong): dang bral ba'i sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sems kyi 'dod chags dang bcas pa ma yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa
163b6(brgyad stong): 'dil brten nas sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems rnams 'dod chags dang bral ba'i semaso zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab
163b7(brgyad stong): 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems rnams zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba/ 
163b8(brgyad stong): bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems rnams zhe sdang dang bcas
164a1(brgyad stong): pa'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor sems kyi zhe sdang dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin no// sems kyi yang dag
164a2(brgyad stong): pa ji lta ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sems kyi zhe sdang dang bcas pa ma yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag ga zhi
164a3(brgyad stong): sdang dang bcas pa'i sems rnams zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
164a4(brgyad stong): la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi zhe sdangang bral ba'i sems rnams zhe sdang dang bral ba'i semaso zhes ya dang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhi
164a5(brgyad stong): gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems rnams zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji
164a6(brgyad stong): lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor sems kyi bral ba gang yin pa de ni sems kyi zhe sdang dang bcas pa ma yin/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sems
164a7(brgyad stong): kyi zhe sdang dang bcas pa ma yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bter nas sems can dpag tu byed pa dag gi zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems rnams zhe sdang dang bral
164a8(brgyad stong): ba'i sem so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzham yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag zhesas
164b1(brgyad stong): gtisus dang btsal pa rnams sems gti mub dang bcas pa'i zhes yang dag pa de lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi sa ro du byin pa 'di la brten nas
164b2(brgyad stong): sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems gti mug dang bcas pa rnams sems gti mug dang bcas pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor sems kyi gti musha dang bcas pa
164b3(brgyad stong): gang yin pa de ni/ sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid ma yin/ sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sems kyi gti mug dang bcas pa ma yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs
164b4(brgyad stong): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems gti mug dang bces pa rnams sems gti mug dang bcas pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta
164b5(brgyad stong): ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor sa bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi gti mug dang brang ba
164b6(brgyad stong): sems rnams gti mug dang bral ba'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas
164b7(brgyad stong): sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi gti mug dang bral ba'i sems rnams gti mug dang bral ba'i sems so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor sems kyi bral ba gang yin pa de ni
164b8(brgyad stong): sems kyi gti mug dang bcas pa ma yin/ gti mug dang bral ba'i sems kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sems kyi gti mug dang bcas pa ma yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
165a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag ka gti mug dang bral ba'i sems rnams gti mug dang bral ba'i semaso zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
165a2(brgyad stong): mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems chen por zhugs pa ma yin pa rnams sems chen por
165a3(brgyad stong): zhugs pa ma yino zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi
165a4(brgyad stong): sems chen por zhugs pa ma yin pa rnams sems chen por zhugs pa ma yin pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor sems de dag ni 'ong ba myed pa
165a5(brgyad stong): 'gro ba myed pa/ ma gtogs pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems chen po
165a6(brgyad stong): zhugs pa ma yin pa rnams sems chen por zhugs pa ma yin pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
165a7(brgyad stong): brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems chen por zhugs pa rnams sems chen por zhugs pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshes
165a8(brgyad stong): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems chen por zhugs pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce ma/ rab 'byor sems de dag ni man
165b1(brgyad stong): ba nyid kyis mnyam pa yin te/ dngos po myed pas mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems chen por

165b3(brgyad stong): dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems rgya chen po ma yin pa rnams/ sems rgya chen po ma yin pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha
165b4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyind pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems rgya chen po ma yin pa rnams sems rgya chen po ma yin pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen
165b5(brgyad stong): ce na/ rab 'byor sems de dag ni yong su myi ldang ba'i tshul te/ yongs su myi ldang ba'i nang du gtogs so// rab 'byor de lta nyer de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas
165b6(brgyad stong): sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems rgya chen po ma yin pa rnams sems rgya chen po ma yin pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha
165b7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems rgya chen po rnams sems rgya chen po'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
165b8(brgyad stong): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu byed pa dag gi sems rgya chen po rnams sems rgya chen po'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor
166a1(brgyad stong): sems de dag ni myi 'phel myi 'grib cing sems rnams myed par gyur pas ma myi 'jig pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas
166a2(brgyad stong): sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems rgya chen po rnams sems rgya chen po'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
166a3(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems bstan du yod pa rnams sems bstan du yod pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ rab 'byor nga ji ltar
166a4(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sem sa bstan tu yod pa rnams sems bstan du yod pa'o zhes
166a5(brgyad stong): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor mas de dag gi mnyam par ston cing sems kyi ngo bo nyid yi na te/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi
166a6(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems bstan tu yod pa rnams sems bstan tu yod pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang
166a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems bstan tu myed pa rnams sems bstan tu myed pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba
166a8(brgyad stong): bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems bstan du myed pa rnams sems bstan tu
166b1(brgyad stong): myed pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor mtshan nyid myed cing don sna tshogs yin pa'i phyir/ sems de ni myi snang ba'o// spyan gsum la ni snang bar ma gyur pa'o// 
166b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems bstan tu myed pa rnams sems bstan tu myed pa'o zhes yang dag pa
166b3(brgyad stong): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems 'ong khro ba dang bcas pa
166b4(brgyad stong): rnams sems khong khro ba dang bcas pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta rab bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de ban ngan gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten na
166b5(brgyad stong): sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems khong khro ba dang bca nyes pa rnams sems khong khro ba dang bcas pa'o zhes yang da ga pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor sas
166b6(brgyad stong): de dag ni myed pa la kun brtags pa ste/ dmyigs pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba'o// rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di la brten nas sems can dpag na myed pa dag
166b7(brgyad stong): gi sems khong khro ba dang bcas pa rnams sems khogakhra ba dang bcas pa'i rnas yang dag pa nges pa bzhin du chub khyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byo de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ban
166b8(brgyad stong): nas sems cand dpags myed pa dag gi sems kho la khro bskyed pa rnams sems kha mar ba myed pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji la pa bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor nga ji sang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi
167a1(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'dis brten nas/ sems can dpag tu skyed pa dag gisems khrong tho bskyed pa rnams khong khro ba skyed pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta pa bzhin du rab tu mkhyen cen/ rab 'gyu
167a2(brgyad stong): sems de dag ni gnyi su med par gyur pa ma byung ba yang dag par ma byung ba ste/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can dpag tu byed pa
167a3(brgyad stong): ngag gi sems khong tho bskyed pa rnams sems khong khro ba myed pa'o zhes yang dag pa jis pa bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gzhan yang rab 'byor bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di
167a4(brgyad stong): brten nas/ sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems tha na yod pa rnams sems bla na yod pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji das pa bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin
167a5(brgyad stong): gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can dpag tu myed pa dag gi sems bla na yod pa rnam sa sems bla na yod pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ras
167a6(brgyad stong): tu mkhyend ce na/ rab 'byor sems bla na yod pa'i yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid gang yin pa de rlom sems myed de/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten

169a7(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la rten pa'o// de bzhin song ba shi phan chad myi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la rten pa'o// de bzhin song ba shi phan chad 'byung yang 'byung la myi 'byung yang kyi

169b1(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams te/ de bzhin song ba shi phan chad 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la rten pa'o// de bzhin song ba shi phan chad myi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes
169b2(brgyad stong): pa la rten po'o// de bzhin song ba shi phan chad 'byung yang 'byung la myi 'byung yang myi 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la rten pa'o// de bzhin song ba shi phan chad 'byung ba yang ma yin myi 'byung
169b3(brgyad stong): ba yang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la rten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa ste/ 'di nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la rten pa'o// bdag dang

169b5(brgyad stong): nyid bden gyigazhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzu gas la rten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa nyid kyang ma yin/ myi rtag pa nyid kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid
169b6(brgyad stong): bden gyi/ gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la rten pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams te/ bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa ste/ 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan
169b7(brgyad stong): ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la rten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni myi rtag pa ste/ 'di nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la rten pa'o// 
169b8(brgyad stong): bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag kyang rtag la/ myi rtag kyang myi rtag go zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa nyid
170a1(brgyad stong): kyang ma yin la myi rtag pa nyid kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o//

170a8(brgyad stong): mtha' myed pa yang ma yimo zhes bya ba 'ang nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'ang ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang bcas pa nyid kyang ma yin la mtha'
170b1(brgyad stong): myed pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi// gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// lus de'o srog de'o zhes bya ba de nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni gti mu go zhes

170b4(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi/ gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba/ 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
170b5(brgyad stong): la brten nas// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dpag tu myed pa dag gi phye ba dang btsums pa dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin
170b6(brgyad stong): gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dpag tu myed pa dag gi phye ba dang btsums pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor
170b7(brgyad stong): 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs mkhyen to// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs ji ltar mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs mkhyen
170b8(brgyad stong): to// rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs mkhyen to// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams te/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par shes pa mkhyen to// 
171a1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par shes pa mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa mkhyen te/ rab 'byor de ltar de
171a2(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pas rnam par shes pa mkhyen to// rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dpag tu myed pa dag gi phye
171a3(brgyad stong): ba dang btsums pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / phung po'i de bzhin nyid dang / phye ba dang btsums pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid du
171a4(brgyad stong): gdogs te/ rab 'byor phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten gyi de bzhin nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
171a5(brgyad stong): kyis phung po lnga ni 'jig rten no zhes mying du gsungs te/ 8/ ba 'byor de lta bas na phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'jig rten gyi de bzhin nyid do// 'jig rten gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
171a6(brgyad stong): de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i
171a7(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do// dgra bcom
171a8(brgyad stong): ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ gcig ma
171b1(brgyad stong): yin pa dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / myi zad pa dang / gnyis su myed pa dang / gnyis su byar myed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin nyid 'di ni gcig ste/ 
171b2(brgyad stong): dang tu ma'i dngos po dang / dngos po myed pa dang bral ba'o// rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ de bzhin nyid 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te
171b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi skyed pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid mngon par
171b4(brgyad stong): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi de bzhin nyid mkhyen to// ma log pa'i de bzhin nyid mkhyen to// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid mkhyen to// rab 'byor de ltar de bzhi
171b5(brgyad stong): gshegs pas de bzhin nyid 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// rab 'bya ra gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid 'di ni zab ste/ 
171b6(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid de las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub rab tu dbye'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/ dgra bcom pa brnag pa
171b7(brgyad stong): yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/ rigs kyi bu lta ba phun sum tshogs pa gang su dag 'di la mos par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das gnas zab mo 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs
171b8(brgyad stong): rgyas nas gsungs so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas kan
172a1(brgyad stong): zab mo 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bshad de/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin nyid ni myi zad pa ste/ myi zad pa
172a2(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas myi zad pa nyid du bstan to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu nyi khri dag/ bcom ldan
172a3(brgyad stong): 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa
172a4(brgyad stong): dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gso dal to// bcom ldan 'das chos zab mo dag rab tu bshad dan/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di la mtshan nyid ji ltar gzhag
172a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag stong pa'o// zhes 'di la mtshan nyid bzhag go/ lha'i bu dag mtshan ma myed pa'o// lha'i bu dag smon pa myed pa'o// zhes 'di la mtshan
172a6(brgyad stong): nyid bzhag go// khri'i bu ngag mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'o zhe// skye ba myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa'o// chos kyi dbyings so zhes 'di la mtshan nyid bzhag go// de ci'i phyir/ 
172a7(brgyad stong): zhen lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid 'di dag ni myi gnas pa nam mkha' dang 'dra ba ste/ lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
172a8(brgyad stong): ma bzhag ste/ mtshan nyid 'di dag ni gzugs su bgrang ba ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par bgrang ba ma yin no// mtshan nyid 'di dag ni
172b1(brgyad stong): gzugs la rten pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rten pa ma yin no// mtshan nyid 'di dag ni lha dang myi dang lha ma yin dag gis ma bzhag go// 
172b2(brgyad stong): mtshan nyid 'di dag ni lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskyod myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang mtshan nyid de bzhin te/ mtshan
172b3(brgyad stong): nyid 'di dag ni lag gis bzhag pa yang ma yin no// lha'i bu dag gang zhig 'di skad du/ nam mkha' 'di sus bzhag ces zer na/ lha'i bu dge ci yang dag par smra bas smra 'am/ de skad ces bka' stsalang
172b4(brgyad stong): pa dang / bcom lda'u 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ni sus kyang ma bzhag go// de ci'i
172b5(brgyad stong): srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ni 'dus ma bgyis pa lags te/ sus kyang ma bzhag go// de nas bco ma ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod
172b6(brgyad stong): ba'i lha'i bu dag la bka' stsal pa lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyes kyang rung / ma skyes kyang rung ste/ mtshan nyid 'di dag ni de bzhin du gnas pa
172b7(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir led/ ji ltar 'di dag gnas pa de lta bu nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de bas ma lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// 
172b8(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyongad pa'i lha'i bu dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid zab mo 'di dag de brje
173a1(brgyad stong): gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes so// chags pa ma mchis pa ra
173a2(brgyad stong): ye shes kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab
173a3(brgyad stong): 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nga
173a4(brgyad stong): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten cing gnas pa de bzhin du/ chos de dag kyang rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sas
173a5(brgyad stong): rgyas so// de dag kyang chos kho na la rten cing gnas so// chos la bkur stir mdzad do// tha mar mdzad do// ri mo ra mdzad do// mchod de/ brjed do/ gsol lo// rab 'byor
173a6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid yin te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur stir mdzad do// bla mar mdzad do// ri mor mdzad do// 
173a7(brgyad stong): mchod par mdzad do// brjed par mdzad do// gsol bar mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs na/ 
173a8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas rnams rab tu 'byed par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni byas pa 'jo ba/ byas pa tshor ba rnams yin no// rab 'byor gang ma
173b1(brgyad stong): skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni byas pa bzo ba'o// byas pa tshor ba'o// zhes zer na yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra ba'o// rab 'byor byas pa gzo ba byas pa tshor ba zhes bya ba ni de bzhin
173b2(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin te/ theg pa gang dang gang gis gshegs pa/ lam gang dang yang gis blar byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par thogs
173b3(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas pa'i theg pa de dag nyid dang / lam de nyid de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'dzin cing skyong ngo // rab 'byor byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa tshor ba 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas
173b4(brgyad stong): pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams ca dam byas pa'o zhes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 
173b5(brgyad stong): ma bsgyur ma bsgyur ba'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas mngon bar sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar rig par blta'o// 
173b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ chos thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'jug ste/ rab 'byor rnam grang
173b7(brgyad stong): 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan

174a3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni myi shes kyi mthong ngo // rab 'byor ji ltar chos thams cad myi shes myi mthong ba yin zhe na rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa yin te/

174a5(brgyad stong): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

174a7(brgyad stong): wAr zhes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rje/

174b2(brgyad stong): pa'i sems myi skye ba de'i tshe/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa myi mthong ba yin no// rab 'byor gzugs myi mthong ba gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rab
174b3(brgyad stong): 'byor rnam par shes pa myi mthong ba gang yin pa rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gzigaso// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya

174b5(brgyad stong): zhes de ltar 'jig rten ston to// 'jig rten dben pa'o zhes de ltar 'jig rten rnam par dag pas 'jig rten smos so// 'jig rten zhi ba'o zhes de ltar 'jig rten ston cing de ltar 'jig
174b6(brgyad stong): rten smoso// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las 'jig rten bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// 
174b7(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyi ba chen pos nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes
174b8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyi ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / bgyi ba gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / bgyi ba dpag tu ma mchis pas nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa
175a1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de de bzhi ro// dede bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'don bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'angan bya ba bsam
175a2(brgyad stong): kyis rtsa khyab pa dang / bya ba gzhal du byed pa dang / bya ba dpag tu myed pas nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bya ba bsam gyis kyi khyab pas nye bar gnas zhe na/ 
175a3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dang / rang byung ba nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis myi khyab pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dini
175a4(brgyad stong): bya ba bsam gyis myi khyab pas nye bar gnas so// sems kyis bsam par myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos myi 'jug pa'i gyi// rab 'byor
175a5(brgyad stong): ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bya ba gzhal du myed pa sa nye bar gnas she na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dang rang byung ba nyid dang / thams
175a6(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam pa 'am gzhal bar myi nus te rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bya ba gzhal du myed pas nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha
175a7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba dpag tu myed pas nye bar gnas shen rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dang / rang byung ba nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dpag tu myed
175a8(brgyad stong): pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba dpag tu myed pas nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
175b1(brgyad stong): bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzhal du ma mchis pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dpag tu ma mchis pa lags samasangs rgyas nyid dang / rang byung ba nyid dang / thams cad mkhyend
175b2(brgyad stong): pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa gzhal du ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma mchis pa lags sams 'on te gzugs kyang bsam gyis myi khyab pa gzhal du ma mchis pa lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
175b3(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma mchis pa lags/ 'on te chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis myi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma mchis
