175b6(brgyad stong): gyis myi khyab pa gzhal du myed pa/ dpag tu myed pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ gzhal du myed pa/ dpag tu myed pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi chos
175b7(brgyad stong): nyid gang yin pa de la ni/ sems pa yang myed/ sems kyang myed/ sems las byung ba'i chos gang yang myed do// rab 'byor gzugs ni gzhal du myed pa'o// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes da
175b8(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhal du myed pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang gzhal du myed pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni dpag tu myed pa'o// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes
176a1(brgyad stong): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni dpag tu myed pa ste rab 'byor chos thams cad dpag tu myed pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi tshad kyang myi rig go// rab 'byor tshor ba
176a2(brgyad stong): dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang myi rig ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi tshad kyang myi rig go// rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs dpag tu myedatshor ba dang / 'du
176a3(brgyad stong): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dpag tu myed rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad kyang dpag tu myed ce na/ rab 'byor gzugs la tshad myed do// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'a
176a4(brgyad stong): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la tsha nga myed do// rab 'byor chos thams cad la tshad myed do// rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs la tshad myed/ rab 'byor tshor ba
176a5(brgyad stong): dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor dpa'il phyir rnam par shes pa la tshad myed/ rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad la tshad myed ce na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshang
176a6(brgyad stong): myed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor ji snyam du semasanam mkha' la tshad dam/ sems sam/ sems las byung ba'i chos yod dam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/ 
176a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin te/ nam grangs 'das chos 'di dag thams cad krung bsam gyis kyi khyab pa/ gzhal du myed pa/ dpag tu myed pa ste/ rab 'byor chos 'di
176a8(brgyad stong): ngag thams cad ni nam grangs 'dis chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ gzhal du myed pa/ dpag tu med pa ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni/ sems dang bral ba'i phyir
176b1(brgyad stong): bsam gyis myi khyab pa'o// gzhal ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir gzhal tu myed pa'o// rab 'byor gzhal du myed pa gzhal du myed pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ rnam par shes par gyur pa'i tshig bla dgas/ 
176b2(brgyad stong): so// rab 'byor tshad dang bral ba'i phyir dpag tu myed pa'o// nam mkha' dpag tu myed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams dpag tu myed pa'o// nam mkha' gzhal du myed pa'i phyir
176b3(brgyad stong): gzhal du myed pa ste chos de dag ni myi phrad pa'o// rab 'byor de lta bas na chos de dag ni rgazhal du myed pa'o// nam mkha' bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir/ chos de dag bsam gyis myi khyab pa'o// 
176b4(brgyad stong): nam mkha' gzhal du myed pa'i phyir/ chos 'di dag gzhal du myed pa'o// nam mkha' dpag tu myed pa'i phyir/ chos 'di dag dpag tu myed pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mams kyis kyi
176b5(brgyad stong): pa dang / gzhal du myed pa dang / dpag tu myed pa 'di dag bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya len pa myed par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma nyis stong yang len
176b6(brgyad stong): ba myed par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// dge bsnyen pa drug bcu yang chos rnams la chos kyi khyig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge bsnyen ma sum bcu yang chos rnams la
176b7(brgyad stong): chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khris kyang myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de dag kyang skal pa bzang po 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyis tha/ 
176b8(brgyad stong): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag chos rnams la chos kyi phyag rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi/ 
177a1(brgyad stong): lung bstan te/ de dag kyang len pa myed par zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
177a2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab ste/ e ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyi ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
177a3(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab bo// rab 'byor shes rab
177a4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor dmal phyir zhe na/ 'don rnam pa thams cadas khyen pa nyid dang yang dag par ldan no// 'di ni rang sangs
177a5(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi sa dang yang dag par ldan no// 'di ni nyan thos kyis rang yang dag par ldan no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dpe na rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yul gyi myi la dbapa
177a6(brgyad stong): ba dang / brtson 'grus thob pa'i rgyal po bya ba gang yin pa dang / grong khyer gyi bya ba gang yin pa dang / gzhongs kyi bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni blon po dang ldan par gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po// 
177a7(brgyad stong): ni bcon 'grus chung zhing khur bor bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos sal/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ nyan thos kyi chos gang yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad na shes
177a8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang yang dag par ldan na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ming la bya ba byed do// rab 'byor nam grangs 'dis na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas/ 
177b1(brgyad stong): gzugs yongasu myi bzung zhing mngon par chags par bya ba dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su myi bzung zhing mngon par ma chags par bya ba dang/ 
177b2(brgyad stong): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su myi gzung zhing mngon par ma chags par bya ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa yongs su myi gzung
177b3(brgyad stong): nang mngon par ma chags par bya ba dang / rang byang chub myi gzung zhing mngon par ma chags par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su myi gzung zhing mngon par ma chags par bya ba'i phyir
177b4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar gnas so// rab 'byo ra gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su myi gzung zhing mngon par
177b5(brgyad stong): ma chags par bgyi ba'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar gnas pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 
177b6(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa de nyid gang la yongs su 'dzin pa 'am/ mngon par chags par byed pa khyod kyis mthong ngam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ma lags te/ bcom ldan
177b7(brgyad stong): 'das dgra bcom pa nyid gang la yongasu 'dzin pa 'am/ mngon par chags par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu ni bdag gis ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin
177b8(brgyad stong): no// de de bzhin te rab 'byor ngas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ rab 'byor ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas yongasu 'dzin par myi
178a1(brgyad stong): byed mdzin pa chags par myi byed do// rab 'byor des bsan/ thams ca brtson pa nyid ni yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ mngon par chags pa byed pa'o// rab 'byor kyis gsal pa
178a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das theg pa la gsar tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongasu 'dzin pa myed cing mngon par chags pa myed do zhes bgyi ba'i bstan
178a3(brgyad stong): pa 'di thos nas/ skrag cing dngang ste/ shin tu dngangs par 'gyur du mchi'o// 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das gang rgyu phun sum tshogs pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa/ yun ring po nas dge ba'i
178a4(brgyad stong): ba bskrun pa de dag gis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mos par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de bzhino// rab 'byor de de bzhin te
178a5(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni blta dka' ba
178a6(brgyad stong): rtogs par dka' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa'o// 
178a7(brgyad stong): ma ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi song chen po'i 'jis rkyes kyi khams dgan/ sems cam ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ dad pa'i rjes grang ba'i sa la rnam pa 'am/ rnas pa bas
178a8(brgyad stong): par byung ba bas/ gang shes ran kyi pha rol du phyin pa lab mo 'di la nyin cig tsam yang bzod cing grod nga chol pa dang / sems pa dang / 'dzal ba dang / ba sa pa dang / nye bar sems par bgyid // 
178b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyi 'ad cid de ngag pas mchog tu 'gyur// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na byung ba dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal / 
178b2(brgyad stong): dag gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan ra/ lha'i bu dag des ni ches myung bar mya ngan las 'da' bar re bar bya ste/ dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i sa la
178b3(brgyad stong): skal pa 'am skal pa bas lhag par spyod pa de dag gis ni ma yino// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bas
178b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas nas/ ba ma ldan 'das kyi drung nas mchi'o zhes gsol te dong / ngo // de dag shin tu ring ba zhig du phyin nas myi snang bar
178b5(brgyad stong): gyur to// 'dod pa ra spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams ni 'dod pa 'i kham su gnas par gyur/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha 'i bu rnams ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gnas par gyur to// 
178b6(brgyad stong): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom
178b7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos shing
178b8(brgyad stong): bar myi 'gyur ba dang / kun zhum par myi 'gyur ba dang / mongs par gyi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / the tsom du myi 'gyur zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
179a1(brgyad stong): mngon par dga' ma/ bcom ldan 'das de gang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir mchis pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
179a2(brgyad stong): chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing zhum par myi 'gyurakun tu zhum par myi 'gyurarmongs par myi 'gyur/ rnam par gnas par myi 'gyur/ the tsam
179a3(brgyad stong): du myi 'gyur/ som nyi ba bar myi 'gyur/ lta ba dang mnyan pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la 'dzin cing sgom par 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rolang du
179a4(brgyad stong): phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa myi spong zhing phyir phyogs pa ra myi byed do// gzung ba dang kun chub par bya ba dang / ban dang ba dang klag pa'i phyir/ mos pa skyed par 'gyur/ rjes su 'brang
179a5(brgyad stong): zhing phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ chos smra ba myi gtong bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ba be'u gzhon nu yod pa be'u myi 'dor ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor byang chub sos
179a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lus la thogs pa 'am/ glegs bam du chung bar ma gyur pa de srid
179a7(brgyad stong): durtsom ba ste gtong bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mi dag ginang nas na 'phos nas myer skyes pa yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dra
179a8(brgyad stong): yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes par 'gyur bar mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lang pa/ 
179b1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur byas te/ dri ba dang yongs su dri ba byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan de ngag nas shi 'thos
179b2(brgyad stong): nas 'dir skyes pa yod de/ de yang yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgal ldan gyi lha dag gi nang nas shi 'phos nas
179b3(brgyad stong): 'dir skyes pa de yang yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya ste/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bsnyen bkur byas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
179b4(brgyad stong): brtsams te dri ba dang / yongs su dri ba byas pa de yang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/ 
179b5(brgyad stong): yongs su ma dris pa de'i phyir myi nyid kyi nang du skyes na yang / nem nur byed par 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum pa ra 'gyur na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni sngon yang yo/ 
179b6(brgyad stong): su myi 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum pa nyid du
179b7(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyin cig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi tsam du thos par 'gyur te/ bsnyen bkur byas na
179b8(brgyad stong): dri ba dang yongasu drib byas pa de ni re shig dad pa yin te/ chos ston par 'gyur zhing / yongs su dribs 'phrogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
180a1(brgyad stong): 'di sngon yongs su ma dris shing rjes su ma 'brangs par gyur pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyan par bya ba'i phyir/ res 'ga' ni mos pa rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni
180a2(brgyad stong): mos par myi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir g.yengs pa dang zhum par 'gyur/ de'i blo dgod par 'gyur te/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni theg pa la yang dag par zhugs nas
180a3(brgyad stong): ring por ma lon zhing / theg pa la gsar du zhugs te 'ongs par rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni ngad pa de dang / dang ba de rab tu rab tu gtong bar 'gyur zhing / 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu
180a4(brgyad stong): phyin pa zab mo 'di rje su 'dzin par myi 'gyur/ rjes su 'jug par myi 'gyur/ rjes su 'khor bar myi 'gyur te/ de ni nyan tho sa kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gang yang
180a5(brgyad stong): rung ba les gcig tu re bar bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa'i bla chag pa dang / gang dag de shing ngas/ gru tshal la gyi 'dzin tam/ shi ba'i rol myi 'dun
180a6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ni chu 'i pha rol kyi 'gram du ma phyin par/ chu'i nang du shi ba'i dris byed par 'gyur ro// zhes rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gang dag rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa'i gru chag pa dang / shing leb bam
180a7(brgyad stong): gru tshal la 'dzin cing / shi ba'i ro la 'jun/ rab 'byor de ni chus dus byed par myi 'gyur te/ bde bar pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin nas/ ma snang ma sbas par skam sa la gnas par 'gyu ro zhes rig par
180a8(brgyad stong): bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dad pa tsam dang / dga' btsam dang / dang ba tsam dang ldan pa yang nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma 'dus na/ rab 'byor bar ma dor de ni la
180b1(brgyad stong): gyi bye brag la skyeng lug par 'gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par/ nyan thos nyid dam rang sangs rgyas nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sas
180b2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar/ dad pa yod pa dang / bzod pa yod pa dang / sred pa yod pa dang / 'dod pa yod pa dang / brtsom
180b3(brgyad stong): 'grus yod pa dang / bag byed pa yod pa dang / mos pa yod pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yod pa dang / gtong ba yod pa dang / gus par byed pa yod pa dang / dka' ba yod pa dang / dang ba yod pa dang / 
180b4(brgyad stong): rab tu dga' ba yod pa dang / brtson pa myi 'dor ba de dag kyang / she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'ju bar byed de/ de ltar de dag ngagi dad pa de dang / bzod pa dang / sred pa dang / 'dod pa dang / 
180b5(brgyad stong): brtson 'grus dang / bag byed pa dang / mos pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / gtong ba dang / gus par byed pa dang / dka' ba dang / dang ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / brtson pargya
180b6(brgyad stong): 'dor ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bud myed dam skyes pa yang rung / bum pa so ma btang bas chu chun rab 'byor de'i bum pa
180b7(brgyad stong): de ni yun ring po mya thub ste/ de ni myur du chag cing zhig par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bum pa so ma btang ba de ni mthar sa nyid du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sem
180b8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dad pa yod pa dang / 'dod pa yod pa dang / bcom 'grus yod pa dang / bag byed pa yod pa dang / mos pa yod
181a1(brgyad stong): pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yod pa dang / gtong ba yod pa dang / gus par byed pa yod pa dang / dka' ba yod pa dang / dang ba yod pa dang / rab tu dka' ba yod pa dang / brtson pa myi gtong ba
181a2(brgyad stong): yod du zin kyang / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongasu ma bzung bar gyur na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni bar ma dor lam gyi bye brag la sgying lug par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
181a3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi bye brag la sgying lug pa gang zhe na/ de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na bud myed dam skyes pa yang rung ste/ bum pa legs
181a4(brgyad stong): par so btang bas 'bab chu 'am/ lteng ka 'am/ mtsho 'am khron pa 'am/ de ma yin pa'i chu'i gzhi gzhan nas chu bcus te/ des chu de khyer na/ rab 'byor bum pa des ni bde bar khyim du
181a5(brgyad stong): phyin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bum pa so leg sa par btang ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par
181a6(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dad pa yod/ bzad pa yod/ sred pa yod/ 'dod pa yod/ brtson 'grus yod/ bag byed pa yod/ mos pa yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yod/ 
181a7(brgyad stong): gtong ba yod / gus par byed pa yod/ dga' ba yod/ dang ba yod/ rab tu dga' ba yod/ brtson pa myi 'dob pa yang yod la/ reshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongasu bzung ba
181a8(brgyad stong): krungs/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sel ba dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dro la gri bye brag la spring lus par gyi 'gyur te/ ma sras ma snang bar thams cang mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par byan
181b1(brgyad stong): bam po bcu bzhi// / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhi
181b2(brgyad stong): maman pa'i sum las byas gangs bcas pa sna bkyi sa nas rnyen lan bya'/ ma rnamasas de sa kyim chan pa'i da thams paragyu/ 
181b3(brgyad stong): gru de ni 'di lta ste/ 'di lta bu'i 'jig pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/ pha rol tu ma rgal bar/ de rdzas kyang gzhan du 'gyur la/ klu de yang gzhan du 'gro bar rig par bya ste/ de ltar ded dpon thabs myi mkhas
181b4(brgyad stong): pa'i shes rab can de nor chen po dang bral ba dang phrad par 'gyur te/ rin po che'i 'byung gnas chen po las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la
181b5(brgyad stong): yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dad pa yod/ bzod pa yod/ sred pa yod/ 'dod pa yod bcon 'grus yod/ bag byed pa
181b6(brgyad stong): yod/ mos pa yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yod/ gtong ba yod/ gus par byed pa yod/ dga' ba yod/ dang ba yod/ rab tu da ga' ba yod/ brtson pa myi gtong ba yod kyang / de shes rab kyi pha
181b7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung zhing thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che nyid ma thob par/ bar ma dor chud zos shing yi gsod par 'gyur
181b8(brgyad stong): te/ don chen po las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro// rin po che'i phung po chen po 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che chen po las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems
182a1(brgyad stong): gdapa' bar ma dor chung za ba gang zhen/ 'di sa ste nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na ded dpon mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis/ rgya mtshor 'dun
182a2(brgyad stong): ba'i gru bcing ba legs par banings/ myig tshags bya ba legs par byas nas/ bcos par bya ba legs par bcos te/ chu'i nang du drangs nas/ rdzas der bskyas te/ gang bar byas nas legs par bzhes
182a3(brgyad stong): shing mthun pa'i rlung dang sbyar te/ de gang du 'gro 'dod pa'i phyogs su mthar kyis song na/ rab 'byor de ni chus 'jig par myi 'gyur gyi/ gru de gang du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyogs der phyin par 'gyur zhing / ded dpon
182a4(brgyad stong): de yang 'jig rten gyi rin po che chen po rnyed pa 'di lta ste/ 'jig rte na gyi rin po che dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// zhes rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
182a5(brgyad stong): la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa ra 'tshang rgya bar dad pa yod/ bzod pa yod/ sred pa yod 'dod pa yod/ brtson 'grus yod/ bag byed pa yod
182a6(brgyad stong): mos pa yod/ lhag po'i bsam pa yod/ gtong ba yod/ gus par byed pa yod/ dka' ba yod/ dang ba yod/ rab tu dga' ba yod/ brtson pa myi gtong ba yang yod la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir / 
182a7(brgyad stong): bas yongs su bzung zhing / thangs mkhas pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ bar ma dong lam gyi bye brag la chung myi za zhing sgyid lug par myi 'gyur te/ 
182a8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
182b1(brgyad stong): po gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la dad pa yod/ bzod pa yod/ sred pa yod/ 'dod pa yod/ brtson 'grus yod/ bag byed pa yod

182b3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung zhing thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral na/ de ni gang gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'grub pa'i chos mngon du byed cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
182b4(brgyad stong): bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi sgrub po// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu 'ga' zhig skyes nas/ lo brgya
182b5(brgyad stong): nyi shu lon pa zhig/ rgang po rgas shing 'khogs par gyur la/ de'i lus la rlung las gyur pa 'am/ 'khris pa las gyur pa 'am/ bad kan las gyur pa 'am/ 'dus pa las kyur
182b6(brgyad stong): ba'i nad kyis btab na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems skyes bu de ma bslang bar khri las ldang nus sam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
182b7(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor gal te skyes bu de khri las ldang nus par gyur kyang / de rgas pa de dang / nad des 'khogs pas/ rgyang grags gcig srid dam/ rgyang grags gnyis srid du 'gro ba'i
182b8(brgyad stong): mthu byed do// gal te skyes bu de khri las ldang nus kyang 'gro bar bya bar mthu myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
183a1(brgyad stong): rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bya bar dad pa yod pa dang / bzod pa yod pa dang / sred pa yong ba dang / 'dzad pa yod pa dang / brtson 'grus yod pa dang / rang ba yod pa dang / mos pa yod pa dang / 
183a2(brgyad stong): ga pa'i gsas pa yong pa dang / gtong ba yod pa dang / zas dbyed pa yod pa dang / dga' ba sang pa dang / ban gyid pa dpa dang / rab tu la sa yang pa dang / brtson 'dres kyi gtang ma yang par chu
183a3(brgyad stong): deshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing / thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur pas/ dablan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'phang bar bya ba la yang dag par

183a6(brgyad stong): lo brgya nyi shu lon par gyur pa/ rgang po gas shing 'khogs pa de nyid kyi lus n+ya las sngar po 'am/ 'khris pa las gyur pa 'am/ bdakan las gyur ba 'am/ 'dus pa las gyur ba'i nad kyis btab pa rdo
183a7(brgyad stong): g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyogs gnyis nas/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis legs par btan zhing / 'dur bcug ste/ legs par bzung nas de la 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu khro gang du 'gro bar bya ba'i gnas de

183b8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'dod pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la bsnyen par bya/ bsten par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la 'doms shing ston par 'gyur ba dang /

187b8(brgyad stong): chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed

188a4(brgyad stong): bzhin gyis skye ba myed pa dang 'gag pa myed par chos ston to// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba myed pa dang 'gag pa myed par chos ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i chos
188a5(brgyad stong): rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba myed pa dang 'gag pa myed par chos so// na to// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba myed pa dang 'gag pa myed par chos ston to// chos thams cad kyang rang ba
188a6(brgyad stong): byas skyo ba skyed pa dang 'gas pa byed par chos som// rab 'byor de lta na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla ma byed pa yang da par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'dren
188a7(brgyad stong): rten gyi yongasu 'dren par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor nga ji lta par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blar myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// 'jig rten gyi rten du 'gyur sem
188a8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs yinam mkha'i rten can no zhes chos non par 'gyur/ de bzhin du tshor ba
188b1(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang nam mkha'i rten can no zhes chos ston par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad nam mazha'i rten can te/ 'ong ba myed pa 'gro ba myed pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs/ 
188b2(brgyad stong): pa ste/ ji ltar nam mkha' 'ongs pa myed pa/ song ba myed pa/ ma byas pa/ myi gnas pa/ rnam par myi gnas pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang / nam mkha' la rnam par rtog pa myed/ 
188b3(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir rnam par myi rtog pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'ong ba myed pa 'gro ba yod// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i
188b4(brgyad stong): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba myed// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba myed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi rten can te/ chos de dag ni rten
188b5(brgyad stong): de nyid las myi 'anga'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma myed pa'i rten can te/ de dag ni rten de las kyi 'anga'o// rab byor chos thams cad ni smon pa myed pa'i rten can te/ de dag rted de las
188b6(brgyad stong): myi 'anga'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mngon sum du myi byed pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las myi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'byung ba myed pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las myi 'dam
188b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni skye ba myed pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las myi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las myi 'anga'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rmyi lam gyi
188b8(brgyad stong): rten can te/ de dag rten de las myi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gi rten can te/ de dag rten de las myi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mu khyed pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las myi 'da'o// rab 'byor
189a1(brgyad stong): chos thams cad ni zhi ba'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las myi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las myi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad
189a2(brgyad stong): 'byung du myed pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las myi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'ong ba myed pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las myi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'gro ba myed pa'i rten can te/ 
189a3(brgyad stong): de dag rten de las myi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rab tu zhi ba'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las myi 'da'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo su dag
189a4(brgyad stong): gis 'tshal bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
189a5(brgyad stong): rgyas rnams kyi drung du spyad pa de dag gis shes par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di shes par 'gyur ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su
189a6(brgyad stong): sbyin par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi ngo bo nyid ji lta bu lags/ 
189a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal parab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di shes par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ dul ba dben pa'i rang bzhin can no// rab 'byor/ 
189a8(brgyad stong): kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag/ ji de lta bu'i rten can kho na lags sam/ rten de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can dag la rten 'di nyid ston
189b1(brgyad stong): par 'gyur zhing / de dag de ltar sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ram/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de
189b2(brgyad stong): bzhin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'di lta bu'i rten can du 'gyur ro// rten de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can de dag la rten 'di dag ston par 'gyur te/ 
189b3(brgyad stong): de ltar de dag sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems
189b4(brgyad stong): can grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag gi rten du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa dag yongasu mya ngan las bzla'o zhes go cha 'di bgos
189b5(brgyad stong): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dka' ba bgyid pa lag so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyikyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byo
189b6(brgyad stong): de de bzhi'o// de de bzhin te/ sems can grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag yongasu mya ngan las bzla'o zhes gang gis go tshe 'di bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dka' ba byed pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub
189b7(brgyad stong): mams dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi don du 'brel ba la yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa shes pa dang 'bres pa ma yin
189b8(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'i don du 'brel pa ma yin nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang 'brel pa yang ma yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du 'brel pa yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sa dang 'brel pa yang ma
190a1(brgyad stong): yin/ sangs rgyas kyis 'don du 'brel pa yang ma yin/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa'i go cha 'don chos thams cad dpam 'brel
190a2(brgyad stong): pa'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo de la de ltar spyod pa gnas gsum la re bar gyi
190a3(brgyad stong): bgyi ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
190a4(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor khyod don gyi dbang ci zhig mtho dang na 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la de ltar
190a5(brgyad stong): spyod pa/ gnas gsum la re bar myi byed pa ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgya sa kyi sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes zer/ rab 'byor kyis gsol
190a6(brgyad stong): pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo de ni sus kyang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ su yang gyi sgom/ su yang bsgom par myi 'gyur/ gang la yang bsgom par bgyi ba ma mchiso// de ci'i srang
190a7(brgyad stong): zhen/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos gang yang yongasu grub pa ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa lags so// 
190a8(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskos pa 'di ni chos thams cad bsgom pa lags// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa 'do ni ma chags pa sgom pa lag so// 'di lta ste zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa
190b1(brgyad stong): bsgom pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa bsgom pa lagaso// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni dngos po ma mchis pa sgom pa lagaso/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni
190b2(brgyad stong): yongasu gzung ba ma mchis pa bsgom pa lag so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
190b3(brgyad stong): phyin pa la spyod pa zab mo 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub seMs
190b4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la mngon par chags pa myed pa dang / la la gzhan gyis smra ba dang / gzhan gyis bsgo ba dag la mngon par myi chags pa dang / la la pha rol
190b5(brgyad stong): gyi dang 'iphyir myi 'brang ba dang / rab 'byor byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chen po la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab/ mo bshad pa las myi zhum myi 'god/ myi smig myi dang shin tu dngang bar myi
190b6(brgyad stong): byed de/ nem nur myi byed/ the tsom myi na/ rmongs par myi 'gyur zhing / rtogs par byed/ mos par byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa mthong ba dang thos par dka' na/ rab 'byor 'dis sngon yang zhes
190b7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dris par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe sa/ lce 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa la myi smra ba myi ngang / shin tu dngang bar myi byed pa'i phyir// rab 'byor gyis gso
190b8(brgyad stong): pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la myi skrag myi dngang / shin tu dngang bar myi bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang gis de
191a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bye brag du brtags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
191a2(brgyad stong): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bye brag du brtags pa yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis bye brag du brtags pa lags/ bcom
191a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang / rab 'byor nam mkha' la 'bab pa dang / rab 'byor nam mkha' la bab pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
191a4(brgyad stong): gzhol ba'i sems kyi chud bye brag du brtags pa yin no// rab 'byorathams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dbye brag du brtags pa gang yin pa 'di ni bye brag du brtags pa'o/ 
191a5(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu myed pa'o// rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni tshad myed pa'o// rab 'a byor dpag tu myed pa dang tshad myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma
191a6(brgyad stong): yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ thob pa ma yin/ mngon par rtogs pa ma yin/ khong du chud pa ma yin/ lam ma yin/ lam gyi 'dra
191a7(brgyad stong): bum sa pal shes ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ skye ba ma yin/ 'jis pa ma yin/ 'byung ba ma yin/ 'gro ba ma yin/ 'gag pa ma yin/ sgom pa ma yin/ rnam par sgom pa ma yin
191a8(brgyad stong): lus kyang ma byas ga nas kyang ma 'ongs gang du yang myi 'gro yul gang du yang ma phyis/ phyogs gang du yab myi gnas te/ gzham phun dpag tu byed pa tshad myed pa zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'o/ nam mal
191b1(brgyad stong): dpag tu myed pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu myed pa ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu byed pa de ni/ sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par myi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin/ tsho
191b2(brgyad stong): bas ma yin/ 'du shes kyis ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyis ma yin/ rnam par shes pas ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
191b3(brgyad stong): pas ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi nuso// de ci'i phyir zhe na
191b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzugs nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// rab 'byor de bzhi na du tshor ba nyid dang / 'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed rnams nyi ra dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyi
191b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
191b6(brgyad stong): pa nyid dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnam su bcas pa dang / myi mjed kyi bdag / 
191b7(brgyad stong): po tshangs pa yang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum spor ba
191b8(brgyad stong): byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dam su bcas pa dang / myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang
192a1(brgyad stong): bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab po/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gting
192a2(brgyad stong): dpag dka' ste/ don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa na/ brtson pa chung ba la thugs gzhol bar mdzad
192a3(brgyad stong): chos bshad pa la gzhol bar mdzad// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / kyi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gzugs
192a4(brgyad stong): na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag ma la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab mo/ lha'i bu dag ma
192a5(brgyad stong): la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gting dpag dka' ba ste/ nagyi dbang 'di gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra brtsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi snying po la/ 
192a6(brgyad stong): bzhugs pa nabartson pa chung ba la thugs gzhol bar mdzad de/ chos ston pa la gzhol bar mdzad do// e ma chos zab mo 'di ni ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sus kyang mngon par rdzogs
192a7(brgyad stong): bar sangs ma rgyasasu yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar myi 'gyur/ su yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang gyi rgya ste/ 'di ni chos kyi zab pa de yin te/ nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ 
192a8(brgyad stong): bangs lab pa'i phyir chos 'di mtho chos thams cad sgrib pa myed pa'i phyi chos 'di ba'o// chos thams cad 'gro ba myed pa'i phyir chos 'di mo// chos thams cad 'ong ba myed pa'i phyir chos 'dris 'o// zhes ram mtho
192b1(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gzugs na spyod
192b2(brgyad stong): pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang myi mthun par bstan te/ bcom
192b3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das chos thams cad ni myi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa lags na/ 'jig rten dag ni 'dzin pa la spyod// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ lha'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcol
192b4(brgyad stong): lnga pa'o// # la byas so ga dam bam po bcwa lnga// de nas bcom ldan
192b5(brgyad stong): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// / bcom ldan 'das e ma'o chos thams cad dmyigasu ma mchis bar chos 'di bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gang
192b6(brgyad stong): la yang thogs pa ma mchiso// e ma'o bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas gnas thams cad dmyig su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos 'di ni thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid// e ma'o/ 
192b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gnyisu ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos 'di ni mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// e ma'o bcom ldan 'das rgol ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos 'di ni do bla ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// 
192b8(brgyad stong): e ma'o bcom ldan 'das mngon par grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos 'di ni rje su ma mchis pa'o// e ma'o bcom ldan 'das skye ba thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos 'di ni 'byung ba ma mchis pa'o// 
193a1(brgyad stong): e ma'o bcom ldan 'das lam thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i slad du/ chos 'di ni lam ma mchis pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / 
193a2(brgyad stong): gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'phags pa gnas gtan rab 'byor 'di ni rjesu mthun par skyes pa lagaso// bcom
193a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos gang dang gang ston pa/ chos de dang de nyid ston pa/ chos de dang de nyid stong pa nyid las brtsams te ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ lha'i dbang po
193a4(brgyad stong): brgya byin dang / myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ce das smraso// lha'i bu dag gang 'di skad du/ gnas gtan rab 'byor 'di
193a5(brgyad stong): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu mthun par skyeso// zhes smras pa ni ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gnas gtan rab 'byor 'di ni de ban na gshegs pa'i rjesu mthun par skyes// gnas gtan rab 'byor
193a6(brgyad stong): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rje su song ba'o// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'ongs pa yang myed/ song ba yang myed pa de bzhin du/ gnas gtan rab 'byor kyang de bzhin nyid kyi rje su song zhing
193a7(brgyad stong): ming ba yang byed/ gnas gtan rab 'byor ni dang po nas de bzhin nyid kyi su song ba'o// daci'i phyir zhem/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na chos thams cad kyi bzhin nyid do// chos thams cad kyid
193a8(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid gnas gtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin nyid de'i rje su song ba'o
193b1(brgyad stong): de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu spong ba ste/ de bzhin nyid de yang de bzhin nyid ma yin te/ de ltar na gnas gtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje su skyes pa'o// de bzhin nyid de'i gnas pa gang yin pa'i
193b2(brgyad stong): gnas pa des/ gnas gtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje su skyes pa'o// de bzhin nyid kyi gnas pa gang yin pa'i gnas pa des/ gnas gtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje su skyes pa'o// ji ltar
193b3(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba myed pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba myed pa dang / rtog pa myed pa dang / rnam par rtog pa myed pa de bzhin du/ gnas gtan rab 'byor yang de bzhin nyid des 'gyur ba myed rnam pa
193b4(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba myed/ rtog pa myed rnam par rtog pa myed pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje su skyes// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang la yang thogs pa myed pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba
193b5(brgyad stong): myed/ rnam par 'gyur ba myed/ rtog pa myed rnam par rtog pa myed de/ gang la yang thogs pa myed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams
193b6(brgyad stong): cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gcig ste/ gnyis myed cing gnyisu byar byed// gnyis byar byed pa'i di zan na nyid ni gang du yang de bzhin nyid ma yin te/ gapan yang de bzhin nyid
193b7(brgyad stong): ma yin/ gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin te/ 'di ltar gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid de ni gnyi su myed pa ste/ gnyi su myed pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyi su byar myed // de ltar gan
193b8(brgyad stong): gtan rab 'byor ni ma byas pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesasu mthun par skyes te/ ma byas pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin par myi 'gyuraro// 'di ltar nam yang
194a1(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid ma yin par myi 'gyur ba de'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid de ni gnyi su myed/ gnyis byar myed pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gnyisu byar myed do// de ltar na gnas gtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
194a2(brgyad stong): rjesu skyeso// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dus thams cad du chos thams cad la mye tog/ rnam par mya rtog pa de bzhin du/ gnas gtan rab 'byor khyod de bzhin nyid kyang / chos thams cad la
194a3(brgyad stong): rtog rnam par myi rtog// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ de bzhin nyid kyis mngon par sprul pa ste/ 'byed pa myed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni tha dad pa ma yin zhing gzhig tu myed pa'o// de ltar na gnas gtan rab
194a4(brgyad stong): 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes skyes// ji ltar de bzhin ga/ shegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mi chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na myed do// de gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin/ 
194a5(brgyad stong): par myi 'gyur te/ de bzhin nyid de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid ro// de bzhin nyid de la gnas gtan rab 'byor gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rje su 'gro bas nye bar song ste/ 
194a6(brgyad stong): 'di la gang yang gang du yang rje su 'gro bas nye bar song ba myed do// de ltar na gnas gtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyeso// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de 'das pa yang ma/ 
194a7(brgyad stong): yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang / 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa 'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba 'ang ma yin te/ de ltar
194a8(brgyad stong): gnas gtan rab 'byor yang de bzhin nyid de'i rjesu skyes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes skyes pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid
194b1(brgyad stong): kyis/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rje su song // 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rje su song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rje su song
194b2(brgyad stong): ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rje su song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi rje su song ngo // da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de
194b3(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rje su song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi rje su song ngo // 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang
194b4(brgyad stong): da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjesu song ste/ de ltar gnas gtan rab 'byor kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
194b5(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di ni gnyis myed de gnyi su byar myed// de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / rab 'byor kyi de bzhin nyid 'di ni gnyisu
194b6(brgyad stong): myed de gnyisu byar myed // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
194b7(brgyad stong): pa'i yang de bzhin nyid de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin nyid gang gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
194b8(brgyad stong): mying thob par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid 'di bstan pa ma/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de bzhin du/ sa chen po 'di
195a1(brgyad stong): rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur te/ de skar gnas gtan rab
195a2(brgyad stong): 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyeso// gzhan yang gnas gtan rab 'byor gzugs kyi rjesu ma skyes te/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes kyi ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyi ma yin/ rnam par zhes par
195a3(brgyad stong): rjesu ma skyes// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rje su ma skyes te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'i rje su ma skyeso// rang sangs
195a4(brgyad stong): rgyas nyid kyi rjesu ma skyes/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi rje su ma skyes// de ltar gnas gtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje su skyes so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe/ 
195a5(brgyad stong): rang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom lda ma 'das 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid 'di ni spyod pa zab mo lA/ gso// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang / 
195a6(brgyad stong): ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sha ri'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin nyid 'di ni spyod pa zab mo yino// de nas de bzhin nyid bstan pa zab mo 'di bshad pa na
195a7(brgyad stong): dge slong sum brgya len pa myed par zag pa las sems shin tu rnam par grol// dge slong ma lnga brgya chos rnams la rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi myig rnam par dag go// lha'i bu lnga stong sngon yongs su
195a8(brgyad stong): byangs sa rgyas ba / gas kyi skye ma ma ma 'dod pa pa par gyu // byang chub ses pa 'a ma rnas yi bathod shes pams rnas par thal so// denas com ldan 'dis rgyam na pa'i bul
195b1(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya la bsnyen bkur byas shing / thams cad la sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams
195b2(brgyad stong): bsam gtan dag bskyed kyang / de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung zhing thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di stong pa nyid dam/ mtshan ma myed
195b3(brgyad stong): pa la spyod dam/ smon pa myed pa yid la byed pa yod mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag thabs mkhas pa dang ma ldan pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas nas/ nyan thos kyi sar nges par skyeso// shA ri'i bu
195b4(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dab chags bya zhig lus dpag tshad brgya'am/ dpag tshad nyis brgya 'am/ dpag tshad sum brgyal ma/ dpag tshad bzhi brgya 'am/ dpag tshad lnga brgya tsam du gyur pa zhi
195b5(brgyad stong): yod de/ de sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na 'dug pa sa/ 'dzam bu klong 'dir 'gro'o snyam du sems na/ sha ri 'i bu 'dab chags bya de/ 'dab ma ma skyes pa 'am/ 'dab ma byi
195b6(brgyad stong): bar gyur la/ nges 'dzam bu gling 'dir gnas par bya'o snyam du bsams te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris nas bdag nyid ma chongs na/ 'dab chags bya de de nas ltung ba dang / nam mkha'i bar
195b7(brgyad stong): snang la gnas pa'i bar der 'di snyam du kye ma'o bdag phyir sum bcu ma gsum pa'i lha'i nang du gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na/ sha ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ 'dab chags bya des phyir sum bcu pa gsu
195b8(brgyad stong): pa'i lha'i nang du gnas par nus sam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu gal te yang 'di snyam du bdag ni ma sbas ma snang bar 'dzam bu gring
196a1(brgyad stong): tu gnas par bya'o snyam na/ shA ro'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ 'dab chags bya de ma snang ma sbas par 'jam bu grang du gnas par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// 
196a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bya de 'dzam bu srid du srung na/ sras shing snang bar 'gyur te/ 'gum pa 'am/ 'bum pa la thug pa tsam gyi sdug bsngal du 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhem/ de ni 'di
196a3(brgyad stong): ra lus kyang chen por gyur la/ 'das ma yang ma mchis par 'gyur ba/ mthon po zhi ga nas kyang ltung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pas
196a4(brgyad stong): ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpachen pos tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
196a5(brgyad stong): sems bskyed nas/ skal pa gang gakrung gi bye ma snyed du gnas shi pa/ sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsku bas/ batshon 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan la mnyam
196a6(brgyad stong): par bzhag ste/ de rgya cher yang dag par zhugs par gyur cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar/ de'i sems cher bskyed par gyur kyang / shes rab kyi sa/ 
196a7(brgyad stong): rab tu phyin pas yongasu ma zin cing thabs mkhas pa dang bral na/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis lung ngo // sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thos 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
196a8(brgyad stong): dang mar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rgyal khrims de dang / ting nge 'dzin de dang / shes rab de dang / rnam par grol pa de dang / rnam par grol ba'i legs mayong ba de dag mtsham pa 'i
196b1(brgyad stong): tshul gyis sems shing sgrub kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims myi shes te/ ting nge 'dzin ma yin/ shes rab ma yin/ rnam par grol ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
196b2(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mthong ba myi shes te/ ma shes ma mthong bas stong pa nyid kyi sgra nyan cing / des sgra de la mtshan mar 'dzin cing / des sla de mtshan mar bzung bas/ bla na
196b3(brgyad stong): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar 'dod na/ de'i phyir 'di ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu/ 
196b4(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung zhing thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur pa de ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad
196b5(brgyad stong): pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ba sod nams kyi tshogs shin tu mang po dang ldan du lags kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung la/ thabs ma
196b6(brgyad stong): pa dang bral zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma ldan na/ de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa la the tsom du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sos
196b7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom par bgyi/ thabs mkhas pa la batshon par bgyi'o// 
196b8(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sha ra'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
197a1(brgyad stong): yogs rab tu pha ros tu ston pas yong sam bzung zhi mabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ babadarnapas kyi tshogs mang ba dang ldan yang dge ba'i banas gnyen dang bral bar gyur pa/ bla ma byed pa yangangs pa
197a2(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob pa ni the tsom du 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu de lta bas me/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
197a3(brgyad stong): 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom par bya zhing thabs mkhas pa la yang brtson par bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnamasu bcas pa dang / myi mjed kyi
197a4(brgyad stong): kyi bdag po tshangs pa gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnam dang bcas pa sa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab po// bcom
197a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o// bcom ldan 'das bla na myed pa yang da ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
197a6(brgyad stong): shin tu 'byung bar dka'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang pa brgya byin la stsogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / tshangs pa myi mjed kyi bdag po la stsogs pa/ gzugs na spyod pa'i
197a7(brgyad stong): lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni za'o// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'byung bar dka' ste/ 
197a8(brgyad stong): shes rab 'chal pa dang / brtson 'grus dman pa dang / mos pa dman pa dang / thabs la myi mkhas pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po bsten pa rnams kyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
197b1(brgyad stong): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba shin tu 'byung bar dka'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ bla na myed pa
197b2(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byung bar dka'o// tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'byung ba ba shin tu dka' zhes bka' stsal na/ 'di ste ste de la cung zad kyang
197b3(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'byung bar dka' zhing / bla na myed pa yang dag par
197b4(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub shin tu 'byung bar dka' ba ltar/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa lag sa pa'i slad du/ chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
197b5(brgyad stong): nus pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sa thams cad ni stong pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang spang bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos gang bstan pa'i chos de yang ma mchis so// 
197b6(brgyad stong): de bzhin du bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab gang lags pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang sa bar bgyid pa gang lags pa dang / 'tshal bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa dang / 
197b7(brgyad stong): 'tshal bar bgyid pa gang lags pa'o chos de dag thams cad ni stong ba'o// bcom ldan 'das nam grangs 'dis na/ bdag na 'di sum tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar la
197b8(brgyad stong): ba la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba sla ba lags te/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba ma lags pa snyam bgyid// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
198a1(brgyad stong): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'byung ba myed pa'i phyir bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byung bar dga'o// rab 'byor yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir bla ma byed pa yang dag
198a2(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byung bar dka'o// rab 'byor rnam par ma bsgrubs pa'i phyir bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byung bar dka'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
198a3(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor stong pa zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs 'das bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byung bar dka'o// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
198a4(brgyad stong): bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shin tu 'byung bar dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nam mkha' ni 'di snyam du bdag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
198a5(brgyad stong): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// snyam du myi sems te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin du chos 'di dag kyang mngon par rdzog sa par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
198a6(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungaso// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba slar zin na/ byang chub sem/ 
198a7(brgyad stong): dpa' gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed bla na khyed
198a8(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta bas na 'di ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byung bar dka' zhing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
198b1(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba shin tu 'byung bar dka'o zhes rig par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan
198b2(brgyad stong): ba sha ri'i bu ji gzugs bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog gam/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pas

203b8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems yong su dag pa gang lags par rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
204a1(brgyad stong): dge ba'i che ba de dag nas par 'phel ba des de la bur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems la bya ba nyung ba yong su 'dzin to// sems g.yo' myed pa dang / sems su byed par
204a2(brgyad stong): sems gya gru myed pa dang / sems yon po myed pa yongasasu 'dzin to// rab 'byor sems rnam par dag pa des nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di ni byeng
204a3(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems yongasu dag par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
204a4(brgyad stong): bo nibla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byoradaphyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
204a5(brgyad stong): rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshig su bcad pa la lhur mye byed de/ phrag dog dang ser sna mang ba ma yin no// gos da nga bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo bya
204a6(brgyad stong): dgas sur byed pa ma yin no// chos phab mo dag bshad na/ yang dag par gyi zhum zhing bro btad par 'gyur/ thozab par 'gyung / mor byas te / zhan las chos nyan cing / ri mor byas te/ 
204a7(brgyad stong): gzhan las chos gang nyan pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang sbyor bar byed do// 'jig rten gyi las kyi gnas dang / bzo'i gnas ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes
204a8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas chos nyid dang sbyor bar byed do// gang chos kyi dbyings dang myi sbyor ba'i chos gang yang myi mthong ste/ thams cad kyang de dang ldan par yang dag par mthong ngo // rab 'byor
204b1(brgyad stong): rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// 
204b2(brgyad stong): gzhan yang rab 'byor gal te bdud sdig can des sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad mngon par sprul te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag re res kyang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya dag dang / byang chub seMs
204b3(brgyad stong): dpa' mang po stong dag mngon par sprul nas/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces zer te/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang lung
204b4(brgyad stong): bstan pa de dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba chen po 'di dag du skyes te/ khyod kyang phyir myi ldog par lung bstan pas/ khyod kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po 'di dag du skye bar 'gyur gyis
204b5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems de phyir gshegs par gyis shig/ sems can dmyal bar skyes na/ khyod la sangs rgyas kyis ci zhig bya/ de ltar byas na mtho' ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// zhes ze
204b6(brgyad stong): ma yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems myi 'khrug kyi g.yo zhing / 'di snyam du gang phyir gyi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song du skye ba 'do na gnas ma/ 
204b7(brgyad stong): yin zhing go skabs myed do snyam du shes na/ rab 'byor ram pa de ngas dang / nags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me/ blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs
204b8(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub las phyir gyi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor bdud sdig can dge sbyong gi cha byad du phyir gyi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gam du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad ce
205a1(brgyad stong): zer te/ gang khyod kyis sngon thos pa de phyir gshegs par gyis shig/ gang khyod kyis sngon yongasu bzung ba de phyir 'or cig/ de ltar gal te phyir gshegs shing / de ltar khyod kyis phyir 'or na/ nga yang
205a2(brgyad stong): rtag tu 'dir 'ong ngo // gang khyod kyis da ltar bzung ba 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma yin gyi/ 'di ni rang bzo' can gyis snyan dgas byas pa'o// gang pa 'chad pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs
205a3(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi tshig go zhes zer ba thos nas/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems 'khrug cing g.yon rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis lung ma bstan pa ste/ bla na myed pa
205a4(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa ma yin zhing / 'di ni phyir myi ldog pa'i khams la gnas pa ma yin par rig pa ra bya'o// rab 'byor yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
205a5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po bdud sdig can las de lta bu thos nas kyang / sem sa myi 'khrug myi g.yo zhing / chos nyid la brten te myi skye banyid dang / myi 'gag pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du byed pa nyid
205a6(brgyad stong): la rten cing gzhan gyi dad pa'i phyir myi 'gro ste/ dper na rab 'byor dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ gzhan gyi dad pa'i phyir myi 'brang ba ste/ chos nyid la mngon sum du byed cing / bdud sdig can gyis/ 
205a7(brgyad stong): kyi 'phrogs pa de bzhin du/ rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dag gis kyi rdzi ba yod de/ nyan thos kyis
205a8(brgyad stong): 'as rang sangs rgyas kyis byar gyi ldol pa'i chos can tu 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges zhing rdzogs pa'i byeng chub la gzhol bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' ngos
205b1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa'i khams la gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ gzhan gyi dring kyi 'jog par 'gyur ba yin no// rab 'byor dam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub
205b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las khyim gyi ldos par gzung bar bya'o// ma tho ban ma / 
205b3(brgyad stong): gzhan yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gas du la la 'ongs nas 'di skad ces zer te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di ni 'khor ba'i spyod pa yin te/ khyod 'di nyid du sdug bsngal mthar
205b4(brgyad stong): la phyir 'khor ba ma yod pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang / yid kyi ba de ba de dag myong bar ma byed cig/ kye ma khyod ni 'di nyid du lus 'di khyi 'grub par 'gyur la/ khyod lus gzhan yongasu gzung bar
205b5(brgyad stong): sems pa lta ka la srid ces zer ba la/ gal te gyi 'khrug kyi g.yo'an/ bdud sdig can bdag nyid der 'ongs nas/ 'dzi nad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skas pa
205b6(brgyad stong): kakrung gi bye ma snyed du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag lan bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / srung ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag gis rim gror byas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
205b7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das gang gzung gi byem srid kyi cing tu tshangs par spyod pa srung ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gsung gi kyil gying gas bsnyen bsu rgyas nang / byang chub sems dpa' srin pa 'di sa
205b8(brgyad stong): kar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis gnas par bya ba cus shi yongs kyi ba byas te/ ci gang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bstan pa de bzhin du gnas/ de bzhin du srung / de ba'i na dum
206a1(brgyad stong): 'byor du byas kyang / de dag gis da dung bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/ de ltar bstan pa dang gdams pa la gnas shing / 
206a2(brgyad stong): de ltar bslabs pas kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su ma thob na/ khyod kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ka la 'thob par 'gyur zhes byas kyang / gal te myi 'khrug myi
206a3(brgyad stong): g.yo na/ bdud sdig can gyis sa phyogs de nyid du dge slong dag mngon par sprul nas/ 'di skad ces zer te/ 'di ltar dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa 'di dag ni kyang byang chub tu zhus
206a4(brgyad stong): par gyur pa las/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing / dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas pa yin na/ khyod kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ga la 'thob par 'gyur zhes
206a5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de skad bshad/ de skad bstan kyang / sems kyi 'khrug kyi g.yon/ byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ bla na myed pa
206a6(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan las thos nas/ de ltar 'gyur zhing / yongs/ 
206a7(brgyad stong): su nyams par myi 'gyur ba de'i yid phyir myi ldog/ de'i sems gzhan du myi 'gyur zhing bdud kyi las de dag thams cad shes nas/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
206a8(brgyad stong): bltar pha rol tu phyin pa dag la spyod pa gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi thob par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs byed// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar srog
206b1(brgyad stong): ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci ltar gsungs pa'i spyod pa de dang ma bral ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yid la byed pa de dang ma bral ba la/ bded sdig can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas ma/ 
206b2(brgyad stong): yin zhing go skabs myed do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi las rnams khong du chud cing 'bral bar byed pa'i tshig rnams gzhan las thos nas yongasu myi nyams/ de'i yid phyir myi
206b3(brgyad stong): ldog/ sems gzhan du myi 'gyur te/ bdud kyi las de dag de ltar shes na/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
206b4(brgyad stong): ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir gyi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dur sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i drung du bdud sdig can dge sbyong
206b5(brgyad stong): gi cha byad du bsgyur te 'ongs nas/ 'di ltar mos pa las bzlog pa ra byed de/ 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ni nam mkha 'ichos dang mtshungaso// 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa
206b6(brgyad stong): bya ba'i tshamadzan med pa'o// 'ad sa ste/ thams ca ma tshan pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos 'angan meng pa sa yin pa zhes de la zhes par 'tshasas de la mdun par 'os
206b7(brgyad stong): bar 'byung / ngam gang sangs par gyi / gang mngan par rdzogs par 'ayang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyas par bya ba dang / ganganas par bya ban rgyas sa ma
206b8(brgyad stong): mas/ thas mamaso// 'das pa thad byed pa yang sa par rnag sa pa kya mams pa rdzogs pa la tu bar gyi mas ba 'a
207a1(brgyad stong): bstan te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa ma yin no zhes zer zhing / gang 'bral bar byed pa 'di ni bdud kyi las yin no zhes/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des de ltar shes par bya/ de ltar
207a2(brgyad stong): bsam par bya/ de ltar rig par bya ste/ de ltar bsams nas de la sems brtan par bya'o// sems myi g.yo ba dang / sems myi 'khrug par bya'o// rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang
207a3(brgyad stong): mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir myi
207a4(brgyad stong): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'dod pa na bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug// de bzhin du gnyis pa dang me / sum pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan pa'i
207a5(brgyad stong): pa la snyoms par 'jug ste/ rab 'byor de bsam gta/ bzhi po de dag la gnas shing / bsam gtan la yongasu 'dris par byed do// de bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug
207a6(brgyad stong): bsam gtan gyi dbang gis kyi skye zhing / de 'dod pa na spyod pa'i chos rnams la dmyigs par byed de/ rab 'byor 'di ni phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan nyid du rig pa
207a7(brgyad stong): bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mying ched cher byed pa ma yin/ grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshig su bcad pa ched cher byed pa ma yin/ 
207a8(brgyad stong): mying la chags par myi byed do// de sems kyi 'khrug pa yin te/ de sems can thams cad la phan par sems pa yin/ de 'gro ba dang 'ong ba na sems 'khrug cing myi 'gro/ sems 'khrug ci
207b1(brgyad stong): myi 'ong ste/ dran bzhin du 'ong ngo / de gal te khyim na gnas na yang 'dod pa rnams la mngon par chags pa 'am/ bsam pa lhag par cher myi 'gyur te/ de skyo bar 'du shes pas 'dod pa la yongasu
207b2(brgyad stong): spyod cing / skrag par 'du shes pas 'dod pa la yongasu spyod de/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu zhig myi dgod kyi gnas dgon pa'i nang du song la/ zas kyi bya ba byed na/ skrag pa'i
207b3(brgyad stong): 'du shes kyis zas kyi bya ba byed cing / 'gro bar 'du shes pas zas kyi bya ba byed de/ bdag myi dgod kyi gnas dgon pa 'di nas ji tsam na 'das snyam du ris par 'du shes pas/ rings thab su zas
207b4(brgyad stong): za ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang khyim na gnas na/ 'ad dra pa gang dang gang dag la yong su spyod pa de dang de dag la myi 'dod bzhin
207b5(brgyad stong): mchags pazhin su sangs byung // 'dod pa'i sem lnga po dga' ba'i rang ba'i man/ zang pa'i rang na can dngan la #// dedan kyi
207b6(brgyad stong): na sangam thus pa dang gyimathun pas 'chi bar gyi byed de/ sa 'ba' khrig gis 'am bar byed kyi sa pa yin pas kyi tsho/ 'amabar gyur kyang bu'i/ gzhan la gnod par su rnyed do// 
207b7(brgyad stong): khyim zhe na/ 'di lta skyes bu ngas pa/ skyes bu chen po/ skyes bu mchog/ skyes bu mchog rab/ skyes bu khyu mchog/ skyes bu rlom pa/ skyes bu gcig/ skyes bu lung phyi na/
