208a1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag khyim na gnas te/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
208a2(brgyad stong): rol da tu phyind pa'i stobs bskyed pa thob pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bla na myed pa yang
208a3(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje rtag par phyi bzhin 'brang bar
208a4(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ de thub par dka' zhing myi ma yin pa dag gis 'da' bar bya myi nus par 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur ba ra 'gyur ro// de sems myi g.yong bar 'gyur ro// dbang po ma tshang ba
208a5(brgyad stong): myi 'gyur/ dbang po yongasu tshang bar 'gyur/ skyes bu khyu mchog gi dbang po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i dbang po de nga ldan par myi 'gyur/ de bud myed dag dbang du bya ba'i sngags bslab
208a6(brgyad stong): ba dang / ci dang / rigs sngags dang / sman la sogs pa gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad myi sbyor te/ 'tsho ba yongasu dag par 'gyur/ log par 'tsho bar myi 'gyur/ thod pa'i ngang tshul can du myi 'gyur/ de drang por 'gyur/ 
208a7(brgyad stong): bdag la myi stong / gzhan la myi smod de/ de yon tan de dag dang gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyuraro// de skyes pa dang bud myed dag la khyod kyis bu pho zhig btsa' bar 'ong ngo zhe 'am/ bu mo zhig btsa' bar 'ong ngo zhes lung myi ston
208a8(brgyad stong): de la de lta bu ya snyoms pa'i kun ston pa'i nyes pa de lta bu myi 'byung // rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bla na myed pa
208b1(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
208b2(brgyad stong): chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa dang / rtags gang yin pa dang / mtshan ma gang yin/ 
208b3(brgyad stong): ba'i rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang mtshan ma de dag bstan par bya'o// de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de dag ni 'du 'jil dga' ba'i sbyor ba la brtson par myi gnas so// rgyal po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la brda
208b4(brgyad stong): bar myi gnas/ rkun po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la brtson par myi gnas dmag gi gtam gyi sbyor ba la brtson par myi gnas/ thab mo'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la 'tshon par myi gnas/ grong dang / grong khyer
208b5(brgyad stong): dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po'i srid dang / yul 'a khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la bco na bar myi gnas/ blon po chen po'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la brtson
208b6(brgyad stong): bar myi gnas/ skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / ma ning gi gtam gyi sbyor ba la brtson par myi gnas/ bzhon pa dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mtshe'u dang / mtsho dang / lteng ka dang / 
208b7(brgyad stong): bu dang / nags tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / ri mo'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la brtson par myi gnas/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / lus srul po dang / srul bum gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la brtson
208b8(brgyad stong): bar myi gnas/ zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la brtson par myi gnas/ srang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo' dang / dpongs dang / tshong dus dang / 
209a1(brgyad stong): 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la brtson par myi gnas/ gru dang / gar dang / snyan par brjod pa dang / bro gdung ba dang / rol mo mkhan gyi gtam gyi sbyor ba la brtson par myi gnas
209a2(brgyad stong): mtsho dang / gling gi gtam gyi sbyor ba la brtson par myi gnas/ chos dang 'gal ba'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la batshon par myi gnas/ so so'i skye bo'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la brtson par myi gnas te/ gzhan du na shes
209a3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i gtam gyi sbyor ba la gnas shing / thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang ma bral bar gnas te/ de dag zab mo'i sbyor ba la brtson par myi gnas/ de dag chos
209a4(brgyad stong): 'dod par 'gyur/ chos ma yin pa 'dod par myi 'gyur/ dedag myi mjed pa'i bsngags pa smra zhing / mdza' bar 'dod pa yin te/ myi mdza' bar 'dod pa ma yin/ de dag ni chos smra bar
209a5(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ chos ma yin pa myi smra'o// de dag de bzhin gshe gas pa mthong bar 'dod pas re bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi/ khams gzhan dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
209a6(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag gi drung du skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ sems bskyed cing de dag 'dod na der yang skyes te/ de dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / de bzhin
209a7(brgyad stong): gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang myi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag nin 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dag las shi 'phos pa dang / gzug
209a8(brgyad stong): na spyod pa'i lha las shi 'phos pa dang / gzugs myed pa na spyod pa las shi 'phos nas 'dzam bu gling gi yul gyi dbus 'di nyid du/ myi nyid kyi nang na/ myi dag spu tshal dag la mkhas pa/ rig sngags dag la
209b1(brgyad stong): mkhas pa/ gtsug lag la mkhas pa/ mtshan ma dag la mkhas pa// chos kyi don la mkhas pa dag yod par skyes te/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo dag tu skye ba ni nyung ngo // phal cher yul gyi dbus su skye'o/ 
209b2(brgyad stong): gang dag mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo'i nang du skyes pa de dag kyang / grong khyer chen po'i nang du skyes te/ de dag la yang yon tan 'di dag yod do// rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag da
209b3(brgyad stong): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
209b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du bdag phyi ldog pa 'am/ dar myi ldog pa ma yin snyam du myi sems te/ rang gi sa la the tsom myi skyesom nyi myi byed de/ yang dag par zhum par myi
209b5(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rang gi sa la nem nur myi byed/ the rtso ma myi za ba de bzhin du rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub
209b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / rang gi sa la nem nur myi byed the tsom myi za/ som nyi myi byed de rang gi sa de la yang dag par zhum par myi 'gyur ro// bdud kyi las skyes shing byung kyang myur du rig
209b7(brgyad stong): ning de dag bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba rnams kyi dbang du myi 'gro'o// 'di la ste dper na myi zhig gis 'tshams myed pa byas ma/ 'chi ka'i bar du 'tshams myed pa'i sems dang rtsi 'bral bar 'gyur
209b8(brgyad stong): te sems de bsal ba 'am/ gnan par myi nus shing / 'chi ka'i dus kyi bar du de'i sems de'i rjes su 'brang ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
210a1(brgyad stong): phyir myi ldog pa'i sems kyang gnas par 'gyur zhing / rang gi sa las phyir myi ldog pa las myi bskyod par 'gyur te/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang
210a2(brgyad stong): bskyod pa 'am bskul bar myi nus so// bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba dag rig par byed de/ bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba dag gi dbang du myi 'gro'o// rang gi sa la nem nur myed cing the tsom myed pas
210a3(brgyad stong): tshe rabs 'phos na yang nyan pos kyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi skye'o// de che 'phos na yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar gyi 'gyur ba ma yin te/ bas
210a4(brgyad stong): ni blam myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par dgas par 'chang tu'o snyam sa/ derags su gnas na rang gis la gzham gyini kyi 'jog par 'gyur/ rang gi sa la
210a5(brgyad stong): gyu te/ 'a gyi shes/ 'dre mas pa ma pa pa gyuro// yangs 'byos 'an
210a6(brgyad stong): gas ga ga dang mtshanas gang ga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' thams dpa chen po'i nan byed pa sangs par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'ang rgya ba'i rnam pa deda'
210a7(brgyad stong): rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag khyod la myed do zhes zer ba las rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems gzhan du gyur na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
210b1(brgyad stong): kho 'di/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis phran myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan par rig par bya'o// gal te de 'di snyam du 'dzin
210b2(brgyad stong): bdud sdig can yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas 'ongs pa 'am bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'am/ bdud kyi sprul pa zhig yin te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no// 
210b3(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni skad du gsungs pa de ni de bzhin te/ gzhan ma yin no snyam du sems sam/ gal te 'di snyam du rtog cing sems te/ kye ma 'di ni
210b4(brgyad stong): bdud sdig can gyis sangs rgyas su byin gyis brlabs te/ bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las gzhan du bral bar 'dod do snyam pa la/ rab 'byor gal te bdud sdig can phyir
210b5(brgyad stong): log na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag parardzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa ste/ byang chub sems
210b6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rnam pa 'di dag dang / rtags 'di dag dang / mtshan ma 'di
210b7(brgyad stong): dag yod na rab 'byor de 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yon tan 'di lta bu dag yod pa las na/ e ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni gdon myi za bar sngon gyi de bzhin
210b8(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstand par rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bya'o// 
211a1(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa gang yin pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag yod pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor
211a2(brgyad stong): rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par rig par bya'o// / 
211a3(brgyad stong): gzhan yang rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ bdag gi lus kyang yongs su gtong bar byed/ srog kyang yongasu gtong
211a4(brgyad stong): bar byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa ni ngamad pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir batshon par byed de/ sangs
211a5(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams la dga' ba dang / gus pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la chos kyi sku'o zhes/ chos
211a6(brgyad stong): la dga' ba dang / gus pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa nyi tshe ngem pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas bcom
211a7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das da ltar byung ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba 'ang 'di yin/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba 'ang 'di yin te/ bdag kyang ma byon pa'i
211a8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi grangs su gtogs so zhes/ bdag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de la lung bsten gyis/ 'di ni bdag gi yang dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'o/ 
211b1(brgyad stong): snyam ste/ don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid yongs su gtong ba dag kyang byed do// srog yongs su gtong ba dag kyang byed do// de la zhum par gyi
211b2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// le lo gyi byed do// rab 'byor na rnam pa de dag dang rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
211b3(brgyad stong): ba'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
211b4(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas chos stond pa la/ nem nur myi byed/ the tsom myo nga'o// rab 'byor dkyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kho na chos stond pa la nem nur ma
211b5(brgyad stong): mchis shing / the tsom myi 'tshal ba lags te/ nyan thos kyi ma lags sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis pa ka' stsalang pa rab 'byor nga nyam thos kyis chos stond pa la
211b6(brgyad stong): yang nem nur myi byed/ the tsom gyi ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas na/ de'i phyir chos rnams
211b7(brgyad stong): kyi chos nyid dang myi 'gal bar nyan te/ thos nas kyang nem nur myi byed/ the tsom myi za ste/ rab 'byor dade yon tan de dag dang myi ldan na/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
211b8(brgyad stong): chen po yin no// rab 'byor nga 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir gyi ldog pa'i rnam pa dang rtags dang mchun ma yin
212a1(brgyad stong): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa brgyad stong pa las/ phyir myi ldog pa'i rnam pa dang rtags dang mtshan ma'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu bdun pa'o// 
212a2(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan chen po dang ldan pa ngo mtsha rang to// bcom
212a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das ni phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma dag skal pa gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed du ston kyang spyod de/ de'i slad du/ bcom ldan
212a4(brgyad stong): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i gnas zab mo zab pa dag bsta nang du gsol/ de skad ces gsolang pa dang / 
212a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor da khyod gnas za ba mo zab pa dag shes par 'dod pa legs so legs so// / rab
212a6(brgyad stong): 'byor nga zab ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor nga 'di ni mtshan ma myed pa dang / smonang pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bye ba myed pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / 
212a7(brgyad stong): dngos po myed pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / med par gyu rang pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
212a8(brgyad stong): 'das chos de dag nyid kyi tshig bla dgas lags kyi/ chos thams cad kyi ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da 'di ni chos thams cad kyi yang tshig bla dgas so// 
212b1(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga gzugs ni zab bo/ rab 'byor nga tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor nga rnam par shes pa ni zab bo/ rab 'byor nga gzugs ji ltar zab
212b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor da tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ji ltar zab ce na/ rab 'byor de de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs de bzhin du zab po tshor ba dang / 'du shes
212b3(brgyad stong): dang / 'du byed rnams kyang de bzhin te/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa de bzhin du zab bo// rab 'byor de la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du/ gzugs kyang
212b4(brgyad stong): de bzhin du zab bo// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyi da ji lta ba dang / rab 'byor de la rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
212b5(brgyad stong): ji lta ba bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa de bzhin du zab bo// rab 'byor nga gang la gzugs kyang pa 'di ni gzugs zab pa nyid do// rab 'byor nga gang la tshor ba myed pa dang / 'du shes
212b6(brgyad stong): myed pa dang / 'du byed rnams myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa myed pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa zab pa nyid do// rab 'byord kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar thabs zhib mos gzugs
212b7(brgyad stong): las kyang bzlog la mya ngan las 'das pa yang bstand pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'di ltar thabs zhib mos rnam par shes pa las kyang bzlog la/ mya ngan
212b8(brgyad stong): las 'das pa yang bstand pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i gnas zab mo zab pa 'di dag/ gal te byang chub sems dpas sems
213a1(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur/ nye bar rtog par 'gyur te/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji lta bur bstan pa de bzhin du gnas par bya'o// bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa las ji ltar bstan pa de
213a2(brgyad stong): bzhin du bslab par bya'o zhes/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sgrub cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin du/ nye bar sems nye bar rtog/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
213a3(brgyad stong): bstan pa de bzhin du sbyor zhing / de la nyin cig tsam yang rnal 'byor du byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyi ma cig po de las ji tsam byed par 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dperan
213a4(brgyad stong): skyes bu 'dod chags la spyod pa/ rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa la la zhig yod la/ skyes bu 'dod chags la spyod pa rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa des/ bud myed gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa
213a5(brgyad stong): blta na sdug pa gcig dang btus par gyur la/ bud myed de yang gzhan gyis yongasu zin pa zhig yin te/ bdag nyid khyim nas 'byung zhing 'ong ba'i dbang myed na rab 'byor de ji snyam du
213a6(brgyad stong): sems/ skyes bu de'i rnam par rtog pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu de'i rnam par rtog pa ni bud myed dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni mchi'o// 
213a7(brgyad stong): de mchis nas de dang lhan cig tu 'di ltar dga' bar bgyi/ 'di ltar brtse bar bgyi'o snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de la nyi ma gcig 'das
213a8(brgyad stong): kyi bar du rnam par rtog pa ji snyed cig 'byung / rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs 'das kyi bar du de'i rnam par rtog pa mang po zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
213b1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor skyes bu de nyi ma 'das kyi bar du rnam par rtog pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos skal pa de snyed du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi
213b2(brgyad stong): byin pa 'di la ci ltar ston pa ni ltar bcwa pa la slob bri nye bar mos pa dang / rnal 'byor du byed pa de 'khor ba las rgyab kyis phyogs shing 'dor bar byed de/ nyes pa gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir ldog par
213b3(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba'i nyes pa dag kyang rnam par spong ngo // de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par byed cing / de lta bur gnas pa ni 'di
213b4(brgyad stong): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i yi da la byed pa dag gis/ nyin cig la las ci tsam byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
213b5(brgyad stong): dang bral bas skal pa gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jug ste sbyir pa byin pa bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
213b6(brgyad stong): pa la nyin gcig rnal 'byor du byed pa 'di de bas khyad par du 'phags so// gzhan yang rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang skal pa gang 'ga' klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug
213b7(brgyad stong): cing rgyu nang tu zhugs pa dag la sbyin pa sbyin par byed rab tu 'gyed par byed/ de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir myi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dag la sbyin pa sbyin par byed
213b8(brgyad stong): rab tu 'gyed pa dang rang sangs rgyas dag la sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing rab tu 'gyed la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral ba dang byang chub sems
214a1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du nyi ma gcig tsam rnal 'byor du byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' snga ma de bas byang chub sems dpa' sos
214a2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// gzhan yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gis skal pa gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug cing / sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ tshul khrim
214a3(brgyad stong): yongasu rdzogs par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa gang / yid la byed pa de las langs te chos ston na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpal sos/ 
214a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po snga ma de bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// gzhan yang rab 'byo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa
214a5(brgyad stong): byed cing / sbyin pas bsod nams mang du skyed pa dang / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar chos kyi sbyin pa byin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gsungs pa'i
214a6(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo bas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo zhing / yongs su bsngos nas/ nang du yang dag 'jog la rnal 'byor du byed na gang chos kyi sbyin pa nyi tshe sbyin par byed cing / nang du
214a7(brgyad stong): yang dag 'jog la rnal 'byor du myi byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing / nang du yang dag 'jog la yang rnal 'byor du byed la/ 
214a8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu pan cing / nang du yang dag 'jog ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar byed pa 'di tsam du bsod nams kyi sbed de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
214b1(brgyad stong): po 'di chis bsod nams mang du skyed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de spyod pa kho nar sdang ngo // gso/ 
214b2(brgyad stong): nyid du snang ngo // gsob nyid du snang ngo // snying po byed pa nyid du sdang ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji sa ji lta bur/ 'dra lta sa sor rtog pa de lta de lta bur/ rab 'byor
214b3(brgyad stong): chub thams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos des zung shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
214b4(brgyad stong): tha dang ma bral ba de sa de sa bur/ bsod nams grangs dmyed dpag tu med par skyed do// rab 'byor kyis gsol/ pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis pa dang / grangs ma/ 
214b5(brgyad stong): mchis pa la tha dad du bgyi ba ci mchis bye brag ci mchi sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bya/ ra dpag tu myed pa zhes bya ba ni gang tshad myed par 'gyur ba'o// 
214b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor grangs myed pa ni bgrang bar myi nus pa'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gzugs kyang dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs mchis sam/ tshor ba dang / 
214b7(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang rnam par shes pa yang dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs ma mchis sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di skad du gang
214b8(brgyad stong): gzugs kyang dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs mchis sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang rnam par shes pa yang dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs mchis/ 
215a1(brgyad stong): sa ma zhes smra ba ni/ rab 'byor gzugs nyid dpag tu myed pa'o// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dpag tu myed pa'o// rab 'byor
215a2(brgyad stong): kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dpag tu myed pa zhes bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid
215a3(brgyad stong): kyi tshig bla dgas so// dpag tu myed pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mtshan ma myed pa'i tshig bla dgas so// dpag tu byed pa zhes bya ba 'di ni smon pa myed pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
215a4(brgyad stong): 'das dpag tu ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba 'di stong pa kho na'i tshig tha dgas lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa kho na'i tshig bla dgas da lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa kho na'i tshig bla dgas lags te
215a5(brgyad stong): chos gzhan dag gi ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka 'a stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ci snyam du sems/ ngas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ma bshad dam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol
215a6(brgyad stong): pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid do zhes bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni myi zad pa'o// stong pa nyid
215a7(brgyad stong): gang yin pa de ni dpag tu myed pa ste/ rab 'byor de lta bas na/ chos de dag ni don la bye brag du bya ba 'am/ tha dad du bya ba myi dmyigs te// rab 'byor de dag ni brjod pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bstan
215a8(brgyad stong): cing brjod pa'o// myi zad pa zhes bya ba dang / dpag tu myed pa zhes bya ba dang / grangs myed pa zhes bya ba dang / stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am mtshan ma myed pa zhes bya ba 'am/ smon pa myed pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 
215b1(brgyad stong): mngon par 'du myi byed pa zhes bya ba 'am/ myi 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'am/ myi skye ba zhes bya ba 'am/ dngos po myed pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'gog pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 
215b2(brgyad stong): mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor bstan pa bsgrub pa bshad pa yin no// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs so// rab 'byor
215b3(brgyad stong): kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yang bstan la/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid de yang
215b4(brgyad stong): brjod du ma mchis pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad brjod du ma mchis pa lagaso// 
215b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni brjod du myed pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams
215b6(brgyad stong): cad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni brjod du myi rung ba'i// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das brjod du ma mchis pa'i don la 'phel ba 'am/ 'grib pa ma mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
215b7(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de lta ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te brjod du ma mchis pa'i don la 'phel ba yang ma mchis/ 'grib pa yang ma mchis na ni/ sbyin pa'i
215b8(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'phel ba yang ma mchis 'grib pa yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
216a1(brgyad stong): pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang 'phel ba yang ma mchis 'grib pa yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te pha
216a2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di rnams la 'phel ba ma mchis/ 'grib pa ma mchis te/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug myi 'phel na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par
216a3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla
216a4(brgyad stong): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar myi 'gyur na/ ci ltar byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gas bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te
216a5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la ni/ 'phel ba 'am 'grib pa myed mod kyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes
216a6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa/ thabs mkhas pa ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par 'phel lo// sbyin pa'i pha ro sad tu phyin pa 'di ni yongs su 'grib po snyam du myi sems
216a7(brgyad stong): kyi/ de 'di snyam tu sems te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam mo stsal nas de sbyin pa sbyin par byed na/ yang la byed pa de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag
216a8(brgyad stong): dge ba'i che ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ji lta ba de bzhin du yongs su bsngo'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor/ 
216b1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa/ thabs mkhas pa ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang
216b2(brgyad stong): ni rnam par 'phel lo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yongs su 'grib po snyam du myi sems kyi/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying
216b3(brgyad stong): tsam mo snyam nas/ de tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas shing / yid la byed pa de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
216b4(brgyad stong): chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub ji lta ba de bzhin du yongs su bsngo'o// gzha na yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnas
216b5(brgyad stong): ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa thabs mkhas pa ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par 'phe la lo// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yongs su 'gris
216b6(brgyad stong): bo snyam du myi sems kyi de 'di snyam tu sems te/ 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo snyam nas/ de bzod pa sgrub cing yid la byed pa de dag dang / sems bgyi
216b7(brgyad stong): pa de dag dang / dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mis pa de bzhin du yongasu bsdul// 
216b8(brgyad stong): gzhan yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sdom pa/ thabs la mkhas pa ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus/ 
217a1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par 'phelo// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yongs su 'grib po snyam du myi sems kyi/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
217a2(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo snyam nas/ de brtson 'grus chom zhing yid la byed pa de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
217a3(brgyad stong): chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ji lta ba de bzhin du yongs su bsngo'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
217a4(brgyad stong): phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa/ thabs la mkhas pa ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par 'phel lo// bsam gtan gyi
217a5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yongs su 'grib po snyam du myi sem/ sa kyi/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo snyam nas/ 
217a6(brgyad stong): de bsam gtan la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ yid la byed pa de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
217a7(brgyad stong): mas/ bran byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub jig pa nga mdu bags parjo/ 'du yang sa phyir bya ma mas dpa' phams na
217a8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa thabs mkhas pa ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par 'phel lo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yod
217b1(brgyad stong): su 'grib po snyam du myi sems kyi de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo snyam nas/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ shes rab kyi pha
217b2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la sgom zhing / yid la byed pa de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ bla ma myed pa yang dag
217b3(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ji lta ba de bzhin du yongs su bsngo'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
217b4(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bla na myed pa yang da dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di ni de bzhin te/ rab 'byor de bzhin
217b5(brgyad stong): nyid ni rnam par 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib pa myed do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i yid la byed pa dang ldan pas/ rgyun myi 'chad par mang du gas
217b6(brgyad stong): na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye ba yin no// rab 'byor de ltar brjod du myed pa'i don la 'phel bar yang myi 'gyur/ 'grib par yang myi 'gyur ro// yod la byed pa dang
217b7(brgyad stong): gis yongs su myi 'grib po/ rab 'byor nga de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa la 'phel bar yang myi 'gyur/ 'grib par yang myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad 'phel bar yang myi 'gyur/ 'grib par
217b8(brgyad stong): yang kyi 'gyur ro// garab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la byed pa de sa bu dag gis gnas ma/ zan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nyes ma'o// 
218a1(brgyad stong): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rgyang stong pa las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste/ bco brkyang pa'o// 
218a2(brgyad stong): bam po bcu bdun// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi
218a3(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa dang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on te sems bskyed pa spang masabyang chub
218a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs dpa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ bcom ldan 'das sems bskyed pa snga ma ni sems bskyed pa slad ma dang / 
218a5(brgyad stong): myi 'grogs sems bskyed pa slad la yang sems bskyed pa snga ma da nga myi 'grogs na bcom ldan 'das ci ltar byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i cha ba rnams sdom
218a6(brgyad stong): par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor nga 'di ji snyam du sems 'bru mar gyi mar me 'bar ba'i me lce
218a7(brgyad stong): dang po phog pas snying po de 'tshig gam/ 'on te me lce phyi ma phog pas snying po de 'tshig par 'gyur/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// me lce dang po phog pas
218a8(brgyad stong): snying po de tshig pa ma lags/ me lce dang po byung ba la ma brten par yang snying po de myi tshig/ me lce slang ma phog pas kyang snying po de myi tshig ste/ me lce slad ma phog pa la ma brten par yang snying po de myi
218b1(brgyad stong): tshig go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci snying po de tshig gam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshig lags so// bde bar gshegs pa
218b2(brgyad stong): tshig lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sems bskyed pa dang pos kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par/ 
218b3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang kyi bya sems bskyed pa dang po la ma brten par yang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang kyi rgya'o// sems sred
218b4(brgyad stong): phyi mas kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang kyi rgyu/ sems bskyed pa phyi la la la ba na par yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
218b5(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang yang rgya'o// de skad
218b6(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems dang po bskyed pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
218b7(brgyad stong): bo bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang kyi rgyal/ sems bskyed pa dang po la ma brten par yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
218b8(brgyad stong): bar 'tshang myi rgya/ sems bskyed pa slang mas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mya rgya/ sems bskyed
219a1(brgyad stong): slad ma la ma brten par yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya sems bskyed pa de dag gis kyang ma las/ 
219a2(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa de ma lags pa gzhan yas kyang ma lags par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
219a3(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di ni zab legs so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
219a4(brgyad stong): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems gang lags pa de ya dang 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom
219a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sem sa sems gang ma byung ba de 'gags pa'i chos can yin
219a6(brgyad stong): nam rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'gag pa'i chos can lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor nga 'di ji snyam du sems gang 'gags pa'i
219a7(brgyad stong): chos can de 'gag par 'gyur ram rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du semasasems gang 'byung
219a8(brgyad stong): pa dang / 'gag pa'i chos can de 'gag par 'gyur ram rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lang pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di ji
219b1(brgyad stong): snyam du sems chos gang rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid 'gag pa de bzhin du chos de 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor kyis gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan
219b2(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di ji snyam du sems/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
219b3(brgyad stong): so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin nyid ci lta ba de bzhin du gnas sam rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
219b4(brgyad stong): du gnas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'asu lad pa rab 'byor nga 'di ji snyam du sems ga te de bzhin nyid ci lta ba bzhin du gnas na ni zer zug par myi
219b5(brgyad stong): 'gyur ram rab 'byor kyis gsold pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin
219b6(brgyad stong): nyid zab pa ma/ rab 'byord kyis gsold pa/ zab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin nyid la sems yod dam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa
219b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor da 'di ji snyam du sems sems de bzhin nyid yin nam rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom
219b8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor de 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin nyid las gud na sems yod dam/ rab 'byor da kyis gsold pa/ bcom
220a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lang pa rab 'byor khyod kyis de bzhin nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ rab 'byor da kyis gsolang pa
220a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor pa 'di ji snyam du sems gang de ltar spyod pa zab mo la spyod dam/ rab 'byor da kyis gsold pa
220a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar spyod pa de ji la yang myi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de la rgyu ba myi 'byung ste/ rgyu bar 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'i sa so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
220a4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ci la spyod rab 'byor kyis gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das don dam pa la spyod do// bcom
220a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa rab 'byor nga 'di ji snyam dusems byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga nga don dam pa la spyod pa de mtshan ma la spyod dam/ rab 'byor
220a6(brgyad stong): kyis gsold pabacom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di ji snyam du sems mtshan ma de shi nang tu bsgom 'am/ rab 'byor kyis
220a7(brgyad stong): gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di ji snyam du semasaci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
220a8(brgyad stong): kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod pa/ mtsham ma bshig nas spyod par 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor kyis gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di sar byang
220b1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ci ltar mtshan ma spong ba thob par 'gyur snyam du myi spyod do// gal te 'thob par 'gyur na ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma rdzogs pas na/ nyan
220b2(brgyad stong): thos su 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mtshan ma de'i mtshan nyid gang lags pa'i mtshan ma de yang 'tshal la mtshan ma myed pa la yang yongs su 'dris par bgyid
220b3(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces smras so// 
220b4(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems da dpa' chen po gang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa de nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed
220b5(brgyad stong): pa gsum rmyi lam na sgom na de'i shes rab kyi pharald tu phyind pa rnam par 'phes lam rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ gal te nyin par bsgoms
220b6(brgyad stong): pas rnam par 'phel na ni rmyi lam du myos pa yang rnam par 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha re'i bu rmyi lam dang / nyin par ni/ rnam par myi rtsog
220b7(brgyad stong): bsabacom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nyin
220b8(brgyad stong): cig bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ rmyi lam na yang / 
221a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rgyas par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da bud myed dam/ skyes pa 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang myi
221a2(brgyad stong): lam na las shig byed na/ de la sogs pa 'am nye bar stsogs pa yod dam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ci ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad ni rmyi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungs pa ltar na/ 
221a3(brgyad stong): las de la stsogs pa 'am/ nye bar stsogs pa myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra'i bu de ste/ skyes bu de sad nas rnam par rtog cing / bsad par 'du shes bskyed de/ a la la bsad do// legs par
221a4(brgyad stong): bsad do// shin tu bsad do// ngas bsad do snyam du des de ltar rtog cing bsad par 'du shes bskyed na ni/ tshe dang lnga/ na ba sha ri'i bu las de la stsogs pa 'am nye bar stsogs par 'gyur
221a5(brgyad stong): ro// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dag la te rmyi lam na srog gcod pa byas la/ sad nas kyang a la la bsad do/ legs par bsad do// shin tu bsad do// 
221a6(brgyad stong): dras bsad do snyam du rnam par rtog cing gsod par 'du shes bskyed na/ de bzhin du las de la stsogs pa 'am/ nye bar stsogs par 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ dbyig
221a7(brgyad stong): rkyen kyi ste/ dmyigs pa myed par sems myi skye ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de lta bas na/ las ni dmyigs pa dang bcas par skye'i/ dmyigs pa myed par ma yin no// sems ni dmyigs pa dang bcas par
221a8(brgyad stong): skye'i/ dmyigs pa myed par ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu mthong ba dang thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / rnam par rig pa'i chos rnams la blo 'jug ste/ de la blo la la ni kun nas
221b1(brgyad stong): ra mongs pa yongs su 'dzin/ dz+wa la la nirnam par byang ba yongs su 'dzin te/ lce dang ldan pan ri Ta/ de sa bas na/ sems ni dmyigs pa dang bcas par 'byung gi/ dmyigs pa myed
221b2(brgyad stong): ma yin no// las ni dmyigs pa dang bcas par 'gyuradakyigs bskyes yin no// gama'i bus smras pa/ mdang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di sar dbyigs pa thams cad na
221b3(brgyad stong): ba'o zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga ci'i phyir dmyigs pa dang bcas par skye'o// dmyigs pa myed par myi skye/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshed
221b4(brgyad stong): ldan pa sha ro'i bu/ sems ni dben pa ste/ mtshan ma yang dben pa'o// de bzhin du ma rig pa'i rkyend kyis 'a/ dbyed rnams dang / 'du byed kyi rkye nad kyis rnam par shes pa dang / 
221b5(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin du dmyigs pa de dag thams cad ni dben pa'o// sems pa yang mtshan mas dben pa ste/ 'jig rtend kyi tha snyad la brten nas skye'o// na
221b6(brgyad stong): bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rmyi lam na sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing / sbyin pa de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
221b7(brgyad stong): chub tu yongs su bsdom/ sbyin pa de yongs su bsngos pa zhes bya 'am/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di
221b8(brgyad stong): mngon du 'dug na/ 'do ni bar du ma chod par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan te/ don 'di la lus kyis mngon sum du gyu rang pa yin gyis/ 
222a1(brgyad stong): 'di la dris shig dang / 'dis don 'di'i lan ldon par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 
222a2(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa byams pa/ gnas gtan rab 'byor nga 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di don 'di'i lan ldon no zhes zer na/ tshe dang ldan pa ma pham pa don 'di la
222a3(brgyad stong): la lam lon cigade nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga gang 'di skad zer ba
222a4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di don 'di'i lan ldon no zhes zer na/ tshe dang ldan ba rab 'byor nga 'di mying byams pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de
222a5(brgyad stong): don 'di'i lan ljon tam/ de ste gzugs lan ljon tam tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa lan ljon tam/ de ste kha dog lan ldon
222a6(brgyad stong): tam de ste dbyibs lan ldon tam/ de ste gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de la na ldon tam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa
222a7(brgyad stong): nyi gang yin pa de lan ldon tamatshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lan ldon myi nus so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang
222a8(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lan ldon myi nus so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ngade chos gang lan ldon par byed pa'i chos de yang yang
222b1(brgyad stong): par rjes su myi mthong // chos gang lan glan par bya ba de yang kho bos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // chos gang gis lan glan par bya ba de yang kho bos yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ngo // chos gang bla
222b2(brgyad stong): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de yang kho bos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 
222b3(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa byams pa ci ltar tshig gis ston pa de bzhin tu/ khyod kyis chos 'di dag mngon sum du byas sam/ byams pas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ro'i bu ci ltar tshig gis stond pa de
222b4(brgyad stong): bzhin du kho bos chos 'di dag mngon sum du ma byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ji ltar tshig gis brjod pa 'am/ sems kyis bsam pa'i chos de dag kyang / kho bos myi shes
222b5(brgyad stong): myi dmyigs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // yang sha ri bu ji ltar lus kyis reg tu myi rung ba dang / tshig gis brjod du myi rung ba dang / yid kyis bsam du myi rung ba de bzhi
222b6(brgyad stong): chos thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir rang bzhin myed pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa/ 
222b7(brgyad stong): 'di shes rab zab ste/ ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yun ring por spyad pa ltar stond to snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la bka' stsa lad pa/ sha ri'i bu khyod
222b8(brgyad stong): ci'i phyir 'di snyam du/ e ma byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab zab po snyam du sems sha ro'i bu khyod chos gang dang ldan pas dgra bcom pa zhes rab tu
223a1(brgyad stong): 'byed pa'i chos de yang khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bus gsol dang/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ sha ri'i bu deng
223a2(brgyad stong): bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni 'di snyam du chos 'di bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// chos 'di bla na myed pa yang dag par
223a3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro// chos 'di bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/ chos 'di bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
223a4(brgyad stong): 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ngo ro// snyam du myi sems te/ byung chu dpa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltang spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod do// de spyod pa na myi smag kyi
223a5(brgyad stong): dang shi nang tu dang bar myi 'gyur ro// stobs bskyed pa rnyed pa'i phying / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya bar myi la byung snyam du de ltar nge rnal 'byor du byed de/ gal te re ltar
223a6(brgyad stong): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gzhan yang sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gcan zan gyi dgon pa'i nang du song na/ rmyi swAn/ sgying dang / shin tu dadrung / 
223a7(brgyad stong): bar gyi bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des sems can thams cad kyi don du thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// ngas sems 'di yang bskyed do// la to bdeg gcan can gyis rjes
223a8(brgyad stong): ra rengs la sbyin pa de sbyin par gyur cig/ bdag gi smin pa'i pha ro lang su byi nang pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bdag bla ma byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang nye bar 'gyur
223b1(brgyad stong): gis ji nas bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de dag yod ye myi snang bar
223b2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam mo/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi dgod kyi dgon pa'i nang du song na/ skrag par myi bya/ dngang par myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sos
223b3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la dga' ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus rab tu bor zhing yo byad dang / 'tshog chas yongs su
223b4(brgyad stong): gtang bar bya'o// des sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ gal te bdag gis yo byad dang / 'tshog chas phrogs mede dag la sbyin dpa de sbyin par gyur cig/ gal te 'dag gi srog gcod na ni/ 
223b5(brgyad stong): bdag gis de la khro ba 'am/ zhe sdang bskyed par myi bya ste/ de dag la bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par myi bya'o// de ltar na de'i tshe bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
223b6(brgyad stong): dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ bdag bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ro// ci nas
223b7(brgyad stong): bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / myi dgad kyi dgon pa yong ye gyi snang bar 'byung ba de ltung bya'o// de gang bsgrub po// sri
223b8(brgyad stong): bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der nyes pa de dag dang gzhan dag kyang yong yi myi 'byung zhing gyi sdang ba de ltar/ sangs rgyas kyi
224a1(brgyad stong): gzhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir 'bad do snyam mo// sha ri'i bu brang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po cu'i dgo par gyur pa'i nang du song na/ byi skrag/ mying dang / shin tung nga bar gyi bya sa/ 
224a2(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myi skrag cing shin tu myi dngang ba'i chos can no// des 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sred pa gcad pa'i
224a3(brgyad stong): phyir bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos skrag par myi bya'o// gal te bdag skom pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyu rang na yang / sems can dag la kye ma sems can 'di dag ni bsod
224a4(brgyad stong): rnams chung ba ste 'di ltar 'jig rten 'din chus dgon par bya ra ba'i 'dis bu dag snang ngo zhes snying rje chen po bskyed do// dadag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs/ 
224a5(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing deng chus dkon par 'gyurab yod ye myi sdang 'ang de ltar bya'o// de ltar bdag gis te sgrub bo/ ci nas sems can de dag thams cad yan lag brgyad/ 
224a6(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa'i chus rnyed par 'gyur ba de ltar bsod nams la gzud par bya'o// ci nas de'i tshe bdag gis bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de ltar sems can thams cad kyi phyir brtson 'grus brtan
224a7(brgyad stong): pang brtsam mo snyam mo// gzhan yang ka ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla che ba'i dgon pa'i nang du songan/ kyi skrag kyi dang / shin tu dang bar gyi bya ste/ rang 'di ltar gos
224a8(brgyad stong): bar bya'o// sa cin pa 'das tha byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngo bar rdzogs pang sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi'i nga zu ba'i dgon pa 'dis bung sa mongs kyi 'byung zhing gyi snang ba dang / 
224b1(brgyad stong): sems can de dag thams cad skyid par 'gyur ba dang / bde ba dang ldan pa dang / bde ba thams cad dang phrad par 'gyur ba de ltar brtson 'grus pa han brtsam mo// de ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
224b2(brgyad stong): sbyang ngo // ci nas sems can de dag gi bsam pa gang dang gang yin pa dang / ci dang ci 'dod pa yid kyis bsams te/ de dang nge 'grub par 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/ dper na sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis
224b3(brgyad stong): bsams pa tsam gyis thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin bya'o// ci nas sems can de dag gi chos kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams
224b4(brgyad stong): cad dus thams cad du rnam pa thams cad ma tshang bar myi 'gyur ba de ltar brtson 'grus brtan pa brtsam mo snyam mo// gzhan yang sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nad kyi
224b5(brgyad stong): dkon par gyur pa'i nang du song na myi skrag myi dngang / shin tu da rang bar myi bya ste/ des 'di ltar nye bar brtag par bya/ bsam par bya/ gzhal bar bya ste/ 'di la chos gang yang ma
224b6(brgyad stong): bar byed pa yang myed/ chos gang yang na par 'gyur ba myed do zhes de ltar stong pa nyid du btag par bya ste/ kyi skrag myi dang / shin tu dngang bar gyi bya'o// kA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
224b7(brgyad stong): chen pos sems 'di ltar bskyed par myi bya ste/ yun ring mo zhig na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// zhes myi skrag myi dngang / shin tu dngang bar myi bya'o// 
224b8(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems kyi gcig pa gang yin pa de tsam zhes bya ba 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' ste/ 'di ltar mtha' myed pa'o// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'di ltar dka' ba'i// 
225a1(brgyad stong): A 'du shes bskyed par myi bya ste/ sngon gyi mtha' ni rgyangs bcad do// sngon gyi mtha' ni ring ngo // sngon gyi mtha' ni sems kyi skad gcig dang ldan pa ste/ 'di ltar mtha' myed pa'o snyam mo// sha ri'i
225a2(brgyad stong): ka bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yun ring mo zhig gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes skrag par myi bya/ dngang bar myi bya/ 
225a3(brgyad stong): shi nad tu dngang bar myi bya'o// shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'jigs pa myi bzad pa 'di dag dang / gzhan dag mthong zhing thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / rnam par rig
225a4(brgyad stong): dag la myi skrag myi dngang / shi nang du dngang bar myi 'gyur na/ ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bla na myed pa yang dag dpar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal
225a5(brgyad stong): ba yod par rig par bya'o// sha ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha bgos te/ ji nas bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
225a6(brgyad stong): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can thams cad kyi nang rnams yod ye myi 'byung ba dang / myi sdang bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o// ci nas sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pas/ 
225a7(brgyad stong): gsungs pa smra bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o// de nas 'khor der gang ga'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i bud myed cig 'dug par gyur te/ 'dug pa de stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus
225a8(brgyad stong): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thal mo snang ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gnas
225b1(brgyad stong): 'di la myi skrag myi dngang / dngang bar myi bgyid de/ ma skrag ma dngang bar sems can thams cad la chos bstan par bgyi'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa gser gyi kha tog lta bu
225b2(brgyad stong): mdzad de/ 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu myed pa khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
225b3(brgyad stong): bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu myi snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu/ bud myed des me tog dag blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
225b4(brgyad stong): la mngon par gtor ro// de nas me tog de dag chags pa myed par bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'dug par gyur da to de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos
225b5(brgyad stong): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha pas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la badz+ra logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
225b6(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa myi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das
225b7(brgyad stong): 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo
225b8(brgyad stong): sring mo gang ga'i lha mo 'di gser gyi me tog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ skal pa skar ma lta bu la bla na
226a1(brgyad stong): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gang ga'i lha mo 'di ni bud myed kyi lus bsgyur te/ skyes pa'i lus thob nas/ 
226a2(brgyad stong): 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ myi bskyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi kham su skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang
226a3(brgyad stong): myi bskyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drung du tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro// de nas shi 'phos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag dang ma bral bar
226a4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas kyang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang ma bral ba'i sang ras rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ de dang de dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 
226a5(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po khang bzangs nas khang bzangs su 'gro zhing / de nam 'tsho'i bar du rkang pa'i 'thil gyis sa la myi reg par 'gro ste/ 
226a6(brgyad stong): 'chi ka'i bar du rkang pa'i 'jil sa la ma reg par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de bzhin du/ kun dga' bo sring mo gang ga'i lha mo 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ de yang sangs
226a7(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang myi 'bral zhing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sos
226a8(brgyad stong): te myi bskyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drung na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khod pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus par rig par bya/ 
226b1(brgyad stong): snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo de de bzhin
226b2(brgyad stong): te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dam las rgal ba yin te/ myi bskyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ 
226b3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ byang chub yongasasu 'grub pa la nye bar 'gro bar rig par bya'o// yang kun dga' bo gser gyi me tog de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
226b4(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni tsha yod par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' po nyan thos kyang de snyed cig yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ 
226b5(brgyad stong): gzhan du na grangs myed pa zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'o// kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gcan zan gyi dgon pa myi 'byung / myi rgod kyi dgon pa myi 'byung / 
226b6(brgyad stong): nad kyi dgon pa myi 'byung / chu'i dgon pa myi 'byung / mu ge'i dgon pa myi 'byung ste/ kun dga' bo ma legs par gyur pa de lta bu dang / gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yong ye myi 'byung zhing rmyi
226b7(brgyad stong): snang bar 'gyur ro// yang kun dga' bo gser gyi me tog de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na myed pa yang dag par
226b8(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ 'jigs shing skrag pa'i dgon pa 'di lta bu dag de'i tshe yong ye myi 'byung myi snang bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
227a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sring mo gang ga'i lha mo 'dis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang la dang po bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
227a2(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo
227a3(brgyad stong): sring mo gang ga'i lha mo 'dis ni mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drung du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po ses bskyed pa'i dge ba'i cha
227a4(brgyad stong): baspunang to// bcom ldan lA mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra brtsapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/ gser gyi me tog
227a5(brgyad stong): kis gtor te/ ngas mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ gang gi tshe ud pa la lngas gtor pa de na ngas myi skye ba'i chos la
227a6(brgyad stong): bzod pa thob po// de nas mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis pal bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin
227a7(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten rig pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na myed pa lha dang myi nas
227a8(brgyad stong): kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes/ lung bstanang te/ de'i tshe na sring mo gang ga'i lha mo 'dis nga lung bstan pa zos nas/ kye ma bdag kyang bram ze'i khye'u 'di ci ltar bla na myed pa
227b1(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand pa de bzhin du bdag kyang lung bstan kyang ci ma rung snyam sems bskyed do// kun dga' bo de ltar sring mo 'dis mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
227b2(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drung du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun to// de skad ces bka' stsa lad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la
227b3(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das e ma gang ga'i lha mo 'di ni yongs su sbyang ba bgyis shing mthar phyi nad pa lags te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
227b4(brgyad stong): byang chub tu lung bstand pa'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / dribacom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'dis/ da ces bka' stsa lang ngo to// kun dga' bo sring mo gang ga'i lha
227b5(brgyad stong): mo 'di ni khyod zer ba bzhin du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ 'i byang chub tu yongs su sbyang ba byas shing mthar phyi nad pa yi na no// 
227b6(brgyad stong): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyang stong pa las/ gang ga ma lha mo'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcungs pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyi
227b7(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pas/ ci ltar stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par bgyi/ ci ltar stong
227b8(brgyad stong): pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas
228a1(brgyad stong): gzugs stong par brtag par bya ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang stong par brtag par bya'o// ci ltar brtags pas gzugs so zhes chos nyid de
228a2(brgyad stong): yang chos nyid du yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba de de ltar mye g.yeng ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis brtag par bya ste/ chos nyid de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du myi byed
228a3(brgyad stong): do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
228a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid mngon sum du myi bya'o zhes gsu dngas na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas ma/ 
228a5(brgyad stong): ltar stong pa nyid mngon sum du myi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di ltar bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams
228a6(brgyad stong): cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa stong pa nyid la rtog mod kyi/ mngon sum bya'o snyam du myi rtog// mngon sum du bya'o snyam du myi rtog gi/ yongs su 'dris par bya'o snyam du rtog go/ mngon sum du bya ba'i dus ma yin/ 
228a7(brgyad stong): no snyam du rtog go// yongs su 'dris par bya ba'i dus ni 'di yin no snyam du rtog gi mngon du bya ba'i dus ni ma yin no snyam du rtog cing / dmyigs pa la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems nye bar 'dogs ste/ 
228a8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bdag gis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro zhes skabs der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las nyams par myi 'gyur zhing / zag pa zang
228b1(brgyad stong): par yang myi byed de 'di la yang yongs su 'dris par byed do// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs
228b2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen pos mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bya ste/ mtshan ma myed pa mngon sum du yang myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i tsha ba bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
228b3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po ni/ 'di yongasu sbyin par bya ba'i dus kyi/ mngon sum du bya ba'i dus ma yin no snyam ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod yongs su zin la/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du myi byed do// 
228b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig rab tu dpa' zhing shin tu tshal che la/ brtan zhing myi 'gyur/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la/ blta na sdug pa yon tan mang zhing / yon tan mchog dang ldan pa
228b5(brgyad stong): tshul khrims mchog dang ldan pa yid gzhungs pa/ sma nus pa/ lan ldon nus pa/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa/ nan ta/ na phun sum tshogs pa/ yul shes pa/ dus shes pa/ gnas
228b6(brgyad stong): shes pa 'phong sbyin pa'i mthar phyin pa mtshon cha dang go cha sra ba sgyu tshal thams cad la rab tu mkhas pa/ shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa/ bzo'i gnas thams cad kyi shin tu mthar phyin pa
228b7(brgyad stong): dran pa dang ldan pa blo dang ldan pa rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ mos pa dang ldan pa/ tshul dang ldan pa/ gtsug lag thams cad la 'jigs pa myed pa/ mdza' bo dang ldan pa/ nor dang ldan pa/ dpung dang ldan
228b8(brgyad stong): ba yan lag ma tshang ba myed pa dbang po yongs su chang ba/ yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa/ skye bo mang po la yang phangs shing yid du 'ong ba zhig yod la/ de dgos pa ce
229a1(brgyad stong): ci tsam pa de dang de dag thams cad las sgrol nus zhi rigs pas spyong la de thams cad dus nyid mtshan/ de rnyed pa chen po dang ldan 'as/ skye bo mang po la 'ged par byed/ bkrung sa bya
229a2(brgyad stong): la bkur sting byed/ bla mar bya ba la tha mar byed/ ri mor bya ba la ri lor byed/ mchod par bya ba la mchod par byed na/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ skyes bu de de'i gzhi las dga' ba dang / gus pa dang / 
229a3(brgyad stong): rangs pa dang / yid bde ba cher skye 'am/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor skyes bu de phun
229a4(brgyad stong): sum tshogs pa chen po dang ldan nas/ pha ma dang / bu dang bu mo nam des khrid de/ don dang 'du 'phrod dag cig dang mjal nasapa 'dra ka dgon pa chen po byis pa rnams la bsdigs mor rung ba/ spu zing
229a5(brgyad stong): zhes byed par zhugs par gyur la de der phyin pa dang / pha ma dang bu dang bu mo de dag las/ kho bos khyod dgon pa chen po myi bzad pa 'di nas nye zho myed par myur du bsgral te/ myur du
229a6(brgyad stong): thar bar byasam 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig ces myi 'jigs pa bstabs na/ rab 'byor 'brog dgon pa de na/ skyes bu de la dgra mang po dang / dkol ba mang po zhig byung na/ de la rab 'byor de ji snyam du
229a7(brgyad stong): sems dgra phyir dgol ba de dag nye bar gnas pas/ skyes bu dpa'o phyir myi ldog pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa/ shin tu mdza' ba/ chu gang yod cing brtan pa/ tshogs pa chen po dang ldan pa de/ pha ma dang / 
229a8(brgyad stong): bu dang / chung ma de dag bor te/ 'brog dkon pa 'jigs pa chen po kyi bzad pa de las bdag gcig pu byung ste 'gro bar sems sam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// 
229b1(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar skyes bu de'i pha ma dang bu dang chung ma yongs su myi 'dor te/ de'i slad nang gi tshogs kyi dpung dang yang ldan la/ 'bros dgon pa de na/ dgra phyir dkol ba/ gzhan de bas ches mang ba/ ches dang
229b2(brgyad stong): ba/ go mtshon sra ba/ ches rlabs che ba dag mchis pa bsrung bas na/ de'i slad du/ de dgra phyir rgol ba/ klan ka tshol ba/ glags lta ba dag gis glags myi rnyed de/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ skyes bu
229b3(brgyad stong): mthu dang ldan pa de ma smas ma snad par/ pha ma dang / bu dang chung ma dang / bdag nyid kyang 'brog dgon pa 'jigs pa chen po myi bzad pa nas 'byung nus te/ bde bar grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal du nye bar 'gyur
229b4(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang lnga na ba rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dman
229b5(brgyad stong): pa la snying brtse ba/ byams pa la gnas pa/ snying rje la ga nas pa dga' ba la gnas pa btang snyoms la gnasapa/ thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
229b6(brgyad stong): yongs su bzung ba yang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yongs su bsngo ba yongs su bsngos nas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
229b7(brgyad stong): la 'jug cing 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / thabs mal
229b8(brgyad stong): pa yongs su 'dzin pa/ stobs dang ldan pa'i mchog/ brtan pa'i mchog yin te/ de'i phyir des sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang bas/ de'i phyir bde zhing dge bar/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
230a1(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nus so// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis dmyigs par byed cing / 
230a2(brgyad stong): dbyigs par byas nas byams pa'i mchog de nye bar 'dogs pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i phyogs dang / bdud kyi phyogs las shin tu 'das/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis
230a3(brgyad stong): las 'das te ting nge 'dzinang de la gnas so// rab 'byor nga de zag pa zang pa ma thob kyang / pha rol tu phyind pa'i mchog stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed do// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
230a4(brgyad stong): rapa' chen po rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind la myi gnas te/ nges
230a5(brgyad stong): mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind mngon sum du byas pa ma yin no// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na bya 'dab ma can nam mkha' bar snang la rgyu yang sa la myi ltung zhing / gnas ci la yang myi rten par 'du/ 
230a6(brgyad stong): ste/ nam mkha' bar snang la gnas kyang de la myi rten myi gnas pa de bzhin du/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pas gnas shing stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed do// 
230a7(brgyad stong): mtshan ma myed pa la gnas pas gnas shing mtshan ma myed pa la yongs su 'dris par byed do// smond pa myed pa la gnas pas gnas shing smon pa myed pa la yongs su 'dris par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su
230a8(brgyad stong): ma rdzogs par/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed par myi ltung ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phong gi slob dpon stobs dang ldan pa mda' tshod la bslabs pa mthar shin tu phyin pa des/ 
230b1(brgyad stong): mda' steng du 'phangs te/ 'phangs nas de mnga' gzhan dag gis slar bzlog nas/ mnga' de sa la myi ltung bar 'dzin te/ mda' snga ma de la mda' phyi ma rgyud du 'phangs pas sa la ltung du myi ster te/ kye ma mda' de sa
230b2(brgyad stong): la lhung yang bla snyam du 'dod pa ma byung ba de srid du/ sa la myi ltung ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs la mkhas pas yong su bzung
230b3(brgyad stong): ba yang / ci tsam du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i che ba de dag yongs su smyin par ma gyur kyi bar du/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dam pa de mngon sum du myi byed do// nam bla na myed pa yang dag par
230b4(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag shin tu yongs su smyin pa dar gyurd pa de'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dam pa mngon du byed do// rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
