260b7(brgyad stong): na mongs kyi 'dzin/ yang dag pas med pa'i sa yangs kyu 'dzin/ sa dang gangs par 'jug pa'i nga rgyas kyi myur/ kyang chub sa sa dpa mas
260b8(brgyad stong): babs mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas pa tshe thim pa'i mang tu skye bar gyi 'gyur ba'i babs mkhas pa de la yong do// rab 'byorang babs mkhas pa de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi la ro lang tu byin pa'ang/ 
261a1(brgyad stong): nyid la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas/ bsam gtan la yang snyoms par 'jug pa la bsam gtan gyi dbang gis kyang skye bar myi 'gyur ba de lta
261a2(brgyad stong): bur thabs mkhas pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ stobs yongs su dag par 'gyur/ myi 'jigs pa yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sangs
261a3(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor kyis gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
261a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po chos gang gis stobs yongs su dag par 'gyur/ myi 'jigs pa yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yo/ dngas su dag par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
261a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lang to// rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
261a6(brgyad stong): gyis yongs su dag pa yin te/ de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob pa dag myi zhum myi 'gong na/ rab 'byor da de ni/ 
261a7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// rab 'byor dbyis pa so so'i skye bo dag chos 'di dag de ltar ma shes ma mthong bas/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid myi shes myi mthong ste/ rab 'byor nga sems can de dag gi phyir/ 
261a8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bad cing brtson 'grus chom ste/ bdag cag shes pas sems can rnams shes par bya'o// bdag cag mthong bas sems can rnams bstan par bya'o// zhes bslab
261b1(brgyad stong): pa 'di la slob po/ bslab pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na stobs rnams rjes su thob par 'gyur/ myi 'jigs pa rnams rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga byang
261b2(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol dag gi sems kyi spyod pa dag/ g.yos pa rnams kyi pha rol tu 'gro'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ 
261b3(brgyad stong): sa chen po'i phyogs gang na rdo ba myed pa dang / gser dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dag 'byung ba de lta bu ni nyung gi/ sa chen po sa phyogs gang na/ ba tsa can grams dang cha dang / sdong dum dang / tsher ma
261b4(brgyad stong): sna tshogs kyis gang ba de lta bu ni shin tu mang ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du sems can gyi ris na/ gang dag 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i bslab pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i bslab pa
261b5(brgyad stong): la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyung ngo // sems can// gyi ris na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob pa'i sems can de dag ni shi nad tu mang ngo // rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ 
261b6(brgyad stong): dpeb sems can gyi ris na 'khor los skur ba'i rnal ze srid 'thob par 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung gi sems can gyi ris na la
261b7(brgyad stong): gyi rgyal po'i srid 'thob par 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa'i sems can de dag ni shin tu mang ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du sems can gyi ris na// ra lang du phyind pa / thams cad rjes su song bar
261b8(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyind pa'i nang du 'dus par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da 'od lnga ste dper na/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i nang du sa ba drug bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems das
262a1(brgyad stong): de ni shis tu'o/ na tho da de A sa nga/ lus rje sa pa/

265b6(brgyad stong): rjes su yi rang bar bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ci tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsolang pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad
265b7(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsald to// ke'u shi ka ri rab ri'i rgyal po srang grangasu gcal ba'i tshad ni bzung bar nus kyi/ ke'u shi ka rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams de'i tshad ni bzung bar myi nus so// ke'u shi ka yA/ 
265b8(brgyad stong): gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rtend kyi khams srang grangasu gcal ba'i tshad ni bzung bar nus kyi/ ke'u shi ka rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshad ni bzung bar myi nus so// ke'u shi ka stong spyi phung
266a1(brgyad stong): kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams srang grangs su gcal ba'i tshad ni gzung bar nus kyi/ ke'u shi ka rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshad ni gzung ba myi nus so// ke'u shi ka spyod
266a2(brgyad stong): gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rtend kyi 'ams srang grangs su gcal ba'i ched de bzung bar nus kyi/ ke'u zhig rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshang ni gzung bar mes so// ke sa
266a3(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte nad kyi khams srang grangs su gcal ba'i tshad ni bzung bar nus kyi/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag gi/ 
266a4(brgyad stong): bsod nams kyi tshad ni gzung bar myi nus so// de skad ces bkastsa lad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang
266a5(brgyad stong): dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sem sa dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag parardzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar/ 
266a6(brgyad stong): rjes su yi rang ba tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i sems de lta bu la bsod nams ma lags par myi nyan ma 'tshal/ rjes su yi rang bar myi sems pa de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs par rig par bgyi'o// 
266a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das sems can gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa 'di la rjes su yi rang bar myi bgyid pa de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs su gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das
266a8(brgyad stong): sems can gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa 'di la rjes su yi rang bar myi bgyid pa de dag ni bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
266b1(brgyad stong): 'das sems bskyed pa mngon par bsgrubs pa 'di dag ni bdud kyi gnas 'jig par bgyid pa lags so// gang gis 'di dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'am/ rjes su
266b2(brgyad stong): yi rang ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sos/ 
266b3(brgyad stong): bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs su ma btang ba dang / 
266b4(brgyad stong): dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs dkyi bu mo de dag gis sems bskyed pa 'di la rjes su yi rang bar ba/ gyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ 
266b5(brgyad stong): kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsa lang to// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs
266b6(brgyad stong): su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba de dag gis sems bskyed pa 'di la rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub
266b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa'i theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa gang dag gis sems bskyed pa 'di la rjes su yi rang bar byas nas/ de dag myur du de ba'i
266b8(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyas par byed par 'gyur te/ des rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i mamos 'byud pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis gang dang gang du lus par sa
268a1(brgyad stong): pa de dang der bkur stir byas par 'gyur/ gtso bor byas par 'gyur mor mor byas pa dang / mchod pa dang / brjed pa dang / phu rung du byas par 'gyur te/ de dag yid du myi 'ong ba'i gzugs mthong bar
268a2(brgyad stong): myi 'gyur/ de dag yid du myi 'ong ba'i sla thos par myi 'gyur te/ de bzhin du dri yang ma yin/ ro yang ma yin/ de dag yid du myi 'ong ba'i reg bya la reg par myi 'gyur ro// de dag ngan song du myi skye bar rig par
268a3(brgyad stong): bya/ de dag mtho ris su skye bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can de dag gis sems can grangs myed pa'i dge ba'i cha ba sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba la rjes su yi rang ba'i phyir
268a4(brgyad stong): phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das gang gis mos pa bskyed deg/ pabag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi sems bskyed da pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyis pa de dag gis sems bskyed
268a5(brgyad stong): bya de dag kyang rnam par 'phel bas/ tha na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyid par 'gyur ro// rdo ka bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
268a6(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bgyid par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ ke'u ni ka re
268a7(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus khyod kyis tshig ci skad smras pa de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi sems
268a8(brgyad stong): bskyed pa de dag la rjes su ying rang bar byas pa ke'u shi ka rnam grangs 'dis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yid
268b1(brgyad stong): rang bar byas nas/ sems can grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems sgyu ma lta bus ji ltar bla na myed pa yang / 
268b2(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga 'di ni snyam du sems/ sems sgyu ma lta bur yang dag par rjes su mthong
268b3(brgyad stong): ngam/ rab 'byor kyis gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lang ba/ rab 'byor nga 'di ci snyam du sems/ khyod kyis spru la yang dag par rjes su
268b4(brgyad stong): ma mthong ngam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom la ngan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag das sgyu ma dang sems sgyu ma lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong // 
268b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang sgyu ma yang ma yin sems sgyu ma lta bu yang ma yin la/ sgyu ma 'am sems sgyu ma lta bu las
268b6(brgyad stong): gung na chos gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam rab 'byor kyis gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// 
268b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sgyu ma 'am/ sems sgyu ma lta bu las gud na 'ang chos gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong // 
268b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos gzhan yang dag par rjes su la mthong na/ mchis pa'o zhe 'am ma mchis pa'o zhes chos gang zhig brjod par bgyi/ chos ni shi nang tu dben pa lags te/ de mchis pa'o zhel
269a1(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa'o zhes brjod du ma mchis pa'o// chos gang ni nang tu dben pa de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// de ci'i slang du
269a2(brgyad stong): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos ma mchis pa ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
269a3(brgyad stong): nang tu dben pa lags te/ chos gang shi nang tu dben pa'i chos de ni bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags te/ de chos ga yang thob par bgyi ba 'am/ spong bar bgyid pa ma lags so// bcom ldan
269a4(brgyad stong): 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa shi nad tu dben pa de la brten nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ na po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
269a5(brgyad stong): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bla na myed pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shi nang tu dben pa lags te/ com ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang shinas
269a6(brgyad stong): tu dben pa lags la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kya 'i nang tu dben pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar dben pas dben pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
269a7(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsolang pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces bka' stsalang to// rab 'byor da legs so legs so// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 
269a8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shi nang tu dben pa'o// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shi nang tu dben pa yin te/ rab 'byor nga 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shi nad tu
269b1(brgyad stong): tu dben pas/ de'i phyir bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub shi nang tu dben par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor nga gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
269b2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa shi nad tu dben pa yang dag par myi shes na/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
269b3(brgyad stong): phyi nad pa la brten nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ rab 'byor da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ma brtenang par bla na myed pa yang dag par
269b4(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// dben pas dben pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi rgyal mod/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag
269b5(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang myi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ma brte dang par yang mngon pardzogs par 'tshang myi rgya'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ 
269b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon zab mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byo nga de de bzhin no// de de bzhin tu/ byang chub sems dpa' mas
269b7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po ni don pab mo la spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang don zab mo la yang spyod/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar don de mngon sum du myi byed
269b8(brgyad stong): pa ni dka' ba byed pa yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal pa ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
270a1(brgyad stong): chen po dka' ba bgyid pa cang ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gang mngon sum du bgyid pa de nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang mngon sum du bgyid pa'i chos de yang myi dmyigs pa'i
270a2(brgyad stong): srad du'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te'adi skad du bshang ba la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kyi zhum myi 'god myi smag kyi rangang / dngang bar gyi 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
270a3(brgyad stong): ro// gal te spyod do snyam du yang dag par rjes su myi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// / gal te bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyu ra to snyam du de lta
270a4(brgyad stong): yang dag par rjes su myi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byind pa la spyod do// bdag gis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis rgyang ring du bsrings so snyam du gyi sems na/ shes ra
270a5(brgyad stong): kyis chol tu phyind pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das la de la ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'di snyam du bdag kha ngan nyam/ 'tshag dang ni kyang ring ngo sum du gyi sems so// 
270a6(brgyad stong): dartsi'i slangad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i srang du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
270a7(brgyad stong): pa la spong pa yang bdag ni/ tham byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur te/ nyan thos kyis dang rang sangs rgyas kyis ni bdag dang rlu ring ngo snyam du bya sems so// datsa'i skang
270a8(brgyad stong): na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la nas par rtog pa ma la rnaMs pa'i phung du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di sa ste dperan/ sgyu ma'i skyes ni hrI / sgyu ma byed pa ni bdag dkyi'i
270a9(brgyad stong): skye ba'i tshogs gzhan 'dus pa 'di dag ni bdag dang rgyang ring po snyam du myi sems de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'i skyes bu la rnam par rton pa ma mchis pa'i sla
270b1(brgyad stong): ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dag ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur te/ nyan thos/ 
270b2(brgyad stong): kyis dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bdag dang rgyang ring ngo snyam du myi sems so// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom lnga/ 
270b3(brgyad stong): 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs brnyan ni 'di snyam du dmyigs pa gang gis gzugs brnyan 'byung ba ni bdag dang nye ba yin gyi/ gang dag me long ngam snod chus bkang ba de'i drung du nye bar 'ongs pa de dag ni/ 
270b4(brgyad stong): bdag dang rgyang ring ngo snyam du myi sems so// de ci'i slad du na/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
270b5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni/ tha ma byed pa yang dang par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur te/ nyan thos dang / 
270b6(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bdag dang rgyang ring ngo snyam du myi sems so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan
270b7(brgyad stong): 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni su la yang sdug pa 'am myi sdug pa myi mnga'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'i
270b8(brgyad stong): zang du'o/ ma ldan 'das bzhin du byang chub sam so pa'i sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi sa rol du du phyimed pa la spyod pa yang su la yang sdug pa 'am kyi sug pa ma mchis so// ci'i slad du ses/ 
271a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yang rtog pa thams
271a2(brgyad stong): cad spangs pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa gang mngon par sprul pa 'di snyam du
271a3(brgyad stong): bdag ni bla na myong ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur te/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis ni bdag dang rgyang ring ngo snyam du myi sems so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
271a4(brgyad stong): 'das spru lang pa la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du s+t+waM/ bcom ldan 'das rade bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa yang
271a5(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du bdag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba dang nye bar 'gyur te/ nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyis ni bdag dang chung ring ngo snyam du myi sems so// de ci'i
271a6(brgyad stong): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ sprulang pa de bgyi ba gang gi slad du/ shes rab
271a7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom par bkye bar yang bgyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de yang rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rto// 
271a8(brgyad stong): bam mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dis sa dper nga/ shing ma nyam mkhas pa 'am/ shing mkhan gyi slob mas shing lus bgyis pa'i skyes pa 'dra/ byung byed kyi 'phrul 'khor srung ba 'as
271b1(brgyad stong): rib gyi ba kang gi don du bgyis pa de bgyid kyang / gang ga tshogs de ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis so// de ci'i slang du 'on/ shing gatshogs de la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du sa
271b2(brgyad stong): ma ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon mo yang bgyi ba gang gdon du zhes rab kyi sa rol tu phyind pa la bsgom par bgyi ba de yang bgyi sa shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind par
271b3(brgyad stong): yang rnam par rtog pa ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// 
271b4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa brgyad stong pa las/ sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya ba'i le'u stes bya ste nyi shu cha drug pa'o// 
271b5(brgyad stong): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab
271b6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod za na snying po la spyod do// de skad ces sbas pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa ga ro sa
271b7(brgyad stong): kye sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ni snying po ma yin pa la spyong pa'o// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag mang po rnams 'di sam
271b8(brgyad stong): du sems te/ gang dag bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / gang dag zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'ab mo 'di la spyod cing
272a1(brgyad stong): de sa spyod kyang 'dilta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du myi byed pa'i sems can de dag ni phyag bya ba yin no// gag chos nas/ 
272a2(brgyad stong): chos nyid la spyod kyang / chos nyid mngon du mi byed na/ rnam grangs 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dpa' ba byed pa yin par rig par bya'o snyam mo// gderas kyi
272a3(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag mang po de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes na/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dag la smras pa
272a4(brgyad stong): lha'i bu dag gang dag yang dag pa'i mtha' de mngon sum du myi byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag da ni dka' ba spyod pa ma yin gyi/ lha'i bu rnams gang sems
272a5(brgyad stong): can tshad myed grangs myed pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'dal bar bya'o snyam du go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin/ mchog tu
272a6(brgyad stong): dka' ba byed pa yin te/ sems can rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can de dag kyang shi nad tu yang dag par myed na/ yang dag par myed pas dmyigs su myed do// de ltar gdul bar bya ba rnams shi nang tu
272a7(brgyad stong): yang dag par myed de dmyigs su myed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can dag gdul bar bya'o snyam nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag
272a8(brgyad stong): par zhugs pa'o// lha'i bu dag gang sems can rnams gdul bar bya'o snyam du sems pa de ni/ nam mkha' gdul bar bya'o snyam du sems so// lha'i bu dag de ci'i phyir zhen/ nam mkha' dben
272b1(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir mams cad dben pa badzin par bya'o// lha'i bu das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can nams yang dag par byed cing dbyigs su myed pa rnams kyi kyang/ gos bags na
272b2(brgyad stong): rnam grangs 'dis dka' ba byed pa yin no// lha'i bu dag gang sems can rnams kyi phyir/ go cha bgos par bya'o// snyam du sems pa ni nam mkha' dang 'chod par bya'o snyam du sems pa'o// byang chub so/ 
272b3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can rnams kyi phyir go cha bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang shi nad tu dmyigs su myed par dben pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
272b4(brgyad stong): kyis gsungs te/ de yang sems can dben pa'i phyir de lta bu rig par bya'o// de ltar gdul bar bya ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dben par rig par bya'o/ 
272b5(brgyad stong): gal te 'di ltar bshad pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / chen po zhum par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa yin pa
272b6(brgyad stong): rig par byara'o// datshe phyi med/ sems can dben pa'i phyir gzugs dben par rig par bya'o// de bzhin du sems can dben pa'i bye mtshang ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa shes pa sa
272b7(brgyad stong): par rig par bya'o// de ltar sems can dben pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi bar du dben par rig par bya'o// lha'i bu dag de ltar na chos thams cad kyi bar du dben par rig par bya'o// lha'i bu dag de ltar na
272b8(brgyad stong): chos thams cad dben pa nyid du blta'o// lha'i bu dag gal te de ltar chos thams cad dben pa nyid du bshad pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhum par myi byed na/ 'di ltar zhum par myi byed pa'i phyir
273a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor da ci'i phyir chos thams
273a2(brgyad stong): cad dben pa nyid du bshad pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhum par myi byed/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dben pa'i slad du zhum par myi bgyid do// bcom
273a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dben pa nyid du bshad pa la/ zhum par myi bgyid de/ de bcom ldan 'das chos gang la yang zhum par 'gyur ba ma mchis so// 
273a4(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhum par 'gyur/ deba'i chos de dag ni gang yang dmyigs su ma mchis so// bco/ dam ldan 'das chos thams cad chos gang yang zhum par 'gyural
273a5(brgyad stong): chos de yang dmyigs su ma mchis so// gal te de skad du brjo da pa dang / bshad pa dang / bstand pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhum par myi 'gyur/ yi myi gsod yi gso
273a6(brgyad stong): par gyi 'gyur/ kun du zhum par myi 'gyur/ yang dag par bum par myi 'gyur/ yid phyir phyogs par gyi 'gyur/ myi phrag gyi dang / dang bar gyi 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyind pa la spyod pa'o// 
273a7(brgyad stong): de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la dbang por banas pa'i lha rnams dang / mangs par mas pa dang / bre dbu'i bdan par bcas pa dang / bang ldan dang mas pa rnams rgyam sa nam can
273a8(brgyad stong): mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor na tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / nad byed 'ad dang / 'od gsas dang / 
273b1(brgyad stong): chung dang tshad khyed dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin byed dang / bsod nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes myed pa'i sems can rnams dang / myi che ba dang / myi gdung ba dang / 
273b2(brgyad stong): nom snang ba dang / shi nang tu mthong ba dang / 'og myin gyi lha ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// 
273b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byer nga 'jig rtend kyi khams grangs byed chad myed pa dgan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dang da lar 'thugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas
273b4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sangs rgyas kyi spyas gyis gzigs te/ rab 'byor de dgu gis byang chub sems das
273b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spro/ med pa de la phan 'dogs shing dgongs par mdzad do// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
273b6(brgyad stong): ngag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas rnams phan 'dogs shing dgongs pa mdzad de/ 
273b7(brgyad stong): 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir gyi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// de dag la bdud ngam gzhan dag gis par chang byed
273b8(brgyad stong): par gyi 'gyung ngo // dacar phyir shes/ rab 'byor song gsum gyimi pachen po'i 'des ted kyi 'ams namams can ma srid yod pa de dag thams cad bdang sdig can du gyu la/ drang de sa ris ca
274a1(brgyad stong): de snyed kyi bdud kyi sde mngon par sprul kyang rab 'byor nga bdud sdig can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyis dgongs shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa
274a2(brgyad stong): spyod pa de la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bar chad bya bar myi nus so// rab 'byor nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte nad kyi khams kyi sems can thams cad bdud sdig can du
274a3(brgyad stong): gyu rad pa lta zhog gi/ rab 'byor 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig can du gyur la bdud sdig can de dag thams cad kyi bdud kyi sde de snyed
274a4(brgyad stong): mngon par sprul kyang / rab 'byor nga bdud sdig can de dag gi/ des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas kyis dgongs shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
274a5(brgyad stong): ba de la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bar chad bya bar myi nus so/ 6/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis dang ldan na bdud sdig can rnas
274a6(brgyad stong): sam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thub par dka' ba yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste des sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang ba yin/ des chos thams cad stong par brtags pa yin te/ 
274a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor chos de gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud dag can rnams sam/ bdud kyiris kyi lha rnams kyis thub par dga' ba yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems das
274a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis po gzhan dang ldan na/ bdud sdig can rnams sam gdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis grub par dkal ba yon te/ gnyis gang zhen/ 'dis ste ji skad du smras pa bzhin du/ 
274b1(brgyad stong): tha yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin te/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de gnyis dang ldan pa ni bdud sdig can rnams sam/ bdud kyi ros kyi lha
274b2(brgyad stong): rnams kyis thub par dka' ba yin no// rab 'byor de de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la lha rnams kyang nye bar 'ong bar sems par 'gyur/ nye bar 'ongs nas kyang dri bar sems/ 
274b3(brgyad stong): yongs su dri bar bya bar sems/ bsnyen bkur bya bar sems so// de la spro ba yang bskyed par byed de/ rigs kyi bu khyod myur du bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
274b4(brgyad stong): 'gyur gyis/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas ma 'di lta ste/ shesang rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gan+da pa'i spyod pa 'di nyid kyis gnas da par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod de ltar gnas pa de
274b5(brgyad stong): nyid kyis gnas shing de ltar spyod na/ sems can 'gon mye da pa rnams kyi 'gon du 'gyur/ sems can gzhi myed parnams kyi gzhir 'gyur/ sems can gnas myed pa rnams kyi
274b6(brgyad stong): gnas su 'gyur/ sems can skyabs myed pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur/ sems can dpung gnyen myed pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur/ sems can gling myed pa rnams kyi gling du 'gyur/ sems can
274b7(brgyad stong): rten myed pa rnams kyi rten du 'gyur/ sems can dmus long rnams kyi sdang bar 'gyur ro zhes lha'i bu de dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la spro ba bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
274b8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa 'di gnas pa de dag la 'jig rtend kyi khams tshad myed pa grangs myed pa dag na
275a1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar cing bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bca
275a2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i yon tan
275a3(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa de dag gi mying dang rus dang / gzugs dang kha dog rnams yongs su brjod cing chos ston te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la brjod pa yang ched du brjod ngo // rab 'byor
275a4(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste dper na/ de ltar ba nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug phud can dang / byang chub
275a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gang dag da ltar de ba zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi bskyod pa'i drung na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa dag gi mying
275a6(brgyad stong): dang rus dang / kha dog dang gzugs yongs su brjod cing stond to// ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa de bzhin du rab 'byor nga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang / da ltar nga'i sangs rgyas kyi
275a7(brgyad stong): zhingan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag tshangs par spang ba spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
275a8(brgyad stong): de dag gi myong dang / rus dang kha dog dang gzugs yongs su brjod cing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos ston to// ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod do// rab 'byor dkyis gsol
275b1(brgyad stong): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi mying dang rus dang / kha dog dang / gzugs yongs su brjod cing chos stond te/ ched du brjod pa yang
275b2(brgyad stong): ched du brjod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi mying dang / 
275b3(brgyad stong): rus dang kha dog dang / gzugs yongs su brjod cing chos stond pa dang / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa ma yin no// rab 'byor nga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir myi ldog pa'i byang
275b4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi mying dang / rus dang kha dog dang gzugs rnams yongs su brjod nas/ chos 'chad cing ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// rab 'byor dkyis
275b5(brgyad stong): gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan// 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa rnams ma gtogs par/ de ma lags pa'i
275b6(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi mying dang rus dang kha dog dang / gzugs rnams yongs su brjod cing che sa stonang pa dang / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod par mdzad
275b7(brgyad stong): pa ma mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa rnams ma gtogs par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga
275b8(brgyad stong): gi mying dang rus dang kha dog dang / gzugs yongs su brjod cing chos stond pa dang / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa yod do// yang de dag gang zhe na/ gang da ltar de
275b9(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom bu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rjesu slob cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de/ rjesu spyod pa'i tshul du gnas pa rnams te/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chu
276a1(brgyad stong): 6/ sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byid gyi ldog pa'i nas ma rtogs par sangs rgyas bcom ldadi 'das de dag gi ming dang rus dang 'dog dang / gzugs yi su brjod cing chos ston pa dang / ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub
276a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po rin po me tog gi byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su srebo cing // byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de/ rjesu spyod pa'i tshul du gnas pa'i rnaMs te/ rab 'byor nga 'di dag ni byang chub sos dpa' ses dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog
276a3(brgyad stong): rgyas com ldan 'das de da/ gang gi mying dang / ru dang / ton dang / gzugs sas brjod ma sa pad/ ched du bdod pa chanarjod pa yid do// 
276a4(brgyad stong): yongs su brjod cing chos stond pa dang / ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa yin no// gzhan yang rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod
276a5(brgyad stong): cing / chos thams cad myi skye ba'o zhes de ltar mos la/ da rung myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa dang / chos thams cad zhi ba'o zhes mos la/ chos thams cad la phyir myi ldog pa'i dbang
276a6(brgyad stong): thob pa/ ma nor ba rab 'byor nga gnas pa de lta bus gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mying dang rus dang kha dog dang gzugs kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su brjod cing

276a8(brgyad stong): cing chos stonang pa dang / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod par mdzad de/ de dag ni nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyis spangs te/ de dag gis sangs rgyas kyis la re bar bya ste/ de dag dri bla na byed pa yang
276b1(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stonod par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
276b2(brgyad stong): pa la spyod pa de dag ga yeng dang nus dang / kha dog dang / gzugs rnams yongs su brjod nas chos stond to// tshod du brjod pa de dag kyang phyir gyi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang
276b3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pa ro la du phyin pa gas po 'di bag mams nas/ chos par byed cing rmongs par gyi 'gyung/ nam cung dum byed/ sa / 
276b4(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang das par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyagyi baspyod pa dang / gang sangs rgyas kyi sring den ngas pa pa'i gapa zag byang chub thams dpa'i thes pa za ngas las
276b5(brgyad stong): rgyas param nyan togam du mams bskyed du/ de dag gi drung du thos rab kyi po lang du byerjod pa 'do congs can nam smos par 'gyung // saras kyis rolang tu na pa 'dis ma ma de bzhin gnanas
276b6(brgyad stong): gsungs pa de ba ni dums pas byang gyi ga pa nyid la gnas par 'gyu te/ 'byo das shes sa kyi med ma pa sa kyim skas byung bar bgadang// mas
276b7(brgyad stong): mos nas kyang de bzhin da du grub pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas na de lazhin nyid la bslabs te/ dananan nyid la gnas namathams cad ma khyen pa nyid tsas thon pa la smos kyi
277a1(brgyad stong): dgongs/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par chos gzhan gang dmyigs su ma mchis na/ chos gang zhig de bzhin nyid la
277a2(brgyad stong): gnas par 'gyur// gang zhig bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang zhig chos 'di stond par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
277a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// rab 'byor dgang 'di skad du/ de ltar de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par/ chos gzhan gang yang dmyigs su

277a6(brgyad stong): myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin nyid dmyigs su myed pa gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba lta ci smos rab 'byor da do bzhin nyid bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
277a7(brgyad stong): ba rdzogs par 'amang kyi rgya sa rab 'byor chos kyang thar byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'am/ mngon par rdzogs par 'chang sa bar 'gyur

277b2(brgyad stong): 'das bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so// de ci'i phyir zhen
277b3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid la gang yang gnas pa ma mchis la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba gang yang ma mchis/ chos stond pa yang ma mchis
277b4(brgyad stong): pa 'di la zhum par myi 'gyur/ nem nur myi bgying / rmongs/ par myi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'a byod kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// 
277b5(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka gang 'di skad du/ gang dag chos zab mo 'di lta bu bshad pa la nem nur myi byed pa dang / mongs par/ myi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
277b6(brgyad stong): ni dga' ba byed pa'o zhes zer la/ ke'u shi ka chos thams cad stong pa na 'di la su zhig nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor kyis gang dang
277b7(brgyad stong): gang bshad pa/ de dang de ni stong pa nyid la brtsams te/ bshad pas ci la yang thogs pa myed do// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bar snang la mnga' 'phangs pa ni ci la yang thogs pa myed de/ 
277b8(brgyad stong): de bzhin du 'phags pa rab 'byor kyis chos stond pa ni ci la yang thogs pa byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
278a1(brgyad stong): bdag gis gnas gtan rab 'byor de la brtsams te/ 'di skad du bshad cing / 'di skad du bstand pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin smras pa lags sam/ chos smra
278a2(brgyad stong): ba dang sa su madran pa ngas yang da pa lags sas/ rin kyis gso'adu ba dang/ ma ldan 'as ma sa ca ma 'dun kyis pa 'phrul / mnanam ma
278a3(brgyad stong): na su bstad pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba yin no// chos smra ba yin no// chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos lung stonang pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shig gan
278a4(brgyad stong): gtan rab 'byor dgang dang gang spobs par 'gyur ba de ni stong pa nyid las brtsams te spobs so// da ci'i phyir zhen ga'u gag gnas gtan rab 'byor ni/ shes rab tu
278a5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyind pa yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong zhing / myi dmyigs na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spro nga blta ga la yod// byang chub nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 
278a6(brgyad stong): gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 
278a7(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mi skye ba nyid kyang gyi dmyigs na/ TI skye ba mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba la ga la yod/ 
278a8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang myi dmyigs na gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ stobs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang stobs dang ldan par
278b1(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang myi 'jigs par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ chos nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang chos stond par 'gyur ba lta ga la
278b2(brgyad stong): yod/ ke'u shi ka gnas gtan rab 'byor nga ni/ chos thams cad dben par gnas pa dang / chos thams cad myi dmyigs par gnas pas gnas so// ke'u shi ka gang yang
278b3(brgyad stong): gnas gtas rab 'byor kyis chos thams cad dben par gnas pa dang / chos thams cad dmyigs su myed par gnas pa 'di ni ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
278b4(brgyad stong): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing gan sa pa'i/ brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// sto nga gi char yang / brgya stong gi char yang / bye ba'i
278b5(brgyad stong): char yangabye ba brgya'i char yang / bye ba ste nga gi char yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yapa nye bar myi 'gro'o/ grangs dang / bgrang ba dang
278b6(brgyad stong): dpe' dang / rgyur yang myi bzod do// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i gnas pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gnye/ 
278b7(brgyad stong): pa'i gnas pa ma gtogs par/ de ma yin pa'i gnas pa gzhan thams cad zil gyis gnon to// ke'u shi ka 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad pas mchog ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes
278b8(brgyad stong): bya'o/ phul zhes bya'o// rab ces bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// tha ma zhes bya'o// bla na myed pa zhes bya'o// kong na myed pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dang
279a1(brgyad stong): da pa 'a @/ tham gyid pa sa byeng bar byin pa sa kyis sa gas kyi rnams ca sa pas ma
279a2(brgyad stong): na/ shes rab kyi pa yang tu phyin pa la tshung ci gas nyid dgis ma par bya'o// sa rab kyi byi pa yang sna ba smras/ snang ba'i sa
279a3(brgyad stong): mapa 'i ga na ba'i thams me tag stan pa du/ na ra
279b1(brgyad stong): gsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis shes rab kyi phar lang tu phyin pa 'di la spyang par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bangag cug nas shA kyi pha slo tu phyi pal gnam pa'i nga ba'is
279b2(brgyad stong): gnas par 'gyur/ de ras bcom ldan 'das de'i min 'dum pa yangadza de/ sangs rgyas com ldan 'das gang gi ci 'dum pa mngang pA de'i tshe/ chos nyid kyis 'o ze dog pa tshogs/ khangag du ma 'dzi
279b3(brgyad stong): 'das kyi dbu'i macug tu myi sgrung bar gyur te// denas ched da ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs sa/ thogs zag gcig du she te/ bras mo gsas pa'i lhungs la btsun
279b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo spa se phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// su ma mchis/ rkyengam mchis par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
279b5(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dum pa myi mngang na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dum pa mdzad pa 'di' rgyu ga pa lags/ rkyen gang lags de skad ces gsolang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis me dang ldan pa kun dga'
279b6(brgyad stong): zos 'di skad ces bka' stsal ngo // kun dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa skangs la bral/ dge slong brgyathas drug bcu po 'di dag thams cad than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
280a1(brgyad stong): rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang chos stonang par gyur to// 'di lta ste thams cad kyang me tog 'akram pa zhes bya bar mying yang mthun par 'gyur te/ smon pa
280a2(brgyad stong): 'jig rte nad du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang mnyam por 'gyur ro// 
280a3(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba de dag gi tshe'i tshad kyang skal pa stong phrag nyi shu'i bar du mnyam par 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad so so'i gsung rabs kyang rgyas
280a4(brgyad stong): par 'gyur te/ lha dang mya'i nang du yangs shing rgya che bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad so so'i zhing yang skal pa stong phrag nyi shu'i bar du mnyam par gnas par 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad grong dang
280a5(brgyad stong): grong khyer dang / grong 'dab dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor da da pho brang 'khor gang dang gang nas mngon par 'byung zhing / mngon par 'byung nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// 
280a6(brgyad stong): rab tu bskor nas kyang de dang der gnas par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du 'dug pa dang / gang dang gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'jug pa dang / 'byung ba dang / gnas pa de dang de dag tu me tog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i me
280a7(brgyad stong): tog gi char rab tu 'bab par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na gnas pa mchog gis gnas par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i gnas pas gan
280a8(brgyad stong): par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pas gnas par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa'i gnas pas gnas par bya'o// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su shes rab kyi
280b1(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod na/ de dag ni myi las shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa 'am dka' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas myi'i nang du skyes par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi'i nang ngam yang na dka' ldan
280b2(brgyad stong): gyi lha'i ris na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rgyas par rab tu spyod do// yang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
280b3(brgyad stong): bas gzigs par bya'o// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzind pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'dond pa dang / stonang pa dang / 'chad pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang
280b4(brgyad stong): chung ngu ma yi ger 'dri ba dang / bzung bcangs/ grags kun chub par byas/ rab tu 'dod/ bstan bshang / kha ton du byas bris nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
280b5(brgyad stong): 'doms shing rjes su stond pa dang / yang dag par stond pa dang / nga dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / rab tu dga' bar byed pa dang / bdag par 'dzud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
280b6(brgyad stong): dag ni kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin par rig par bya'o// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di la slob pa'i slob pa de dag
280b7(brgyad stong): nanyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas nyin la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par myi brtsi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de bzhin gzhanas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
280b8(brgyad stong): la gdos gyi la bar dge ba'i cha ba bskyed pa yin no// kun dga' bo gang zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'di ltar slob cing / skrag par gyi byed pa dang / gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'ang 'dzin pa
281a1(brgyad stong): dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / stond pa dpa' chad pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / don dang tshul dang / 
281a2(brgyad stong): chos kyi rjes su rtogs par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon sum du gyu ra pa yin par rig par bya'o// 
281a3(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la myi spyod/ 'gal bar myi byed/ 'khrug par gyi byed/ spong bar myi byed/ 'gog par myi byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
281a4(brgyad stong): ngag sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la bya ba byas pa yin te/ kun dga' bo nyamathos dang / rang sangs rgyas thob par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
281a5(brgyad stong): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dge ba'i tsha ba ma bskru nad kyi rnam par sbyin pa yang 'byung bar bye/ nga la smon lam yang slu bar myi 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo
281a6(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni phal cher shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ci nas kyang nub par
281a7(brgyad stong): kyi 'gyur bar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di khyod la gtang ngo // rjes su gtang ngo // kur dga' bo gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma gtogs par chos gang ngas mngon sum du bshad pa de dag thams
281a8(brgyad stong): cang bzul nas/ phyis chung gsan tam/ phyis btang ngam/ brjed par byas na kun dga' bo khyod de tsam gyis ngas nyes par bachi bar myi 'gyur gyi/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
281b1(brgyad stong): phyi nad pa'i tshig gam/ yang na tshig gi yan lag kyang rung ste/ chung bsan tam/ btang ngam brjed par byas na/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de tsam du bal nyes pa byas par 'gyur te/ nga'i sems mgu bar ma byas so/ 
281b2(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bzung nas/ phyis chung gsan cing / btang brjed par byas na khyod kyis ngal bkur stir ma byas/ ri mor ma byas mchod par ma byas
281b3(brgyad stong): brjed par ma byas/ gsol bar ma byas so// kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bzung nas phyis chud gson cing btang ste brjed par byas na/ kun dga' bo gang dag 'das pa dang / ma
281b4(brgyad stong): 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de da dag la yang kun dga' bo khyod kyis bkur stir ma byas/ bla mar ma byas/ mchod par ma byas brjed par ma byas/ gsol bar ma
281b5(brgyad stong): byas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
281b6(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sum sa/ sbed pa dang / 'byind pa dang / thams cad mkhye rang pa nyid thob par byed pa yin par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs sa
281b7(brgyad stong): kyis gsungs so// kun dga' bo de lta bas mashes rab kyi pha rolapa tu phyimed pa 'di cinas kyang / nub par gyi 'gyur bar khyod la gtad ngo // rjes su gtang ngo // kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa 'di rjes su bzung
281b8(brgyad stong): bar bya'o// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bcang bar bya'o// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di kun chub par bya'o// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'di rab tu gdon

282a2(brgyad stong): byed pa 'be tshan bya'o// na pa 'a thog sa rab tus rom tu rgyas ma 'di ga 'a ba ste/ bran dan tha thong kyis mab tshad du mya da bsags par 'angs bya ba dang / legs par byar chub par byab

282b3(brgyad stong): ngas khyod la yang du bshadan/ skal pa 'am skal pa bas lag pa 'am/ galang pa brgya'am/ rnamang pa stong ngam/ galang pa bye ba phrag brgya song ngam/ sapar debs kyang lhag par ba'ad du yang

282b7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyind pa 'di tshad myed pa'i phyir yongs su gtad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di khyod la yongs su gtad pa'o// kun dga' bo gang kyis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs
282b8(brgyad stong): su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub yongs su ma btang ba des/ shes rab kyi pha rol
283a1(brgyad stong): tu byi pa yo su myi gta bya ste/ dzi de'i mu spyan pa'o// nga'i rje su bstan pa'o// kun dka' bo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / thog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / ra
283a2(brgyad stong): tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / 'chad pa dang / kha ton du byed pa des/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gapal
283a3(brgyad stong): ral zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di rab tu 'jig pa'i tshe/ rjes su bzung na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub kyang yongasasu bzung bar 'gyur ro//

283a5(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzod sa pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las skyes so// kun dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'i de bzhin gzhogs pa
283a6(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa las skyes so// kun dga' bo gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed
283a7(brgyad stong): bdag na/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi/ bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub klung shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las skyes/ 
283a8(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo nga'i bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las skyes so// kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par
283b1(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'dod pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid bzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun
283b2(brgyad stong): chub par bya/ rab tu 'don par bya/ bstan par bya/ bshad par bya/ kha ton du bya/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya/ rnal 'byor du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo shes rab
283b3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum ste skyed pa byin pa'o// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pa rol du phyin pa drug las bla na byed pa yang
283b4(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur/ ba de dag kyang / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brkyen nas/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug la bslab pa yin no// de dag
283b5(brgyad stong): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la brten nas/ pha rol du/ tu phyind pa drug las skyes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun da/ 'bo pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
283b6(brgyad stong): byend pa las skyes te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'o// kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ci nas kyang nub par myi 'byung bar lam gnyis su khyod
283b7(brgyad stong): la yongasu gtad do// rjes su gtad ngo // kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid kyi mdzod kyi
283b8(brgyad stong): bzad pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang 'das pa'i rus kyi thog ma myed pa'i 'khor ba na sems can rnams la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bshad pa 'di lta ste// shes rab
285a1(brgyad stong): kyipha rol tu phyid pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'di las pa'o// kus rga po ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi dpag tu myed pa'i 'khor ba na/ sems can rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos 'chad par 'gyur ba de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
285a2(brgyad stong): 'das kyis 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha ralang tu phyind pa 'di las 'chang ngo do// kun dga' bo nga ltar 'jig rtend kyi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ga rje
285a3(brgyad stong): la chos stonang pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyakyi kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos kyi mdzod bsgrags pa 'di nyid las chos bkang par gyur to// kun dga' bo de lta bas na 'di lta ste
285a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i mdzod 'di ni myi zad pa'i chos kyi ma dzod// kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnam sa la nyan thos kyi sa'i chos bshad par gyur la/ chos bshad pa des kya
285a5(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams dag na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa ra gyur na des kyang nga'i nyan thos rnams la nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par myi
285a6(brgyad stong): 'gyu ro// kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig cig tsam yang bshad dam rab tu bstan na/ des ni nyan thos kyi nga la mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// 
285a7(brgyad stong): sngon gyi chos bshad pa de nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur na/ kun dga'o de ji lta du sems/ dgra bcom pa de dag gi sbyin pa la
285a8(brgyad stong): zung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po'i bsod nams kyi phung po mang ba yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa
285b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das mdo/ bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo nyam thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag pas/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
285b2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa de bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// kun dga'o de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la chung ngu na nyi ma cis
285b3(brgyad stong): tsam yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na/ de'i tshe bsod nams ches mang du skyed / kun dga'o nyi ma cig lta zhog gi chung ngun snga dro tsam 'am/ kun dga' bo snga dro cag lta zhog gi/ chung ngu na
285b4(brgyad stong): chu chod cig tsam 'am/ kun dga' bo chu chod cig lta zhog gi/ chung ngu na thang gcig gam/ kun dga' bo thang cig lnga zhog gi yung tsam cig gam/ kun dga' bo yud tsam cig lta zhog gi/ chung ngur skad ce/ 
285b5(brgyad stong): gcig tsam yang / kun dga'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan/ ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na 'di ni des
285b6(brgyad stong): masod nams ches mang du skyed do// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de chos kyi sbyin pa 'das ni nyan thos kyi theg pardzun gang ga thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag pas
285b7(brgyad stong): ba dge ba'i ches zil gyis gnam to/ kun dag 'di lta bu'i das pa'i sa ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang dge pa'i ma ba la/ thams cad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che ma
285b8(brgyad stong): bla ma byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyi ldog pa ni gnas myed skabs khyed de// 'don gnas pa ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i cha ji sa zu'i/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par
285'a1(brgyad stong): 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du byas pas dang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin pa
285'a2(brgyad stong): dri za dang ga lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldi pa dang / myi 'am ce dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang / kye ma yin pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
285'a3(brgyad stong): myi bskyod pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du 'dang ba dang / mye bskyod pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu'i zab mo'i nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
285'a4(brgyad stong): bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ thams cad kyang / dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa myed pa sems shin tu rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab shin tu rnam par grol la/ cang
285'a5(brgyad stong): shes pa/ glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur ro rab/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par sbyor ba yongasu zad pa yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems
285'a6(brgyad stong): kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu som pa/ rnams kyis yongasu bskor cing / mdun du bdar te/ chos stond pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
285'a7(brgyad stong): kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa/ de dag slar brtul te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de ltar brtul nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
285'a8(brgyad stong): rgyas myi bskyod pa yang / myi snang bar 'gyur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang 'khor bzhi po de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang
285'b1(brgyad stong): da sbyin pa / rnaMs dang / skam yin dang / rnas pa' 'a' dang / rgya'ab ci dang / cho bye na po dang / byed me ma yin pa de ga 'i rkyen sas kyi nga mi chur // dba'i phying chem/ de bzhin gshegs pa
285'b2(brgyad stong): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis du 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de 'artul bar 'gyur bas/ de rnams de dag gi phyogs sa du phye snang bar gyur to// dedas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pasun
285'b3(brgyad stong): dga' bo la bka' stsal dpa kun dga' bo de ltar chos thams cad ni myeg lam du yang sdang bar myi 'gyur te/ chos rnams la chos rnams snang bar myi 'byung / chos rnams kyis chos rnams myi mthong / chos rnas
285'b4(brgyad stong): kyis chos rnams myi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga'/ kho chos thams cad ni zhes pa po ma yin/ dgos pa byed nus pa nayin no// de ci'i bying zhe na/ kun dga' bo nam mkha' byed pa myed pa
285'b5(brgyad stong): byed/ chos thams cad g.yo ba myed de/ gzung ba myed do// kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu bsam gyis myi khyab bo// kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa'i phyir tshor ba po ma ge
285'b6(brgyad stong): mo// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod ma/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod cing // chos thams cad la yang mngon par chags pa myed do// kun dga' bo byang chub seMs rapan
285'b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen pos de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob bo// chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes
285'b8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo bslab pa 'di ni bslab pa thams cad kyi dam pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// 
286a1(brgyad stong): mchog rab ces bya'o// rgya nom pa zhes bya'o// blam zhes bya'o// blan byed pa zhes bya'o// gong na byed pa zhes bya'o// 'jig rten pa thams cad la phan pa thob par byed pa'o// 'jig rten pa thams cad
286a2(brgyad stong): bde ba thob par byed pa'o// mgon myed pa rnams kyi mgon tu byung pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis gnang zheng sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa ste/ kun dga' bo bslab pa 'di la bsrabs shing bslab pa 'di la gnas nas/ 
286a3(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zhabs kyi mthe bo gcig gis bteg cing slar bzhag kyang sems can de dag 'di snyam
286a4(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bteg pa 'am pa dag par myi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha ro/ lang tu phyin pa ni grangs myed gzhal du myed pa'i yon tan dang ldan
286a5(brgyad stong): te/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bslabs nas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la gnas pa myed pa nyid rjes
286a6(brgyad stong): su brnyes so// kun dga' bo 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi bslab pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni dam pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// mchos
286a7(brgyad stong): ces bya'o// mchog rab ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla ma dang / bla na myed pa dang / gong na myed pa zhes bya'o// kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshad dang / mtha' ma bzung bar sems
286a8(brgyad stong): pa de ni nam mkha'i tshad ngam mtha' ma bzung bar sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni tshad myed do// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtha' myed do// kun dag
286b1(brgyad stong): bo ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshad dam/ mtha' ni ma bshad/ gzhan yang kun dga' bo myang gi tshogs dang / tshig tshogs dang yi ge'i tshogs rnams la ni tshad chad pa yod kyi/ kun dka' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
286b2(brgyad stong): pa la ni tshad chad pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mying gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang yi ge'i tshogs ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin te/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad dang ldan pa ma yin no// 
286b3(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhal du myed do// kun dga' bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ma gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
286b4(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi zad pa// 'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshad ma bstand to// kun dag/ 'bo shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dben pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshes/ 
286b5(brgyad stong): pas tshad ma brjod do// kun dga' bo dben pa'i phyir chos la dben ba dmyigs su myed na/ de'i tshad lta ga la yod/ kun dga' bo de ba zhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dpag tu byed pa'i phyir gzhal tu
286b6(brgyad stong): myed pa'o// kun dga' bo 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa 'ang nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yin
286b7(brgyad stong): yang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zad zin pa 'am/ bad pa 'am/ zad par gyu rad pa ma yin no// kun dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
286b8(brgyad stong): drag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu 'byed par 'gyur yang / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di zad zin pa 'am zad pa 'am/ zad par 'gyur

289a5(brgyad stong): sdig can yang 'i nang tu mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can gcig cig shin tu mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ 'on te mang po
289a6(brgyad stong): shi nad tu mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ram/ 'on te stong gsuM gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi las na/ bdud sdig can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad kyang shi nad tu mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur/ 
289a7(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsolang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces bka' stsalang to// rab 'byorang nam byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la gnas
289a8(brgyad stong): pas spyod pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bdud sdig can ji snyed yod pa de dag zas cad shi nang tu mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rang gi stan la 'dug na'ang nyams myi dag
289b1(brgyad stong): par 'gyu 'o// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub seMs dpa' sos dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pas spyong ba la yi/ lha rang kyi dang / lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten gis bdag cag gis 'a
289b2(brgyad stong): bzung la/ tho 'tsha mo snyam la/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar bzlog par bya'o snyam pa'i grags rnyed par myi 'gyur/ gting rnyed par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ byang chub
289b3(brgyad stong): ses dpa' seMs dpa' chen po/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga byang chub seMs dpa' sos
289b4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thabs mkha ngas pas thas cad sgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub
289b5(brgyad stong): seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod pa de la/ bcud kyi las gang ci 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag zas cad ma pa yang su rdzog/ 'byung ba'i tshe/ rab tu shes par 'gyur te/ 
289b6(brgyad stong): rab tu shes nas/ rnam par spang bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor nga thab sa mkhas pa thas cad yong su bzung bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sas dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyad par bya'o// 
289b7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom par bya'o// rab 'byor nga nas byang chub seMs dpal seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / desar kyi pha rol byi dpa la spyod ceng/ shes rab
289b8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par bslab par byed pa de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi las grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa de dag gis thas cad
290a1(brgyad stong): ma khyedang pa nyid kyang des ste/ shes ras kyi ba mang tu byend pa las skyem gtubs par bya'o// de ltang bsas nas byang chub ses dpa' mas dpa' can 'das yangasas 'di gang bstod ba can
290a2(brgyad stong): ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang dag rjesu brnyes pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos de dag rjesu thob par bya'o// swA ste rab 'byor de ltar byang chub ses dpa' sos dpa' chen po zhes rab
290a3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas nyin cig 'das kyi bar la se gol gtogs pa tsam tu yang seMs bskyed par bya mngon tu bsgrub par bya'o// rab 'byor dmyigs pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub ses dpa' gang gin
290a4(brgyad stong): bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa byin pa'i byang chub seMs dpal sos dpa' chen po dmyigs pa can de bas mi/ byang chub ses dpa' sos dpa' chen po gang nyi ma gcig 'das pa'i
290a5(brgyad stong): bar la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di chung ngu na/ se gol gto/ gcig tsam tu mngon par bsgrubs na bsod nas mang du bskyed de/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po 'di phyir myi ldog pa la
290a6(brgyad stong): gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / nyin gcig 'das kyi bar la chung ngu na/ se gol gtogs pa srid tsam yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyod cing / sems bskye
290a7(brgyad stong): pa 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs par rig par bya na/ gang sems bskyed pa 'di'i rjesu zlos ma thag tu 'jug pa lta ci smos/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
290a8(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi bskyod pa'i rang na/ da ltar byang chub ses dpa' seMs dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba/ tshangs par smad pa spyod pa bzhin no// 
290b1(brgyad stong): zhes ra kyil mang tu byend pa rgyang stong la las mtshag 'a jam pa'i nyisas bya 'o// / ma sa 'argyas byang chubasams dpa' ma

290b3(brgyad stong): tu byin par rjes rig par byal/ nas las cang 'byung ba byed pa dang / marnams shes rab kyi 'a bang tu phyin par rjes rig par bya'o// tshas thams cad sar yang rig pa skyed cing/ ma pa sa
290b4(brgyad stong): par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang par rjesu rig par bya'o// chos thams cad ba snyad gdags pa tsam gyis brjod pa'i phyir/ shes rab tu pha ra lang tu phyirang bar rje su rig par bya'o// bsang gdags pa/ 
290b5(brgyad stong): 'ang gang la yang gang du yang tha snyad gdags pa myed// chos thas cad pa skad myed pa/ brjod du myed pa'i phyir shes rab tu/ pha ral tu phyinang pa rjesu rig par bya'o// chos thams cad
290b6(brgyad stong): chad byed pa'i phyir zhes rab kyi pha rol tu byin par rjesu rig par bya'o// gzugs yang byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyinang par rjesu rig par bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba chad byed pa dang / 'acu shes
290b7(brgyad stong): myed pa dang / 'du byed rnas tshad myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa tshad myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang par rjesu rig par bya'o// chos thas cad mtshan ma myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
290b8(brgyad stong): par rjes rig par bya'o// chos thos cad nges par 'byed po'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa brje su rig par bya'o// chos thas cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
291a1(brgyad stong): par rje su rig par bya'o// chos thas cad tshig myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par rje su rig par bya'o// chos thas cad 'gog pa dang mnye ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang par
291a2(brgyad stong): rjesu rig par bya'o/ kya tsha mams kyi mya ngan las 'das po thos cad de bzhin nyid dang mnye pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjesu rig par bya'o// chos bas cad myi 'gro mya 'od myi skye ba'i phyir zhes
291a3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par rjesu rig par bya'o// bdag dang gzhan du myi lta ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par rje su rig par bya'o// 'phags pa dgra bcom pa rnaMs rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir
291a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par rje su rig par bya'o// chos thos cad khur bor zhing 'ur myi khyeng ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa rje su rig par bya'o// chos thas cad yul myed cing phyogs
291a5(brgyad stong): myed pa'i phyirashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par rjesu rig ra bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang gzugs ni rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis yul myed cing phyogs myed pa'o// 
291a6(brgyad stong): chos thas cad 'gog pa rab tu tshim par byed pa'i phyir/ shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyinang par rjesu rig par bya'o// dka' ba myed cing dga' ba dang bral ba'i phyir zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang par rje su rig pa bya/ 
291a7(brgyad stong): 'do chags pa yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par rje su rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni yang dag par 'dod chags par myi byed/ 'dod chags dang bral bar myi byeda'o// de bzhin
291a8(brgyad stong): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rjes dang / na par shes pa ni yang dag par 'dod chags par myi byed/ 'dod chags dang bral bar myi byed do// rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
291b1(brgyad stong): chos mas cad ma chags shing chags pa dang bral ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par rje su rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes khong du chud par byed pas/ chos

291b3(brgyad stong): byam pa chen bu sran du 'gro ngam nas thams cad sngun bya lta bu 'o zhe sa rab kyi ma rlol tu kyi dang ba rje mu rig pang bya'o// chomams cad byas pa la gnas zhing matsun pa lta bung gyu pas zhe sngab gyi len pa dang / 
291b4(brgyad stong): yul pa mkhyod pa'i phyi zhes rus kyi ma rol gyi sbyin pa su rgyapar rje la par bya/ tshugs kyi phyiman pob kyi ma ba tu phyi dang pa rje bu cig pa bya'o// gzugs su byed
291b5(brgyad stong): phyir shes kyi pha rol de de phyind la mu myed par rjesu rig pa ba'o//

291b7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyis ro la tu phyi nad pa med kyang rje su rig par bya'o// sgra thas cang su myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol ba tu phyin pa su myed par brjesu rig par bya'o//

293a1(brgyad stong): chos thas cad ting nge 'dzin mu myed pa thob pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa mu myed par rje su rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos mu myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mu myed par rje su rig

294b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ji ltar byang chub seMs dpa' sos dpa' chen po rtag tu du gang da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs myi zad par sgrogs

296a1(brgyad stong): byed pa myi skyed pa dang / gnyid dang tshugs pa yid la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / bza' ba yid la byed pa myi bskyed pa dang / btung ba yid la byed pa myi skyed pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa myi bskyed pa dang / 
296a2(brgyad stong): nyi ma mo yid la byed pa myi bskyed pa dang / grang ba yid la byed pa myi bskyed pa dang / tsha ba yid la byed pa myi bskyed pa de ltar song shig/ nang ngam phyi rol gang la yang seMs smond par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu g.yas g.yon
