296a8(brgyad stong): tu yang sgra de thos te/ 'di skad tu rigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i chos dag la mos pa bskyed la/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongasasu btsal bar bya'o// 
296b1(brgyad stong): khyod kyis mtshan yongasu spang ba dang / dngos po yongasu spang ba dang / seMs can tu lta ba yongasu spang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag spang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang stong pa nyid dang / 
296b2(brgyad stong): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / ma byung ba dang ma skyes pa dang / dngos po myed pa dang ma 'gags pa'i chos rnaMs stond pa dag la brten par bya'o// bsten par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
296b3(brgyad stong): de ltar bsgrubs na/ ring po myi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs ba tu chud pa'i dge slong chos smra ba'i lus la yod par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu gang las shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di thos de la rigs kyi
296b4(brgyad stong): bu khyod kyis ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing / khyod kyis byas pa ba zo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba byas te/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol pa ba tu phyind pa 'di thos pa 'di dag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ 
296b5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de bdag gis thos pas myung du bla ma mye/ nga ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'a gyur / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pam
296b6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas rnaMs la bsnyen par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ba zhin gshegs pa dang ma bral ba na su skye bar 'gyur ro// myi khom pa rnas spong bar 'gyuraro// ral ba phun su tshogs par 'gyuraro// rigs
296b7(brgyad stong): kyi bu phan yon 'di nas khyod kyis yong su rtogs la/ dge slong chos smra ba la stonang pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i seMs kyi rgyud kyis/ dge slong chos
296b8(brgyad stong): smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar myi bya'o// khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba la chos 'dod pa dang / chos la gus par byas pas phyir bzhin 'brang bar bya'o// khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnaMs rtogs par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu bcud
297a1(brgyad stong): khyi las rnaMs rtogs par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu bdud sdig can mi byang chub sos dpal sos dpa' chen po rjes la gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro nga reg bdag bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / spyad par
297a2(brgyad stong): bya ba'i phyir nye bar bsgrubs ste/ de dag des zil kyis mnan nas/ thabs mkhas pas 'grogs shing bsnyen pa dang / bsnyen par byed pa yang yod/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos smra ba de la ma dad pa bskyed par
297a3(brgyad stong): myi bya'o// gzhan tu na seMs 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de myi shes kyi 'di ni thabs mkhas pa rab tu sheso// 'di ni seMs can gyi tshul gyis seMs can nas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bzung ba'i
297a4(brgyad stong): bying / chos 'di dag la rten cing 'grogs te/ bsnyen par byed kyi byang chub sos dpa' sos dpa' chen po nas mi gapal yang chags pa'i sgrib pa byed kyis skad cig de nyid la rigs kyi bu myong
297a5(brgyad stong): kyis yang dag pa'i tshu la so sor brtag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos rnaMs kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thas cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rna bar byang ba ma yino// 
297a6(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thas cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o// chos thas cad ni seMs can myed pa/ srog myed pa/ gang zag myed pa/ sgyu ma lta bu rmi la lta bu/ brag cha lta bu/ myig yor lta bu ste/ rigs
297a7(brgyad stong): kyi bu chos rnaMs kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtag cing chos smra ba'i phyir bzhin 'brang na ring po myi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud kyi las
297a8(brgyad stong): la sems shig pa rigs kyi bu ci ste chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'dod po'i rigs kyi bu la brnyas par byed cing kyi seMs mde la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byir sngo bar myi bya ste/ gzhan du mchos 'dod pa
297b1(brgyad stong): nyid dang / chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid myi skyo bas dge slong chos smra ba'i phyir bzhin 'brang bar bya'o zhes thos// de nas byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de las de lta bur bstand pa la
297b2(brgyad stong): blangs nas/ sha rang phyogs ga la ba der song ba dang ring po ma phyi nad par de 'di ste du seMs te/ bdag gis sgra de las ji srid du 'dro bar bya ba ma triso snya nas/ des phyogs de nyid du ngu zhing tshong nges 'debs te smre sngag
297b3(brgyad stong): 'don zhing 'dugo// des phyogs de na nyin zhag gcig gi bar du nyin mtshan 'das par byed/ nyin mtshan gnyis sa gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'i/ drug go/ btsun 'das kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
297b4(brgyad stong): thos par ma gyur kyi bar du lus ngal ba yid la byed pa myi skyed/ rmugs pa dang / gnyid dang yid la byed pa myi skyed/ bza' ba yid la byed pa myi skyed/ btung ba yid la byed pa myi skyed/ mtshan
297b5(brgyad stong): mo yid la byed pa myi skyed/ nyin mo yid la byed pa myi bskyed/ grang ba yid la byed pa myi skyed/ tsha ba yid la byed pa myi skyed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la zhig bu cig pa 'chi ba
297b6(brgyad stong): tus na sdug bsngal ba dang yid myi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de bu'i mya ngan gyis bu cig pa yid la byed pa 'byung ba ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang myi 'byung ste/ rab 'byor nga de bzhin du byang
297b7(brgyad stong): chub seMs dpa' sos dpa' chen po rtag tu du yang de'i tshe/ bdag gis na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos par 'gyur ste pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang myi 'byung // rab 'byor de ni byang
297b8(brgyad stong): chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rtag tu bya de ltar gtung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod tshig 'di skad du smra ba leg so legs
298a1(brgyad stong): ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar yongasu btsal ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes kyis kyang sngon byang chub ses dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
298a2(brgyad stong): yongasu btsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyi brtson 'grus 'di dang / spro ba 'di dang / don tu gnyer ba 'di dang / 'dod pa 'di lta bus rjesu 'brang zhing shar phyogs nyid tu song shig dang / rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad
298a3(brgyad stong): lnga brgya na/ spos dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ra ba rim bdun gyis bskor ba/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang / shing ta la'i 'phreng ba bdun gyis yongasu bskorang pa/ chung dpag tshad
298a4(brgyad stong): bcu gnyis/ zheng tu dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor da pa dang rgyas pa bde ba lho legs pa skye bo mang po dang myis gang ba/ grong bar gyi srang mnye zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du rtas
298a5(brgyad stong): pa khyogs khri nyaM myi nga ba dang / bar bar d+hu za pa btags pa/ grong khyer gyi khor yug tu zhol gyi phyir rin po che sna bdun las legs par byas shing bskor ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba de dag gi mnga'
298a6(brgyad stong): yab rnaMs ni 'dza bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa mda' yab thas cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna brnyan gyi shing skyes ta/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing thog gi 'bras bu chags pa
298a7(brgyad stong): mnga' yab las skyes pa thas cad las kyang rin po che'i tha gu byung bas/ mdal yab gnyis pa shing gzhan dang 'brel pa/ grong khyer de dag thas cad gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas phyebs te/ gser gyi dril bu
298a8(brgyad stong): g.yer ka'i tra ba de dag la rlung gis btab na/ sgra 'ja zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ dper na yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo'i tshogs pa rol mo 'phan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na/ 
298b1(brgyad stong): smra 'dza zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du/ dril bu g.yer ka de dag la rlung gis btab na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ skra nges sos can de dag rtse dga' kun tu spyod / grong khyer
298b2(brgyad stong): de lor yug tu 'obs chu 'bab pas gang zhing / mu ha cang kyi grang ha cang myi dro bas gang ba dag yod/ chu ro la sngon gyi las kyi rna par sbyin pa las grub pa rin po che snga brgyan gyi glu dag yod de/ re
298b3(brgyad stong): seMs can dag zhugs nas rtse dga' zhing rab tu rgyu'o// chu de zas cad kyang me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pun ta ri ka dag gis phyebs pa me tog gi rigs che zhing bzang la dri zhim po'i ngang dang ldan pa gzhan dag
298b4(brgyad stong): gis kyang phyengs ste/ stong gsu gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kha sa na yod pa'i me tog gi rigs las de na myed pa gang yang myed do// grong khyer de'i nang na bskyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/ thas cad kyang
298b5(brgyad stong): rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ ne par bkra zhing blta na stug pa sha stag ste/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re ma yang rdzing bu khor yug tu N+ya grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yong de/ rdzing bu de dag gi khror yus
298b6(brgyad stong): tu thos cang nas rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog ud ba la dang / ku mu ta dang / pun ta ri ka rnaM bar bkra zhing blta na stug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de khyebs shing me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / bun d+ha ri ka re dag
298b7(brgyad stong): thas cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i 'khor lo tsa ma ste/ mthing ka la dog 'thing ka 'thing kar stond pa/ 'thing kar snang ba/ ser po kha dog ser po/ ser por ston pa/ ser por snang ba/ dmar po kha dog dmar po stan pa
298b8(brgyad stong): dmar por snang bas dkar po kha dog dkar po/ dkar por ston pa/ dkar por snang ba dag yod// rdzing bu de dag zas cad ma/ bdung dang / khrung khrung dang / ka ra nang dang / sa ra sa sgra 'byin pa dag yong / skyeng chon
299a1(brgyad stong): 'tshal de dag thos cad kyang nga'i bya ba myed cing ri su bcang ba mye // 'di ltar yun ring por ses can dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing yun ring por chos zab mo la mos pa'i seMs can de dag gi sngon gyi
299a2(brgyad stong): las kyi rna bar grub pa yimo// rigs kyi bu grong khyer de dag gi dbus kyi bzhi mngom/ byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpal chen po chos 'phags kyi 'ang ba rin po che sna brgyan las byas pa/ khor yug tu dpag tshad kyi chang tsam rdza
299a3(brgyad stong): bar bkra zhing blta na stug pa/ rab rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongasu bskor ba zhig yo // 'ang pa de ni khang pa'i long spyod du rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan myed ces
299a4(brgyad stong): bya ba dang / mya ngan dang bral zhes bya ba dang / me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / skyed mos tshal bzhi yod/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re ma/ rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang / bzang
299a5(brgyad stong): mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dag la mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bde mchog zhes byab dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang mi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de
299a6(brgyad stong): rdzing bu de dag gi ngos gcig ni gser las byas/ ngos gnyis pa ni rdul las byas/ ngos gsu pa ni bye du rgya las byas pa/ ngos bzhi pa ni she las byas/ nang gi sa gzhi ni ke ke ru las gser gyi phye ma bdal ba ste/

299a8(brgyad stong): rdzing bu de dag thos cad kyi chu ni me tog ku mu ta dang / ud pa la dang / bum ta ri ka sna tshogs khyebs shing / dadra dang / khrung khrung dang / sa ra sa rnaMs skad 'byin to// rdzing bu de dag gi zhor yug tu me tog gi sh-ing
299b1(brgyad stong): ba sna tshogs skyes te/ shing de dag la rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog rnaMs rdzing bu'i nang tu lhung ba dang / rdzing bu de dag thas cad kyi chu yang can dan gyi drir phyogs shing / kha dog dang ldan/ tri dang ldano// de na byang chub seMs
299b2(brgyad stong): dpa' seMs dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa bud myed drug khri brgya stong dang / lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing // dbang du 'gyur te/ rtse dga' kun tu spyod do// grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa
299b3(brgyad stong): dang bud myed gang gzhan dag 'khor ba de dag thas cad kyang skyed mos tshal la/ rdzing bu de dag na rtag tu dgal zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan nas dbang du gyur pa te rtse dga' kun tu spyod do// yang byang chub ses dpa' ses

299b6(brgyad stong): rkang pa dag btsugs pa/ shing bal bting ba/ bstan pa tshangs can bting ba/ steng snying po can du byas pa/ ka shi ka'i gos bting ba/ dpang du rgyang grags byed yod pa bzhes ste/ steng du gos kyi bA re lu tig
299b7(brgyad stong): gis brgyan pa bres shing / de ltar chos la gus par byed pas sa phyogs de khor yug kyang me tog la dog lnga pa dag mngon par gtor cing / sa phyogs de yang spos sna tshogs dang / gdug pa sna tshogs kyis shi nang tu gdug
299b8(brgyad stong): bar byed do// de la byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stonang to// rigs kyi bu seMs can de dag ni de lta bur gus par byed cing / byang chub seMs dpa
300a1(brgyad stong): seMs dpa' chen po chos 'phags las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyan to// de na gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang / myi srog chags brgya phrag mang po/ srog chags stong phrag mang po/ srog chags
300a2(brgyad stong): gro gas stong phrag mang ba chags pa de dag las/ la la ni lung nong / la la ni 'a tor byed/ la la ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas/ rtogs par byed// seMs can de dag thas cad kyang log par myi ltung ba'i/

300a5(brgyad stong): dag par gzeng stong pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin// rigs kyi bu des kyang sngon da ltar khyod ci ltar tshol ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yongasu btsal gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod

300a7(brgyad stong): mgu ying rangs rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur ba 'di lta ste dper ma/ skyes bu mede'u dug can zhig gis phog na/ yid la byed gzhan gyi skyed kyi gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar
300a8(brgyad stong): byed pa zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gis ni rnyed ste sos pa de bzhin du byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de thos par byed cing / chos gang yang thos nas
300b1(brgyad stong): bdag gis dmyigs pa yid la byed pa smos par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag na mthong sa tu ses pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yid la byed pa myed do// de nas byang chub seMs dpa' sos dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus
300b2(brgyad stong): phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/ chos thas cad la myi gnas pa'i 'du shes skyed nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo tu ma ngon tu gyur pa 'di lta ste/ chos thas cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thos cad
300b3(brgyad stong): kyi ngo bo nyid myi dmyigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi nad dang / chos thas cad myi zhes pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / chos thos cad 'gyur ba myed par thob par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzim dang / chos thos
300b4(brgyad stong): cang snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / chos thos cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / chos thas cad myi shes pa selang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang
300b5(brgyad stong): chos thas cad myi dmyigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me ta/ ga bkri ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / chos thos cad bdag gi dngos po myi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind dang / sgyu ma rnam
300b6(brgyad stong): rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'phe ra snang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / sos can thas cad kyi sgra bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / chos thos cad ma dang
300b7(brgyad stong): pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sos can thos cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seMs can thas cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjesu song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sA dang tshig dang 'bru snga
300b8(brgyad stong): logs bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / ma khyengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rang bzhinan par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa myed pa rnam par tharang pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang
301a1(brgyad stong): dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mying dang nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig dang 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / na mkha' dang / chos thas cad la rdzi bar lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
301a2(brgyad stong): dang / chos thas cad la sgrib pa myed pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / na mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / gzugs kyi rdul sel zhes
301a3(brgyad stong): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang phyir myi ldog pa'i myig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sos can thos cad zil kyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtul myed
301a4(brgyad stong): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ne nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
301a5(brgyad stong): snying po zas cad kyi rjesu song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thas cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi nang dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs dang / 
301a6(brgyad stong): myi 'jigs pa rdob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos zas cad la nges par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / chos thas cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / chos thas cad
301a7(brgyad stong): bye brag kyang bar lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi dang / lta bar byur ba'i rtsibs pa thams cad spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thos
301a8(brgyad stong): cang mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa thos cadalas rna bar dben zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / le lo zas cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
301b1(brgyad stong): chos zab mo'i 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinang dang / ri rab dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / myi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud kyi 'khor rna bar 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
301b2(brgyad stong): rag 'jig rter gsul mngon par chags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zeng bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin na par mngon tu gyur te/ 
301b3(brgyad stong): de ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi las na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed dpag tu myeng pa dag byang chub sos dpal mos dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
301b4(brgyad stong): pa 'di rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ngag gis legs zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs byung ba mdza/ ngag 'di skad kyang gsung ngo // rigs kyi bu red kyis kyang sngam
301b5(brgyad stong): byang chub ses dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol \u0f7fbyinang pa 'di bzhin tu bcal te/ yongasu tshol ba ma yang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob nas/ 
301b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pa yang tu byinang pa rtogs par 'ang du chung bar gyur te/ phyi gyi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to/ dkyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ging bo nyid dang / rang ba'is la 'altas
301b7(brgyad stong): na gang mnye bar gzhag par bya ba la/ ldang bar bya ba 'am/ byang chub tu spyad pa 'am/ gang tha ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag
301b8(brgyad stong): bang rjesu ma mthob/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni zhes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyin pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu chom gang gis kyang rlom sems/ rnam sos myed par gyi byed pa la gnas so/ nged kyis 'di 'dra ba'i lus
302a1(brgyad stong): gser gyi ladog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chenam po'i mtshan su bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byang bzang po brgya bcu dang / 'ang 'dam gang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhes rab ba
302a2(brgyad stong): gyis myi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na myed pa dang yon tan thas cad kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rje su thob ste/ yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis chang gzung ba'i
302a3(brgyad stong): mtha' bstand par myi nus na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid la rab tu don tu gnyer ba dang / 'dod pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par
302a4(brgyad stong): bya ste/ rigs kyi bu don tu gnyer ba dang / 'dod pa la ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yino// khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyem la shin tu gus pa bskyed par bya'o// 
302a5(brgyad stong): 'phangs par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pas byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 
302a6(brgyad stong): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags/ de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
302a7(brgyad stong): to// rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring po nas byang chub seMs dpal ses dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su sbyin par byas shing yongasu bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha 'om
302a8(brgyad stong): tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la bsrab so// rigs kyi bu de ni khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yong su 'dzin pa yin te/ des khyod la ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du zung shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis
302b1(brgyad stong): byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskal pa'i/ bskal pa gnyis so/ bskal pa brgya 'am bskal pa stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang mgo la thod bzhin du thogs shing
302b2(brgyad stong): bde ba'i yo byad thas cad kyis rim 'gror byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi las na/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thas cad phul yang rigs kyi bu
302b3(brgyad stong): khyod kyis de la lan lon pa ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin nas rnyed par 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang thabs mkhas pa thob cing / 
302b4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa thob par 'gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dbugs phyung nas myi snang bar gyur to// rigs
302b5(brgyad stong): kyi bu de yang ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te/ langs nas yang ri swA tu sos so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhung ste ste/ de de bzhin
302b6(brgyad stong): gshegs pa de dag ma mthong bas rab tu gdung zhing myi dga' bar gyurang to// yang de 'di snye du sos te/ byang chub seMs dpa' sos dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni gzungs thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ 
302b7(brgyad stong): sngon gyi rgyal ba rnaMs la lhag par bya ba byas pa ste/ bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongasu 'dzin pa/ yun ring po nas nges bdag gis don byas pa yin gyis/ bdag byang chub seMs dpa' sos dpa' chen po chos 'phags
302b8(brgyad stong): kyi drung tu mngon par song ste/ nye bar phyi nang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid 'dri'o snya mo// de nas byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa'
303a1(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba dang / dad pa rang gus par bya ba nye bar gzhag ste/ nye bar gzhag nas 'di snye du seMs/ bdag
303a2(brgyad stong): ka gis ji lta bu'i bkur stir byas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/ bdag ni dbul te gang gis byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bdag
303a3(brgyad stong): gis bkur stir bya ba'i gos rin po che 'am/ gser ram/ nor bu She/ mu tig gam/ bye dU r+ya 'am/ dung dang man shel dang byi cu'i dngul lam/ me tog gam spos sa
303a4(brgyad stong): 'phreng ba'i/ byug pa la/ phye ma la/ gdug pa dalta bu yang bdag la myed na/ bdag nying bzhin du byang chub seMs dadapa' seMs dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni
303a5(brgyad stong): bdag gis myi rigs pa byas par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba le/ rangs pa yang myi skye'o// swA tu seMs so// de nas byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ru de lta bu'i
303a6(brgyad stong): yon tan dag dang / bla ma la gus pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pas song nas mthard kyis grong gzhan zhig tu phyind pa dang / de grong bar gyi dbus su de 'di snye tu sos te 'di ltar bdag gis
303a7(brgyad stong): lus btsongs la de'i rin gyis byang chub seMs dpa' sos dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sting bya'o// yun ring po nas bdag gis lus stong zhig zang ngo // btsongs so// 'khor ba dpag
303a8(brgyad stong): tu myed pa na 'dod pa'i rgyus yang dang yang seMs can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu myed pa dag myong yang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir raM/ 'di lta bu'i sos can chen po la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir ma yin no// 
303b1(brgyad stong): snya mo// de nas byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rtag tu dus grong bar tu 'dug ste myi su 'dod myi su 'dod ces sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis be so// de nas btung sdig can 'di ste tu seMs te/ 
303b2(brgyad stong): byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas byang chub sos dpa' seMs dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir byed cing / ji ltar byang chub seMs dpa' seMs
303b3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su rdzogs par 'gyur// zos pa rgya mtsho rjesu thob pas 'gyur/ bdud kyi ris kyi
303b4(brgyad stong): lha dag gis myi thub par 'gyur/ yon tan thams cad kyang pha rol tu phyind pa rje su thob par 'gyur zhes shes ra da ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkhas pas
303b5(brgyad stong): yongasu 'dri bar 'gyur te/ der seMs can mang po de dag gi don byed par 'gyur/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de dag kyang nga'i
303b6(brgyad stong): yul las 'da' bar byed/ seMs can gzhan dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis 'di'i bar chad bya'o snyam nas/ bcud sdig can gyis ci nas bra ze dang khyim bdag
303b7(brgyad stong): de dag gis byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rtag tu dus myi su 'dod/ nga su nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra myi thos par 'gyur ba de lta bur yongasu bsgrib so// de nas byang chub sems dpal seMs dpa' chen po
303b8(brgyad stong): rtag tu ngu gang gi tshe bdag nyo ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe phyogs gcig tu song nas mchi ma phyung nas 'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs la byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya snyam ma
304a1(brgyad stong): lus nyo ba yang bdag gis ma rnyed de/ kye ma bdag ni thob pa ngan pa thob bo snyam// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam tu sems te 'di ltar byang chub seMs dpal ses dpa' chen po
304a2(brgyad stong): rtag tu bya 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gi lus yong su btang bar/ lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin na ma yin pa/ byang chub seMs dpa' sos dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu bdag gis sa
304a3(brgyad stong): bar bya'o// snyam ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/ byang chub sos dpa' ses dpa' chen po rtag tu dul ba der song ste/ 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpal ses
304a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu khyo de 'di ltar yid myi dga' zhing yid gad+hapal mchi ma byung ba ci nyes// des smras pa/ bra za'i khye'u nga ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid
304a5(brgyad stong): btsongs te/ chos la mchod pa bya bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba de ngas ma rnyed nas/ de la nga 'di snyam tu ses so// kye ma da ni bsod nas chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te shes rab kyi pha
304a6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyind pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur stir bya ste na/ bdag gis lus nyo ba yang ma rnyed do snyam// de nas bra ze'i
304a7(brgyad stong): le'u des byang chub seMs dpa' sos dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu pal myis ni bya ba byed kyi/ nga mchod sbyin zhig byed de/ der myi'i snying dang / khrag dang / nus pa dang / rkang
304a8(brgyad stong): dag pal chos na rin gyis pal nyor byin cig byas pa dang byang chub seMs dpal sos dpa' chen pa rtag tu 'di sto ru sos te/ gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / 
304b1(brgyad stong): rkang nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnye // bdag gi lus ni shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa dang / thabs mazhes pa la yongasu rdzogs par gyur to// ste nas/ de so sa
304b2(brgyad stong): dga' ba dang / sems bde ba dang / ses rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bra ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smraso// bram ze'i phye'u nga'i lus 'di las khyod gang 'dod pa sbyin no// des de la 'di
304b3(brgyad stong): skad ces smras// rigs kyi bu khyod rim du ci 'dod pa sbyin no// zhes byas pa dang / des de la 'di skad ces smras// bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis gang yongasu gtang ba de bal byin cig/ de nas byang / 
304b4(brgyad stong): chub sos dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mtshon rnon po thog sa nas lag pa g.yas pa phug ste/ khrag gzag so// brla g.yas pa phag sta sha myed par rtogs te/ rus pa gcog
304b5(brgyad stong): tu rtsig pa'i drung du so po// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhang pa'i yang thog tu 'dug pa nges byang chub ses dpal seMs dpa' chen po rtag tu dru brla sha myed par rtogs nas/ rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song
304b6(brgyad stong): ba mthong nas/ de 'di ste tu sos te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i mtsha ngag byed pa/ bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung tu song ste/ dri'o snyam nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub ses dpa'
304b7(brgyad stong): seMs dpa' chen po rtag tu du ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed/ khrag
304b8(brgyad stong): dang / nus pa dang / rkang 'dis ci zhig bya rtag tu dus mu mo de la 'di skad ces smraso// bram ze'i khye'u 'di la btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mchod par bya'o// 'phags pa byang chub sos
306a1(brgyad stong): dpal sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur stir bya'o// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub seMs dpal sos dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi/ 
306a2(brgyad stong): bu khyod 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / nus pa dang / rkang yang btsongs te rigs kyi bu de la bkur sti bya bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan gyi rna pa ci lta bu zhig 'grub par 'gyur/ 
306a3(brgyad stong): des de la smras pa/ bu mo rigs kyi bu de ni gang la ngas bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dag ston par 'gyur te/ de la ngas bslabs nas/ bla na myed pa
306a4(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs nga rgyas nas/ seMs can thas cad kyi rten tu 'gyur/ lus gang ser gyi kha dog lta bu yang 'thob par 'gyur// skyes bu chen
306a5(brgyad stong): po'i mtshan su bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgya pa cu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / 'od zer mtha' yas pa dang / byas pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang
306a6(brgyad stong): btang snyoms chen po dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so ya dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang thob par 'gyur// mngon par shes pa lnga dang / tshul khris rna
306a7(brgyad stong): par dag pabs kyis kyi khyab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin na par dag pa bas kyis myi khyab pa dang / shes rab rna par dag pa khas kyis kyi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgya dang / bla ma myed pa
306a8(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang gis sos can thos cad la kun tu bgo bsha' bya ba'i bla na myed pa'i chos rin po che yang rab tu 'thob par 'gyu

306b2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du lus yongasu btang bar bya ba yin ma/ gcig lta ci smos te/ de tsam tu khyod kyis chos 'di dag rgya cher yongasu brjod na/ rigs
306b3(brgyad stong): kyi bu khyod gang gis byang chub ses dpa' seMs dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sting bya ba'i gser ram/ nor bu laM/ mu tig kram/ bye dUr+ya 'am dngul laM/ me tog gi/ gtug pa 'am/ spos
306b4(brgyad stong): sa maH'phreng ba'i/ byug pa 'am/ phye ma'o/ dgos sam/ gtugs so/ khyod la ci dgos pa khyod la sbyin gyis/ bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal
306b5(brgyad stong): ma byed cig/ kho mo yang khyod dang 'grogs te/ byang chu bsos dpa' seMs dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba de do la bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ 
306b6(brgyad stong): de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrun par rig par bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ba ze'i khye lnga'i cha byad gyi sdang bar byas nas bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub sos
306b7(brgyad stong): dpal seMs dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i mdun tu 'dug nas 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar yid de la brtan pa ni leg so legaso// 'di lta bu'i chos 'dod pas sngon gyi de bzhin
306b8(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang / sngon byang chub so sa dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkhas pa yongasu

307a8(brgyad stong): chub sos dpal ses dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i lus sngon gyi bzhin du gnas par 'gyuraro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin spobs pa myed par gyur nas/ byang chub seMs dpa' sos dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu
307b1(brgyad stong): la lan klan par spobs pa ma bskyes na/ de nyid du myi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo nges byang chub ses dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu tshur shog/ 
307b2(brgyad stong): kho bo'i khyim gang na yod pa der 'dong ngo // kho mos pha ma las nor blangs te nges shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyinang pa de yang mchod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la
307b3(brgyad stong): yang bkur stir bya ba yi no// de nas byang chub ses dpa' sos dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo der 'grogs nas/ de rang gi khyim ga la ba der dong ngo // der tshong dpon gyi bu
307b4(brgyad stong): mo de dag gi khyim du phyinang nas pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ yab yu gser dang / dngul dang rimadache dang / nor bu dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos

307b6(brgyad stong): bdag kyang byed kyis stsalang ba'i g.yog mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang / lhan cig dbyer gsolang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dang bdag cag 'grogs te/ 
307b7(brgyad stong): byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi ba'i srang du'o// de yang bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyur ro// de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad
307b8(brgyad stong): ces smras so// bu mo byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de su zhig/ bu mo rigs kyi bu de da lta gang na 'dug pa mas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de nga lha 'o skol
308a1(brgyad stong): gyi sgo drung na mchis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni lhag pa'i bsam pas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa 'di la ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i
308a2(brgyad stong): sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las tha dad par bgyid par 'tshal bas/ de chos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag nyid btsongs la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal ba/ 'phags pa byang
308a3(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bgyi bar 'tshal na/ de'i lus nyo ba su yang ma byung ste/ de sdug bsngal zhing yid myi bde nas myi dga' bar sems shing mchis te/ des nga'i
308a4(brgyad stong): lus btsong bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba ma rnyed do zhes bgyis pa dang brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur te/ de la 'di ska da du rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir lus btsong bar 'dod ces pa
308a5(brgyad stong): bgyis pa dngang / rtag tu ngu des shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la mchod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur stir bya'o// nga'i sangs rgyas
308a6(brgyad stong): kyi chos rnams ni de la rag las pas 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bgyes pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur bas 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ni nga myi 'dod de/ nga mchod sbyin
308a7(brgyad stong): zhig byed pa der myi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dgos so zhes bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu des yi ma bsad par de skad du sbyin no zhes smras nas/ de mtshon rnon po thogs te bdag gi lag pa lug
308a8(brgyad stong): nas khrag gzags/ brla'i sha btogs te/ rus pa gcog tu song nas/ phyogs cig tu 'dug ste/ rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no snyam nas/ de khrag gzag pa bdag khang pa'i yang tog na mchis pas
308b1(brgyad stong): mthong ste / de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid do// mye 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid lan cha dag babyed snyam ste/ de'i thad du mchis nas 'di snyam du bgyis so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag nyid kyis lus
308b2(brgyad stong): kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad ces mchis ste/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang / snying dang / rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ni dbul te/ 
308b3(brgyad stong): pa la nor ci yang myed do zhes mchi'o// bdag gis khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la mchod par bya'o// 
308b4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang ba kur sting bya'o zhes mchi nas/ bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyi ngas te/ rigs kyi bu des khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa 'am
308b5(brgyad stong): yon tan gyi khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur// de dag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / sar sa rgyas kyi chos dpag tu myed pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// 
308b6(brgyad stong): 'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis kyi khyab pa de dag thos nas/ bdag kyi padaga' ba dang // rab tu dgu pa chen po rab tu skyes nas 'di sa
308b7(brgyad stong): du babyed de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i gnas la spro bar 'byed pa ni shin tu dka' ba babyed pa ste/ ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid yongs su gtong na/ bdag cag la
308b8(brgyad stong): longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod la/ ci'i phyir chos la mchod pa myi bgyid/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i phyir myi gdab snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so// 
309a1(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu khyod bdag la 'di lta bu'i na cha dag ma byed cig/ khyod 'dod pa gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur stir bya ba'i nor mang po dag
309a2(brgyad stong): khyod la sbyin no// bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags ga la ba der mchi'o// bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod par bgyi'o// gang khyod kyis
309a3(brgyad stong): yongs su brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na myed pa yang dag pa bdag gyis kyang thob par bgyis ma yab yum gyis kor gyi phung po chen po bdag la stsal du gsol// bdag gis kyang rigs kyi
309a4(brgyad stong): bu de dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod par bgyi'o// // bam po
309a5(brgyad stong): de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de'i dka' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa lags
309a6(brgyad stong): chos de dag ni gcig tu nges par bas kyis myi khyab pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags pa sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de lta bu'i dka'
309a7(brgyad stong): ba'i gnas la/ smyo bar byed na/ khyod nged kyis gnang gyis bu mo nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la blta zhing / mchod pa byed du nged kyang 'gro yis// nged
309a8(brgyad stong): 'gro ba'i skabs phye shig/ de nas bu mo de byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lngal mchod par bya ba dang / bkur sting bya ba'i phyir chas te/ pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag ni dan
309b1(brgyad stong): pa'i phyogs gang gi yang bar chad myi 'byed do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing rta lnga brgya yang brgyan bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang brgyan gyis brgyan to// brgyan gyis brgyan pa me tog sna tshogs thogs
309b2(brgyad stong): bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog thogs/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa
309b3(brgyad stong): dag kyang thogs te/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / mya ba mang po mang du bskur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ru dang / shing rta gcig tu zhugs te/ bu mo lnga brgya shing rnga lnga brgya
309b4(brgyad stong): nang du zhugs pa de dag gis yongs su bskor cing / mdun du bdang nas/ pha ma las stsogs pa 'khor mang po dang / shar phyog/ sa ga la ba de log su dong ste/ mthar da kyis song ba dang / byang
309b5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ rgyang ring po zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba/ lta na sdug pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba rim bdun
309b6(brgyad stong): gyis bskor ba/ rta babs bdun yod pa 'obs rim pa 'dun drang / ta la'i 'greng ba rim bdun gyis yongasu bskor ba/ chung dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byord cing mod la bde ba
309b7(brgyad stong): lo legs pa mye mang po dang / skye bo mang pos gang ba/ grong bar gyi srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa khyogs khri nyam myi pa dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa/ 
309b8(brgyad stong): legs par byas pa mthong ngo // de'i dbus kyi bzhi mdo na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khri la 'dug nas/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma dang / brgya stong
310a1(brgyad stong): zag du mas yongs su bser cing / mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa dag mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang
310a2(brgyad stong): kapo rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas/ snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no// de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
310a3(brgyad stong): kyi drung du 'gro ba ni/ bdag gi myi cha'o snyam nas/ de nas shing rta de las babs pa dang / cheb dpon gyi bu mo dang / bu mo lnga brgya de dag mnyam du zhing rta las babs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sos
310a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu mu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs pa bu mo lA brgya yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdang te/ bkod pa tshad myed/ pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'pha/ 
310a5(brgyad stong): ga la ba der dong ngo // de'i me byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'chen po ches 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rolab tu phyind pa khang bu rtsegs pa ri po che sna bdun las byas pa/ can ngan dmang pos brdzun
310a6(brgyad stong): cing / mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de'i grwa bzhir nor bu rin po che gzhag par gyurd te/ de dag sgron ma'i bya ba byed do// gdug spos kyi sdong rdul las byas pa bzhi
310a7(brgyad stong): yang phyogs bzhed btags te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ a ga ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis bdug par byed do// khang pa brtsegs pa de'i dbus na/ rin po
310a8(brgyad stong): che sna bdun gyi khri bzhi btsugs te/ de'i steng du rin po che'i sbom bzhi bzhag/ de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gser gyi glegs bam la bye du r+ya zhums bris pa bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de
310b1(brgyad stong): yang dang kyi rkun po sna tshogs rnam pa sa dad pa 'byung bas brgyan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du tsong dpor kyi thu bo las spogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas/ khang du
310b2(brgyad stong): brtsegs pa de bkod pa chang myed pas brgyan pa mthong ma rung mams dmamasas ya dpa' chen padab tu/ stong zag sa sa kya mthong ste lha'i dbang po brgya gyis sang lnga'i gtog pa ra da ba nga / 
310b3(brgyad stong): lha'i can das gyi byes dang / kwa'i gser gyi phye ma dang / lha'i dngus kyi bye ma dag gis khang bu brtsegs pa de sa 'thong mngon par 'thod/ mngon par rab tu 'thong ba mthong ngo // lha'i sil snyan rag kyang 'os
310b4(brgyad stong): so// mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i dbang po brgya byen khyod la stong phrag dum
310b5(brgyad stong): dag dang / rin po che'i khang bu bsregs pa 'di la ci'i phyer/ me tog man dang ba dang / tsan ngan gyi phye ma dag gis 'thor zhing / mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor/ lha'i sil
310b6(brgyad stong): snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams par snang la ci'i phyir rdung / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rtsal 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi/ 
310b7(brgyad stong): bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang / yongs su 'dren pa yin te/ 'di la bslabs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
310b8(brgyad stong): chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid kyang myur tu thob pa yin na// khyod myi shes sam/ de skad ces
311a1(brgyad stong): ga / mas pa' bu sa sa sa byed du sa mas shes sa ra byed du kyang thams dpa'as
311a2(brgyad stong): ka radab thon po rnams kyi yum dang yongs su 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs/ brgya byin gyis gsol dra la/ de ni khang bu bsregs pa 'di'i nangangan/ gser gyi glegs pa ma la bye ba rgya bzhu pas bres pa/ b+har
311a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zos 'phags kyis chu rim bdun gyis btab nas bzhag ste/ nged kyis khyod la bstan par dka'/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ru tshong
311a4(brgyad stong): dpon gyi bu mo las sogs te bu mo lnga brgya dag dang / tshogs nas de dag gis me tog dang / 'phreng ba'i chun po dang / gos rin po che dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang /

311a6(brgyad stong): byind pa la mchod bu byas te/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ bkur sed bya ba'i phyir chashas kyis bzhag go// de ras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ni
311a7(brgyad stong): bo rtag tu dru/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la stsogs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin

311b1(brgyad stong): chos 'phags la/ me tog dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / 
311b2(brgyad stong): dngul gyi me tog dag gis gtong mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng du me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa
311b3(brgyad stong): zhig tu gyur da to// gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag ni nam mkha' la gzhal myed khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyurd to// chos gos dang / gos rin po che de dag kyang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khod
311b4(brgyad stong): 'dra bar 'dug par gyur da to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
311b5(brgyad stong): po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sos te ngo mtshar to// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di rdzu 'phrul che zheng
311b6(brgyad stong): 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di ltar gzi brjid che ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
311b7(brgyad stong): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i che/ ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches
311b8(brgyad stong): 'phags la dga' ba skyed nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
312a1(brgyad stong): dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyud cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i srung ba spyod pa na sang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis chos gang thob pas/ 
312a2(brgyad stong): byung dpa/ 'di ga bu'i chos rnams thob par gyud da cig/ bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa ma yang / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams mngon gsum du gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
312a3(brgyad stong): yang ji gar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags bkur sed byed pa 'di bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bkur steng byed par shog shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa dang / 
312a4(brgyad stong): chen po chos 'phags ji ltar son pa bzhin du/ bdag kyang ste po mang po la stond par gyur cig/ ji ltar byang chub sems da 'a sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
312a5(brgyad stong): pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa 'di bzhi na du/ bdag cag kyang kyis rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thas mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa bshog shig ces
312a6(brgyad stong): smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mchod pa byas/ 'phags
312a7(brgyad stong): pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur bstir byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ zhes byed ni
312a8(brgyad stong): thal mo skyabs phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces
312b1(brgyad stong): smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di la bdag zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa tshol zhing 'brog dgos par phyind pa na sgra thos pas rigs kyi bu zhar phyogs su song zhig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos par 'gyur ro// 
312b2(brgyad stong): zhes bdag gis spa thos nas/ sapa phyogs ga'i la logs su mchis nas 'di sam du sems to// bdag gis sA de la'i srid cig tu mchis par bgyi/ su la ma gas rab kyi pha rol du gyis
312b3(brgyad stong): pa mnyan cing rnyed par 'gyur ba ma dris so snyam ste/ des bdag yid kyi bde zhing shin tu gdung bar gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/ de lta bshin tu gdung bas zas la sems pa ni ma byung
312b4(brgyad stong): gi gzhan du na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'ba' zhig yid la ba gyis te/ ji srid cig tu mchi bar bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi rold tu phyind pa 'di sa ltas mnyan+d+ha ba rnyed par 'gyur ba/ swa
312b5(brgyad stong): de la ma dris so snyam pa deng / de nas bdag gi mdun tu de bzhin pa/ shegs pa'i sku gzugs shig byung ste/ de 'di skad ces gsungs so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar song dang / 
312b6(brgyad stong): grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'chad ba mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de
312b7(brgyad stong): las bdag gis 'di thos nas ji ltar gtams pa bzhin du/ shang phyogs ga la ba de logs su zhugs te mchis pa dang / rgyang ring mo zhig nas/ 'phags pa chos stond pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu bdag
312b8(brgyad stong): dol bde ba 'di lta bu skyes pa/ dper na dge slong / bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin te/ bdag dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nas ma bskyod par
313a1(brgyad stong): khyod las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos so// de nyan pa na ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to// bdag den mchis pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom
313a2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das rnams kyi dbugs phyung ba mdzad de// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyi ting nge 'dzind 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa las skyes pa yin te/ 'di la gnas pas nged kyis
313a3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi / chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas so zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu legs par bstan nas myi snang bar gyur da to// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzind de las langs nas
313a4(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam mo// de nas yang bdag 'di snyam du bsnams te/ byang chub
313a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags ni sngon gyi rgyal pa dag la bgyi ba bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang thabs mkhas pa la shin tu bslabs
313a6(brgyad stong): pa lags te de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa/ de dag bdag la ston par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pade
313a7(brgyad stong): dag gang du 'thud pa bdag 'drin/ ci nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud par 'chal cing de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / mye 'bral bar 'byung bar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon
313a8(brgyad stong): pa dang / bzhud pa bdag la bshad du gsolang// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ brgyad stong pa las rtag tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste// sa sum bcu pa'o// 
313b1(brgyad stong): de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu phul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshes
313b2(brgyad stong): pa de dag ni/ gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du yang ma bzhud de/ de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos so// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu myi skye ba la 'ong ba 'am
313b3(brgyad stong): 'gro ba myed de/ sde ste bgapa yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba myed de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin 'di ni// de bzhin gshes
313b4(brgyad stong): pa'o// rigs kyi bu stong ba nyid la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba mye dang / stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu ji lta ba bzhin la ni 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba myed
313b5(brgyad stong): de/ ji lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de ni ga de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba la ni 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba myed de/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni/ 
313b6(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'gog pa la ni/ 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba myed de/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i khams la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba myed de/ 
313b7(brgyad stong): nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa kun na myed de/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin
313b8(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid la ni gnyis su byar myed do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ myed pa'i phyir/ 
314a1(brgyad stong): gnyis sam/ gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu nyi mas gdungs pas sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i che/ smyig rgyu g.yo ba
314a2(brgyad stong): mthong nas ka der chu btung ngo zhes de dang der rgyug na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ chu gang nas 'ongs gang du song / chu de shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ nub phyogs kyi
314a3(brgyad stong): rgya mtsho 'am byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho gang du song / rtag tu dus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu smyig rgyu la chu ma mchis na 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba lta ga la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu skyes bu de nyi mas gdungs shing byis pa'i
314a4(brgyad stong): rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can gyis smyig rgyu mthong nas/ chu ma mchis pa la/ chung 'du shes bskyed kyi de la chu ni rang bzhin gyis ma mchis so// chos 'phags kyis
314a5(brgyad stong): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang su dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa lag thugs sam/ sgrar mngon pang chags par byed pa dag ni/ de
314a6(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par rtog go// gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni/ byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin
314a7(brgyad stong): can zhes bya ste/ dper na skyes bu de chu myed pa la/ chung 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi skur sde lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o// 
314a8(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu chos nyid ni 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba myed de/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa 'am/ bzhud pa myed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na sgra sa sprul da pa// tha na
314b1(brgyad stong): che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba myed do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la'ang byon pa 'am bzhud pa myed
314b2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmyi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum bcu 'am/ 
314b3(brgyad stong): bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ de las lhag pa zhig mthong ba las/ sad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas
314b4(brgyad stong): byon/ gang du bzhud rtag tu dus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rmyi la la chos gang yang 'grub par myi gda'o// rmyi lam ni rdzun te ya nga dag pa yang ma lags pa'o// chos 'phags kyis smras
314b5(brgyad stong): pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas/ rmyi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungs so// rig sa kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thas cad rmyil
314b6(brgyad stong): lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa la myi zhes pa de dag ni mying mtshan gyi sku dang / gzugs kyi sku mngon par zhen par byed de/ de ltar chos nyid myi shes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa
314b7(brgyad stong): dang / bzhud par rtog go// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par 'dod pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni 'khong ba 'gro ba drug par 'dod pa dang / 'dod bar 'gyur ba
314b8(brgyad stong): dang / de dag thams cad ni/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa las rgyang du gyur pa'o// de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur da pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu gang dag chos thos
316a1(brgyad stong): cad mye lam lta bu la/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad skye lam lta bu'o zhes/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa zhes pa de dag ni skye ba 'am/ 'gag par mye rtog go// klu
316a2(brgyad stong): dag chos kapal yang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par myi rtog pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes so// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu zhes
316a3(brgyad stong): pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am/ bzhud par mye tog go// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'i chos nyid de lta bu rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye ba
316a4(brgyad stong): gyu rang pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos de dag ni yul 'khor kyi bsod snyom sa don yod par za ste/ de dang de dag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gyi
316a5(brgyad stong): gnas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po 'i nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs lho dang / nub dang / bya dang / phyogs 'tshams dang / 
316a6(brgyad stong): steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas/ rgya mtsho chen po de'i nang nas rin po che dag byung ste/ de dag kyang rgyu myed par 'byung
316a7(brgyad stong): ba ma yin gyi rgyu dang rkyen dang / gzhi lngas rag las pa yin te/ brten nas 'byung ngo // rin po che de dag 'gags pa yang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang mye 'pho med kyi rkyen de dag yod na rin po che
316a8(brgyad stong): de dag rab tu 'byed do// rkyen de dag myed na rin po che de dag rab tu 'byed pa yang myed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku mngon par grub pa yang gang nas kyang ma byon// 
316b1(brgyad stong): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang ma bzhud do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu myed pa yang ma yin te/ sngon gyi spyad pas yongasu grub pa yin pas/ rgyu dang / rkyen la rag las pa sngon
316b2(brgyad stong): gyi 'phrin las rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no// de dag kyang rkyen rnams yod na/ sku mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag myed na/ sku mngon par 'grub par myi 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag myed
316b3(brgyad stong): na/ sku mngon par 'grub pa pa yang mye snang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pi khang gi sgra byung ba yang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gags pa yang gang du yang myi 'gro// gang du yang mye 'pho ste/ rten na
316b4(brgyad stong): 'byung ba rgyu la rag las rkyen la rag las pa'o// 'di lta ste pe/ bang gi khog pa la brten phags pa la brten/ rgyud la brten shing bu la brten/ rgyud rten la brten/ mye de las skyes pa
316b5(brgyad stong): rtsol ba las brten nas/ pi bang de las spa byung ste/ sna da yang pi bang gi khog pa las ma byung / pags pa las ma bya pa/ rgyud las ma byung / shing bu las ma byung / rgyud rten las
316b6(brgyad stong): ma byung / mye de la skyes pa'i rtsol ba las snga ma byung mod kyi/ de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang slar gragasa~M la/ sba de 'gags pa yang gang du yang mye 'gro ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom
316b7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das rjes kyi yongasu 'grub pa yang rgyu la rag las pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba du mas yongasu grub pa yin te/ rgyu gcig gis ma yin/ rkyen gcig gis ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis ma yin/ sangs
316b8(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ rgyu myed pa yang ma yin no// rgyu dang / rkyen mang po'i tshogs pa las byung ba yin te/ de ni gang nas kyang ma byon to// rgyu dang / rkyen tshogs pa myed kyang gang du
317a1(brgyad stong): yang myi bzhud do// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa de ltar blta'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chud
317a2(brgyad stong): par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed par shes pa de tshun chad khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
317a3(brgyad stong): chub tu nges shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang / bzhud pa myed pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yo ba chen po
317a4(brgyad stong): 'byung ste/ stong ga su bye stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la di thas cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul
317a5(brgyad stong): kun tu rab tu 'gul to// bdud kyi gnas thams cad dkrongs shing spa gong bar gyur da to// stong gsuM gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rtsa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags
317a6(brgyad stong): tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba de log su rab tu btud par gyu rad to// dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag kyang steng gi bar sdang las
317a7(brgyad stong): 'thong zhing / me tog gi chang dag kyang phab bo// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la/ lha'i tsan dan gyi bye ma dang / lha'i me tog
317a8(brgyad stong): ngag gis 'thor mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing / tshig 'di skad zer te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus der bdag cag gis kyang / don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam/ 'jig rten thas cad
317b1(brgyad stong): dang myi mthun pa gang 'jig tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstan pa 'di thos so zhes 'dzer to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems
317b2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sa g.yos pa chen po byung ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams myi
317b3(brgyad stong): byon/ myi bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dras te kho bos bstan pas/ srog chags brgya stong myi skye ba'i chos la bzod par gyurd pa dang / khrig khrig brgya phrag brgya bcu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
317b4(brgyad stong): tu sems bskyed pa dang / srog chags drag khri bzhi stong chos rnam sa la/ chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma myed pa rnam par dag pa ragyur da to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
317b5(brgyad stong): po rtag tu ngu dga' ba dang / rangs pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyu ra te/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / de ba zhen gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa myed pa bstan pa
317b6(brgyad stong): 'di dris pas sems can 'di snyed kyi don byas par gyurd pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// 'di nyid kyis bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog gis
317b7(brgyad stong): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phyir the tsom myi bya'o// bdag ni the tsom myed par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / de dga'
317b8(brgyad stong): ba dang / rangs pa de dag dang ldan pas/ ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ ta la bdun tsam du 'dug ste/ bdag nam mkha' la 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chem
318a1(brgyad stong): chos 'phags la bkur snying bya'o snyam sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ru/ mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas// de'i sos sos
318a2(brgyad stong): kyis shes nas/ de la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag byin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu me tog 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir gyis shig/ 'di ni ngas khyod
318a3(brgyad stong): yongs su bzung ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas te/ rigs kyi bu gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir ji ltar spro bar byed pa/ de lta bur bskal pa grangs myed dpag tu
318a4(brgyad stong): myed par spro ba byed pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed par dka' ba zhes smras pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog de dag blangs te/ 
318a5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la ga ti dad to// rab tu gtor da nas bdag gi lus kyis byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par
318a6(brgyad stong): bkab ste/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu der slan chad khyod kyis rim gro dang / nyam 'bring bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gi lus khyod la dbul lo// des bdag gis lus phul nas byang chub seMs dpal
318a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang / 'khor lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rdul 'di skad ces/ 
318a8(brgyad stong): smras so// rigs kyi bdag cag kyang khyod la lus dbul gyis// bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag thob par gyu da cig/ khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
318b1(brgyad stong): rnams la bkur sting bgyi/ de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dus/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyal 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo dag khyod pa la lhag
318b2(brgyad stong): pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed na/ ngal lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang / bu mo khyed ngas blang ngo // bu de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas/ khyod kyi rjes su mthus
318b3(brgyad stong): par 'jug go// khyod la lhag pa'i bsam khas kyi 'dod par bdag nyid la dbul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sgrogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgyad
318b4(brgyad stong): dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ shing rta lnga brgya yang brgyan nas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la phul te/ rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'khor 'di dag dang
318b5(brgyad stong): shi ta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongasu longs spyod pa'i phyir khyod la 'a bul lo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ 
318b6(brgyad stong): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis bdog pa thos cad yongs su btang bar bya'o// yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bus myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
318b7(brgyad stong): par 'tshang rgya'o// de ltar na chos smrab dag la mchod pa byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang thabs mkhas pas nyan nus te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
318b8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na// 'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
319a1(brgyad stong): phyind pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su dris so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang / shi rda la
319a2(brgyad stong): brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i rtag tu ngu'i/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te/ blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngul slar byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
319a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te/ bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang nyi ma yang nub par gyurd to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ 'di snyam du sems te
319a4(brgyad stong): 'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phye ba 'ongs la/ 'dug pa 'amanyangal bar byed pa ni/ bdag gi mye cha la 'di ni ma legs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di lta ste/ 
319a5(brgyad stong): chos ston tu ma byung gi bar du bdag 'greng ba dang / 'chag pa spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o// snyam mo de nas byang chupa sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar
319a6(brgyad stong): du ting nge 'dzind cig la snyoms par bzhugs par gyur cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkhas pa las byung ba
319a7(brgyad stong): la gnas par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du yang lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung / gnod sems kyi rtog pa ma byung / rnaM pa 'che ba'i rtog pa ma byung / rol pa
319a8(brgyad stong): ba ma skyes te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam ldang bar 'gyur/ bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khrig pa la rigs
319b1(brgyad stong): kye bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bshams na/ bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag btab kyis legs par byugs la/ me tog sna tshogs gtor da te/ sa phyogs gang du byang chub mas
319b2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur ba/ de dag legs par byug par bya'o snyam mo// tshong dpon gyi bu mo las stsogs pa bu mo
319b3(brgyad stong): lnga brgya de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob cing / spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'das par byed de/ bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rje su 'jug go// de nas byang chub
319b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i sgra de thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'phags zhag dun na ting nge 'dzind 'di las langs ste/ langs nas grong khyer gyi
319b5(brgyad stong): dbus su 'dug ste/ chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes grags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du lA'i sgra thos pa dang / dga' mgu yid rangs/ rab tu mgu zhing dgal ba
319b6(brgyad stong): dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang / sa phyogs de sngags nas/ chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyis sbas pa bshams so// de nas bu mo de dag gis rang ra
319b7(brgyad stong): kyi thugs phrad te/ sen gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos ston par 'byung / deng bting ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus
319b8(brgyad stong): phyogs deng chag chag btab par 'dod na/ bdud sdig can gis chu thams cad rtse snang bar bya nas/ ce nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus rgya ma rnyed nas/ yid myi dga' zhing sdug
330a1(brgyad stong): bsngal te/ sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod pa de yang myi mdzes par bya ba'i phyed chu de dag myi snang bar byas nas/ kun tu chu btsal na chu ma nyed do// 
330a2(brgyad stong): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi lus phug la khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag bdab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di rdul che se/ 
330a3(brgyad stong): rdul gi khams 'di nas byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rgyalha phog na myi rung na/ bdag gi lus gdon myi za bar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig bya bdag gi lus 'di lta
330a4(brgyad stong): bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni bla'i nus pa myed pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khor ba dag na/ bdag gi lu saM bats+tsha stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni cer yang ma rung ngo / 
330a5(brgyad stong): rnam mo/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus mtshon rnon po blangs te/ bdag gi lus kun tu phug nas rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu chag
330a6(brgyad stong): rna pa bo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis kyang / mtshon rnon po blangs te/ rang rang gi
330a7(brgyad stong): sa nas// rang rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de cag chag btab ste/ gang de dag la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar cang bya ba'i grags rnyed par ma byung par byang chub sems dpa'
330a8(brgyad stong): den sa mye chen po rtag tu dang / bu mo de dag sems gzhan du 'gyur ba myed do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di ji tsam du/ chos
330b1(brgyad stong): kyi bu de 'dra ba/ ci tsam du yi dam la brtan pa dang / ci tsam du go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang / srog dang / longs spyod rnams la mye lta ba dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa
330b2(brgyad stong): dpa' sem 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu myed pa las/ sems can thar bar bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i bas
330b3(brgyad stong): lnga brgya gas pa ni ngo mtshar to// snyam du sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de thams cad/ lA'i tsan dan gyi chung byin gyis brlabs te/ lha'i tsan dan gyi chu de'i dri dam pa/ rgya che
330b4(brgyad stong): semasam gyis myi khyab pas sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu bag chad brgya pAr d+his khyab bo// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu
330b5(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mye khyab bo// da kyi chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba bla na myed do// 
330b6(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu sngon gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de dag gis/ lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus bla na
330b7(brgyad stong): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'
330b8(brgyad stong): sems dpal chen po chos 'phags chos kyi stan ni bting / sa phyogs 'di phyag dang ni byas/ chag chag ni btab/ bdag gis me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub seMs
331a1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad pa la gto dad par bya'o// me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya gyis byang chub sos
331a2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu phul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog man da ra ba 'di dag long la khyod kyis phyogs 'di dag me tog bkram pa gyis shig/ byang chub sems
331a3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos stond cing / seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa la gtodad cig ces/ des de la lha'i me tog man dAr 'khal stong byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
331a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus me tog de dag blangs te/ me tog kha cig gis ni/ sa phyogs deng me tog bkram pa byas so/ sde tog kha cig gis ne/ byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa'
331a5(brgyad stong): chen po chos 'phags la gtong to// de nas byang chub sems pa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phag lo bdun 'das pa dang / ting nge 'dzind de las langs te/ chos kyi stan gangan yod pa deng 'ongs
331a6(brgyad stong): stan bting ba 'dug ste/ 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du byang chub
331a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu/ 'di lta sa dper na/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong ce gcig tu med la byed pa bzhin du bde ba las bu thob bo/ 
331a8(brgyad stong): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ston pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mnyam pa nyid// 
331b1(brgyad stong): chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rolab tu phyind pa dben pa nyid do// chos thams cad g.yo ba myed pa nyid bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba myed pa nyid do// chos thams cad rlom

331b5(brgyad stong): mkha' mu myed pa nyid pas/ zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da mu myed pa nyid do// rgya mtsho mu myed pa nyid pas shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mu myed pa nyid do// ri rab sna tshogs

331b7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mu myed pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par zhes pa mu myed pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mu myed
331b8(brgyad stong): pa nyid do// sa'i khams mu myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mu myed pa nyid do// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu myed pa nyid pas/ shes rab/ 
333a1(brgyad stong): kyis rolang du byed pa su byed pa nyid do// nas ma'a' ma byed pa nyid pas pa shes rab kyi sa ro ba tu byin pa su byed pa su myed pa nyid do// dengel bu'i tshogs nyam pa nyid pas shes

333a5(brgyad stong): gyis myi khyab nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i/ ting nge 'dzind
